thy grace spend small short transitorie time world verie fountaine welspring vale miserie may made member christ partaker thine eternall felicitie seeing mine owne desert shall neuer able aspire sinne trulie aboundeth ech deed act mine onelie infected altogither polluted therwith none remedie haue ease selfe none salue heale sore onelie take hold promise thine wheras thou saiest come vnto ye ye labour ouerladen refresh holdfast mine anchor sure staie verelie sweet sauiour looke vpon mine owne frailnesse behold readie offend thee quake feare almost vtter despaire soone call mind thy great loue kindnesse thou wilt death sinner rather repent liue daie soeuer doth hartilie repent call vnto thee thou wilt heare releeued little comforted knowing surelie thou wilt performe thou hast promised faithfull assurance whereof saie vnto thee turne thou god shall turned wickednesse deliuer heale soule wounded sinne doo acknowledge mine iniquitie hartilie sorie mine offence correct lord yet thy furie looke vpon weaknesse thinke vpon thine owne worthinesse remember thy louing kindnesse abundance multitude thy mercy wipe cleane awaie pardon forget sinnes haue either word deede though anie kind way offended thee blot thy remembrance let bloud immaculate lambe iesus christ wash awaie let mine old offence decaie die neuer commit anie meanes renew thy sight meane time doo withdrawe thy grace cause doo good father remoue thy wrath awaie restore vnto thy fauour turne thou thy louing countenance vnto plentifullie powre foorth thy mercie vpon incline hart doo onelie acceptable thy sight guide thou footesteps thy path suffer time straie thy way let alwaies haue feare thee hart remembrance thy benefit fresh memorie anie time weakenesse failtie doo transgresse thy commandements yet doo therefore reiect cast thy sight thou good samaritane powre oile wine mercie forgiuenesse wound sinne shall make disdaine reuolting haue mercie vpon according thy great goodnesse according multitude thy mercy wipe awaie mine iniquitie hide vnder shadowe thy wing protection lighten mee thy holie spirit make thy seruant indue thy grace may vnfeinedlie hart voice serue honour praise thee day life amen another praier obteining grace mercie mercifull lord god whose maiestie incomprehensible power infinite whose magnificence exalted aboue heauens vouchsafe beseech thee fro thy high throne behold worke thy hand haue pitie vnhappie desolate condition thy creature sinner conceiued sinne selfe haue good thing wherefore lord cleaue altar thy mercie thou art anchor hope refuge staie therefore lord haue mercie vpon flesh iustified thy sight thou knowest frailtie weakenesse men taught fall peter doo nothing without thee graunt v therefore good lord thy grace without world like waues temptation swallowed gulph whirlepoole sinne drowned ship without anchor pilote euerie tempest runne rocke perish guide v therefore thy grace good lord flouds carefull world may rest euer pleasant port happie hauen euerlasting ioie thine elected blessed sauiour iesus christ whome thee holie ghost honour glorie world amen confession said penitent person mercifull lord god haue offended throne thy maiestie sinnes euer mine eies worthie liue enioie fruit wherewith thou hast blessed earth mine owne conscience tormenter bringing testimonie witnesse sunne doth hide light place woorsse wherein become lord shall doo shall despaire thou art mercifull readie forgiue aske confesse sinnes thee wearie sinfull life sorie soule mine offence wherefore good lord thou dooest ease laden refresh trauell thou hast promised mercie penitent looke thy seruant thy cheerefull countenance behold pitifull eies thou didst marie magdalen woman taken adulterie thou hast shed thy bloud ou altar crosse offering thy pretious bodie eternall sacrifice sinnes despise thou hast redeemed thou cammest world call sinner repentance saue lost sheepe israel haue mercie vpon leade thy grace fold among thy sheepe go sweet pasture danger wolues thou art shepheard keepest good accompt euerie one though haue gone astraie wandring thy flocke borne mark world yet good lord disclaime thy right beseech thee take vnto thee may safe vnder shadowe thy wing may sleepe soundlie whome thou dooest keepe thou art watchman israel honour glorie vnto thee euer amen another godlie confession meditation penitent altogether vnhappie comfortlesse haue greeuouslie offended lord god shall whether shall go hide sight oft haue trespassed oft haue deserued displeasure yet seldome hath punished oft hath beene good mercifull vnto oft haue promised vowed amendment little seldome haue performed wofull case haue pitie dare lift vp mine eies towards heauen haue sinned earth looke refuge haue beene slander shame vnto despaire god mercifull good sauiour doth visit liue darknes cheerfull light sit shadowe death willeth v forgiue brother though offend seuentie tune yea infinitelie god mercifull anie man must onlie refuge comfort despise creature image himselfe returne thee therefore soule vnto thy lord god praie humblie thy knee grace continue bewaile thy sinnes past loueth thee prouoketh thee dailie gratious gift blessing loue leaue thee vntill haue made perfect worke begunne brought mercie full effect thee naturall cause beginneth worke leaueth halfe waie imperfect vertue seed sowne doth cease till fruit brought perfection yet nature worketh first prepareth matter disposeth make fit receiue shape perfection end thereof naturall order right course thing proceede increase little little lesse euen doth god first dispose v mercie increasing goodnesse dailie bestoweth v end treasure grace inheritance euerlasting ioies bird forsaketh hir yong till able liue themselues yet auaile paine commeth uerie loue worketh naturall cause bring foorth affect perfection creature creator doo loue selfe infinite goodnesse withdrawe thee thy sinnes make thee cleane pure finallie blesse thee eternall life hath prepared thee lord come thee sad mourning sit thy feete humblie waiting thy mercie thou art hope helper according thy great mercy haue mercie vpon amen praier purged sinne vncleannesse take awaie lord burden corruption continuall exercise sinne wickednesse hath wounded soule wofullie dangerous dart transgression feele putrifaction abounding festered conscience ouerladen vncleannesse haue meane remedie prostrate selfe throne thy glorious maiestie beseeching thee intirelie thy gratious goodnesse salue sore comfortable oile thy mercie thou onlie iesu art sweete physition soule sprinkle vpon hysope shall made whiter snowe thou thine exceeding bountie fauour good lord wilt vouchsafe wash awaie spot sinne wickednesse heapeth thine indignation furie shall excell gold hath beene purified fornace seuen fold let therefore good lord mercifull father seeme pleasant vnto thy diuine maiestie touch corrupted vncleane hart heauenlie finger thy grace may bring foorth fruit true repentance acceptable thy glorious diuine presence offering calues bullockes sheepe goates anie burnt offering sacrifice peace contrite sorowfull soule thing thou doest delight humble lowlie spirit oblation thou dooest desire cleane pure hart lord god knowe thou dooest loue fauour wherefore beseech thee purge sinne inquitie thy great mercie let bitter deploration mine offence hartie contrition thy glorious merit painefull passion iesu onlie meane waie set free power hell death damnation sith thy goodnes begotten borne anew strengthen good lord neuer slide fall thee may continuallie beare remembrance state wherevnto called thee thine aboundant loue kindnesse wipe awaie good lord sin thy remembrance cleanse bloud thy spotlesse lambe iesus christ shall made cleane pure safe graunt mercifull god honour punishment due offence wherefore good lord according thy iustice multitude thy mercy deale thy seruant remember sinnes forefather thinke milde meanour youth passed haue pitie thy creature according likenesse thy selfe thou hast made shaped earth long wilt thou turne thy face awaie forsake god renew thy holie spirit plucke awaie withdraweth thee graffe hart thy grace may loue thee feare thee finallie reioice thy goodnesse elected praise thee thy woonderous work euer graunt mightie god sauiour iesus christ sake whome thee holie ghost honor glorie euer euer amen another praier said sinfull soule sinfull life increasing sinnes still abounding good lord whome shall flee whome shall resort succour offending thee cease neither daie night sinnes heauie vpon pressing downe euen hell weight thereof moreouer prepare selfe amendment life thinke stedfastlie serue please thee euen soone doth corrupt infected nature offend displease thy diuine maiestie prone readie run headlong kind wickednesse sin strength force rather weakenesse perfourming thing thou requirest hand good lord readie vtterlie despaire forsake thee vnlesse thou thy great mercie pitie send thine aide aboue powre thy healthfull grace may make hast flee vnto thee bitter teares sorrowfull hart bowing knee lamenting sinfull life greeuous offence committed thee trusting assuredlie faithfullie merit sauiour iesus christ bitter death bloudshedding far greater force vertue effect preseruing sinnes offence condemning casting awaie whose sake assuredlie beleeue sinnes offence cleerelie forgiuen shall neuer laid charge shall enter thee last daie thine euerlasting kingdome thee euermore whome honour praise glorie euer euer amen praier god father almightie god father lord iesus christ whome desert merit worthinesse thine owne great clemencie mercie pitie caused send downe thine onlie begotten sonne world beare burden sinnes miserable sinner ouerladen suffer cruell torment yea also bitter shamefull death sanctifie reprochfull name crosse renting blessed bodie shedding pretious bloud thereon thereby make attonement betweene thee v thereby paie raunsome soules thereby consummate finish perfection redemption saluation thing thy good doo onelie asswage thy wrath indignation also bring v againe thy grace fauour deliuered bondage sinne hell might serue thee righteousnesse holinesse day life free gift benefite death passion made partaker resurrection thine endlesse vnspeakable glorie wherefore god maker lord king seeing thou hast aboundantlie bestowed thy heauenlie gift vpon mankind hast plentifullie powred thy grace fauour v sake thou wouldest spare thine owne sonne shall escape thine indignation care kindnesse thine carelesse vnkind among waie shall poore creature turne shall haue beene vnthankefull thy benefit vnmindfull bold lift vp hart hand vnto heauens call vpon thee thou thy singular goodnesse didst prouide wickednesse old adam purged washed awaie bloud iesus christ haue wilfullie fallen sinne againe thou madest child light haue made selfe inheritour darkenesse thou madest thine creation haue made selfe child perdition shall therefore shall doubt anie mercie forgiuenesse sweete lord great thy mercie surmounteth thy workes large thy promise sure performance take hold thereof deere thy sight merit thy sonne iesus acceptable vnto thee hartie repentance sinner remembrance thereof prouoked crie vnto thee saieng father haue sinned heauen thee worthie called thy child neuerthelesse behold thou greeuous offender thy creature haue respect mine offence behold repentance thinke vpon wickednesse vpon wound sauiour iesus looke vpon false hart hath wauered thy lawes behold bleeding hart thy sonne iesus christ pierced release set free sinnes cast vpon thy backe beseeching thee merit may beare thy mercie pardon heare lord god heare knowe earnestlie seeke desire thine aide readier thou art stretch foorth thine hand helpe heare therefore lord bow downe incline thine eare vnto praier inspire thy holie spirit may loue thee aboue thing neuer faile put hope trust saluation whome thou wouldest redeemer sauiour make forsaking wickednesse rise falling sinne may obtaine true seruing thee innocencie purenesse life graunt lord iesus christ sake whome thee holie ghost honour glorie amen praier vnto god sonne sweet sauiour mercifull redeemer bountifull iesu sonne god although thou art high yet thou art humble although thou art omnipotent thou art also meeke thou art mightie art thou mercifull thee christ guide felicitie father heauen hath giuen power heauen earth thou art true pastor soules thou art messias thou castest none sue vnto thee thou hast taken awaie handwriting v hast fastened thy crosse art thou readie impart merit thy passion vnto true repentance sin call vpon thee faithfullie wherefore sweet iesus faithfullie vnfeinedlie acknowledge benefit thou hast bestowed vpon stedfastlie beleeue thou immaculate lambe whose mouth neuer found guile didst suffer cruell torment hand sinner loue v wretched sinner cause hartilie beseech thee humblie praie thee accept number thou wilt make coinheritours thy bitter paine although selfe vnworthie thereof yet thy merit make woorthie flie crauing may armed defended may subdue world flesh diuell euen thou hast gloriouslie conquered sinne death hell thou seest sauiour dailie hourlie beset three enimies hardlie beseeged without thy helpe meanes escape must need praie vnto one strengthen therefore lord neither one carnall lust neither delectable pleasure sathan himselfe craftie subtile deuises get dominion ouer thou hast bought thou hast paid take thou saue keepe defend alwaies readie voice crieng powre thy grace patientlie abide thy diuine pleasure thing make present day life haue mind profoundlie roote hart mystery thy painefull passion filled remembrance thereof sin may enter sathan mine old enimie may well perceiue hath neither part fellowship bodie soule altogether thine whome praise world without end amen praier vnto god holie ghost holie ghost blessed holie spirit comforter afflicted thou proceeding father sonne art true instructor teacher diuine heauenlie veritie wherefore humilitie praie thee renew make cleane hart graffe right spirit guide gouerne may thinke nothing speake nothing doo nothing onlie shall please thee whereas haue ceased offend lord god maker greeuouslie transgresse iesus redeemer sauiour praie thee may haue inward sorowe repentance shame thereof euer hereafter may performe dutie ought doo bring foorth fruit repentance passion iesus christ may defend sinne wickednesse bring ioies paradise godlie praier true worshipping god may vsed church common praier stablish hart mind gratious god true thy worship defaced thy glorie prophaned thine honour greatlie diminished giue v grace hate sinne iniquitie renounce forsake vanity wanton pleasure wicked sinfull world arme v beseech thee mortifie bring vnder rebellious appetite straieng lust flesh finallie giue v power aboue withstand sathan prince darknesse damnable minister diuers temptation prouoke allure v godlie puritie perfect integritie god light defence soule athirst god euen liuing god shall come presence god flesh longeth thee barren drie land water good lord remember graunt may weare white garment innocencie thine elected thine euerlasting kingdome amen praier felowship vngodlie protect defend heauenlie father mercifull god felowship vngodlie men dailie imagine mischiefe hart harme innocent keepe counsel foolish vngodlie speake proud thing glorie thy blessed name defend faithlesse deceiptfull one whose guiltie stomach gorged grudge enuie malice hatred disdaine vncharitablenesse throtes like vnto open sepulchre swallowing graue tongs giuen slander backbite neighbour poison adder lieth hidden vnder lip fine thine enimies blaspheme thy holie blessed name contemne thy testimony lord giue thy grace conuersant good godlie men fauour thy glorious gospell doo indeuour practise thy precept glorie thy holie blessed name make example exercise selfe heauenlie veritie thereby may instructed liuelie knowledge thy commandements obtaine wisdome aboue faith may cleaue thee felowship feare thy holie name auoide companie wicked vngodlie worldling haue laid snare intrap mee graunt mercifull father thy sonne iesus christ sake euer liueth reigneth thee holie ghost whome laude glorie power praise euer euer amen praier said sermon mightie god thy word hast made thing whose voice flouds hils doo knowe whose heast quicke dead heauen hell obey whose displeasure diuels hell doo tremble let thy word lighten hart good work may testifie profession seeing tree beareth fruit shall cut downe throwne fire grant may onelie hearer also dooer thy holie word finallie may partaker thine euerlasting ioie blisse lord grant wisdome knowe thee grace followe thee true humilitie thou didst suffer spitted smitten thine enimies may beare displeasure world rage enimies patience thou hast blessed little one reuealed vnto thing hidden wise thou wilt haue mercie pleaseth thee set thy feare alwaies mine eies make vnderstand wisdome secretlie graffe thy faith hart may knowe thee loue thee glorifie thy holie name euer amen praier faith blessed sauiour iesus sonne euerliuing god vnspeakeable ioie thy seruants present cofort sinner camest world saue offender louedst world thou sparedst thy pretious bloud redeeme losse first father adam make v coheires forfeited inheritance thy selfe beleeue thee might saued good lord hast promised knocke shall opened seeke shall find grant beseech thee may search thy holie lawes find truth thy holie word may alwaies constantlie confesse shew thee thy goodnesse well word liuing inspire thy holie spirit may knowe thee stedfastlie trust thee serue thee praiers welldooing time life mercifull lord sauiour world glorie thy name sake beseech thee heare praiers soule reioice god sauing health hee hath good thee hath kept thee snare hunter blessed thee lord mercifull god let earth feare let mouth men sound praise vnto god good lord dailie increaseth good gift seruants lord increase faith shall saued praier said receiuing lord supper omnipotent god father euerlasting whose mercie infinite whose kingdom hath none end vouchsafe beseech thee thine exceeding goodnes increse faith thy ghests repaire table thy sonne iesus christ hath left vnto v gaue bodie crucified bloud shed largelie crosse redemption pledge great loue abundant kindnesse celebration glorious supper wherein looking glasse death great maister high shepheard soules iesus christ liuelie set foorth vnto v giue v grace therefore aboue rightlie vnderstand diuine mystery offered vnto v thereby wrest wring contrarie thy let far thought good lord leaue thine eternall veritie build doctrine men following owne imagination run headlong gaping gulph danger destruction plucke scale ignorance eies may cleerlie descerne behold light thy glorious gospell may truelie communicate participate fruit thy grace represented vnto v comfortable sacrament indue v plentifullie pure knowledge may thinke saie anie grosse forme carnall maner feede vpon eate thy flesh reallie carnallie make v alwaies constantlie beleeue thy glorious bodie ascended vp heauen sitteth right hand thy father concerning thy humanitie cannot thence remooued till time thou shalt come legion angel iudge quicke dead whose presence shall run consuming fire moreouer wee doo humblie beseech thee confirme v truth thy blessed testament may confesse thy diuine nature equall father holie ghost beleeue thy power power particular power generall doth shall gouerne heauen earth deepe lowe water yea nethermost part hell strengthen v therefore good lord stand least falling true knowledge thee perish euerlastinglie sith thou hast called v thy word thy ghests blessed banket wherin ye mouth carnall body fostered fed bread wine lord confirme faith thee mouth soules may feed spirituallie vpon thy sweetest flesh drinke thy deerest blood nourished euerlasting life heauenlie blessednesse reward dowrie due thou hast promised faithfullie build vpon thee art rocke strong piller saluation holie mystery must set foorth vnto v liuelie thy death passion make v thankefull thee thereby giue v grace print hart thy great loue exceeding clemencie sparedst giue thy bodie vile shamefull slanderous death crosse thy bloud shed offence indue v loue charitie men make v readie forgiue loue pardon enimies persecutor slanderer turne hart mind impietie couetousnesse blasphemie pride gluttonie fornication detestable euils anie time haue defeated fatherlesse right widowe hir dowrie gathered togither good wrongfullie violence oppression fraud collusion deceit giue v grace make restitution aske sorowfull plaint fluds teares bottome hart pardon free forgiuenesse thee offence whatsoeuer wee haue done committed thought word deed thy diuine maiestie anie brother sister take awaie v ali bitternes cursed speaking backbiting giue v grace come woorthilie vertue true fruitfull faith holie blessed supper soules feeding faithfullie thy sweetest flesh drinking thy deerest bloud wee may bodie soule nourished thee euerlasting endlesse glorie heauen thee felowship thy chosen saint shall enioie fruition euerlasting kingdome thou hast ordeined ouelie alone without wauering doo build vpon thee sanctifie make cleane hart mind power thy holie ghost verie comforter thy chosen purge thou cankred conscience infected sinne working thy good grace least presuming thy table lord incur thy displeasure vnrepentant offence found vnmeet ghests come thy holie banket eate drinke vtter confusion soules body giue v grace therefore good lord conuert v wholie vnto thee shall turned sinne iniquitie giue v grace rest onlie vpon thee shall made safe giue v thine aid aboue beseech thee faith striue man sinne vanquish may die v may liue thee art giuer life grant gratious god iesus christ sake thee holie ghost giuen praise honour glorie euer euer amen praier thankesgiuing said receiuing communion giue thee hartie thanks heauenlie father hast present fed v refreshed hungrie soules flesh bloud sauiour christ carnallie spirituallie giue v grace therefore continuallie meanes increasing fruitfull faith beleeue thy flesh meate indeed thy bloud drinke indeed vnneths eate thy flesh drinke thy bloud enter thy kingdome saued daie thy comming giue v grace therefore vnprofitable seruants vnwoorthilie called reason multitude sinnes banket thy table whereas celebration thy supper hath beene vsed thy death visible element bread wine represented vnto v offer vp vnto thee continuallie fruit true repentant sorowfull hart thy name may glorified thy grace comforted thy displeasure turned loue thy wrath compassion sinnes pardoned forgotten name written booke life hath pleased thee present account v thy ghests onlie feede v visible creature namelie bread wine also soule thine owne similitude cherish v thy flesh bloud wheron vertue liuelie faith haue great comfort plentifullie fed lord beseech thee thine abundant goodnesse increase faith may wax strong thee fruitfull exercise work charitie loue men therby haue celebration thy glorious blessed supper may whensoeuer shall please thee call v thine heauenly banket found furnished emptie naked armed couered fruitfull faith truth thy ghests vessel honour enioie participation thy heauenlie rich palace whereas ioies neuer vade continuallie endure take v burden corruption set v free cursed clog sinne deliuer v snare death destruction giue v willing mind obeie heare thy commandements clense thou hart iniquitie giue v grace henceforth walke newnesse life godlie conuersation thy name may glorified saued daie thy comming iudgement grant jesus christ sake mediatour aduocate amen godlie praier said euerie christian especiallie burial good lord thy hand doest staie frame engin earth rulest course swift heauens disposing ordering thing thy diuine prouidence hast apointed bound life pa besech thee liuing learning die mortifieng thy spirit affection flesh though expelling yet subduing rage may last hauen death land glorious citie euerlasting life body darke miserable corruptible shall bright glorious incorruptible like immortall shining bodie lord iesus christ shall like christ sauiour euen shall haue borne image earthlie shall beare image heauenlie shine like sunne face christ transfiguration oh lord iesus blessed sauiour thy death hast triumphed ouer sinne death thou hast troden sting monster hidious enimie gate hel haue preuailed thee grant true liuelie faith men passe earth heauen death eternall life doo without thee thou must mediatour child night birth pure thy sight sinne borne nature child perdition firebrand hell thou blessed sauiour art perfection lawe beleeue death came sinnes thy death pretious bloudshedding death conquered exiled beleeue washed clensed sinnes prophet beare witnesse beleeue thy name shall receiue remission sinnes confesse sinnes thou art righteous forgiue v iniquity whosoeuer calleth thy name shall saued thou hast pleasure death sinner rather desirest liue conuerted thou hast loued world thou onlie didst become man tooke nature vpon thee wert content also suffer cruell death crosse purge nature mortall sinne corruption adorne immortalitie eternall glorie onelie thine owne person v also satisfie iustice father sinnes oh blessed shepheard thou doubtedst spend thy pretious blood saue thy beloued sheepe rauine spoile good lord increase thy grace thy holie word may take roote flourish good seed may choked thornes order liuing course nature shall dissolued prison bodie may come thee thou bright sun shalt come midst legion angel thy shining glorie maiestie iudge quicke dead may number blessed one thou shalt call possesse kingdome prepared thy father saieng come ye blessed child father maiestie trinitie vnitie honour glorie euer amen praier humilitie lord sinner sorie mine offence make satisfaction default haue anie good thing commeth thee acceptable sacrifice thee contrite humble king quench foule fleshlie desire loue thee alone set thou hart fire redeemer driue awaie spirit pride graunt great treasure meeke humilitie take sauiour furious rage ire shield patience giue desire creator roote spitefulnesse mind graunt stead thereof againe meekenes may find bountifull father giue faith shall endure hope agreeing therevnto charitie sure thou guide keepe lip lieng vanitie mind worldlie bee hart voice may craue heauen thee amen thankesgiuing benefit receiued god hand mercifull father yeeld thee humble thanks thy great benefit bestowed vpon sinner thy free mercie onlie thou hast thy fatherlie loue brought vp tenderlie instructed thy holie lawe thou hast giuen knowledge vnderstanding thou hast preserued manie danger euils diuers men haue felt thou hast blessed health guide dooings buckler defence danger may freelie ioifullie sing praise thee liuest reignest one god almightie incomprehensible world without end amen another thankesgiuing goodnesse god v almightie heape vp sentence thine exceeding iustice v place war bloudie battell thou hast giuen vnto v prosperitie perfect peace place penurie dearth scarsitie thou hast giuen v increase fulnesse great plentie punishment doo merit manie sharpe bitter stripe knowing thy blessed glorious haue set purpose contemned thy diuine heauenlie precept cause sentence thy wrath sharpelie kindled v euen hath beene thy chosen people israel day forefather glorieng wickednesse plagued fulnesse thine indignation sword enimies beset round hemmed euerie side iebusites ammonite philistine amorites oppressed diuerselie strong hold rased city besieged house ransacked good rich caried awaie force bloudthirstie enimie yoong men led awaie captiue virgin wofullie defloured fine thou lord god didst behold hartie earnest contrition thou didst withdrawe thy frowning countenance sentest speedie safe deliuerance one thou lord sentest moses bring seruitude pharao stonie stubborneharted king aegyptians another iephthah set free sword ammonite wherewith greeuouslie afflicted make thy power excellent glorie fullie knowne thou gauest samson much fortitude bridle proud philistine ouer besides thou thy loue miraculous goodnes hast made feeble woman mightie victorious conqueror debora shield thy people iudith comforted distressed bethulians cut head proud holophernes thy selfe good lord thou beholdedst teares hartie sorowe offence didst prepare thy selfe go foorth hoasts thou thy selfe saie breath thy nostril didst confound ouerthrowe enimies good lord thou present v fulnesse thy diuine power looke vpon v eies thy fauourable pitie forget corrupt filthie offence let contrite sorowfull hart meane vanquish thy displeasure conceiued v thou present v time necessitie trouble set thy hand helpe assist v enimie thou present v time perill danger go thou foorth host shall assured preuaile let multitude furious foe dismaie v victorie doo knowe consisteth power strength manie men horse armour weapon thou mercifull father giuest conquest thou pleasest thee therefore great extremitie flie appeale beseeching thee thine inestimable loue kindnesse loue sauiour iesus christ looke vpon true repentant hart fulnesse thy miserations pity set v free power raging enimie pardon sinnes greeuous offence hencefoorth may vow dedicate hart mind wholie walke integritie newnesse life grant good lord thy sonne christ iesus holie ghost praise glorie attributed euer euer world without end amen godlie praier said time anie common plague priuate affliction trouble oeternall euerliuing god father consolation comfort vouchsafe thine infinite loue kindnesse strengthen mee thy heauenlie grace patiently beare meekenesse suffer crosse affliction trouble thou hast laid vpon vse sinne iniquitie knowe gratious louing father desert woorthilie haue prouoked thee displeasure burden sinnes intollerable must acknowledge earnestlie bottome hart confesse iustlie thou hast corrected visited yet fulnesse thy furie according thy fatherlie loue kindnesse albeit thy rod lie heauie vpon shoulder yet time thy correction comforted greatlie knowing assuredlie thou correctest simitest thou louest thou woundest healest againe thou throwest downe hell liftest vp againe heauen great thine omnipotencie thou rulest aboue firmament earth flouds lowermost part hell heauen angel archangel soules thy saint blessed companie martyr giue thee praise glorie veneration sun moone glistering star ech one course qualitie shew themselues obedient vnto thy earth beast field seelie feathered foules aire order seeme set foorth thy glorie praise deepe water fish sea readie obserue thy maner thy creature giue thee due honour reuerence among man thou thy diuine pleasure hast indued reason creation concerning inward man hadst fashioned thy similitude likenesse prone willing minister darknesse seduced carried awaie vertue vice godlinesse impietie obedience wilfull breach contempt thy precept diligence banished negligence power flesh eies haue chiefest contemplation delight perusing reading thy glorious sacred gospel wherein may behold thee crucified slaine sweetest sauiour christ iesus perfect god perfect man whose innocent death bloudie passion attonement made betwixt thy father v dazeled dimme darke mist sathan occupied beholding mundane transitorie pleasure effect vanish weare awaie euen flower either parched force phoebus radiant beames winter stormes horie frost consumed eares thou hast giuen v heare vnderstand sacred diuine mystery conteined thy holie lawe made deafe purpose glorie fable lothsome leasings conceiue delight zealous predication thine euangelicall heauenlie doctrine hart hardened like adamant greatest part brooke thy testimony continuallie lust desire satisfied worldlie wealth honour dignitie beholdeth day cruell conflict bloudie fight betwixt good conscience filthie auarice roote mischiefe euill naie seeth age plaine dealing murthered deceit faithlesse fraud beholdeth true meaning strangled forged flatterie loathsome leasings bowel compassion pitie shut vp violent oppression tyrannie feete willing tread path pride fornication vncleannesse hand readie offer wrong iniurie innocent yea fine whatsoeuer thou hast giuen vnto v spread set foorth thy glorie honour sinne corrupted make member body grace pure loue ingraffed bodie christ rich great shepheard soules verie member sathan set purpose transgression abounding flie christ rocke strong piller saluation run headlong death vtter destruction bodie soule yet like louing god mercifull father thou callest v home againe thy word wherin onlie thy mercy also thy terrible threat thundered foorth v impenitencie neither thy manifold mercy freelie thine abundant goodnesse offered vnto v iesus christ mooue stir v handfast contrition neither yet thy terrible commination thretnings reclame call v backe dangerous puddle sin thou sendest forth thy plague punishment pestilence famine bloudie sword intending thereby driue v amendment life acknowledge thine omnipotencie thou beholdest true repentant hart sob sighing teares powred foorth throne thy diuine maiestie thou withdrawest v terror thine indignation vengeance rod thy correction laid aside thy displeasure iustlie conceiued v continuall exercise sinne vtterlie forgotten intercession thy sonne iesus christ sitteth thy right hand glorie permanent euerlasting like louing father mercifull god siluered scepter peace offered vnto v thy gratious benefit thine anger conuerted clemencie thy displeasure turned louing kindnesse fine thine indignation calmed thine abundant grace mercie like louing gentle father thine armes stretched foorth ioifullie embrace receiue v thy fauour againe knowe certaine true tune soeuer shall appeare gate mercie meanes power constant liuelie faith knocke therat thou art redie open vnto v anie desert merit iesus christ fulnesse thy diuine miseration compassion pitie whensoeuer shall call vpon thee lowlinesse meekenesse hart mind bewailing wofullie heinous offence committed thee thine eares attentiue heare willinglie doest grant v petition wherefore gratious louing father come vnto thee sorowfull contrite hart beseeching thee loue thine annointed sonne iesus christ messias sauiour redeemer behold looke vpon v eies compassion pitie albeit haue worthilie deserued thy plague punishment yet respect thou deseruings least thy furie indignation confounded perish haue eie rather thy sonne iesus christ behold bloudie wound yet fresh greene neuer stint bleeding thinke vpon bitter painefull torment suffered v vpon crosse whose name beseech thee fauourablie looke vpon infirmity mercifullie heare praiers petition offered vnto thee gratiouslie glorie thy name sake take withdrawe v thy heauie rod correction sinfull liues contempt thy precept haue heaped heauilie neckes giue v patience suffer whatsoeuer shall please thee laie vpon v giue v grace alwaie call crie vpon thy holie blessed name faithfullie teares saie vnto thee continuallie spare v good lord spare thy people thou hast redeemed thy pretious bloud neither yet good lord thou angrie v euer graunt mercifull father loue thy onlie sonne iesus christ whome thee holie ghost honour glorie praise ascribed foreuer amen praier patience trouble meekelie suffer aduersitie gratious lord omnipotent god whose mercie euerlasting infinite bowe downe thine eare harken vnto praier make thy diuine maiestie humblie beseeching thee thine accustomed goodnesse indue work mercie deedes charitie aboue thing giue patience aduersitie meekelie suffer patientlie take whatsoeuer shall please thee laie vpon neuer murmur grudge thereat alwaies thinke thy louing gentle correction much lesse desert great manifold offence againe vnder correction thy child father correcteth child whome intirelie loueth euident token thou louest v thou correctest v scripture saith whome god loueth chasteneth thou seest thing thou vnderstandest knowest thing much one little sparowe lighteth vpon ground without thy knowledge yea verie thought foreknowne vnto thee thou disposest orderest thing seemeth best thy holie pleasure thy helpe may doo thing without thee doo nothing thou powrest vpon v thy creature thy good gift benefit thou bestowest vpon v prosperitie health wealth like thou dooest intent acknowledging thereby incouraged serue honour humblie obeie thee alwaies praise magnifie thy glorious name contrariwise thou strikest v thy rod correction plaging v great mortalitie suffering enimies inuade v robber spoile v pouertie oppresse v fire consume thing thou hast lent v maintenance body mortall life thou doest put v mind haue transgressed thy commandements haue harkned vnto thee neither done acceptable thy sight willinglie falling puddle sin following owne appetite haue prouoked thy iust wrath indignation v thus thou dealest v lord intent suffering bodilie punishment feeling smart may thereby admonished dutie true compunction hart desire released thy scourge haue deserued worthilie receiue acknowledge selues lost child straieng sheepe may see ashamed vnbrideled affection wilfulnesse haue brought v calamitie miserie true penitent saie worthie mercifull father lift vp eies voice vnto thee manifold sin wickednesse neuerthelesse presuming vpon thine aboundant mercie refusest none doo call vppon thee lamentablie doo crie haue mercie vpon v lord haue mercie vpon v miserable sinner greeuouslie afflicted burden punishment affliction thou hast laid vpon v put thou therefore awaie displeasure conceiued v thy poore creature grant v beeing warned may euer heereafter serue thee newnesse life neuer commit anie thing shall displease offend thee heauenlie father acknowledge dutie though part haue performed ought doo yet beseech thine inestimable goodnesse execute rigour thy iustice vpon state thine hand thou giue anie greater wound behold humilitie repentance able recompense satisfie trespass thee haue committed doo offer vnto thee according poore widowe able giue sorowfull contrition hart former offence done passed thy iustice right rigorous sinner thou art gealous much doest detest sin thou sparest punish thy verie elect chosen seruants fall acceptable thy sight holie prophet king dauid whome thou thy selfe didst saie haue found man according mine owne hart euen dauid seruant yet neuerthelesse diuers sundrie way didst thou punish swarued thy testimony thou sufferedst molested insurrection owne sonne thou didst send prophet vnto offer choice plague thou wouldest send vpon wicked liuing sorowfull sighes trickling teares turned vnto thee confessing fault crauing pardon promising amendment life thou forgatest thine anger forgauest offence thy chosen vessel thou hast permitted greeuouslie tormented vexed sundrie trouble aduersities onlie trie faith stedfastnesse towards thee thou didst suffer patient man iob cruellie intreated enimie mankind haue house burned spoiled cattell taken awaie seruants driuen bondage child slaine owne bodie afflicted loathsome disease plague sore thou didst anie euill deede shewe thine omnipotencie power thou hadst tried vtmost found enimie diuell could preuaile anie paine greefe cause blaspheame speake euill thee thou diddest reduce health thou diddest enrich againe thou diddest restore vnto againe child friend familie good much euer possessed shewing manifestlie thou wilt reward plentiouslie loue thee folowe obserue thy commandements wherefore beseech thee giue grace whatsoeuer waie shall please thee visit thy punishment may take patientlie saie patient iob naked came world naked shall returne earth againe lord giueth lord taketh awaie euen pleaseth lord suffer despaire thinke thou dealest vniustlie saie shall receiue prosperitie lord hand content aduersitie alwaie thinke vpon happie whome thou doest punish though thou make wound thou also giuest plaister though thou smitest thy hand maketh whole againe mine iniquitie great thou merciful vnto wickednes deliuer thine anger presse shall able beare acknowledge whatsoeuer trouble thou hast sent wilt laie vpon either punishment mine iniquitie triall constancie may repentant dauid find remission sin patient iob release mine aduersitie obtaine fauour thy sight thou neuer againe greeuouslie punish may passe life may afterward liue thee whome honour glorie euer euer amen another praier trouble aduersitie haue mercie vpon lord haue mercie vpon miserable creature doo ought feare haue iustlie deserued weigh selfe wickednesse haue done punishment thereby deserued halfe great sinne haue committed thou art mercifull god thy iudgements right neither dooest thou anie time punish v vniustly thou almightie god madest v lost damned thou didst miraculouslie restore v knowe sure life led sudden vncertaine motion disposed directed thee thou hast fatherlie care v especiallie doo put whole trust confidence thy mercie therefore humblie praie beseech thee thou wouldest deale deseruings according thy great mercie doth exceede sinnes whole world often thou dooest punish outwardlie giue grace inwardlie patience beare thy praise neuer depart mouth order dooings euen shall necessarie bodie soule thou onlie hast power ouer thing thou knowest thing thee honour euer amen another praier trouble obteining mercie behold bottome hart doo crie vnto thee lord beseeching thee thou wouldest saue bottomlesse pit hell knowe mercie thee doo therefore marke haue done amisse enter iudgment thy seruant meanes iustified thy sight remembrance mine offence greeuous vnto mee therefore right humblie craue pardon thereof hart troubled soule vexed health flesh forsake mine onlie staie comfort despise contrite hart open bosome thy mercie take cleane awaie mine iniquitie bring soule tribulation turne extremitie thy iustice thy tender mercie thou shalt come iudge quicke dead reuenged eternall damnation take mee amongst thine elect blessed state saluation grant father christ sake mediator aduocate amen another lord god although haue committed whereby offender make selfe bee thy creature though sinne haue lost cleannesse puritie haue also taken awaie thy goodnesse mercie though haue committed wherefore thou maiest condemne hast thou done whereby thou maiest saue true lord conscience doth shew haue deserued damnation thy mercie exceedeth offension spare god bicause vnpossible thy power vnmeete thy mercie vnaccustomed yet contrarie thine infinite goodnesse wherefore thou hast created doo destroie thou iesu hast redeemed doo condemne thou hast made mee let thy worke cast awaie wickednesse wipe awaie mine draweth thee knowledge thine may bring mee vnto thee liuest reignest one god person three honour euer amen another praier wherin penitent longeth comfort long lord wilt thou turne awaie thy face long wilt thou bee angrie thy seruant long shall abide mourning solitarie bird hath lost hir yoong lord thinke thy mercy doo correct thy wrath shall become dust smoke wind lord forsake thy seruant israel thou hast chosen hart comforted thy mercy shall reioice sing vnto thee praise thee thy good work miracle thou hast done father time tempted ghostlie enimie feare god doubt anie article catholike faith despaire god mercie yeeld melancholie fansies vexed vnkindnes friend malice enimies troubled sicknesse anie way oppressed griefe bodie mind saie deuoutlie followeth humblie accept mercifull iesus heauie temptation suffer hand thy diuine prouidence would greater thou please laie thy sake hast ordeined beginning tender loue thou bearest health sinfull soule hartilie thanke thee confesse haue deserued woorse sinne vnkindnesse towards thee woorthie receiue anie comfort consolation thy hand therfore honour passion death thou willinglie sufferedst crosse offer selfe sustaine anie aduersitie hart seeking otherwise ease reliefe thee lord thy good pleasure shall appoint yet one thing craue beseech thee tender loue thou bearest mankind vertue ought good helpe assist thy holie spirit trust thou wilt promisest man shall tempted shall able beare giue euer shall necessarie sustaine patience crosse temptation thy diuine wisdome hath appointed intent bearing willinglie thee world may conceiue assured hope partaker thy glorie world come grant request mercifull sauiour merit deseruing onlie merit thy death bitter passion humblie beseech thee amen praier feare worldlie casualty bountifull louing father mine onlie guider comforter well mercie true light world take awaie darknesse mind lighten hart sens indue thy grace arme stronglie sure hope confidence trust thee neuer driuen feare either subtile inuasions ghostlie enimie sathan craftie wilinesse world neither yet losse damage hurt hinderance anie vaine transitorie thing world doo possesse alwaies whatsoeuer shall becom thinke thing lent owne shall make streight account vse abuse whereby possesse thereof greater shall paine abuse wherefore take mee inward heauinesse thought care anie losse discommoditie receiued worldlie good alwaies thinke well pouertie rich needinesse abundance sicknesse health aduersitie prosperitie come thee knowne thine inscrutable iudgement onlie wherefore thou sendest either vpon v therefore let mind troubled anie feare thing chance sauing onlie feare displease thee alwaies merrie thee sobernes cast care worldlie affaire vpon thee forasmuch thou hast commanded carefull eate drinke raiment shall clothed thou wilt see righteous forsaken child begging bread thou turnest thing best serue thee flie vnto thee succour time distresse let lord euermore fresh memorie grauen hart readie mouth leauing needlesse feare may alwaies giue thanks vnto thee praise thy holie name amen praier deliuered enimies danger mightie lord god abraham isaac iacob didst leade child israel red sea madest streames iordan runne backe spring againe thy people might passe midst thereof good lord whose heasts flouds obeied whose voice hils doo leape earth doth tremble mightie lord canst destroie proudest king verie fly ant madest little dauid triumph giant goliah deliueredst enimie king saule hand gauest gedeon thy seruant souldiours victorie manie legion strong men thou hast subdued manie mightie king sundrie nation vnto thy people israel god workest thing giuest victorie alwaies seemeth best thine vnsearchable wisdome defend alwaies beseech thee mine enimies euils ship tossed beaten waues world may rest thy happie hauen euerlasting ioie euer soule cleaueth vnto thy mercie holie sanctuarie god thou shouldest mercifull could abide heat thy displeasure thou lord art good thy seruants hope see thy goodnesse land liuing glorie high mercifull god euer euer amen praier righteous iudgement matter controuersie lord god iustice equall ballance dooest weigh cause prince poorest man despisest suite simple deliuerest captiue comfortest desolate carefull lord hast blessed poore spirit releeue thy seruant oppressed griefe remooue cloud sorowes lord stretch forth thy mightie hand helpe let sinke sea slander shame thou knowest secret hart defend mine innocencie pleade thou cause vngodlie haue laid net god thou hast deliuered ioseph daniel mardocheus susanna captiuitie instant death didst cloth honour good lord strengthen defender euils let poisoned arrowes malicious tongue doo anie harme grant praiers good lord beseech thee sauiour iesus christ sake amen psalme said trouble escaped soule reioice god light defence helpe lanterne foot hath heard praier called hath holpen neede hath deliuered danger lord keeper life whome shall shrinke whome shall feare lieng prostrate feete lord bewailed case heard plaint forsaketh seruants wherefore army men stood vp feare god side preuaile happie safe whome god mightie god israel keepeth sun shall burne daie moone night chrise blessed feareth lord shall see happie day hart thirsteth water spring soule hath longed lord liuing god shall come appeare thy presence see thee thy glorious maiestie face face lord let thy kingdome come come lord iesus may see daie redemption good lord make hast helpe glorie maiestie empire vnto god creator god redeemer god holie comforter euer euer amen comfortable exhortation manifold assault sathan thou perceiue storme temptation doth verie often greeuouslie assault thee dismaie therefore thy selfe neither displeased thy selfe though almightie god nothing regarded thee rather thank instructeth teacheth thee one heire punisheth correcteth thee deere soune prooueth assaieth thee welbeloued freend manifest great token man reiect mercie fauour god earthlie adam mortified subdued wise resisteth spirit whether perfect quietnesse may anie affirme peraduenture necessarie paule life notwithstanding high perfection grace motion flesh vexe trouble thrise desired god deliuered said motion onelie answere paule grace sufficient vertue made perfect vexation paule vexed pride proud perfect strong god caused weake feeble caried treasure heauenlie reuelation fraile brittle vessell honour victorie onlie god himselfe one example paule erudition learning manie thing entised moued sinne diligentlie call almightie god praier remember dauid prophet king salomon peter apostle notwithstanding great light example holinesse yet fell greeuous great sinnes whome almightie god peraduenture suffered fall cause speciallie thou shouldst despaire lift vp thee wherein appeared helpe comfort aide defence anie wherein god whole world seemed cruell malicious enimies cried alowd god god hast thou forsaken trulie greeuous painefull bitter temptation christ suffered v might make waie crosse easie v therefore prepare thy selfe patientlie drinke cup christ iesu thy head hath willinglie dronke saluation mankind seeing therefore christ willinglie put himselfe subiection dipped himselfe horrible intollerable sorowes calamity louing heauenlie father willing doubt also vnderstandeth knoweth infirmitie doubt taking compassion v extremelie deale v rather beare imbecillitie weakenesse doth himselfe calling men vnto saie come vnto yee labour heauie laden refresh greater comfort praie giuen v could christ speake mercifullie vnto v manie thing greeuouslie vexe trouble man thing cruellie vexe torment conscience ouerwhelmed sinne doubteth mercie god dreadeth least god aduersarie reiect able conceiue faith mercie doth imagine himselfe cast awaie drie member cut present heere iesus christ thine aide helpe heere haue neede thy comfort let blacke violent horrible tempest trouble ouerthrowe drowne wretched man cause doubt christ true make thy prouidence shall enter therein rest labour peace enimie new kind ioie delight hart conceine saue onlie taking maruellous delight exceeding pleasure beholding thee lord god glorious redeemer heauenlie comforter proceedeth father sonne heauenlie ierusalem thou art sweet beautifull thy ioies delight misery thee feele suffer poore miserable life thee darkenesse change time shining moone twinkling brightnesse star giueth light thee onlie god power glorie maiestie light light thee sun iustice giueth light adopted bloud euerduring blessednesse bright immaculate lambe beautifull light thy light doth illuminate chosen child king king middest thee enuironed ech side beloued saint redie crowne euerlasting glorie thee legion angel singing sweet hymnes song set foorth praise honor thy name thee felowship heauenlie citizen thee resteth sweete solemnitie returne miserable pilgrimage vnto thy glorie companie prophet apostle victorious armie martyr holie men woman haue vanquished pleasure world haue abiding thee yoong child maiden haue passed ouer day holinesse life publishing thy praise puritie pietie euerie one reioiceth degree though equall glorie yet like ioies gladnesse reigneth perfect charitie god whose maiestie without end see continuallie still beholding loue increaseth eternall blessednesse holie apostle peter shadowe tast vpon mount thabor transfiguration christ whence desired might depart paule also proofe rapt taken vp third heauen heard word sawe thing maruellous secret far passeth man vnderstanding told reuealed vnto men moses face became bright conuersation diuine glorie vpon mount sinai israelite could abide shall become v perpetuallie thee art lord glorie shall conuersant maner thy child familiar friend seeke desire meanes possible dweller desire peace ioie eternitie perfect sight god contrariwise able expresse torment appointed vngodlie vnrepentant liuers deadlie place called hell sathan himselfe abhorreth thing continuall paine eternall tribulation infinite calamitie repleat euils dwell wicked ouglie angel whose horrible lookes bring sudden feare greeuous paine fearefull death continual cloud euerduring darknes nothing howling wailing lamentation mourning without end fearfull scriches confused cry place suddenlie raised woorme conscience neuer dieth damnable dungeon fire vnquenchable perpetuall gnashing teeth miserable soule findeth rest afflicted kind torment neuer expressed endure euer ala little auaileth subiected firebrans hell crie vnto lord heare shall knowe thing life vaine thing thought pleasant found bitter gall poison pleasure flesh termed falslie none pleasure feare lord shall confesse saie iudgement god true righteous saieng heare yet would conuerted wicked deed shall nothing preuaile sorowe find comfort complaint anie remorse torment ease painfull passion end exceeding vexation second death wherewith body soules vnrighteous shall euer enuironed sith therefore heauenlie father gratious god seemeth good thine eternall wisdome knowledge thine euerlasting truth giue knowledge thine inestimable mercie offered freelie vnto iesus christ mercifull sauiour whose bloudie death painfull passion assured eternall life blessednesse giue grace print remembrance thy manifold mercy feeding soule faith thee may attaine vnto endlesse ioies thou hast prepared thine adopted sonnes chosen child kingdome euerlasting righteousnesse escape euerlasting torment thou hast prepared diuell angel place wofull vexation endlesse miserie deliuer heauenlie father loue iesus christ sake thee holie ghost laud praise euer amen praier said sicke houre death mightie art thou lord thy deed holie thy way blessed name father god glorious creator diuine power celestiall prouidence nothing made thing fish flesh foules fruites tree hearbes thing whatsoeuer conteined heauen earth sea nethermost part thereof man concerning outward part thou thy celestiall prouidence fatherlie bountie framedst createdst claie concerning inward substance thy creature man thou didst fashion make euen according thine owne similitude likenesse moreouer great thy loue good towards creature work thy creation serued vse earth thou madest lord king ouer fruit thereof beast field foules aire fish little flouds great water firmament thou hast placed glistering sunne orient beames giue light daie therewith thou hast giuen moone starres gouerne night cause aboue work thy creation man ought right giue thee glorie thee belongeth ala great corruption fraile sinfull flesh thy grace wee carried awaie thee enter contempt thy precept cause thou oftentimes doost correct punish v intent might thereby feeling thy rod correction driuen imbrace hartie true repentance thy threat stripe thy displeasure laid vpon v take place amongst v thou oftentimes giuest v vp folowe lust affection last thou dooest behold enormity thou moment power thy diuine iustice restrainest rope disordered libertie cuttest sunder bridle voluptuousnes either sudden death sword fire famine sicknesse diuine sentence thy conceiued ire intent thy creature might terrour thy iustice auoid sinne learne amend liues least fall like calamitie danger true true good lord exercise sinne child death destruction grace almightie victorious conquerour sweete iesus christ adopted sonnes thy father made felloweheires thee perfect emanuel whose name humilitie lowlinesse hart mind come vnto thee great extremitie sicknesse danger death beseeching thee present forget mine offence thinke vpon thy mercy although haue deserued much least drop thy fauour meanes great burden sinnes presence thy diuine maiestie ouglie loathsome behold yet respect thou father mine iniquitie haue eie beseech thee merit sauiour christ iesus mediator sauiour redeemer appeale hath promised comfort sweete consolation name flie vnto thee releefe confesse woorthilie thou hast visited sicknesse disease yet according multitude sinnes fulnesse miseration fatherlie pitie giue grace therefore bitter brunt death vehementlie present beginneth combat fainting feeble life constantlie cleaue vnto thee let pleasure wicked world let impediment come vnto thee let fraile feeble flesh subiect sinne hath transgression made bondman death mooue despaire thy great mercie neither yet let caueling aduersarie enimie mankind last end triumph ouer giue patience suffer gladlie beare abide thy scourge visitation fortifie soule bodie long life shall endure may neuer cease call vpon thy holie blessed name yea death busiest make thou constant yea seeketh stronglie assaile feeble bodie giue thy grace good lord may spirit hart mind power soule giue praise vnto thee thy grace inestimable kindnesse hast sent thy sonne christ iesus ransome bloudie death passion power hell giue grace therfore thou hast appointed thy messenger death finish day pilgrimage call summons vale miserie wretchednesse build stedfastlie vpon faithfullie hope life saluation alone let remembrance former wickednesse thought vpon let mine offence blotted thy glorious sight behold sorowfull true repentant hart come vnto thee teares building merit vpon thy mercy though sinfull thy sonne sauiour righteous though wicked yet holie though full impietie yet full goodnesse though haue greeuouslie offended thee yet hath fullie contented thee though haue transgressed thy lawe yet hath fulfilled hath promised bloud wash awaie sinnes faith continue constant end therefore great painfull agonie beholding death gate bodie come vnto thee vertue fruitfull faith beseeching thee thou shalt see meete conuenient shall dissolue band vading life endureth thousand yeeres yesterdaie thy sight take soule thy glorious blessed hand confirme thy truth last shall please thee sound trumpe raise bodie graue time bodie soule shall vnite come thy presence may faith thee passe ouer mount corruption shake band sinne set free death destruction vertue thy righteousnesse made holie may redeemed mee lord god truth commend soule amen deuout meditation vsed praier remember lord god thine anger offender mindfull thy mercie towards true penitent forget pride haue prouoked thee ire fauourablie harken vnto praier iesus sauiour therefore bountifull iesu thou sauiour rise vp thine owne strength helpe saie vnto soule thy safegard thy goodnesse doo trust thee helpe forasmuch thou hast willed without ceasing seeke sue vnto thee behold beeing counselled foretold thy commandements doo aske seeke knocke thou commandest aske graunt may receiue thou biddest seeke make find thou hast taught knocke open vnto stand knocking strengthen weake restore lost reuiue dead sinne make serue thee liue thee giue selfe wholie thee knowe god thou madest owe selfe vnto thee thou hast redeemed owe thee selfe behold haue giue neither giue selfe vnto thee vnlesse thou make willing therevnto take thou draw vnto thee thine creation may thine following thee liuest reignest euer euer amen praier deciphering alphabet forme name right woorshipfull ladie mary fane mightie art thou lord thy deedes holie thy work haue mercie vpon giue vnderstanding therefore aboue consider substance whereof thou hast framed knowledge thereof make consider mine owne weakenesse infirmitie vnlesse thou set thy hand speedilie helpe oppressed sinne shall perish wickednesse sin innumerable redder scarlet giue grace acknowledge thy greate mercy surmounting sand sea thou thy grace thy good pleasure canst wash awaie deformitie make excell snowe libanus beseech thee mercifull father let far thought wilfullie set purpose fall danger sinne commit anie heinous sinne greeuous wickednes thine eternall maiestie exercise great euill meanes presumption prouoke thee displeasure giue grace therefore stand awe thy iustice least thy mercie withheld kept thou giue ouer thou didst proud pharao lust affection mine owne hart drowned dangerous gulph destruction r readie art thou lord time heare giue eare vnto petition thy people readier run astraie thy transgresse thy sacred lawes diuine statute leaue lust carnalitie pleasure vaine wicked world greatlie affected licentious libertie kind notorious euill yet mercifull father thine abundant loue fauour exceeding kindnesse giue grace renounce sinne hate transitorie vading world mortifie fraile feeble flesh rebelleth spirit faith christ dangerous pilgrimage giue strength mine enimies may ouerthrowne deliuered snare hell may thee art author man felicitie haue fruition thy kingdome celestiall mansion endlesse sempiternall glorie ydlenesse nurse roote infectious euils giue thine aid therefore lord loath detest deadlie dangerous sinne least therby run headlong thy heauie displeasure make alwaies euer occupied good lord thy holie lawe power soule hart mind vnderstanding may giue thee continuall praise honor glorie yeeld plentiouslie vnto also good lord thy grace aboue may continuallie make boast thine euerlasting name hartie contrition bitter deploration sinnes wickednesse obtaine thy fauourable pardon thee sanctified made cleane mine vncleannesse vngodlinesse may enter thee last daie celestiall glorious kingdome purchased bloudie death sauiour iesus christ yea illuminate mine eies saie good lord sleepe darkenes giue grace good lord continuallie keepe watch ward least enimie find slumbering cradle carelesnesse gate bodie broken vp daie thy comming iudgement sentence thy displeasure pronounced vtter confusion bodie soule f faith embraced hope felicitie blessednesse iesus christ giue therefore wisdome aboue may dailie desirous learne thy sacred precept walke pathwaie thy glorious statute exercise thy sinfull vice iniquitie may vanquished vertue may haue dominion souereigntie abstinence coupled constant faithfull praier thing much pleaseth thy maiestie withdraweth v force thy heauie indignation giue grace praier exercise fasting may hold downe man sinne swell pride excesse gluttonie superfluous eating drinking make alwaies vse thy gift moderatelie thy name may glorified fasting sinne hartie praier faithfullie may beate gate thy grace obtaine full effect thy fatherlie loue fauourable kindnesse finallie abate beseech thee pride vngodlie trouble confound thy iustice imagination foolish sticke saie hart god breake iawe bone sunder consult take counsell togither may harme innocent weake bloudthirstie deceiptfull man deliuer lord god looke fauourablie vpon glad thou hart cheerefull lookes thy gratious louing countenance saie vnto soule thy safegard thou euer shall need feare power subtile cruell enimies thine appointed heauenlie pleasure shall made safe felowship thy chosen saint enioie fruition thine euerlasting kingdome n nothing lord brought world nothing shall carie hence mee giue mee grace power therefore consider worldlie thing vaine shall vanish awaie like smoke make vnderstand stranger heere far countrie new citie ierusalem thou hast fulnesse thy great mercie ordeined continue faithfull thee end sith earthlie thing subiected consuming meere vanity endue vnderstanding may laie treasure plentifullie heauen iesus christ whome water baptisme grace spirit coupled knit withdrawe therefore delight worldlie pleasure giue streugth offer selfe vp wholie blessed heauenlie hand hart mind power soule haue may depend whome treasure resteth vnder comfortable gard defence may deliuered danger bodie soule naked borne naked graue shall returne againe lord giueth lord taketh awaie euen pleaseth maiestie thing brought passe whose glorious name praised euer man escape sting death flesh must bow vnto graue giue feruent faith therefore lord continue faithfull iesus christ whensoeuer shall please thee send thy messenger death arrest may readie summons ioifullie beare stroke power liuelie faith withstand sinne sathan death may enimies man felicitie vanquished subdued may liue iesus christ e expell roote remembrance detestable branch wrath pride concupiscence vaineglorie horrible vice noisome euils heape vp thy greeuous displeasure take abuse let neuer blaspheme thy blessed glorious name let tong purged thee corrupt vncomelie talke let thought occupied thy seruice faith feare loue make good lord alwaies obedient doo thy walke way thy commandements delight thy blessed testimony graunt thy grace hearing thy euangelicall heauenlie doctrine faith may increased made strong fruitfull exercise work charitie loue men chieflie constantlie fauour thy gospell continue faithfull christ iesus euermore saie good lord giue thy blessing aboue let hart soule tong euer readie thy gratious benefit receiued publish set foorth thy glorie praise weale wo pouertie prosperitie time peace time danger stretch foorth thy hand protect thee deliuered peril shall make boast thy mercy freelie showne vnto without desert felowship thy saint giue honour praise reuerence vnto thee right bounden dutie ought doo forasmuch euerie one saith lord lord shall enter kingdome god christ make professor thy word lip earnest louer faithfull folower thy commandements least comming great rich bridegroome iesus christ refused fiue vndiscreet foolish virgin wanted oyle garnish lamp thou lord passe finde vnprouided gate thy grace fast shut vp locked close shall stand knocking calling lord vaine thou wilt giue answere thou knowest forsaken thee shall perish euerlastinglie giue grace therefore good lord readie prepared wedding garment oyle lampe may continuallie watch thy comming enter thee thy ghest rich banqueting house euerlasting glorie amen f sinfulnesse preserue lord r renew thy spirit hart let tongue therewith accord v vttering goodnesse part n thought let arise c contrarie thy statute ten e euer let mindfull still praise thy name amen soule bodie b thou guider god v vnto thee onlie crie r remoue thy furious rod g graunt head may still deuise thing pleasing thee v vnto mine eares mine eies e euer let watch set bee n none ill may heare see n wicked deede let hand yn thy good path let feete go finis p certaine praiers made godlie woman martyr praier agnes martyr hir death eternall gouernour vouchsafe open gate heauen shut vp inhabitant earth receiue soule oh christ seeketh thee song eulalia martyr hir death behold lord wil forget thee pleasure christ remember thy triumphant victory attaine vnto high dignity praier anne askue martyr hir death lord haue mo enimies heares head yet lord let neuer ouercome vaine word fight thou lord side thee cast care spite imagine fall vpon thy poore creature yet sweete lord let set thee whole delight lord hartilie desire thee thou wilt thy mercifull goodnesse forgiue violence doo haue done vnto open also thou blind hart may hereafter doo thing thy sight onlie acceptable thee set foorth thy veritie aright without vaine phantasy sinfull man lord praier maister bradford morher said offered vnto god behalfe little martyrdome ah good father dooest vouchsafe sonne iohn bradford greeuous sinner thy sight find fauour thee one thy sonne christ captaines men war fight suffer gospel sake thanke thee praie thee thy deere sonne christ name thou wouldest forgiue sinnes vnthankfulnesse make perfect good thou hast begun yea lord praie thee make worthie suffer imprisonment euen verie death thy truth religion gospell sake hanna applie dedicate giue hir first child sonne samuel vnto thee euen doo deere father lord consider meditation harken thou vnto voice wofull mourning king god vnto thee make praier heare voice lord betimes earlie morning direct praier vnto thee thou art god hast pleasure wickednesse neither shall anie euill dwell thee thou hatest worke vanitie leade therefore thy righteousnesse lord weake without thee haue strength therfore lord god rebuke thine indignation neither chasten thy heauie displeasure haue mercie vpon lord deliuer soule oh saue thy mercie sake almost wearie groning euerie night wash bed water couch teares lord god thee haue put trust saue mee persecute deliuer lord god haue done anie thing laid charge anie wickednesse let mine enimie persecute soule take captiue hast thou lord god defended vngodlinesse oh long wilt thou hide thy selfe thy poore afflicted seruant oh long shall seeke comfort soule vexed hart yea long shall mine enimies triumph ouer consider heare lord god lighten mine eies sleepe death least mine enimies saie haue preuailed cast downe trouble reioice trust thy mercie lord hart ioifull thy saluation storme thou makest weather faire still weeping heauinesse thou giuest great ioie thy name mightie god praised euer euer amen another praier lord consider meditation complaining oh harken thou vnto praiers go fained lip let sentence come foorth thy presence let thine eies looke vpon thing equall hold thou vp going thy way footstep slip haue called vpon thee god thou shalt heare incline thine eare hearken vnto word shew thy maruellous louing kindnesse thou art sauiour put trust thee keepe apple eie hide vnder shadowe thy wing vngodlie trouble mine enimies compasse round take away soule lord let man haue vpper hand let heathen iudged thy sight may knowe themselues men yet thy mercie lord forgiue mine enimies turne hart hate tell oft offendeth oh clense thou secret offence keepe thy seruant also presumptuous sinnes least get dominion ouer shall vndefiled innocent great offence let mourning teares sorowfull sighing hart come thy presence alwaies accepted thy sight lord strength redeemer let thy good pleasure rid deliuer trouble humblie beseech thee shew token thy fauor poore wretched sinner banished woman looke vpon lord beseech thee thou didst looke vpon susanna sarai daughter raguel holie woman trusted thee thou didst deliuer hoped thee forsaken knowe lord thy strength weakened neither thy power abated thy good pleasure lord thou wilt helpe make thy power knowne meane time mercifull gratious lord god giue grace thankfullie patientlie take whatsoeuer shall thy good pleasure laie vpon lord grant thing hartilie thankesgiuing trouble lord strong rocke defence sauiour god might trust horne also saluation refuge yea lord shepheard therfore lacke nothing hath comforted soule brought trouble euen mercy sake though walke vale shadowe death feare none euill thou art thy rod thy staffe comforteth thee lord haue put trust feare flesh bloud doo vnto haue waited long weeping teares haue taried lord leasure hath great goodnesse deliuered trouble mightie god thine accustomed mercie preserue sinne wickednesse lord feele mine owne infirmitie weakenesse mercifull lord keepe bit bridle ioifulnesse doo forget
