proceede promise free goodnesse god vseth towards owne conteined gospell promise comprehended faith faith assured knowledge good god towards v grounded vpon free promise giuen vnto v iesus christ confirmed heart holie spirit weakenesse faith lord hath giuen v sacrament sacrament outward testimonie visible signe representeth vnto v promise god spirituallie accomplished v baptisme vnto v entrance church god representeth vnto v remission sinnes renouation life water propertie thereof wash doth signifie washing soules done v bloud iesus christ forgiuenes sin water also put vpon head signe death neuerthelesse done little time figure resurrection supper instituted lord assure v communion bodie bloud soules nourished hope life euerlasting bread wine signifie vnto v bodie bloud iesus christ haue propertie towards soules bread wine haue towards body namelie nourish strengthen right vse comunicating ye supper chieflie man proue himselfe whether haue true faith repentance charitie towards neighbour finis godlie exhortation mortification sinfull affection holinesse life written vertuous gentlewoman yee liue flesh shall die ye spirit doo mortifie deed bodie ye shall liue many led spirit god sonnes god rom also knowe season awake sleepe saluation neere night passed daie come nie let v put armor light let v walke honestlie day light eating drinking neither chambering wantonnesse neither strife enuieng put yee lord iesus christ make prouision flesh fulfill lust rom reward sinne death eternall life gift god iesus christ lord rom deerlie beloued abstaine fleshlie lust fight soule see ye haue honest conuersation among gentils wheras backbite euill dooers may see good work glorifie god daie visitation peter saie walke spirit fulfill lust flesh flesh lusteth contrarie spirit spirit contrarie flesh contrarie one ye doo whatsoeuer ye would ye led spirit ye vnder lawe deed flesh manifest adulterie fornication vncleannesse wantonnes worshipping image witchcraft hatred variance zeale wrath strife sedition sect enuieng murther dronkennesse gluttonie like tell yee haue told time past commit thing shall inheritours kingdome god trulie christ haue crucified flesh affection lust thereof galat let filthie communication proceed mouth good edifie withall oft neede may minister grace vnto hearer grieue holie spirit god phil followe thy lust turne thee fro thine owne thou giuest thy soule hir desire shall make thine enimies laugh thee scorne sirac adulterous woman shall troden vnder foot mire euerie one goeth waie sirac ye adulterer woman breake matrimonie knowe ye friendship world enimitie godward whosoeuer friend world made enimie god submit selues god resist diuell flie drawe nie god drawe nie clense hand ye sinner purge hart ye wauering minded suffer affliction sorrowe ye weepe let laughter turned mourning ioie heauinesse cast downe selues lord shall lift vp iames child adulterer shall come end seed vnrighteous bed shall rooted though liue long yet shall nothing regarded last age shall without honour die hastilie haue hope neither shall spoken daie knowledge horrible death end vnrighteous wisd child vngodlie abhominable child accompanie vngodlie inheritance vngodlie child shall come naught posteritie shall haue perpetuall shame confusion wo vnto ye vngodlie haue forsaken lawe highest ye doo liue ye shall cursed ye die curse shall portion labour get thee good name shall continue surer thee thousand great treasure gold sirac lord alloweth righteous vngodlie delighteth wickednesse doth soule abhor upon vngodlie shall raine snare fire brimstone storme tempest shall portion drinke righteous lord loueth righteousnesse psal sinner shall confounded earth vngodlie shall come end psal another godlie exhortation moue v praier cause v continuall readinesse waite maister christ shall come againe iudge quicke dead written godlie gentlewoman reioice lord alwaies againe saie reioice let softnesse knowne men lord euen nie hand carefull nothing praier supplication let petition bee manifest vnto god giuing thanks feruent spirit applie selues time reioice hope patient tribulation continue praier rom take heed therefore ye walke circumspectlie vnwise wise men redeeming time bicause day euil wherfore ye vnwise vnderstand lord dronken wine wherin excesse filled spirit speaking vnto selues psalmes hymnes spirituall song singing making melodie lord hart giuing thanks alwaies thing vnto god father name lord iesus christ submitting selues one another feare god epes praie alwaies maner praiers supplication spirit watch therevnto instance supplication ephes uerelie verelie saie vnto saith christ whatsoeuer yee aske father name giue aske yee shall receiue ioie may full thou praiest thou shalt hypocrite loue praie standing synagogue corner streetes would seene men verelie saie vnto haue reward thou praiest enter thy chamber thou hast shut dore praie thou thy father secret thy father seeth secret shall reward thee openlie thou praiest babble much heathen thinke shall heard much babbling sake yee like therefore father knoweth whereof yee haue neede yee aske maner therfore praie yee father art heauen halowed thy name c matth watch praie knowe neither daie yet houre sonne man commeth glorie holie angel shall sit vpon seate glorie shall gathered nation shall separate one another shepheard diuideth sheepe goates shall set sheepe right hand goates left shall king saie right hand come yee blessed child father inherit kingdome prepared beginning world hungred yee gaue meate shall king saie vnto shall left hand depart ye curssed euerlasting fire prepared diuell angel hungred yee gaue meate thirstie ye gaue drinke shall answer saieng lord sawe thee hunged thirst naked sicke prison minister vnto thee shall answere saieng uerelie saie vnto asmuch one least ye vnto shall go awaie euerlasting paine righteous life eternall matth iesus sate mount oliuet disciple came vnto secretlie saieng tell v thing shall signe shall thy comming end world iesus answered said vnto take heed man deceiue manie shall come name saieng christ shall deceiue manie yee shall heare warres fame warres see troubled thing must come passe end yet matth shall signes sunne moone star earth sea water shall roare men hart shall faile feare looking thing shall come earth behold figge tree tree shoote foorth bud ye see knowe owne selues summer nigh hand likewise yee ye see thing come passe vnderstand kingdome god nigh hand luke daie houre man knoweth angel heauen father onlie time noah shall likewise comming sonne man day floud eate drinke marie maried euen vnto daie noah entered ship knew nothing till floud came tooke awaie shall also comming sonne man matth take heede selues least heart ouercome surfeting dronkennesse care world daie come vnwares snare shall come vpon sit face earth watch therefore continuallie praie ye may obtaine grace flie shall come ye stand sonne god luke take heed watch praie ye knowe time man gone strange countrie hath left house giuen authoritie seruants euerie man worke commanded porter watch watch therefore yee knowe maister house come whether euen midnight whether cockecrowing dawning least come suddenlie find sleeping saie vnto saie vnto men watch praie matth sober watch aduersarie diuell roring lion walketh seeking whome hee may deuoure whome resist yee stedfastlie faith finallie let v praiers remember praie queenes excellent maiestie please almightie god prosper hir hir affaire send hir long triumphant reigne ouer v may ouercome hir enimies painefull life ended may reigne christ heauenlie kingdome receiue glorious crowne neuer shall perish finis third lampe virginitie conteining sundrie formes diuine meditation christian praiers penned godlie learned properlie vsed qveenes excellent maiestie especiallie vpon daie nouember daie gladnesse hir hart memorable feast hir coronation day time hir grace pleasure wherevnto also added heauenlie heast spoken person god vnto hir maiestie conteining diuine commandement concerning gouernement right godlie christian vow vttered againe hir grace vnto god comprehending heroicall office dutie prince faithfullie compiled holie psalmes princelie prophet king david learnedlie explaned theodore beza verie profitable often read meditated vpon hir maiestie christian ruler gouernours glorie god benefit church owne euerlasting ioie comfort holie ghost psalme audi filia vide inclina aurem tuam obliu scere popul domus patris tui et concupiscet rex formam tuam quia ipse est dominus tuus ipsum adorabis omnis gloria filiae regis intus est right godlie psalmes fruitfull praiers comfortable meditation said vertuous deere souereigne ladie queene elizabeth time hir grace pleasure especiallie vpon daie nouember memorable daie hir maiesties ioifull deliuerance trouble happie entrie hir blessed reigne psalme david made first beginning gratulation thankesgiuing vnto god entring kingdome maruelous mercy victory grace god towards paraphrasticallie explaned opened godlie learned man theodore beza doo loue thee lord strength doo loue thee euen bottome hart lord rocke fortresse deliuerer god mount refuge sheeld horne wherwith driue awaie enimie high tower defence haue praised lord called vpon hath deliuered mine enimies band death compassed round bound wicked men like raging flouds made afraid enuironing round lie wrapped winding sheete euen snarled snare death called vpon lord extremity called vpon god saie heard voice high palace receiued eares crie made vnto prison began earth quake tremble verie foundation mountaines shake shudder breathed smoke nostrels spitting foorth fire mouth yea casting foorth euen coales fire bowed heauens came downe darkenesse spred abrode vnder feete ride vpon wing angel caried wing wind blacke darknesse enuironed tabernacle round caried darke thicke cloud untill glistering brightnesse breake cloud flame fire flash euerie side length thundered heauen filled place mightie sounding voice hailestones lightening shot foorth fierie dart increasing lightening terrified mine enimies destroied deepe bottom water appeared foundation world discouered thy rebuke lord blustering wind thy wrath hath stretching right hand heauen taken drawne bottome deepe water mightie enimie saie enimies whose power oppressed verelie almost cast downe destroied sudden staffe staied mee hath drawne streights placed open large place bicause pleased without deseruing fauour regard indeed oppressed men without cause granted thing guiltlesse haue followed waie lord hath appointed howsoeuer men vexed neither could drawne anie iniuries fall god wicked vse lawes mine eies neither put statute foorth sight behaued selfe without hypocrisie neither followe mine affection else would easilie haue caried foorth waie therefore lord regard oppressed without anie cause fauoured mee innocent partie thou lord wilt shew thy selfe good vpright deale vprightlie thou shewest thy selfe sincere deale sincerelie craftie men shall perceiue thee cunning although manie time thy seruants sore vexed yet dooest thou preserue dooest cast downe behaue themselues proudlie hence haue light whereby thou causest shine driuest awaie darknesse thou hast made ouercome danger easilie leape ouer wals let waie waie whereby god leadeth v plaine word god pure lord doth defend trust shield god lord mightie god onelie hath girded power hath made waie safe hath made swift hind hath placed high safe place hath taught mine hand fight hath giuen great strength able breake bowe brasse mine armes thou hast preserued protection thy shield thou hast staied thy right hand readie fall thy great mercie thou hast caused go safelie without danger thou hast staied sliding step therefore haue pursued mine enimies taken haue turned back till haue destroied haue beaten downe troden vnder foote able raise themselues againe thou verelie hast giuen strength haue risen haue fallen hedlong feete thou hast giuen power strike head might destroie pursued yet lord grant cried vnto thee thou hast deliuered neither wouldest heare crie therefore beate small like dust wind scattereth abroad beate like mire tempered vnder foote walke street yea also thou hast deliuered domesticall inward trouble thou hast giuen dominion ouer nation neuer knewe unknowne people saie obey commandements stranger compelled feare submit themselues vnto heart stranger haue failed fall downe feare strongest fort let lord liue let defence knowledged worshipped worthilie deserueth let god deliuerer bee praised eueriewhere euen god saie mine aduenger hath subdued manie people vnder thou hast saued mine enimies thou hast deliuered rose vp especiallie cruell curssing man therefore praise thee euen amongst prophane nation sing vnto thy maiestie verelie thou hast maruellouslie preserued thy queene onlie elizabeth hir selfe thou hast annointed queene also thou hast shewed singular fauour hir posteritie shall remaine euer amen glorie therefore vnto thee father sonne holie ghost beginning present euer shall age world world without end amen amen psalme made david obteined kingdome death saule oh acknowledge declare yee openlie lord good bountious goodnesse euer let israel confesse thing bountious goodnes mercie endureth euer let stocke aaron confesse louing kindnesse perpetuall let sincere woorshippers lord confesse louing kindnesse perpetuall doubtlesse notable example vnspeakable bountie haue ceased yee knowe call vpon greatest extremity selues see hauing heard hath exalted large roome wherefore hauing experience lord worketh neere hand vnto god forbid feare power threat anie man lord himselfe chiefe leader helpe doubt shall see mine eies enimies remaine iustlie punished oh far better trust lord men far better trust lord anie men excellent soeuer behold manie nation compas calling vpon ye lord shal vndoubtedlie destroy compasse saie beset round calling vpon lord shall vndoubtedlie destroie mine enimies great multitude compasse like swarmes bee shall forthwith stiffle though cast fire calling vpon lord shall vndoubtedlie destroie deede cruell enimie sore thrust seemed euen readie fall falling lord supported therefore accompt mine onlie strength acknowledge sauiour praise song heereof come voice sing reioice together tabernacle doubtlesse lord hath aduanced power strong right hand lord hath exalted right hand lord hath shewed foorth power strong right hand behold yet aliue set foorth work god though hath striken verie sore yet hath spared life praie thee therefore let gate length open vnto onlie louers righteousnesse must go vnto entred thither may praise lord consecrate vnto lord therefore open iust alone heere praise thee lord thou giuing eare hast deliuered stone verie chiefe builder haue stubbornelie yet reiected nothing fit onlie counted building euen principall vpholdeth whole weight verie building uerelie worke god indeede maketh beholder thereof amazed go seeing lord hath commanded ioifull daie shine vnto v let v passe wholie mirth becomming saincts saie beseech thee lord preserue queene giuen v heauen praie thee saie praie thee lord giue queene elizabeth prosperitie let hir haue prosperitie blisse commeth gouerne v name commandement god wish prosperitie also neerer inhabitant house lord iehoua onlie god shineth vnto v binde lambe cord brought horne altar thou art god praise thee thou art god sing thy praise lowd confesse lord exceeding good bountious goodnesse euerlasting glorie therefore vnto thee blessed trinitie father sonne holie ghost alwaies hath bin continuallie euer shall world without ending praier almightie god gratious lord heauenlie father behold thine handmaid prostrate throne thy diuine maiestie meeklie confesse thee bee mercifull god highest king euerlasting sauiour humblie acknowledge thee souereigne lord aboue lord highest king king onelie omnipotent creator wise preseruer woonderfull ruler thy creature heauen earth high lowe visible inuisible selfe also worke thine hand sheepe thy pasture subiect seruant thy high sacred maiestie child depending alone wholie vpon thy diuine fatherlie prouidence thing bicause knowe vnthankfulnesse doth greatlie displease thee root spirituall euill onelie thing dammeth vp fountaine thy godlie mercie euer giue thanks vnto thee lord least vnthankfull thee god deliuerer sauiour yeeld thee humble hartie thanks hath pleased thee thy singular mercie giue mee especiall honour first suffer thy glorious truth much extreme miserie feare care imprisoment perill bodie trouble mind hazard life danger death sicknesse fire conspiracie sword afterward blessedlie protecting preseruing manifold danger miraculouslie deliuering hand mine enimies call excellent state roiall dignitie prince daie cloath garment honour set crowne gladnesse diademe dignitie vpon mine head put scepter righteousnesse globe glorie sword thy power mine hand annoint deborah iael hester iudith elizabeth rest staie staffe maiestie shepheard ringleader waie vertue holinesse zeale sincere religion maruellous worke thine oh gratious god thy name sake giue grace onlie daie day time life remember solemnize woorthie thanksgiuing queene saba may continuallie blesse thee saie blessed thou lord god thus hast loued thy people set thy throne qveene establish euer making gouernour ouer thy steed execute thy iudgement iustice neither forget thankfullie also call remembrance thy great mercy mercifull god shewed towards since comming vnto crowne namelie often thy mightie maruellous mercie thou hast deliuered vnto mee counsell wicked attempt malignant deuises mischeeuous practises wrought conceiued common craftie cruell enimies sathan minister exalt themselues rob mee thy people kingdome peace religion euen verie malice deadlie hatred haue diuellish meanes raged blasphemed conspired thee god thy truth like hypocrite mee crowne like traitours commonwealth countrie like spoiler offence mine themward lord thou knowest onelie cruell spite beare mee bicause truth professe thy christian religion seeke establishing good godlie lawes serue thee zealouslie sincerelie purelie according rule veritie thine eternall word thy great benefit well consider togither mine vnwoorthinesse thereof euen forced father david giue humble thanks blesse thee congregation saie blessed thou lord god israel father euer euer thine lord greatnesse power glorie victorie praise heauen earth thine thine kingdome lord thou excellest head ouer rich honour come thee thou reignest ouer thine hand power strength thine hand saie mightie god make great giue strength vnto therefore thanke thee praise thy glorious name euer lord god people thou hast brought mee honour thus redeemed deliuered mee thy people thrall vnto thy selfe art beecome god dooth apperteine man lord commeth rather thy free mercie anie woorthinesse elizabeth saie vnto thee thou lord god knowest thy seruant euen thy word sake according thine owne hart hast thou made fountaine become floud light shine sunne done great thing make knowne vnto thy seruant therefore thy gratious fauour long restraint great danger ouerpassed blusterous storm ouerblowne many iniuries digested wrong susteined thy mightie protection mercifull god small comfort thy people commoditie exalting erecting bringing thrall libertie darknesse light danger peace quietnesse dread dignitie miserie maiestie mourning ruling breeflie prisoner make prince place roiall throne sit queene full yeeres admirable rest blessed quietnesse long danger also fro hand violence al mine enimies visible inuisible domesticall foraine finallie thy great grace singular blessing mestimable benefit principall vertues spirituall corporall glorious resignation empire kingdome power rule dominion maiestie glorie heauen earth thee onlie iustlie belongeth humblie hartilie beseech thy diuine maiestie excellent father mercifull god haue mercie vpon thine humble handmaid sinfull seruant prouoked good lord sinnes sinnes parent people giue v ouer lust enimies make v reproch vnto foolish let aduersaries ouerthrowe triumph v saieng god thy rich mercie woonted compassion christ iesu forgiue sinnes old new secret open past present come yea mine owne others fault god beseech thee deliuer cast mine offence bottomlesse depth thy remembrance sight euer making crosse passion death resurrection thy deere onlie sonne sweete sauiour onlie redeemer iesus christ righteous immaculate lambe effectuall mee vertue godlinesse life pietie best becommeth thy daughter thy virgin thine annointed elect vessell honour thy good grace bountifull benefit alredie shewed towards thine accustomed goodnesse beseech thee confirme finish worke mee thou hast gratiouslie begun continue towards mee end according thy good pleasure increase thereof time time best shall serue setting foorth thy glorie benefit thy church posteritie mine eternall peace christ iesus prince peace grant saie lord also may added namelie hath pleased thee thy secret wisdome quicken tanquam ouis euen seelie sheepe lambe led slaine raise vp dust mire persecution lift vp pit dungeon set chiefe prince land make mee meete inherit seate glorie yea build chiefe head piller thy church england france ireland wherevpon whole bodie thy saint therein doo staie themselues thy blessed peace vnitie saie thy good desert exalt horne thine annointed appoint fraile woman thy lieutenant earth giue power vnto thy qveene iudge end thy dominion execute thine office amongst thy people space regall seate iustice mercie vouchsafe thou gratious god louing father like mercie powre downe continuallie vpon thy speciall good gift princelie vertues heauenlie grace fit high calling plentiouslie indued therewith bright shining beames thereof glittering star firmament glorious sunne orient arising setting foorth thy glorious inuisible eternall maiestie fraile earthlie visible maiestie may cleerelie shine appeare benefit thy church farre neere remembring whose minister may first aboue thing perfect zeale thy house loue thy people euer seeke thy honour glorie studie continuallie preserue thy people committed charge wealth peace godlinesse deere father blesse mee loue mee spirit counsell prudence knowledge fortitude sanctifie strengthen direct perfect faith feare loue thy sight may walke vprightlie without offence giuing obedience thy holie word fulfilling thy blessed commandements day life may true follower king souereigne ouer holie hill zion whose seate kingdome endureth euer giue mee grace thankfullie acknowledge thy manifold great benefit bestowed vpon mee also faithfullie diligentlie discharge dutie towards thee thy people executing thy iudgements indifferentlie without parcialitie aduancement thy kingdome establishment throne vniuersall comfort commoditie thy people make good lord entire affection perfect hart towards thee humble gentle spirit towards vnder gouernement example christ eternall king fulfill thy god vouchsafe take flesh virgin marie became man man man might become god vnto men also verie much abase humble himselfe seruant euen vnto death crosse redeeme prince people thrall bondage sinne sathan death hell let naturall affection disposition saie lord continue foe terrible subiects amiable mine offender mercifull vertuous bountifull men indifferent parciall none guided thee gouerne thy people iustlie godlie peace quietnesse may able good conscience witnesse mine integritie thee world thy faithfull seruants moses samuel nehemias somtimes boldlie trulie saie behold beare record lord annointed whose oxe whose asse haue forceablie taken awaie haue done anie wrong haue iniured hurt whose hand haue receiued anie bribe blind mine eies therewith restore people seeing well perceiuing motherlie affection faithfull gouernement carefull diligence diligent watchfulnesse ouer meanes doo good possiblie may thee may woorthilie witnesse rightlie answere iustlie confesse saie thy glorie perpetuall praise israelite heretofore said samuel haue grieued troubled land oppression iniurie haue hurt taken ought anie man hand anie meanes either selfe others willinglie abused power dealt vniustlie people oh kindle hart beseech thee holie father pure zele aboue thing promote thy glorie vigilant care onelie serue thee selfe sincerelie also haue thee diligentlie serued familie people end vouchsafe praie thee adorne thy heauenlie gift also blesse whole familie court houshold thy grace vertues high lowe one placed therein vnder may vertuous life true faith right religion towards thee god loiall hart conscionable obedience towards prince mistres entire affection charitie one towards another brother lastlie hartie loue naturall goodwill beare commonwelth countrie example patterne true godlinesse puritie religion life whole realme countrie yea whole world besides followe head fountaine light moreouer blessed god hitherto thy mightie protection thou hast preserued thy great mercie maugre head mine enimies miraculouslie hast deliuered established kingdome thus long admirable peace blessed quietnesse glorie praise rendered vnto thy glorious name therfore beseech thy gratious goodnesse lord like mercie blesse preserue maintaine keepe defend realme still forreine domesticall conspiracy treason deceit violence enimies danger peril imminent come bodilie ghostlie publike priuate may still gouerne blessedlie ouer blessed people realme people thy defence protection continue truth thy gospell happie enioieng perfect peace quietnesse outward inward thou lord host hast ordeined gouernour ouer thy people made people thy people thou lord art become god yea great mightie god besides wee haue none god knowe also god thou triest hart hast pleasure righteousnesse behold therefore offer vow dedicate selfe willinglie entirelie vprightnesse hart serue worship thee onelie euer ioie therfore thine handmaid bold praie praier vnto thee beseeching thee euer keepe helpe good purpose holie seruing worshipping thee haue hitherto done nothing speake direct thou continuallie thought mind prepare hart euermore vnto thee giue vnto thine handmaid perfect hart keepe thy commandements thy testimony thy statute cause vse power lawfullie reforming thy house estate according prescript rule thy written word reuealed may please thee lord god confirme euer thy mercifull promise made vnto father david blesse throne house thy seruant thy blessing may continue established thee euer may better come passe glorie thy name benefit thy church wealth realme hartilie wish desire remoue far thy church far excellent father fall thee infidelitie obstinate wilfulnesse traiterous rebel thy sacred lawe sincere religion professe let backbiter together proud dare shameleslie presume anie thing vtterlie rooted contrariwise let space especiallie verie zealous truth onlie may conuersant thee cause feede singular faith innocencie minister thing diligentlie vnto finallie let enimies thy gospell beseech thee gratious mightie god thus despise thy grace offered vnto repentance conuerted conuert turne god speedilie thy make thou saule length become paule let persecutor persist errours let rather accompt thy long suffering peaceable vnbloudie gouernement occasion saluation soules vnfeigned loue thy church otherwise needes remaine still disobedient thy truth disloiall vnto dangerous state enimies countrie commonwealth god saluation arise helpe wound head thine enimies hearie scalpe go still wickednesse let thy right hand find euerie daie prouoke thee reuenge thy selfe blasphemous hypocrite thus proudlie contemne thee thy face thou hast discouered peeuish practises thee thine annointed discouer still thou hast preuented diuelish purpose execrable intent preuent still yea let firie eies waxe wearie looking bloudie hart hand faint waiting golden daie commeth yet neither let come lord beseech thee thy good time according thy blessed healthfull reigne vnto selfe much ioie comfort subiects long peace zion euermore lastlie mightie god looke remaineth yet happie building enlarging finishing thy church establishing planting thy religion perfectlie therein according prescript rule thy blessed word full discharge dutie shall called render accompt iudgement seate christ without thee nothing neither possible please thee thou father light whome good gift doo come proceede vouchsafe powre downe plentifullie thy principall spirit vpon rauish hart flame loue thee thy people earnest zeale thy house ioseph may carefullie faithfullie prouide thy people moses painefullie leade desert errour oppression ioshua bring thy people land promise debora fight thy battels iahel knocke sisera roome temple vsurped headship iudith cut head proud holophernes hezekias iosias roote destroie superstition relikes idolatrie dauid salomon finish consecrate eternitie thy glorious temple among thy people earnestlie continuallie praie vnto thee saluation heere earth time vertuous example dooing good thy sight reigning blessedlie ruling prudentlie like louing mother tender nursse giuing fostermilke foode thy word gospell aboundantlie place dominion endeuouring selfe faithfullie discharge great trust committed vnto thy sonne whome onlie sea windes creature subiect shall come king king require accompt charge committed vnto may found faithfull faile finallie heauen purenesse virginitie holinesse mine innocencie presented lambe souereigne lord onlie god heauenlie bridegroome spirituall spouse euerlasting king deere christ onlie sweet sauiour iesus see saincts sainct holie patriarch iudges king queenes yea archangel angel saint martyr confessor uirgins whole companie thy celestiall blessed spirit reigne ouer spirituall power principality euer sing sugred song weddingdaie perpetuall ioie thine eternall praise glorious trinitie father son holie ghost one inuisible god almightie blessed euer euer amen amen another praier said queenes maiestie blessed art thou lord god sabbaoth vnto thee apperteineth magnificence power glorie thee belongeth honour authoritie whatsoeuer either heauens aboue earth beneath thine thine lord kingdome thou art aboue prince king rich thine glorie thine thou art lord ouer thee remaineth vertue power greatnesse gouernement god father lord mercie hast made thing thy word thy wisdome appointed man rule creature thou hast made gouerne world equitie iustice praise thee extoll thy glorious name appointing thy seruant rule gouerne thy people committed vnto charge therefore gratious lord fauourablie behold may treade path truth righteousnesse sinceritie hart thy sight let abuse mine authoritie gouerne lenitie gentlenesse people vnder liuing godlie honest life mankind may enioie desired peace giue therefore vnto thy seruant hart desirous instruction may iudge people discerne betweene good euill neither declining right hand left stoutelie valiantlie mainteine cause righteous grant counsell assistance doo thing gratefull vnto thee good thy church profitable people commonweale giue thy wisdome reiect thy child thy seruant handmaiden fraile woman short time full weake vnderstanding iudgements lawes thou hast chosen gouernour thy people iudge thy sonnes daughter send mee therefore wisdome thy sacred heauens seate thy magnificence may labour whereby may perceiue acceptable thine eies learne haue power selfe thee art almightie reignest ouer kingdomes men giuing thy pleasure graunt neuer conceiue proudlie selfe may receiue patience discipline thy lawe make wise circumspect neither offer iniurie anie man neither suffer anie iniuried equitie may mainteined iustice among men preserued let time vnder shew colour equitie vphold countenance wicked cause neither yet without sufficient examination triall party giue sentence anie allow counsellers gouernours ouerseers courage fearing god dealing vprightlie hating couetousnesse burthen charge care susteine may somewhat lightened endue thine holie spirit earnest studie watchfull mind may discerne betweene matter man negligence haue ouerthrowe righteous cause sentence rightlie pronounced betweene man brother stranger without respect anie person iudgement let v heare well little great feare man iudgement thine standest companie iudges among god thou plaiest iudge iudgement man lord whatsoeuer shall iudge come vpon v wherefore let thy feare v may doo thing care circumspection prooue child vnderstanding neither giue selues lust pleasure eate meate due season strength dronkennes thou wilt make earnest diligent inquirie work search cogitation thy seruants deputy gouerne men verie short life daie king morowe may dead mortall subiect one corruption besides horrible iudgement nigh walke thee god lowe shall finde mercie mightie shall mightilie tormented thou art lord ouer regardest person anie neither doest thou feare greatnesse mightie well great small workemanship thine hand thy care equall ouer thou giuest godlie prince eternall happinesse art iudge quicke dead liuing reigning thy son vnitie spirit god euermore amen another forasmuch hath pleased thee king king lord lord appoint among ruler thy people giue mee grace beseech thee minister commonweale execute mine office may please thee hurt man dooings iudge equallie iustlie rule according thy shew selfe mother vnto thy people haue selfe mine enterprise seeking thy glorie furtherance thy blessed gospell weale thy subiects may thou shalt render euerie one according deedes found blamelesse thy sight iesus christ lord amen another oalmightie god lord heauen earth hast appointed thy seruant bee gouernour thy people ruler ouer men humblie beseech thee send thy wisdome aboue whereby may vprightlie iudge thy people rightlie discerne betweene good euill constantlie continue dooing dutie without respect person giue power wisdome gratefull thy sight profitable subiects good continuance peace let alwaies remember haue power selfe thee iudgement man thee god standest among iudges plaiest iudge among god giue grace likewise consider one daie soone knowe thou wilt bring reckning make diligent inquirie haue behaued selfe place office thy seruant haue short race run state v daie king morrowe may dead forasmuch horrible iudgement shall giuen vpon rule vprightlie walke thy mightie men shall mightisie tormented thou lord ouer wilt spare person feare anie greatnesse thou hast made small great carest alike beseech thee gratious eternall god giue mee grace learne thy deale wiselie infer none iniurie vnto anie suffer anie iniured countenance none euill cause slide path iustice thy seruant fraile person short time full weake vnderstanding iudgments lawes send therefore wisdome throne thy maiestie may labour may knowe acceptable thy sight led hir dooings preserued hir power shall work acceptable shall gouerne thy people righteouslie christ lord sauiour amen another heare mee lord thou high mightie god whose maiestie may bee comprehended whose worde true whose commandement strong thou ridest vpon cherubins fliest wing wind thou god mercie woorthie sought whome host heauen stand trembling whose ordinance dreadfull whose lookes drie vp depth whose hand rule starrie firmament whose goodnesse onelie giueth fruit earth whose wrath maketh mountaines melt consumeth wicked whose truth beareth witnesse mercie saueth sorowfull sinner thou thou incomprehensible creator neuer tookest beginning wantest end sith nothing thou hast wrought woonders world thy seemelie shape vouchsafest thy dririe death passion drowne danger sinful desert hast carefull captaine cherished bodie comfortable gift vnto present daie continue god goodnesse towards vnwoorthie doo contrite hart bowed knee appeale heigth thy mercie louing kindnesse accept mine vnequall thanks humblie beseeching thy fatherlie goodnesse thy holie hand may stil renew thy former gift plentiouslie powred vpon prime birth vnto present remembring good lord mine vnwoorthinesse frailtie passed yeeres speaketh altering minister thy wrath mild mercie grant beseech thee assistance thy holie spirit may led correct amisse may perseuere setting ordering reforming trauels counsel study best may accord thy blessed cancell bond heauie charge wherein assist puissant prince power thy prudent skill heauenlie grace may truelie able aduance iustice hate wrong found faithfull minister ouer thy people plant beseech thee thy heauenlie grace feare obedience towards mee thy minister kindle loue thy holie spirit may perseuere truth thy word without doubt wauering end grant oh mightie god host merit passion thy deere sonne lord sauior iesus christ amen praier king salomon wisdome gouerne well wisd thrise denied thee forsooke thee oth thou mercifullie lookedst beholding thee bitterlie wept thou lord forgauest another thy compassion theefe crosse saued one word paule furious madnesse persecution doost thou powre thy plentious compassion vpon v well thou didst vpon forefather standest thou far lord hidest thy face needfull tune trouble hast thou forsaken v thy mercy spent none left lord god thou wilt vouchsafe drawe take also make mee righteous thy grace clense purifie hart mine iniquity vncleannesse put may cleane table thy finger god may write lawe thy loue charitie amen daie trouble teares cleanse comfortable water thy sacred scripture may numbred among vnto whome thou saiedst yee cleane word haue spoken amen z zache perfect man thou lord saiedst vnto figtree zache come downe daie come thy house came downe ioifullie receiued thee luke verse mercifull god manie sinnes haue thy sight would wise haue done mortall men feared men thee blind loued blindnesse onlie eies flesh therfore onlie feare looke men flesh god behold stand thy face might finde mercie stand thy goodnesse benignitie looking thy fauorable answere haue mercie therefore thou saiedst zache daie abide thy serue thee euer cleane pure hart sweet lord iesus sawest thou zache euen thine owne image cast image diuell put thine image thou didst see zache putting image diuell drawe thee house take sweet iesus sinnes wickednesse praie thee none may remaine may keepe thee may put zache euill thou maist see thou sawest zache thou shalt call figtree miserable world thou maist saie vnto come downe daie abide thee amen pure heart create god right spirit renew within psalme verse ala lord sauiour hart hath forsaken thee turned thee gone astraie wandered strange country ensueth vanity hir eies vttermost part world lost gone sold vnder sinne stonie yea harder flint adamant stone relented yeelded thy sonnes death lord shall saie pure hart create fleshie hart mollified soft hart humble hart penitent hart mercifull hart deuout hart religious zealous hart yea hart loue thee aboue thing create therefore good lord hart may efficacie thy grace nature able make giue also right spirit may loue worship thee vaine trifle therefore desireth spirituall thing desireth great thing desireth thy ioie sauing health desireth greatest thing thou hast giue thy sauing health iesus christ thy onlie sonne verie god euerlasting life forsomuch thou hast bin louing liberall father giue vnto death crosse offer ashamed aske thee whome thou hast giuen giue therefore thy principall spirit may reioice thy sauing health thou makest v promise fulfillest thy truth sake thou didst promise vnto abraham sonne aged thou fulfilledst thy promise old barren sara thou louest truth thou madest promise vnto dauid thy seruant saieng fruit thy bodie set vpon regall throne came passe thou louest truth thou hast promised vnto sinner come vnto thee forgiuenesse fauour thou hast neuer defrauded anie man thou louest truth innumerable promise thou hast euer bene faithfull thou louest truth loue therefore father mercy truth repentant hart turneth thee behold therefore thy creature whome thou maist keepe whome thou maist desired loue heauenlie thing wilt thou desire sacrifice wilt thou lord pleased amen regina r rebuke lord thine anger neither chasten thou mee thy heauie displeasure haue thou mercie weake miserie prodigall vnthriftie sonne saieng father haue sinned heauen thee haue mercie therefore haue mercie bicause haue deserued thy mercie bicause thou art mercifull sith therefore thou art mercifull art desire woman canaan followed thee cried made pitious noise mooued thy disciple compassion worshipped thee said lord helpe yet wouldest thou answere yet shee trusting thy mercie praied againe saieng lord helpe unto whose importunitie thou diddest answere saieng good take childrens bread cast vnto dog lord would haue beene confounded haue gotten awaie thy word yet woman continue still praier said truth lord thou saiest meete cast childrens bread vnto dog yet lord dog doo eate crums fall childrens table thou lord reioicing hir great constancie didst saie woman great thy faith vnto thee thou desirest therefore sweet mercifull lord iesu thou diddest vouchsafe accept heare praier cornelius woman canaan hartilie beseech thee heare humble praiers make daie night thee onelie thou shouldest complaint go foorth vnfeined lip come thee mouth may shew foorth woorthie praise thy name psalme verse thy praise great thing lord proceedeth fountaine whereof sinner drinke glorious praise mouth sinner deliuer therefore lord waie sinner tongue shall magnifie thy righteousnesse lip mouth shall shew foorth thy praise thou hast key dauid shuttest man openeth openest man shutteth therefore open thou lip thou hast opened mouth infant whose mouth thou hast established thy praise trulie prophet apostle thy saint praised thee despised themselues suckling extoll thy fame glorie knowe thy heauenlie celestiall grace thy friend spreading thy glorie haue conuerted innumerable soules sinne vnto vertue true felicitie thy beloued haue openlie preached thy bountious gentlenesse mercifull fauour thou shewest thy deere sonne vnto world therefore mercifull god giue true humilitie thou maist stablish thy praise mouth make one infant suckling may euer hang pap thy wisdome thy pap lord better wine thy wisdome better rich make one thy friend beloued may constantlie abide thee mouth voice may among suckling extoll set foorth thy praise saieng singing ozanna highest amen filthie vncleane thee lord thou therefore sprinkle isope shall cleane thou wash shall whiter snowe psalme verse sope lord lowe herbe hot good sauour signifieth nothing else thine onlie sonne iesus christ humbled himselfe vnto death euen vnto death crosse heate feruent loue loued v washed v sinnes bloud also redolent sweet sauor beneuolence righteousnesse hath replenished world therefore isope shalt thou holie father sprinkle thou shalt powre vpon vertue bloud thy deere sonne christ faith shall dwell loue ioined shall imitate followe humilitie passion shall cleansed mine vncleannesse shalt thou wash mine owne teares flowe loue thy sonne christ shall sigh till wearie shall water bed euerie night teares shall swimme lord shalt thou wash shall whiter snowe amen n euerie one saith lord lord broken vexed hath carnall thing desireth else feeleth selfe thing hateth spirit broken vnquieted fault hath offended god loueth soroweth hath sinned maker redeemer hath regarded good louing father broken sorowing spirit vnto thee lord sacrifice sweet sauour notwithstanding hath confection bitter spice euen remembrance sinnes sinnes gathered together morter hart beaten pestle compunction made
