house humbling hir selfe thy feete sweet lord washed hir teares wiped hir heare annointed pretious ointment ceassed kisse surelie lord hir sacrifice right acceptable pleased thee thou preferredst aboue pharisie owne sight righteous lord great thy power great thy might declareth selfe chieflie sparing hauing compassion sinner shewing v contrite humble hart thou wilt despise accept therefore sweete lord iesu sacrifice praise proceeding broken sorowfull hart vnperfect amend thou fault mercifull lord onlie art power doo may holie acceptable sacrifice inflamed feruent heate thy bountious charitie may acceptable vnto thee least thou despise knowe well shall find fauour thy sight heereafter none thy saincts either heauen earth shall despise accomplish therefore euen lord oft craue thee thou wilt haue compassion according thy great mercie also thou wilt receiue sacrifice righteousnesse holie oblation burnt sacrifice good liuing calfe offered vpon thine altar crosse may passe vale miserie vnto ioie thou preparest loue thee amen another elizabeth e engraue thy lawes depth heart lord instructed thy commandements may serue thee feare reioice thee trembling take hold vpon thy discipline thing least anie time thou become angrie perish right waie amen l lord giue helpe trouble vaine helpe man thee haue strength thou bringest vnto nothing thing trouble let soule subiect vnto thee thee proceedeth patience thou art god sauiour helper depart thee thee helth glorie thou art god helpe helpe thee amen haue broken thy fold wandered long lost sheepe let returne lord bicause haue forgotten thy commandements misdeed ignorance tender yeers remember lord according thy mercie haue mind thy goodnesse lord keepe soule deliuer let ashamed bicause haue trusted thee turne heauinesse ioie cut sacke sorowes gird gladnes glorie may signe vnto thee shall greeued z zorobabel king iuda depth thy displeasure tasted thy mercie receiued mouth aggeus thy prophet sweete comfort knowledge thy fauour grace yea thy determination destroie whole kingdome heathen thy right hand preserue thine incomparable mercie choose seale thy selfe lord happie king thy goodnesse earthlie creature could haue righteousnesse himselfe moue thy compassion proceeded multitude thy mercy surmount iniquity whole world thou didst onlie vouchsafe behold image thy selfe bow downe thine eies lord behold selfesame certifie conscience remission sinnes sorowfull soule may rest within send downe thy holie spirit remaine may become good king thy chosen seale seruant graunt thy people may neuer deserue tast thy rod fauorable correction labour study may euer bend performance thy holie discharge dutie amen arise illuminate mind benigne sauiour sleepe anie time death least mine enimies saie haue preuailed trouble glad cast downe haue fixed hope thy mercie enter iudgement thy seruant liuing creature shall iustified thy sight euer looke vpon lord shalbe right hand mooued hart glad tongue reioiceth yea moreouer flesh shall rest hope amen b thou vnto lord daie time defendour night season place refuge thou maist saue thou art strength vnto thee flie lord god deliuer hand sinner lawebreaker wicked dooer thou lord art patience thou art hope euen youth thee confirmed euen mother wombe thou art protector thee shall song euer euer amen e euer tongue shall telling thy rich mercie woonderous work lord thou hast caused passe fire water led fresh place thou hast giuen soule life hast suffered feete fall according multitude sorowes thy comfort haue made soule merrie soule like sparowe taken fowler snare thou hast deliuered life death hand bloud may please thee lord light liuing amen thou art iust lord thy commandements true thy way mercie truth iudgement lord mindfull take reuengement sinnes remember mine offence neither offence father haue obeied thy precept giue hart vnderstanding set thy feare alwaies mine eies may obedient word deed thought thy lord giue vnto power thy holie spirit rule gouerne thy people committed charge godlie feare knowledge thy word may vnto example godlinesse vertue praise thy holie name amen h heale lord shall healed saue shall saued life cleaueth vnto earth quicken according thy word according thy mercie releeue keepe testimony thy lip helpe lord shall safe hencefoorth studie thy righteousnesse thy mercy manie lord according thy word restore health amen regina r regard praiers thou god life leaue thought euill deliuer wicked man let foote pride come vpon vaineglorie giue take sinfull lust let desire vncleannesse take hold vpon giue ouer vnshamefast obstinate mind correct thy mercie thy hand commit amen e enter thy iudgements table hart destroie mine affection thy loue send thy wisdome holie heauens seate thy maiestie may labour may knowe thing acceptable thee may iudge people righteouslie discerne betweene good euill g gratious lord thou art high god aboue earth longsuffering much mercie sorowing sinnes man thy great goodnesse hast promised penitent remission sinnes lord haue sinned mine iniquitie multiplied aboue sand sea hope life haue stirred thee anger multiplieng offence thee lord trusting thy mercie bow knee hart beseeching thee thy goodnesse destroie togither mine iniquitie dead whose soules body neither praise thanke thee sorowfull hart thirstie soule ascribe praise vnto thee lord powre praiers thee require mercie thy sight saue vnwoorthie reserue eternall punishment mee thine owne sake aske praise thee day life amen illuminate hart lord light thy word leade lord thy waie shall enter thy truth print thy feare hart may reioice thee let thy word lanterne vnto foot lampe light vnto path shall erre right waie walke like pure wise virgin vpright hart chaste mind cleane conscience single eie thee daie euermore amen n neuer cease call vpon thee mightie god host sittest vpon cherubins hast dominion ouer kingdom earth thou madest heauens thing comprehended bow downe thine eare heare open thine eies behold saue mee hand mine aduersaries suffer euill happen vnto people may knowe thou alone art god amen assist mee lord god thy heauenlie grace renew mee right spirit may receiue strength ablenesse doo thy righteous stand assault wilie satan may haue place mee old man beare bodie may crucified dailie die desire sinne errour worldlie vanity may vtterlie destroied may euermore renewed spirit mind life sauiour christ may alwaies appeare whome father holie ghost honour triumph glorie euer euer amen versicle euen euer vouchsafe lord thy deere sonnes sake heare humble petition answere receiue praiers saie god thy truth mercie pardon mine offence grant mee thy grace collect emanuel lord god iesus christ sonne pure virgin marie thou art onelie sweete spouse soule god father meeke mediatour full mercie truth wash awaie sinnes pretious bloud thy holie passion make rich thy mercie faith strong thee assisted thy grace holie spirit duty work life towards thee may enioie afterwards glorie thy blessed kingdome thy holie saint pure uirgins euerlasting honour triumph amen praier roote iesse lord sauiour iesus christ hast redeemed mankind sinne death hell thou hast said waie truth life waie doctrine commandements example truth promise life reward praie thee thine ineffable loue wherewith thou hast vouchsafed wholie bestowe thy selfe securitie thou wilt suffer euer straie thee bicause thou art waie anie time distrust thy prom art truth performest whatsoeuer thou promisest neither let rest anie thing bicause thou art eternall life without nothing ought desired neither heauen earth thee learne sure expedient passage vnto true helth wander longer laberinth world thou hast exactlie taught beleeue doo hope ought rest thee wee learne wee first adam vnfortunatelie borne thee assured hope health faith thee thou art onlie brightnesse giuest light men trauelling darke desarts world nothing profound dimnesse wherby neither see calamity fro whence ought seeke remedie euill thou vouchsafedst descend earth disdainedst take nature vpon thee thy doctrine thou mightest shake dimnesse ignorance thy commandements mightest direct feete waie truth peace example thy life thou hast shewed v waie immortalitie thy step hast restored v plaine easie profitable waie vneeuen rough waie thou art made vnto v waie knoweth error least wearie thou hast vouchsafed vphold v thy benignitie great sure promise wearie accounting himselfe redie thy step enter thy heauenlie heritage therefore whilest iournie thou wouldest sure hope vnto v steed staffe vnto v wherewith sustained neither thy goodnes content knowing weaknesse flesh meane comfort thy spirit dooest refresh strength whereby run cheerefullie thou made vnto v waie dooest driue awaie errour truth dooest thou take awaie distrust finallie made life vnto v dooest reuiue dead sinne liue thy spirit releeuing thing vntill resurrection mortalitie vtterlie abolished may alwaies liue thee thee christ shall v eternall life knowe father sonne holie ghost one true god thorough faith behold onlie glasse riddle seeing felowlie glorie lord wee shall transformed image therefore beseech thee mercifull sauiour thou wouldest nourish faith thy seruant may neuer wauer thy heauenlie doctrine increase obedience neuer turne thy precept fortifie constancie entring thy step pulled backe terrour intisements satan ouerthrowne may perseuere thee art true waie vnto death build sure trust accustomed thy promise neuer waxe old exercise vertue forgetting thing past may cotinuallie striue com perfecter accept contrite hart woonted sacrifice thy delight oblation petition granting summe request blot mine offence thine owne sake increase thy grace may thing carrie vpright swaie equall iudgement gouerne thy people light thy word feare thy lawes dailie die selfe liue led thy spirit fearing nothing thee nothing greater mightier louing nothing beside thee nothing beloued glorieng nothing thee art glorie saint requiring nothing beside thee art best desiring nothing thee art full perfect felicitie father holie ghost aboue starrie firmament whome praise euer amen king heast god familiar speech qveene collected holie psalmes good king david learnedlie expounded theodore beza wherein almightie god diuine sort speaking vnto hir maiestie sometimes vnto dauid though mysticall maner doth first declare mercifull prouidence preseruing hir gratious goodnesse exalting hir crowne exhorting hir therewithall humblie acknowledge souereigntie ouer earthlie power worship secondlie describeth vnto hir grace woorthie property required bee euerie godlie prince wise gouernour maintenance glorie estate thirdlie exhorteth hir maiestie faithfull discharge hir office dutie feare seruice increase vertue suppressing vice shewing commodity insue thereby hir hir people fourthlie promiseth onelie hir continuall defender hir enimies also blesse hir hir realme manie large sweet comfortable benefit corporall celestiall make hir partaker ancient mercy promised long since hir father dauid namelie vpon condition finallie perseuere perfect loue due obedience hir spirituall spouse christ iesus p first chapter heast elizabeth thou uirgin mine king daughter fairest among woman full beautie maiestie attend litle heast marke shall say thou art daughter deede daie haue begotten thee espoused thee thy king christ sonne crowned thee gift appointed thee qveene reigne vpon holie mount zion behold onlie lord full right authoritie men doo selfe gouerne empire kingdom greatest king mightie monarch whole world euen high god celestiall father haue elected thee chosen vessell high honour price house end haue mightilie preserued thee miraculouslie deliuered thee manie great danger last haue brought thy subiection people ouer whome thou hast authoritie none haue consecrated thee vnto selfe annointed thee holie oile queene mother nursse people israel onlie haue giuen thee excellent goodlie heritage thou possessest peace thee saie daughter elizabeth haue raised vp chosen pure perfect virgin rest whole people loued thee deerelie aboue thou maiest worthilie reioice glorie thy dignitie honour yet singular power benefit none cause hath pleased thy god exalt thee aboue others embrace receiue thee speciall grace fauour therefore intent might alwaies vse thy diligent seruice faithfull ministerie dutifull endeuour great businesse high office queene kinglie gouernour thy power receiued people may defended cherished behold haue ordeined lampe thee mine annointed powred foorth vpon thee bountie none able compared vnto thee yea haue adorned thee bountifullie beautifullie gift grace incomparable shall neuer taken thee deere daughter consider diligentlie thy selfe awhile maner husband thou art coupled conioined vnto learne alone thy spouse christ mine onlie son meane daie married thee requireth thee namelie thou shouldest forget thine owne nation thy father house worldlie thing thou art come vnder authoritie familie spirituall societie thy heauenlie bridegroome therefore saie bee wise qveene bee learned thou iudge earth emperours king potentats world thou maist giue place vnto lord resigne vp vnto honour glorie power giue saie vnto god god king king euen verie god glorie maiestie dominion due vnto name fall downe worship doo vnto possible reuerence giueth power people blesseth prince subiect continuall benefit reioice feare trembling kisse sonne christ thy spouse betimes least angrie thou suddenly perish wrath shall flame foorth worship lord saie due worship trust alone wholie dependeth vpon mercie fauour protection shalt thou blessed thy throne shall neuer shaken confesse hath set thee high place far aboue men thy subiects remember also high god present thee thine assemblie state senatours haue debarred selfe mine authoritie ouer neither present idle beholder iudge also knowe assuredlie honoured deed name god whereby mine authoritie ouer men declared albeit haue embraced speciall fauour father child yet thinke haue exempted power authoritie though prince magistrate yet knowe mortall euen men yea remember shall die shall stand iudgementseate euen euerie vile poore man render giue accompt stewardship thing done flesh cap ii beware therefore yee abuse authoritie giuen vnto vnder certaine lawes condition see directlie followe way haue appointed walke take heed drawne awaie right hand left error wicked forsake lawes ordinance fall god haue exalted sure haue placed seate vpon condition giuen vnto plaine charge commandement decree iust lawes execute iudgement right equitie without fauour parcialitie regard anie partie deuise manner godlinesse shew selues openlie freends vertue foe vice weigh nothing equitie iustice balance verie lawe nature doth require releeue spoiled violence defend fatherlesse mainteine poore iniuries rich deliuer miserable hand wicked see diligentlie wringing worldling cruell extortioner exercise tyrannie oppression continuallie ouer godlie feeble people moreouer make diligent inquisition bloudshead murther reuenge carefullie search wickednesse abhomination condemne execute traytor murtherer theefe pull praie teeth spoiler breake downe power wicked mightie one destroie worker iniquitie vtterlie roote sinne vngodlinesse earth euen conspire soules righteous abusing iustice colour lawe gather themselues together sit condemne innocent bloud trouble heritage finallie disordered state world seemed vtterlie void iustice haue set thee daughter people last restore ancient right godlie order iustice religion faith thou shouldest defence fortresse among people followe thy god great cheerefulnesse haue thy delight fullie fixed lawes statute daie night well exercised therein behooueth thou maist able knowe sift trie way men iudge betwixt right wrong cap iii harken therefore vnto daughter take heed thou haue nothing stoole wickednesse throne iniquitie tyrannicall domination forgeth wrong lawe adioineth authoritie wicked decree haue fellowship agreeable thee bicause wicked doo wander euerie side woorst men exalted highest place honour office commonweale therfore aduise counsell thee betimes expell thrust thy court house vnwoorthie vngodlie men flatterer parasite iesters atheist reuengers bloud place woorthie godlie roomes may sit among prince people assistant vnto thee make much feare lord let thy delight vpon saint earth carefull alwaie preserue vertuous exalt best woorthie person call thy state dignitie senatours counsellers iudges magistrate vnder thee graue wise learned godlie zealous truth gelous thy renowme aduance men saie honour office vnder thee good conscience sound religion vpright life painfull watchman diligent steward make iust decree execute good lawes euen care nothing knowe dutie therefore willing doo dutie hating vnfeinedlie maner vice louing intirelie maner vertue come foorth saie deere daughter come foorth thou beautifull woman fairer child men thou qveene uirgin saie incomparable eloquence grace speech come foorth thus shew thy beautie full maiestie grace thy gouernement pastorship may want neither integritie vprightnesse taking counsell neither wisdome performing thine interprises doo thing prudentlie prosperouslie caried vpon triumphant chariot euen word god wise vertuous gouernour directing let truth mercie iustice equitie drawe round thy dominion thus shalt thou declare thy selfe bountifull daughter prince woorthie gouernour vsing thy power neither weakelie idlelie thou gouerne people moderate equitie punish mine enimies thine seueritie iudgement shee also sitting vpon thy throne maiestie two pillers mercie truth seene stand support thee cap iiii qveene surelie performe couenant begun thy father david chosen man vnto thee also daughter indue also eternitie make thy kingdome perpetuall heauen continuallie defend thee certaine speciall power together people land haue chosen giuen vnto thee hand saie shall establish thee mine arme strengthen thee enimie shall ouercome thee subtiltie anie wicked man oppresse thee force yea though thou shalt want manie mightie enimies domesticall forreine shall resist thee sacred qveene thy godlie proceeding yet assure thee enterprise shall vaine frustrate thou misery greeuous battell wherewith thou maist seeme vexed shalt suffer detriment contrariwise meanes plaine experience thou louing righteousnes hating whatsoeuer armed sharpe arrowes sword word shalt onlie therwith wound heart thine enimies cast downe ground tread vnder thy feete also bring maruellous thing passe name thy mightie power lord iehova reuenger roiall dignitie defender david seruants posteritie destroie would oppresse thee thy face slaie thine enimies fill shame confusion mercie shall neuer faile thee truth shall neuer forsake thee thou trusting fauour shalt lift vp thine head high crowned euerlasting glorie cause thee haue one hand vpon sea another vpon flouds thou shalt call mee thy father thy god thy safe tower place thee first begotten daughter sacred familie king whole world euen throne high aboue others yea thou pure uirgin borne kindred shalt highlie exalted iehova hath decreed eternitie thou shalt sit glorious qveene ouer mightie people shalt haue rule dominio ouer thy subiects without exception euen mightie iehova giue vnto thee zion kingdome stabilitie ouer end earth kingdome thy power shall great enimies thou hast excellent euident shall thy fame renowme nation people shall willinglie obedientlie offer themselues gouerned thee infinite victory thou shalt haue ouer enimies vexe thee daie shall come thou hast ouercome thine enimies thou shalt muster thine army appeare thee make triumph also garment triumph shall holie pure shining saie qveene thou shalt behold multitude thy chosen yoong men beautifull virgin morning heauenlie light shall bring foorth vnto thee powring downe hir plentifull deaw vpon earth yea arme thee double edged sword thy hand wherewith thou maist punish prophane gentile auenge crueltie proud people also maist drawe king noble bound chaines iron fetter execute iudgement appointed commanded thy lord god vpon verelie dignitie honour renowme giue thee daughter whome haue receiued fauour euen bring subiection vnto thy kingdome people far wide sauing thine owne nation make horrible slaughter rebel traitor eueriewhere go ouerthrowe monarch ruleth shall rule far neere defend thee saie deere daughter euerlasting mercie couenant made thy father david shall established euer generation thy throne shall sunne shall continue moone age stable heauen selfe holie one haue sworne mine owne selfe neither breake promise violate couenant change anie thing haue spoken david thy father thing haue promised old saie vndoubtedlie bring passe thou daughter keepe commandements violate ordinance haue commanded thee order thy selfe thy people rule lawes haue prescribed vnto shall thing good order nothing confounded yea verie foundation earth also shall firme remaine stable peace righteousnesse iudgement good thing else shall remaine safe sure amongst men neither suffer thy dangerous iournie perillous pilgrimage thou shouldest stumble thou shouldest fall compelled go backe though manie doo lie wait thy destruction yet preuenting danger bee thy watchfull keeper seeing haue taken hand freelie mine owne good call thee excellent estate prince haue hitherto bene verie carefull defend thee people israel slumber much lesse deepe sleepe suffer thee oppressed therefore let thing certainlie determined vnto thee bee thou comforted confirmed onlie hope distresse lord thy keeper shadowe thee stormes present thee neuer faile thee present old thou returnedst egypt bondage spirituall pharao also present thee ye heate sunne daietime noisome humor moone vseth raise night season like citie ierusalem compassed round massie mountaines lord stand round thee thy people trusting euerie side neuer forsake haue done hitherto surelie continue defend loue vertue bind thee vnto new benefit bring passe thou shalt enioie stable peace sure tranquillitie thou shalt see ierusalem flourishing long thou doest liue yea lord blesse thee heauen plentifull blessing power maiestie thy counselles enterprise shall prosper haue good successe continuallie preserue thee safe discommodities defend thy life violence yea waie soeuer thou shalt go ride euen thy mightie maker god thee thou goest foorth commest place place onlie temporall voiage iournie euer gouerne guide thee thou shalt neuer laid open reproch men thy crowne shall neuer cast ground thy selfe reiected thy fortress city shall stand vnassaulted thy fort strong castels hold shall battered laid open breach spoile passenger edge thy sword shall neuer waxe blunt thy scepter neuer broken thy crowne cast downe dust thy power stained minister continuall power cause ioie vnto thee qveene take awaie courage force thine enimies shall able arise stand thy mightie power finallie league haue made thee shall neuer abrogated come downe sanctuarie helpe thee euen fro mount zion strengthen thee danger thou callest vpon praier heare thy petition grant vnto thee thy hart desireth accomplish thy purpose thou doubtlesse shalt bee preserued deliuered waie haue annointed thee qveene cap v thus saie deere daughter thou carefullie behaue thy selfe walke way haue commanded thou shalt woorthilie honored indeed name wherby mine authoritie ouer men declared thy god heauenlie father imbrace thee speciall fauour deerelie beloued dooue obedient child yea shall king haue pleasure thy fairenes loue thy goodlie personage shall come passe thou shalt bee high fauour thy spirituall spouse christ sonne onlie meete thou shouldst subiect thy souereigne lord king head vnder whose gouernement thou shalt remaine honourable admirable singular vnspeakeable gift grace maner people stranger others euen mightie rich shall desire see thee linked friendship thee shalt thou come foorth thy princelie yuorie palace statelie roiall throne gloriouslie adorned gorgious garment roiall robe smell fragrantlie yeeld sweete sauours odoriferous odour pleasantlie spred ouer men people declare ioie goodwils towards thee shall run presse togither thousand see praise extoll thy renowmed name maiestie crieng alowd saieng god saue qveene conclude house church thou shalt see thy child offspring publishing promoting gospell thou hast borne maner vnto thy husband christ flourishing spred abroad home nothing inferiour vnto thy noble elder reigning ouer prouinces whole world home chieflie euen heauen mee thy father thy husband christ thou shalt sit right hand beautified gift richlie beedecked ouer glorious garment broidered gold hauing crowne pure gold vpon thy head euen thus roiallie saie shalt thou uirgin qveene deerlie beloued daughter set king thy husband pretious apparell uirgins thy companion waiting vpon thee going thee vnto glorious king king whilest altogither great triumph mirth ioie reioicing shall enter highest mansion heauenlie paradise holie palace enioie certaine vnchangeable euerlasting kingdome glorie dignitie blisse felicitie sing praise vnto name holie trinitie together king queenes saint uirgins elect people world euer shall bee world without end queenes vow selfetalke god collected psalmes princelie prophet king david paraphrasticallie expounded godlie learned man theodore beza wherein queenes maiestie christian maner euen dauids spirit sweet word diuine sentence first inciteth prepareth hir hart mind deuotion secondlie acknowledgeth omnipotent power god ouer king kingdom creature true rehearsall manifold benefit bestowed vpon hir hir birth acknowledgement hir souereigntie come onelie lord thirdlie confesseth hir vnwoorthinesse reioiceth greatlie protection mercie towards hir since hir comming crowne fourthlie hauing wonderous work benefit done hir preseruation great admiration shee onelie yeeldeth condigne thanks exhorteth creature heauen earth praise god together hir lastlie bindeth hir selfe solemne oth vow promise consecrate hir life wholie true worship sincere seruice god holie obedience lawes glorie god full discharge hir dutie hir court realme first part vow rabboni hart voileth within mee must needes burst foorth hath conceiued euen magnifical uow qveene consecrated king heauen himselfe zeale feruencie penne may seeme able attaine vnto voice speaker therefore god prepared whole hart whole hart mind saie haue great desire speake vnto thee present happie estate call remembrance thy woonderfull work wrought brought passe thine almightie power conception euen vntill houre neither doo lord mouth onlie hypocrite vse doo vnfeinedlie testifie thee god mine onlie maker redeemer preseruer sauiour praise shall proceed euen deepe bottome hart go tongue go mouth saie bee thou longer dumbe open thy selfe wide speake excellent praise god make thy hartie uowes saie followeth second part conteining foure chapter cap heauenlie father almightie maker greatest king mine onlie god souereigne sauiour thou art king glorie glorious king lord host strong valiant mightie whose seate highest heauens thy dominion stretched foorth ouer thing without exception humblie acknowledge thee verie god angel men sacred emperour mightie spirit holie companie heauenlie army celebrate thy truth praise perpetuallie region aboue v yea greatest god highest lord magnificall king far aboue emperours king lord prince great soeuer euen god abraham isaac iacob father dauid posteritie king queenes predecessor art higher heauens mightie monarch whole world hauing nothing made heauen earth thing therein thine almightie power guiding preseruing ruling state kingdom creature people dwell world reseruing thy power authoritie lord lowe secret part earth deepe bottom sea high top mountaines reigning euer full maiestie power authoritie gloriouslie triumphantlie eternall euerlasting kingdome whereas kingdom trulie transitorie subiect destruction thy kingdome onlie god confesse limited anie bound subiect anie tearme yeares time alwaies endureth one vnchangeable eternitie eternitie whose throne euer euer hast raised kingdome thy selfe among thine angel people heauen earth old continue alwaie stable firme vnmoueable thou lord onlie maist iustlie challenge vnto thy selfe authoritie kingdome deede ouer nation vpon earth art gelous dreadfull iehova vnto whome emperours king gouernours world shall bow submit themselues doo homage diuine seruice scepter crownes cast vnder thy feete dooest declare thy selfe verie terrible potentate power world cuttest courage strength glorie throwing dust euen gardener doth twist proine uine cap ii therefore worthilie ascribing resigning vp honour glorie empire kingdome rule power dominion vnto holie secret maruellous renoumed name thy high sacred maiestie art father light ancient day sauiour beleeuers onlie redeemer strength glorie hope israel end earth euen alpha omega first without beginning last without ending shalt come iudge quicke dead god blessed euer amen according meete verie bounden dutie doo meekelie confesse protest thy perpetuall praise thou mercifull god none beginning laie rude lumpe without shape shut vp secret place mother wombe didst forme fashion nourish time appointed set downe thy booke didst drawe foorth darke caue wherein fashioned broughtst foorth bowel mother midwife verie bowel within thine owne good right authoritie thou ioining sinewes bone togither hast made mortall woman couered within mother wombe king queene anie beginning birth men haue one entrance life one going like manner worke thine surelie behold selfe wonderfull lord vtterlie shew selfe senselesse vnthankefull vnlesse praise thee confesse thy work exceeding maruellous deede seeing doo perceiue thing manifestlie soone also thy workemanship came foorth reasonable creature world receiued like aire men committed vnto thee creator time thou didst declare thy selfe god causedst looke vp vnto thee hang yet mother breast euen verie cradle swadling clout god thou hadst speciall care regard ouer tookest hand fatherlie foster gouerne manie yeares ago leade guide tender yeares vnto daie euer since borne saie thou god hast defended danger strong floure youth neither hast thou forsaken middle age wilt trust graieheaded mine inlightener thou hast taught instructed knowledge thee childhood hitherto therefore haue depended wholie vpon thee alone vpon thee saie excellent father haue set hope euen mine infancie doo still euen vnto mine old age cap iii neither hath thy prouidence mercie towards ceased anie tune surelie thou hast made singular euerlasting example thy fauour mercie men thou beholding alwaies thy pleasant countenance obseruing continuallie thine heauenlie eie iniurie soeuer offered hast onelie woonderfullie comforted preserued trouble also oftentimes miraculouslie saued deliuered mee great manifold misery imminent peril multitude mightie enimies wherewith haue beene assaulted enuironed vexed afflicted persecuted turmoiled tender age yea tenderlie god hast thou loued mee thou hast suffered intrapped thousand aduersaries rose vp saieng hart hir god helpe hir iudge mine innocencie glorie shield valiant champion thou hast thy selfe smitten downe mine enimies brought safelie distresse lift vp head aboue mine aduersaries thou hast deliuered life saie foorth present doores death staied teares mine eies established feete fall temptation walked safe sound thee among liuing praised thee liue praise thee may onlie thanke thee deliuerer hast caused thus taste feele enioie comfortable sweetnesse thy goodnesse mercie fauour though forsaken men mightie together neerest friend mee contempt though superstitious aduersaries saie heaued vehementlie great violence sought cast downe laie mine honor dust yet hast thou god thine owne hand repulsed driuen mine irreligious foe wickedlie resisted thy purpose confusion face hast exalted highest degree dignitie wherefore great cause continuall ioie hartie reioicing hast thou lord giuen vnto thine handmaid acknowledge selfe mightilie miraculouslie preserued thy power doubtlesse thou hast woonderfullie deliuered deed thy qveene annointed thee hast heard highest sanctuarie granted vnto requested praiers put trust neither chariot horse men munition onelie remembred thy name called vpon thee trouble lo thou king heauen hast heard necessity giuen hart desire accomplishing purpose required thing onlie thee might escape aliue safe persecution thou hast onelie strengthened comforted zion placed thy dominion empire safetie also hast granted vnto life shall neuer faile bicause onelie set hope still thee power remaineth oftentimes good experience haue prooued yea thou excellent father hast done notable worke woorthie bee set foorth writing posteritie limmed gold euerlasting memorie bicause lord thou hast despised praiers teares thy miserable people thy holie throne hast looked downe vpon heare mourning prisoner thy persecuted member loose foorth bond fetter whose life vtterlie despaired zion againe thy name lord thy praise saie ierusalem might published ministerie daie manie nation people running together worship thee hast shewed thy selfe much glorious therein anie time therefore god art indeed gouernor lord ouer people heauen earth thou art god peculiar right mine onlie honor great glorie haue attained thy defence saluation bright glittering honour wherewith thou hast crowned may woorthilie triumph thee thus preserued deliuered thee also condignelie celebrate daie wholie thee banner displaied hast gratiouslie granted petition thine handmaid namelie thou lord euer mindfull thy promise word force euer prouiding thine owne onlie glorie didst mercifullie miraculouslie preserue danger rebuking euen king prince sake pretious deere bloud thy sight none touch thine annointed doo anie harme time appointed thee thou allowing iustifieng commending innocent others maliciouslie condemne guiltie wickednesse didst faithfullie freelie performe thy promise towards changing miserable estate blisse didst bring foorth glad ioifull thou hadst appointed thine elect handmaid chosen seruant gouerne thy people affaire kingdome cap iiii wherefore humblie acknowledge thou almightie god raisest vp abiects exaltest miserable dunghill place among prince people somtime laiedst helpe vpon one mightie didst exalt one chosen people father david thy seruant meane thou tookest sheepfold thy holie oile didst annoint broughtest feed thy people inheritance israel euen thou god saie selfesame good god confesse hast also consecrated elizabeth thy selfe gouerne thy people ouer whome thou dooest chieflie rule hast vouchsafed like fauour great mercie call prison palace appoint prince pastor feede posteritie iacob deere people israel spirituall food thine eternall word preferment lord promotion knowe come neither east west south north neither haue well perceiued mine owne power exalt selfe mount vp great miserie high dignitie thou king god euen thou iust gouernour thing bringest passe mightie thing farre passing condition mankind rulest state kingdom alone belongeth whose power authoritie cast downe thou wilt exalt pleaseth thee hast exalted mee thine handmaid giuen vnto thine absolute authoritie ouer great prince people england gouerne verie magistrate common thereof direction thy word wisdome counsell yea take thee record lord slander men neuer desired honour though deserued neither laboured brought vnto dignitie proud promoted thee thervnto doo much thinke reioice brought kinglie office bloud birth mine owne endeuour power alwaies haue still confesse humblie acknowledge thy glorie thou onlie lord redeemer sauiour vpon whome earnestlie call set mine eies time pleased thee heare didst vouchsafe embrace thy speciall grace fauour bestowe great benefit vpon first choose take onelie rest people exalt aboue others consecrate mee thy selfe annoint thy holie oile qveene realme anie desert mine saie onlie bicause pleased thee vse seruice endeuour weightie businesse defend thy people power receiued thee finallie thou heauenlie king fauouring thine handmaid deserued didst richlie apparell mee roiall robe ouer cloathedst beedeckedst statelie garment brodered gold pretious stone vpon daie settedst regall throne causedst gloriouslie come foorth yuorie palace coronation accompanied manie noble prince goodlie uirgins bearing diademe crowne pure gold vpon mine head time also thou madest fragrant odour sweet garment spread selfe nothing pleasant vnto beholder vpon happie daie continuallie euer since doo runne together presse great multitude vnto see declare thankefull hart thee good willes beare toward thee euermore crie lowd voice ioifull hart vttering foorth praise thy name great comfort like hartie praiers vnto thy maiestie mee saieng god saue qveene god saue queene elizabeth may iustlie saie excellent father daie deede wherein thou hast chieflie shewed thy mercie vnto daie thou didst beget deere daughter vnto thy selfe vpon daie thou didst gratiouslie annoint thy minister queene deliuer thine afflicted church reigne vpon thy holie mount zion declare nation woonderfull work thou hast done thy people israel doo present go therefore soule returne thy rest take thine ease seeing notable change thine estate happilie wrought lord hath well deserued thereby euerlasting praise mercie third part conteining three chapter cap lord god thy sinfull seruant thou hast thus mindfull haue deserued others haue least deserued thy vnworthie handmaid thou shouldest thus regard exalt high dignitie manie others thou hast annointed oile gladnesse fellowes set pretious diademe vpon head thou makest sit highest place dignitie estate far aboue men subiects yea thou god art lord whole earth hast brought subiection people lie neere vnto ouer whome haue authoritie hast honoured deede heauenlie name whereby thine authoritie ouer men declared thou hast crowned saie great glorie honour causing renowme fame spread far neere yea thou hast made nothing inferiour potentate world ordeined mee lord ouer work thine hand souereigne wise thou causest serue dutifullie thou king god hast powred foorth vpon confesse thy bountie grace none able compared vnto mee thou hast caused king queenes come far bring present rich gift vnto thou hast made honourable euen strange people whome euen mightie rich honouring haue doo desire greatlie friendship fauour thou hast preuented thy blessing without anie asking giuen people inheritance end earth possession surelie pleasant place beautifull portion inheritance fallen vnto thee lord art portion reward alone allsufficient thou art hast giuen large excellent heritage planted fat wealthie place whose power may worthilie glorie dignitie honour thy singular benefit none cause onlie hath pleased thee receiue thy speciall fauour surelie cause ascribe atteining kingdome mine owne worthinesse although called oft vpon thy name imagine haue resisted manie mightie people mine owne power strength neither trusting mine owne bowe sword haue obteined manie victory driuen awaie mine enimies thou thy selfe lord hast done strength thine owne arme onlie pleased thee saie thine owne meere mercie goodnesse preserue deliuer people cap ii neither hath thy mercie ceassed heere god hath failed euer since comming crowne gouerne afterward thy wisdome grace miraculouslie preserue defend thy princelie power mine enimies visible inuisible domesticall foraigne hitherto hast thou bene vnto safe refuge sure tower power satan oh great maruellous thing see thou god hast brought passe thine vnworthy seruant thy mightie power wanted rebelled resisted thy power ordinance yet doo see selfe sufficientlie armed thee continuallie sharpe arrowes wherewith wound verie hart mine enimies cast downe moreouer long often haue sonnes men laboured greatlie distaine mine honour reioicing persisting vanitie superstition secret wicked counsell haue taken bring vngodlie thing effect thou lord well knowest haue prooued superstitious enimies haue intended euils haue inuented dailie doo inuent wickednesse shall neuer able bring passe thou lord hast mercie vpon made frustrate deuises desire craftie cruell enimies established throne according office authoritie thou hast giuen might iustlie punish infidelitie thou hast scattered people delight war caused runnagates turne back vnto directing owne sword light vpon owne neck owne dart face thy wrath lord thou hast cast vngodlie flaming fire vtterlie destroied consumed posteritie heate thy furie proudlie rose vp thee thine annointed yea thou hast caused reuenged heathen breake mine enimies asunder iron rod crush peeces like potshards earth mine hand saie hath taken mine enimies god thy power thou wilt bring passe right hand shall apprehend hate without cause vndoubtedlie knowe thou doost hate loue tenderlie euen thou hast suffered mine enimies triumph ouer verelie hoped hast made stand fast sure thy defence whereby knowe thou wilt alwaies care god god shall saie uerelie doo greatlie reioice thou hast great fauour embraced euer preuenting praiers giuing helpe vnto hir called vpon thee mind free euill imagination else thou wouldest haue heard restored life good lost thou hast done calling hartilie vpon thy name chieflie mine aduersities thou hast deliuered trouble fright feares defended wast refuge extreme danger thy mercie hast brought passe onelie dailie behold traitrous enimies haue condigne punishment also people thou hast appointed gouerned consider thy iudgement extended vpon guiltie rebel superstitious aduersaries prophane men wilfullie resist thine ordinance authoritie sufficientlie taught example destruction remember feare dread reuerence due vnto thee god prince cap iii moreouer lord greatly reioice bethinke tower strength safe hauen vnassaultable habitation thou hast euer beene onlie vnto also vnto predecessours forefather king prince land succeeding one another order thou hast beene honour also strength hast time time certaine speciall power defended little island thou hast chosen thy peculiar heritage giuen first vnto vnto possession yea alteration change thing time soeuer haue fallen yet hast thou mightie gouernour whose kingdome euer hath beene alwaie shall sure stable permanent vnchangable vnmooueable lift vp head thine handmaid unicorne annointed thee fresh oile laden new benefit continuallie thou art saie whose power consisteth whatsoeuer high world euen thy might establisheth kingdom policy whereby mankind preserued also testimony thy mightie power inhabitant earth conuinced doo tremble keepe silence peace restored dominion thou causest people againe doo leade liues daie night comfortable peace godlie tranquillitie wherefore thou hast giuen great cause new ioie reioice thee lord god hast thus mercifullie dealt thine handmaid especiallie bicause thou hast granted vnto ouercome mine enimies manie mightie soeuer compose set kingdome peaceable order place iuda throne iudgement iustice directed thy word god haue whereof glorie still glorie conclude doo reioice bicause thou lord art louing shepheard feedest greene pasture sweet medowes thy word ioie solace making sometime barren woman without comfort ioifull glad foster mother manie spirituall child thee yea euen verie sight mine enimies dooest thou bountifull father prepare deintie table reaching vnto full cup thou giuest drinke thy pleasant spring causest thy goodnesse mercie thy bountie liberalitie followe wheresoeuer become blessing people thy blessing continuallie finallie thou lord onlie thy singular goodnesse hast assuredlie fortified hill woonderfullie honour health peace securitie dooest presentlie keepe safetie causest quietlie lie downe take rest thee thou doost ward gate city bar mightilie multiplie cherish thy familie citizen thou bringest amitie neighbor feedest finest flower wheate thing verelie doo testifie plainlie thine infinite goodnesse power yet surelie nothing comparison benefit doctrine saluation holie word thou hast bestowed vpon thy people deliuered vnto v rule lead liues godlie honestlie neither anie nation vnder heauen thou hast dealt v herein therfore hauing experience thy support comfort selfe thee strength shield hart doth rest neither thine annointed trust anie onelie thee giuest power vnto prince euen blesse praise thee lord thus hast blessed people thy continuall blessing present blessed state cease magnifie thee lord deliuerer declare set foorth people maruellous work thou god hast done whereof selfe beginning life vnto houre haue good proofe experience fourth part vow conteining fiue chapter cap oh lord god excellent thy name ouer earth aduancing mee thus glorie far aboue desert one nothing able compasse great mercy euen astonished admiration thine excellent liberalitie fatherlie prouidence ouer greatlie doo manie great benefit binde vnto thee shall giue againe vnto thee thy bountie thou hast bestowed vpon uerelie paie onlie able namelie take hand lampe thou hast ordeined thine annointed therein continuallie magnifie thy mercie take hand saie cup thankefull sacrifice calling vpon thee name lord testifie openlie knowledge deliuerance honour onelie thee thing vowed vnto thee lord danger paie presence people thou art whose benefit remaine aliue thou art defence tower sauiour sheeld refuge finallie thou art onelie hast subdued people vnto therefore well deseruest renowme praise victory worthie right wherefore good right lord declare thy praise euen sounding voice bicause becommeth men woman haue receiued benefit thee whome thou grantest vse life deliuered manie danger death doo thing diligentlie continuallie labour commit memoriall thy benefit vnto others exhort accompanie dutie thankefulnesse earnestlie saie wide onlie priuatelie also publikelie praise lord saie infinite goodnesse euerlasting mercie deserueth innumerable multitude whome god hath deliuered manifold danger foorth hand enimies persecutor praise lord infinite goodnesse euerlasting mercie deserueth acknowledge thing manie hath gathered beginning world scattered east west north south ocean sea manie wandering wretch waste wildernesse seeking citie commodious dwell halfe dead killed famine thirst crieng vnto thee god extreame misery hast thou heard drawing foorth distresse hast brought right waie led commodious city refuge dwell peace let men therefore set foorth thy great mercie thee lord thy selfe shew foorth thy maruellous work men hast thus refreshed panting thirst fed mercifullie hungerstarued manie also shut vp darke prison euen darkenesse death chained mind sorow body strictlie iron fetter worthilie confesse obeie thy commandements oh god engrauen mind men rather followed owne lust wholesome counselles thee god notwithstanding thou god thereby well hadst tamed fiercenesse hadst brought point could find help anie thou gratiouslie heardst crieng vnto thee distresse deliueredst miserie broughtst dongeons prison darkenesse death breaking iron fetter sunder praise yee therefore great mercie lord declare woonderfull actes mortall men hath broken brasen gate hath dashed peeces iron barres manie also driuen awaie persecution vnto prophane babylon euen auoiding much laie sight wicked enimies confesse dolefull silence euen abundance teares sinnes sorowes flouds euphrates mindfull zion though caried harp euen comfort great calamitie yet outragiouslie mocked derided miserie enimie draue awaie miserable captiuitie faine hang vp vpon sallowe tree make noise sight persecutor sawe cause rather mourne sing time place notwithstanding lord forget euer seeing crueltie persecutor good time turned awaie captiuitie mourning restored libertie ioie againe liue see daie wherein babylon destroied hir child dashed stone lord hath giuen hir prosperitie vnto v deale againe haue dealt v yea lord hath armed people double edged sword hand wherewith may punish prophane gentile auenge crueltie oppressed also may drawe king noble bound chaines iron fetter euen execute iudgements appointed commanded thee lord verelie dignitie honour whome god hath receiued fauour wherefore ye glorious people vpon whome lord hath bestowed manie benefit see yee great quietnesse rest sing triumph praise lord deede israel delight thy selfe setting foorth praise continuallie whose worke thou art newlie formed deliuered manie thou lord diddest heare crieng vnto thee miserie thou deliueredst distresse yea thou speaking one word diddest take awaie cause deadlie disease restoredst health let men also saie praise thy great setting foorth thy praise testifie selfe whole life desirous thy honour glorie whome honour glorie right belongeth god king highlie extoll thee celebrate thy name euer euer consecrate day life set foorth thy glorie amplifie thy name song neuer shall haue end thou art great lord praise sufficient thee neither anie man attaine thy greatnesse thy woonderfull work endure one generation age alone one age succeedeth another likewise must men commit memoriall vnto others vnlesse negligent dooing dutie wherefore trulie far thy handmaid anie thing greater authoritie carefullie thinke brightnesse thy maiestie shineth vnto v verie dailie vse thing thy deed peopleward greater comprehended admiration capacitie mortall men woman doubtlesse lord though verie manie blockish woonderfull thankelesse yet neuer wanting shall euen willes confesse least thy terrible power euen ouer prince people world admit others silent vnthankefull yet neuer cease declare thy greatnesse nation far shall heare publishing thy praise singing vnto thee deliuering sauing thy power whome thou hast chosen loued god forbid alone labour doo dutie verelie alwaies assemblie meanes testifie remembrance thy peculiar goodnesse thy vndoubted promise namelie thou art mercifull readie exceeding mercie whome man may almost doubt whether thou slowe wrath prone pardon anie thing lord void thy goodnesse naie whole world hasten speedilie stand porch thereof taste see visible signes thy power maiestie shewed commonlie therein doubtlesse thy goodnesse offereth selfe handled felt sweet far life selfe causeth soule much inflamed earnest desire seeke thy face see thy glorie set foorth thy praise power especiallie people holie vnto thee god might assemble together tribe thousand maner apointed thee powre foorth praise vp mine innocent hart hand others openlie amids whole multitude call vpon thy name wherein safegard nothing loue deerlie temple wherein thou hast set thy seate glorie euen house thy maiestie holie citie wherein tribunall seate father david left posteritie minister iustice indifferentlie euerie one firmelie placed doo soule saie thus inflamed zeale thine house euen consume mee feruent desire hartie longing seeke thy face iacob seeing haue experience oft thy gratious goodnesse miraculous helpe seeing thou lord god hast set thy house ierusalem thy true worship might diligence holilie exercised therein therefore god euen thine handmaid thou hast appointed kingdome reioice praise thee thy sacred sanctuarie ioine selfe companion doo worship thee trulie deuoutlie therein neither far long thence lord shall full sore vrgent necessitie calling office life though absent bodie anie time thy house manie time commeth passe reason change place often yet make vow doo able wit whersoeuer become cleaue vnto thee hart wholie cease thinke thee meditate thy manifold benefit powred vpon yea lord thou knowest accustomed rise midnight doo soundlie sleepe setting aside care euer mindfull thy statute doo watchfullie thinke may please thee keepe thy commandements woont preuent twylight morning lowd praiers yea farre following example wicked lie snorting sin securitie contrariwise beholding excellent iudgements thy iustice crowning thy gift righteous seuen time daie doo celebrate thy praise neither doo watchman doubtlesse carefullie keepe watch diligent meditating thy heast commandements cap ii bicause lord though man increased neuer high dignitie rich honour yet want thy wisedome hee shall counted differ little nothing life brute beast wholie perish doth long remaine worldlie pompe glorie power shall vanish flowe awaie like water spilt ground brought naught therefore number day haue time may betimes applie hart vnto thy wisedome endeuour selfe learne thy statute thine instruction taught true knowledge ioined iudgement whereby may discerne thing aright tasting sauourie thing bicause desire depend thy commandements fulfill thy heast uerelie lord meditate thy commandements continuallie applie whole mind obserue thy way delight mind saie thy statute neither anie time forget thy word neither hast thou lord heauenlie father commanded mee anie thing vnaduisedlie thy heast neither thing shuld onlie vnderstand lightlie consider thou hast wiselie spoken commanded vnto obserued kept diligence would god maners state might ordered thy gouernement might sincerelie seeke please thee holilie walke rule doctrine prescribed thee might constantlie perseuere keeping carefullie thy statute verelie leade vpright blamelesse life hart ease quiet mind thing go well yea meanes shall onelie worship thee rightlie purelie without following maner worship prescribed thy lawe alowed thy word therefore fullie purposed keepe thy statute firmelie end hold waie prescribed thy word haue chosen true waie doo prefer thing lord endeuour selfe saie pure hart cleaue fast vnto thing approoued thy testimony good purpose grant beseech thee doo neuer repent direct well entred waie thy precept inflame wholie great desire true knowledge ioined iudgement wherby may discerne thing aright also keepe thy lawes well prosperitie aduersitie vnto end life may finish whole course reigne direction thy precept mine onelie counsellers thy mercie thy truth two keeper assistant wherevpon also onlie trust neither lord number haue regard whither walke right wrong waie thee haue searched carefullie good aduise waie keepe haue fastened step path thou hast testified doo please thee neither haue staied knowe matter straightwaies bent selfe obserue thy commandements beene willing readie accomplish thy thing might aduance thy glorie oh loue thy doctrine surelie thou knowst lord woont consume whole day night meditating thy lawes doo find experience haue done vaine haue proued much wiser thy precept mine aduersaries labour power destroie great dignitie authoritie soeuer haue obteined thy gift wisdome neuer forsake yea thou hast made better learned teacher maisters euen haue giuen selfe wholie man inuentions meditate thing onlie thou hast giuen vnto v sound learning finallie skilfull anie ancient bent onelie knowe thy commandements also keepe deede held backe feete go waie leadeth vnto euill alwaies rather hold waie thou hast taught v thy mouth thy precept lord haue bene shall like burning lampe hand light shining shew waie shall go yea haue taught true wisdome therefore abhor guids rule order life wicked false see absolute perfect work come end yea decree lawes man wisdome doth set downe subiect vnto change length euen come naught onlie thy precept true stable prolonged without measure without page duplicate page duplicate anie end wherefore wholie consumed inflamed loue thee see thy word despised mine aduersaries surelie feele thy word pleasant sweet mouth tasted honie yea thy precept pretious vnto anie gold iewels neuer high price estimation doo still affirme thy commandements certaine perfect rule thy iustice truth direct equitie godlinesse therefore vtterlie abhor thing appointed deceiue v whatsoeuer leadeth v neither anie time forsake thee turne thy lawes rest vpon thee teacher ghostlie instructer lord thou knowest hate abhorre deceit saie embrace thy doctrine yea neuer conceiued greefe anie thing perceiue men thine mine enimies despise thy word stubbornelie impudentlie mine eies verelie doo swimme teares behold generall contempt thy doctrine bold prophanation thy holie heasts lawes thing neither would could dissemble euen oft perceiued thy glorie diminished burnt sorowe accompted selfe wounded reproches cast thee uerelie nothing pure thy word wherefore euen thy seruant doo embrace incredible loue desire yea haue bound whole heart euer euen last gaspe obserue thy statute cap iii iam determined lord imbrace great loue thing thou hast testified vnto keepe thy heasts diligentlie yea behaue selfe gouernement none shall worthilie complaine haue committed anie thing contrarie right equitie doo beare thy heast hand lampe ordeined thee lighten thy perfect path waie laie vp thy word hart pretious treasure least offend thee anie least thing sincerelie doo without hypocrisie applie selfe fulfill thy commandements accomplish doo vttermost power thing thou hast testified vnto best knowne vnto thee witnesse priuie thought doings doo whatsoeuer doo lord vnto whome appeale whome deceiue though would throughly knowne manifest vnto thee saie part life vnknowne vnto thee whether sit rise yea thou doest euen vnderstand thought far thou obseruest narrowlie walking lieng downe neither anie thing hidden thee go thou knowest euen word lord tongue pronounce submit selfe god thing therefore thy triall doo prefer consideration thy woonderfull work word benefit others great verelie able accompt summe reach height depth length bredth thy great mercy towards find mo sand sea heares head wherefore onlie refer selfe thee god saie thou maiest throughlie prooue thine handmaid see hart altogether fixed vpon thee vtterlie search thought write downe thy booke conscience finallie consider lord praie thee whether haue prouoked vngodlie giuing anie offence thou knowest innocent preserue thou gouerne course life thy counsel yea thou knowest lord haue neuer bent mine eies high thing entangled selfe willinglie great matter whereby might win selfe opinion excellencie aboue neither yet haue reached vnto thing aboue capacitie contrarilie vnlesse haue bene content state howsoeuer haue staid mind depend wholie thee teach weaned child forget nursse regard mother alone vnlesse saie haue behaued selfe hitherto weaned infant let deede refused thee therefore according mine innocencie lord assistance thy grace proceed yea surelie lord according power haue begon thee endeuour selfe end thee walke thee vprightlie setting confidence thee alone fullie minded continue end life without wauering faith right christian feare loue thee stand vpright waie thy truth doo attribute onlie vnto thee lord god therefore magnifie thy name publike congregation doubt thou lord thine owne selfe wilt sullie performe worke haue enterprised thine authoritie thine euerlasting mercie testified thy word neither wilt thou knowe leaue worke vnperfect thou hast begun surelie mine eies still alwaies bent vpon thy goodnesse haue appointed thy truth guide leader life yea vnfeinedlie vow make solemne promise thee thy holie angel giue possible diligence may throughlie knowe right waie appointed thee also may obserue purelie house realme neuer set doo anie wicked thing endeuour selfe godlines keepe hand pure iniurie wrong may liue true life spend whole course peregrination setting foorth thy glorie cap iiii hence therefore ye wicked one may keepe precept god much purelie abhor wauering wandering fro religion count thy word doctrine deere pretious forsake corrupt maners neither take vnto put far author euill counsel neither embrace anie time thing knowe euill yea lord thou knowest carefullie haue auoided companie vaine men haue fled awaie deceitfull dealer run another god vtterlie detest drinkeoffrings bloudie sacrifice afraid euen name offer abhomination soule doth vtterlie abhor thou knowest loue righteousnesse holinesse hate whatsoeuer bicause hate thee lord art righteousnesse selfe therefore doo againe hate doo euen abhor bicause perceiue rise vp thee hate superstitious crue vngodlie saie vtterlie count greatest enimies much lesse ioine selfe vnto abide winke wickednesse rebellion yea fullie determine exercise thy power giuen vnto destroie wicked prophane vtterlie thy church may well purged free cruell bloudthirstie hypocrite men saie speake blasphemie thee great proud crueltie mine enimies much thine abuse thy holie name maiestie superstitious men saie lord beare thy name hypocrisie shall haue mouthes stopped put silence congregation bicause deadlie enimies thy word holie gospell professe therefore bicause resist thee god thy selfe therefore thou shalt carie thy hand cup full troubled wine full dreg thou shalt giue wicked sucke vp drinke euen verie dreg thereof yea edge sword cut horn wicked rebellious execute iudgement appointed commanded thee god vpon till consumed honor dignitie thy saint may flourish israel pietie peace wicked men see heare doo abuse authoritie vnder good godlie cast downe againe increase iust honour subtill man thrust house neither suffer scoffer speake deceiptfullie tarrie sight extortioner cruell man doo speedilie put execution wicked deuises whose hand full bribe vtterlie destroie earth bridle proud dissolute person terrifie wicked shall lift vp horne high blasphemous word thee thine annointed finallie destroie slanderer false accuser suffer proud ambitious dishonor thee yea painefullie without anie delaie worthilie punish whomsoeuer shall vnderstand wicked purge holie citie lord wicked person contrariwise searching euerie side men loue truth take familiar companion counsellers vse dooing mine affaire anie trustie faithfull god prince doo knowe anie feareth thee keepeth thy statute ioine fellowship saie whome see doo worship thee trulie deuoutlie ioine selfe companion yea delight lord shall vpon saincts earth comfort promote excell vertue godlinesse otherwise able doo little nothing profit thee neither suffer anie violence bee done vnto godlie anie man rebuke euen mightie prince sake none shall touch thine annointed priest man suffer hurt anie thy prophet cap v conclude surelie care nothing much set peaceablie ouer kingdome haue people thy goodnesse committed vnto institute holie righteous gouernement thou granting grace case standeth bond lawes broken kingdome anie thing disordered confounded carefullie compose set againe good order establish pillers foundation thereof place remoued doo direction thy reuealed thing may remaine safe among people difference right wrong preserued mainteined may followe thee god great cheerefulnesse whosoeuer delight righteousnesse see disordered state realme restored last ancient right order discipline iustice prescribed thy word thus grace assistance thy holie spirit beseech thee plentifullie powre downe vpon doo thy seruant determine selfe compassion vpon vile wretched miserable sinner whose innumerable offense old new horrible heinous great haue iustlie deserued thy greeuous wrath euerlasting damnation good lord heere appeale thy great mercie onlie far surmounteth thy work thou hast promised thy holie infallible word thou hast said yea sworne trulie thou liuest thou wilt death sinner rather conuert liue ah deere lord confesse great greeuous sinner yet thy grace good working thy holie spirit something turned vnto thee oh let liue die euerlasting death soule deepelie haue deserued make vessell thy great mercie may liue praise thy name among thy chosen child euer oh let horrible sinnes separate sweet sight thy maiestie let thy great power mercie magnified dauid peter magdalen notable theefe crucified christ thy deere sonne righteous sinner repentance oh gratious god giue true earnest hartie vnfeigned repentance may verie bottome hart continuallie lament manifold sinnes wickednesse great ingratitude vnthankefulnesse vnfeinedlie hart mind mouth thee haue greenoushe offended thy high maiestie goodnesse recognise acknowledge selfe full sinne full vnfaithfulnesse seruant vnprofitable thy holie commandements haue transgressed broken first haue set whole beleefe confidence trust hope thee haue loued honoured thee hart soule mind power soule secondlie haue diuided thine honour worship thee giuen thy creature dead thing imagined mine owne fond fantasie meane adoring worshipping image thirdlie haue abused thy holie name false deceitfull swearing hinderance neighbour idlelie vainlie haue vsed thy holie name haue said done neither thought thing thy glorie fourthlie saboth daie haue giuen selfe hearing reading learning holie scripture neither haue giuen meate hungrie drinke thirstie lodged harbourlesse clothed naked visited sicke comforted releeued poore men prison haue expended great weight word thy sonne sauiour christ neither beleeued saieng much ye haue done thing vnto one least brother ye haue done vnto matth haue bestowed spent gold siluer lewd lust concupiscence excesse meat drinke gorgeous apparell bodie child seruants house c haue bestowed else largelie delicatelie nicelie excessiuelie haue bestowed haue regarding meane time suffer deere beloued brother iesu christ go naked perish cold hunger haue saie ceased mine owne sinfull lust praieng time thy mine fulfilled furthermore haue honoured father mother haue much set esteemed reuerence thou commandest obeied neither comforted releened helped haue slaine haue broken wedlocke haue stolne haue sold false weight measure borne false witnesse finallie haue coueted neighbour house haue desired wife seruant cattell good vnlawfullie thus greeuouslie haue sinned infinit way lord omitting leauing thy commandements oh father fulfill desire flesh world diuell wherefore crie thee mercie god mercifull father humblie desire beseech thee loue thou bearest thy deer sonne mine onelie whole entire sauiour iesu christ haue mercie forgiue suffer perfectlie doo would haue done naturall concupiscence striue fight dailie holie ghost vnlawfull lust desire knowledge greeuous sinne thy highnes thou shouldest iudge straitlie thy lawe without concupiscence cannot wherefore wretched yea abhominable wretched sinner selfe cleerelie destitute righteousnesse godlinesse holinesse deseruings come faith thee vnto christ mercie seate righteousnesse vnto goodnesse deseruings satisfaction desiring thee mercifull father death sake righteousnesse wisedome holinesse goodnesse merit satisfaction may mine serue forgiuenesse saluation like thou gauest forenoone afternoone mercifull lord god tender deere father vouchsafe hartilie beseech thee looke downe thy fatherlie eies pitie vpon vile wretched sinner lie heere prostrate heart feete thy bottomlesse mercie haue sinned throne thy glorie thee deere father insomuch worthie called thy daughter yet neuerthelesse forasmuch thou art god father mercie comfort againe desirest death sinner like true samaritan takest thought sillie wounded soule make praie thee infunding thy pretious oile comfort wound ioifullie run lost sonne lap thine euerlasting pitie lo thou art hope trust onlie repose selfe hauing thee full confidence faith saie verie faithfull hart trusting thy mercie beleeue thee god father thee god sonne thee god holie ghost three person one true verie god besides acknowledge none god heauen aboue earth beneath yea poore sinner doo accuse selfe vnto thee deere father haue sore greeuouslie offended thine almightie goodnesse diuine maiestie committing mine exceeding greeuous manifold sinnes wickednesse haue kept least thy blessed commandements like thy righteousnesse may require demand haue saie honoured thee like god dreaded thee like lord loued thee like father trusted thee like sauiour creator thy holie dreadfull name vnto honour glorie belongeth haue vsed vaine haue sanctified saboth holie day work acceptable vnto thee instructed neighbour vertue accordinglie haue honoured father mother beene obedient vnto instrument thou hast wrought comming world high power ruler take authoritie thee haue beene willinglie obedient vnto haue kept hart pure cleane manslaughter yea thy mercie grace defended better haue committed verie deed also likewise pure theft adulterie falsewitnessebearing haue hart mind wished desired neighbour good thing haue folowed great prince worke oh lord despise thy seruant thy bondwoman although euill although vnworthie detestable sinner whatsoeuer whether good bad alwaies thine therfore shall flee except flee vnto thee thou cast shall receiue thou despise turne thy face shall looke vpon recognise knowledge lord thine although vnworthie comming thee although bee vile vncleane vile vncleane confesse selfe deede thou canst make mee cleane sicke thou canst heale dead buried thou canst reuiue thy mercie much mine iniquitie thou canst forgiue offend therefore lord doo consider haue respect number sinnes according greatnesse thy mercie forgiue haue mercie wretched sinner saie vnto soule thy health saiedst death sinner rather liue conuerted turne thee lord bee angrie beseech thee thy great mercie sake forgiue pardon misdeed bring blisse neuer shall cease amen another forme confession praier vsed maister mistresse family priuate house euerie morning almightie god mercifull father doo present selues heere thy maiestie name full assurance onelie amongst v also mediator aduocate towards thy maiestie may obtaine thing shall seeme expedient thy blessed necessity therefore beseech thee mercifull father turne thy louing countenance towards v impute vnto v manifold sinnes offence whereby wee iustlie deserue thy wrath sharpe punishment rather receiue v thy mercie iesus christes sake accepting death passion iust recompense offence onlie thou art pleased whome thou canst offended v seeing thy great mercy haue quietlie passed night grant heauenlie father may bestowe daie wholie thy seruice thought word deedes redeemer forasmuch beleeue except heare cannot heare preaching none preach except sent therefore lord raise vp faithful distributer thy mystery setting apart worldlie respect may life doctrine onelie seeke thy glorie contrariwise confound sathan antichrist hireling whome thou hast alreadie cast reprobate sense may sect schismes heresy error disquiet thy little flocke lord fallen latter day dangerous time wherein ignorance hath gotten vpper hand sathan minister seeke meanes quench light thy gospell beseech thee mainteine thy cause rauening woolues strengthen thy seruants keepe prison affection could celebrate thee frequented assembly godlie trulie doo accordinglie grace assistance thy holie spirit readie ioifull mind behooueth mine enterprise beginning may proceede good successe amendment maners imbettering life doo thou finish thing god thou hast begun make continuallie increase faith faith yea renew shape againe innocencie righteousnesse grations lord beseech thee person new borne thee may insearch thee againe againe dawning daie morning noone euening night lead forooard lord beseech thee thy righteousnesse let thy louing spirit direct feete make thy way plaine face bicause mortall inuisible enimies doo thou vouchsafe luckilie conduct bodie daie vnto thy materiall temple bring soule last vnto thy holie hill blessed mountaine thou hast purchased thy right hand may rest bodie soule heauen remaine thee foreuer amen praie thus god word art light light made art waie truth life darknes ouersight vanitie death shine foorth lord light mine inlightening welfare reuerence lord honour father loue iudge feare bridegroome cleaue vnto keepe selfe vndefiled spouse shine foorth euerlasting light shine foorth saie lighten lampe virginitie oile thy diuine grace mercifull protection may see light walke light neuer stumble vpon snare sathan may passe thereby palace thy woonderfull tabernacle able climbe vp euen vnto holie house temple voice gladnesse confession abide receiue thy hand mercie righteousnesse health blessing euerlasting saluation fellowecitizens thy saint houshold menie amen another godlie praier said either going towards church looke earnest feruent desire soeuer old father mightie god come vnto place wherein thou hadst appointed tabernacle thy selfe time euen like kindled withall beholding repairing thy sacred church see therin great companie godlie men woman lawfullie assembled together aduancement thy glorie hearing thy holie doctrine dulie receiuing thy blessed sacrament accordinglie wherefore humblie beseech thee art god transitorie world seeing therefore thou art splendent light strong defence cause assembly earth god redound thine vnspeakable glorie assured hope comming end vnto thee euerlasting tabernacle heauens lift vp mind vnto vanitie sworne deceiue neighbour shall receiue blessing lord righteousnesse god saluation generation seeke euen seeke thy face iacob lift vp head ye gate ye lift vp ye euerlasting doores king glorie shall come euen lord host mightie strong open gate righteousnesse lord righteous nation keepe thy truth may go giue thanks vnto thee gate lord righteous shall enter yea blessed doo thy commandements god power shall tree life shall enter gate holie citie new ierusalem without shall dog inchanters whooremongers murderer idolater yea shall enter none vncleane thing neither whatsoeuer worketh abhomination maketh lie onlie written lambes booke life amen thus lord shall enter thy sanctuarie consider thy mightie power except thou open vnto shall open thou shut trulie lord god sillie worme claie able enter thine euerlastingnesse vnlesse thou hast made thing nothing doo lead yea knowe lord knowe confesse vnwoorthie enter vnder thy roofe yet beseech thee let blessed entrance house eternall felicitie whither haue dailie feruent desire come set open made free passage vnto god giue mee leaue praie thee though dog vnwoorthie wretch euen thine owne honour sake enter
