god creator thing offered sacrifice praise heauen earth one daie shall come vnto companie alwaies shall see thee praise thee without ceasing lord grant while doo liue fraile bodie mine hart tongue bone may glorifie thee saie lord like vnto thee let thine holie memorie thy blessed sweetnesse possesse whole soule rauish desire inuisible thing let soule beseech thee passe visible vnto inuisible terrestriall vnto heauenlie transitorie thing vnto eternall let passe saie see thy woonderfull vision thou art god almightie three person yet one substance godhead serue worship namelie father vnbegotten sonne onlie begotten father holie spirit proceeding remaining holie glorious trinitie one god almightie didst mightilie make v thorough owne default lost mercifullie maruellouslie hadst deliuered v oh suffer v prooue either vngratefull great benefit vnwoorthie manifold mercy unto thee doo praie sue beseech increase faith increase hope yea increase loue also thy goodnesse make v euermore stable faith fruitfull good work right faith work agreeable vnto faith may come thy mercie vnto euerlasting life seeing thy perfect full glorie euen may worship thy maiestie made woorthie behold thy glorie may sing glorie father hath made v glorie sonne hath redeemed v glorie holie ghost hath sanctified v glorie souereigne blessed trinitie whose work vnseparable whose kingdome hath none end unto thee belongeth praise commendation honour blessing loue glorie power might vnto thee god euermore amen another praier verie forceable mooue mind vnto praise god iesus art redemption loue desire god god helpe thy seruant upon thee doo call vnto thee doo crie verie bottome mine hart thee doo call soule enter thereinto ioine thee thou maist possesse without spot wrinkle cleane lord must haue cleane habitation sanctifie thy vessell thou hast made purge wickednesse fill thy grace replenished keepe may meete temple thy dwelling foreuer good gratious louing deere mightie desired pretious amiable glorious god thou art sweeter honie whiter milke snowe pleasant nectar pretious gold iewels deerer wealth promotion world doo saie god mine onlie hope infinite mercie doo saie happie quiet sweetnesse doo saie saie thing saie able saie would god could saie melodious quiers angel doo saie willinglie would powre selfe wholie thy praise deuoutlie without ceasing would sing foorth psalmes heauenlie musicke vnto laud praise thy name middest congregation notwithstanding cannot doo shall still wo talke thee openest mouth dumbe makest tongue babe eloquent wo talke thee babble much dumbe sing thy praise praise thee woorthilie ynough vnutterable power wisedome father albeit cannot find word wherewithall maie sufficientlie expresse almightie allskilfull word yet vntill thou call vnto thee may praise thee ought saie able wherefore mine humble request thou wouldest respect doo saie desire saie indeed doo mightilie desire speake thee ought becommeth bicause thee praise thee psalmes thee honor glorie due complaint moued pricked contemplation praiers like angel tremble sight god pardon mee lord pardon mee mercifullie forgiue mee haue mercie vpon mee spare mine ignorance great vnperfectnesse doo reprooue rash woman bicause dare bold thy seruant would god either good seruant none vnprofitable euill seruant therefore euill woman praise blesse worship thee ought doo art god almightie terrible verie much feared worship thee saie without contrition hart without well teares angel worship praise thee doo tremble beeing fulfilled maruellous gladnesse sinner while stand thee saieng praise offering sacrifice affraid hart pale countenance doo lip quake tremble bodie afraid doo mourne bewaile thee sort teares might spring mine eies would faine able bicause cannot doo desire doo maketh mee trulie woonderfullie maruell mooued see eies faith thee art fearefull doo anie thing without helpe thy grace except thou make stonie hart relent selues able mollifie helth dependeth vpon thy great mercie wretch soule made without anie feeling perceiuerance afraid ouermuch feare while standeth god singeth owne praise ala hart hardned mine eies doo gush great flouds teares without ceassing seruant bondwoman doo commune talke lord maisters presence yea woman god creature creator made slime earth doo speake made thing nothing put thee lord whatsoeuer perceiue selfe secret hart doo keepe close thy gratious eares thou art rich mercie liberall reward giue thy good may serue thee nothing else serue please thee thine owne gift thou hast vouchsafed bestowe vpon v fasten beseech thee thy feare flesh let hart reioice glad feare thy name would god sinfull soule feared thee much holie man said alwaies feared god though great swelling flouds come tumble vpon god giuer good thing giue among thy praise well teares purenesse hart reioicing mind louing thee perfectlie worthilie praising thee may feele taste fauour palate hart sweete pleasant thou art lord written doo ye taste see sweet delectable lord blessed man putteth trust blessed people knoweth glad ioifull praising blessed man whose strength thee whose hart thy way going vale miserie vseth well blessed cleane hart bicause shall see god blessed dwell house lord shall praise thee world without end amen verie deuout praier grace praise god thankfull benefit lord iesus christ art word father camest world saue sinner beseech thee louing bowel thy mercy amend repaire life make better deed take thou ordering manner take mee noieth hurteth displeaseth thee giue thou knowest please thee profit make cleane conceiued vncleane seed thou alone thou art god almightie infinite pietie dooest iustifie make righteous euen wicked men raisest againe life dead sinne thou changest sinner liue deadlie damnable sinner take awaie therefore whatsoeuer pleaseth thee thine eies doo see much vnperfectnesse laie hand beseech thee thy pitie whatsoeuer offendeth eies thy pietie remoue thy sight health disease one beseech thee preserue cure doo thou heale lord shall healed thou make safe shall saued thou meane dooest make whole diseased dooest preserue cured onlie becke dooest restore repaire thing decaied fallen ruine thou wilt vouchsafe sowe anie good seed feeld hart necessitie thou must plucke vp first hand thy pittie thornes vice gratious gentle louing desired amiable louelie others powre hart beseech thee great plentie delectation thee may desire earthlie carnall thing yet thinke vpon may loue thee alone may haue thee onlie hart mouth write thy finger brest delectable remembrance thy sweet name may blotted anie forgetfulnesse write thy table mine hart also thy iustifications may alwaies euerie place haue thee lord mine eies sight inflame mind fire thou diddest send earth willedst kindled might offer vnto thee dailie teares sacrifice troubled spirit repentant hart sweet christ good iesu euen according vnto desire euen hartilie require thee whole mind giue thy holie chast loue may replenish keepe also fullie possesse giue euident signe token thy loue euen flowing well teares continuallie runne teares may somewhat testifie thy loue may shew foorth declare much soule loueth thee while great delectation hath sweetnes thy loue may refraine shedding teares good lord call remembrance sometimes vertuous woman hanna came tabernacle praie god would send hir sonne scripture maketh mention hir countenance hir teares praiers againe changed altered thinke vpon great vertue constancie stedfastnesse woman doo blush vexed sorrowe confounded shame bicause wretch doo perceiue selfe fallen ouermuch thee good woman weepe sort continued weeping search nothing else sonne ought sinfull soule mourne persist abide weeping seeketh looueth god hath desire come vnto ought soule mourne weepe seeketh god daie night loue nothing christ teares trulie made meate vnto daie night looke vpon therefore lord take pittie bicause dolour sorrowes hart manie number giue thy heauenlie consolation doo despise cast awaie sinfull soule thou didst die giue inward teares beseech thee bottome hart may wash awaie spot sinnes replenish soule alwaies heauenlie delectation myrth may obteine little portion part thy kingdome although amongst perfect men whose step cannot followe yet least among religious woman inferiour sort heere maruellous deuotion another woman called marie magdalen commeth mind vertuous loue godlie affection seeke thee lieng sepulchre thy disciple went awaie departed thee remaine thee hir selfe sate sad sorowfull weeping long verie much arise searched diligent eie manie teares corner sepulchre left emptie might espie thee anie place feruent desire sought yea moreouer went againe againe sepulchre inough vnto hir neither satisfie hir desire grace good worke thy disciple thou didst command bid hir saieng go tell brother go vnto galilie shall see c seeing therfore deuout woman weepe sort continued weeping seeke thee wast aliue among dead touched thee hand hir faith ought soule mourne continue mourning beleeueth thee hir mouth doth acknowledge thee hir redeemer sittest heauen reignest euerie much therefore ought soule mourne weepe loueth thee hir hart hir whole desire dooth couet see thee oh onlie refuge onlie hope wretch vnto man woman needeth anie time praie without hope mercie grant vnto grace thy sake thy holie name sake oft thinke vpon thee oft speake thee write thee read thee confer thee oft euer remember thee stand thee offer vp praise praiers sacrifice vnto thee oft may weepe abundantlie teares thy sight teares may stead bread daie night thou trulie king glorie maister vertues hast taught v thy word thine example mourne weepe whereas thou saiest blessed mourne shall comforted thou didst weepe thy frend lazarus dead didst let yeeld corne increase without thy blessing fauour neither earth selfe bring foorth anie whit paine make prosper wherefore grant thing springing earth meet temperature aire luckilie may take increase haue transgressed thee sinnes wee haue brought misery hang ouer head blot offence god thy manifold mercy take awaie v curse ground people may praise thee god yea people may praise thee earth bring foorth hir increase lord iesus christ thine onelie sonne liueth reigneth thee vnitie holie spirit god euermore amen faire weather lord god sinne man didst drowne world except eight person afterward may receiue fruit earth due season learne thy punishment amend liues thy clemencie giue thee praise glorie iesus christ lord amen praier time vnseasonable shower faire weather god mercifull father wee euerlasting iesus christ lord amen time thunder lightening raging tempest vnseasonable weather praie thus wise mightie god thou art glorious king world thy woonderfull maiestie doth shine knowne also raine thundering lightening meteor ingendred aire thy throne among cloud thou hast made darkenesse thy secrete place thy pauilion thee euen darknesse water cloud aire brightnesse thy presence cloud doo passe awaie doo hailestones firie coales thou dooest thunder heauens giuest thy voice hailestones coales fire thou sendest thine arrowes scatterest thou increasest lightening destroiest great god thou god thou art god dooest woonders declarest thy power among nation thou redeemest thy people thine arme water sawe thee afraid depth trembled cloud powred water aire thundered thine arrowes went abroad voice thy thunder heard round world earth trembled shooke foundation earth shooke discouered thy rebuking lord blasting breath thy nostrels therefore shall verie heauens extoll thy woonderous work saint set foorth thy truth congregation equall thee heauen like thee among sonnes god thou art verie terrible assemblie saint reuerenced aboue thee lord god host like vnto thee art mightie lord thy truth thee thou rulest raging sea thou stillest waues thereof doo arise thou onlie art power resolue vapour drop sea heat sunne thou takest vp turned airie substance againe turnest meere water makest come powring downe vpon face earth whatsoeuer thou wilt thou dooest heauen earrh sea deepe place thy power thou madest earth thy wisdome thou hast established world thy discretion stretchest heauens soone thou lettest thy voice heard water aire waxe fierce thou drawest vp cloud end earth thou turnest lightening raine bringest foorth wind thy treasure thou couerest heauens cloud preparest raine earth thou makest grasse growe vpon mountaines prouidest herb vse man thou giuest beast food yoong rauens crie behold great art thou thou passest knowledge neither number thy yeeres searched thou restrainest drop water raine powreth downe vapour thereof falleth abundantlie vpon man thou bringest foorth wind thy treasure thy secret place thou diddest hide great abundance might readie thy commandement come foorth thou thinkest good thou makest cloud labour giue water earth scatterest cloud thy light thou turnest thy gouernement may doo whatsoeuer thou commandest vpon whole world god hand come therefore let v turne againe vnto lord hath smitten v shall heale v let v repent turne wickednesse sinnes shall forgiuen v let v turne lord turne heauie wrath pardon v shall perish knowledge fault sinnes euer v haue sore prouoked thine anger lord thy wrath waxed hot thy heauie displeasure sore kindled v thou hast made v heare noise warres hast troubled v vexation enimies thou hast thine indignation striken v greeuous sicknes haue fallen leaues beaten downe vehement wind indeede acknowledge punishment lesse deseruings yet thy mercie lord correct v amendment plague v destruction thy hand shortened thou canst helpe neither thy goodnesse abated thou wilt heare thou hast promised afore crie thou wilt heare v whilest yet speake thou wilt haue mercie vpon v none trust thee shall confounded neither anie call vpon thee shall despised thou art onlie lord woundest dooest heale againe killest reuiuest bringest euen hell bringest barke againe father hoped thee trusted thee thou didst deliuer called vpon thee helped put trust thee confounded lord rebuke v thine indignation neither chasten v thy heauie displeasure oh remember sinnes offence youth according thy mercie thinke vpon v lord thy goodnesse haue mercie vpon v lord weake lord heale v bone vexed vexation spirit anguish soules remember thee crie vnto thee heare lord haue mercie thine owne sake thy holie name sake incline thine eare heare mercifull lord doo powre praiers thy face trusting owne righteousnesse thy great manifold mercy wash v throughlie wickednesse cleanse v sinnes turne thy face sinnes put misdeed make v cleane hart god renew right spirit within v helpe v god saluation glorie thy name deliuer v mercifull vnto sinnes thy name sake thy people sheepe thy pasture shall giue thee thanks euer alwaies bee shewing foorth thy praise generation generation glorie father c c another praier said time plague sicknesse mortalitie lord god great fearefull art thou keeping couenant mercie loue thee keepe thy commandements haue sinned lord haue committed iniquitie haue wickedlie yea wee haue rebelled haue departed thy iudgements haue obeied thy seruants prophet spake thy name king prince forefather people land lord righteousnesse belongeth vnto thee vnto v open shame confusion come passe daie plague sicknesse reigning among v among dweller land sin haue done thee unto thee lord god pertaineth compassion forgiuenesse though haue rebelled thee haue obeied thy voice walke lawes thou hast laid v haue hitherto despised thy diuine word yea haue loathed preaching haue loased bridle beastlinesse desire therefore cursse oth written lawe moses thy seruant powred vpon v plague corrupt aire burning feauers greeuous sicknesse lamentablie consumed euerie daie yea knee leg smitten lothsome botch incurable sole foote vnto top head repent neither obserue word written thy lawe feare thy glorious dreadfull name thou doest according thy threatnings aforetold increase plague plague seed thou sendest great plague long continuance euill sicknesse long durance thou bringest vpon v vncurable disease maner sicknesse kind plague besides written booke lawe plague according thy word come vpon v yet haue praied vnto thee lord might euerie one turne vngodlie way therefore hast thou bin wrathfull punishing v bringing euils vpon v thou art righteous lord true thy iudgement god father lord iesus christ thou hast got thee glorious name may appeare daie lord god haue sinned haue done wickedlie haue behaued selues vngodlie thine ordinance turne thy wrath away v beseech thee left place lord god hast promised either pestilence among v aire infected anie plague sicknesse hot thou wilt heare praiers grant request anie man woman among people praieng bottome hart acknowledging sinnes vnfeinedlie lifting vp hand vnto thee thorough iesus christ throne grace thou mercifull giue vnto euerie man according petition thou alone knowest hart child men heare thou praiers petition deliuer v contagious deadlie pestilence command thine angel striketh v put vp swoord sheath strike finall vtter destruction proceede thy wrath spare v death bring end plague let heauens mild dwelling place healthfull least aire infected powre downe contagion thereof vpon v destruction lord turne awaie thine hand sufficient let thine hand cease earth may knowe thou lord art god doo call vpon thy name lord looke downe thine holie house vpon v incline thine eare heare open thine eies behold affliction mortalitie thy people dead whose spirit taken awaie giue vnto thee neither praise righteousnes soule vexed multitude hir sin goeth heauilie weaklie whose eies begin faile yea hungrie soule ascribeth due praise righteousnesse vnto thee lord powre praiers thee require mercie thy sight lord god anie woorthinesse either owne father name thy sonne iesus christ whome thou art well pleased beseech thee mercifull vnto v helpe v necessitie turne thee againe lord last mercifull vnto thy seruants poisoned infection maie taken v notwithstanding thy pleasure visit offence rod thy blessed done giue v grace beare thy fatherlie correction laid vpon v patientlie remembring alwaies chastined thee lord world condemned reprobate world come amen fruitfull praier verie necessarie hartilie said appearing monster anie earthquake plague god would turne awaie vengeance hanging ouer v sinnes oh lord god strong mightie great dreadfull dwellest heauens workest great woonders thy miserable child prostrate vpon earth doo humblie beseech thee mercifull vnto v pardon offence forgiue v sinnes lord enter iudgement thy seruants thou doo shall flesh saued thy sight confesse acknowledge lord sinnes haue mooued thee wrath shew fearefull token thy displeasure towards v day first fire heauen betokening thy hot burning indignation wrathfull displeasure sinne aboundeth daie horrible monstrous shape nature neuer seene day anie time v betoken v none thing thy plague come vpon v degenerate monstrous life conuersation late strange terrible earthquake shooke rather euen vomited v fearfull trembling hart amazed spirit house shamefully haue polluted defiled vile sinnes wickednesse last long great mortalitie plague pestilence thou doost hast terribly threatened v fatherlie warned v mercifullie called v repentance axe set roote tree rotten member without sense feeling may perceiue fearefull destruction desolation hand vnlesse speedilie repent turne thee bicause haue beene long taught thy holie sacred word yet fruit true repentance christian life appeare wo ala day neither preaching word comfortable preaching monster ouglie preaching fire strange preaching earthquake terrible neither yet plague pestilence horrible stirre vp stonie hart awake v sinnes feare oh lord turk rest vnbeleeuing condemne v last daie beene long instructed comfortable preaching thy word sweete promise thy gospell thy woonders heauen earth haue seene doubt righteousnes would haue shined day great shame confusion thou hast lesse warned v oh lord thy fearefull displeasure heauie plague hand great wickednesse thou didst israelits horrible destruction came vpon thou first mercie didst call repentance preaching thy word warning would serue thou didst send monstrous fearfull signes token declare thy visitation farre like vnto v daie alwaies interpret thing imagination vaine hart promising themselues peace destruction ouer head thing doo call mind much written learning example warning maketh v tremble quake feare thy iust iudgments thou hast thus dealt thine owne deere chosen child token thy great wrath sinne shall looke doo lesse deserue thy fearfull scourge mercie thou dooest thus long forbeare v liue though god reuenged vpon sinnes maketh v feare crie unwardlie soules come lord iesu holie true thy dooings shorten day bring pilgrimage end suffer v heape sinne vpon sinne vnto daie vengeance least caught vp amongst number wicked reprobate shall neuer see thy louing countenance maketh v crie thee lord let thy kingdome come end sinfull life wherein doo nothing prouoke thee wrath correct v lord thine indignation neither chasten v thine heauie displeasure though v belongeth nothing shame confusion though offence haue deserued visited rod sinnes scourge yet mercie lord fatherlie correction chasten v thy louing kindnesse take awaie v thee flie succour vnder wing thy mercie shall refuge vntill thou turne thy wrathfull countenance v knowe thy mercie aboue thy work euen great thy selfe therefore saie holie iob though thou kill v yet put trust thee thou camest comfort plucke dungeon hell wretch thou art good samaritane camest heale deadlie wound thou art good physician camest cure mortall infirmity thou art good shepheard camest seeke v wandering lost sheepe bring v thy fold againe thou art brother flesh flesh bone bone hast tasted infirmity felt temptation borne burden sinnes therefore thy hand looke mercie daie vengeance though thou punish v yet hope euer shall thy rod shall touch v shall make thy glorie commoditie strengthening increase faith let thy preaching sundrie way lord sufficient warning grant may speedilie bottome hart repent endeuour doo thy righteous blessed reuealed thy word frame liues according may liue thy feare day life sinfull course ended may dwell thee thy blessed kingdome death merit iesus christ onelie redeemer displeasure turned thy selfe thy wrathfull indignation thou lord hadst helped v failed soules beene put silence said feete haue slipped thy mercie lord helped v vp multitude sorowes hart thy comfort haue refreshed soules soules waited still vpon lord soules hanged vpon helpe hope alwaies lord word reioice god word comfort selues lord said call vpon time trouble heare thee thou shalt praise poore needie sicklie heauinesse lord cared v helpe sauiour according word aduersitie distresse hath lifted vp head saued v vtter destruction hath deliuered soules death hath fed v time dearth hath saued v noisome pestilence therefore offer holie temple oblation thankesgiuing great gladnesse wee sing speake praise vnto lord sauiour giue thanks vnto lord gratious mercie endureth euer lord full compassion hard vpon thy footestoole earth shamefullie haue polluted defiled wicked sinfull rebellious liues notwithstanding thy continuall crieng calling vpon v thy seruants prophet preacher whome haue learned thy haue followed haue heard much done little yea nothing like peruerse vnthankfull child haue made mocke thy word derided thy minister accounted thy threatenings trifle thy warning weight moment wherefore haue iustlie deserued taste deeplie bitter cup thine anger bengeance war famine pestilence yea eternall death thou shouldest temper rigour thy iustice mildnesse thy mercie thy fatherlie affection towards v thou shewest thy selfe slowe anger long suffering much patience mercie yea thou art thousand time readie forget forgiue aske require forgiuenesse therefore though woorthie least mercie cannot little ransom rich beggerlie beastlie sinnes nothing thy sight great pleasure satisfaction thou takest paine passion turne late earthquake lord benefite thine elect thou didst thou begun worke saluation publishing preaching thy gospell among v mercie thou wilt continue maugre head malicious enimies grant v mercifull father christ iesus thy sonnes sake thanksgiuing deliuerance v among heathen thou sellest thy people naught takest monie therefore heathen come thine inheritance thy holie temple haue defiled haue destroied townes house brought heape stone dead body thy seruants haue giuen meate fowles aire flesh thy saincts vnto beast land bloud haue shed like water euerie side man burie become open shame enimies verie scorne derision vnto round v lord mischieuous warres middest fatall mortall punishment threaten horrible mutation worldlie empire flie vnto thee saieng helpe v god saluation glorie thy name deliuer v mercifull vnto sinnes lord deale v according offence thy people diddest couer sinnes didst turne awaie thine heauie indignation turne v humblie beseech thee god sauiour remooue awaie thy displeasure v also true repentance wee may please thee thy sonne christ sake wilt thou displeased v euer wilt thou stretch thy wrath one generation another oh let sorowfull sighing prisoner come thee according greatnesse thy power preserue thou appointed die attaine end thereof euen saluation soules iesus christ lord sauiour amen reading epistle gospell giue thee thanks mercifull father hath pleased thee great mercie towards v cause holie writing fauour lord sinneth hurteth owne soule hate loue death prouerbs turneth awaie eare hearing lawe euen praiers shall abhominable vvisdome despiseth wisdome discipline miserable hope vaine labour foolish work vnprofitable wiues vndiscreet child wicked ofspring accursed ecclesiasticus humble heare word god thou maist vnderstand make true answere wisdome swift heare good thing followe word peace righteousnesse luke queene south shall rise iudgement men woman generation shall condemne came vttermost part earth heare wisdome salomon behold saith christ himselfe greater salomon heere speaking vnto iohn god heareth god word yee therefore heare ye god reuelation let hath eare heare spirit saith church congregation c praier heedfull hearing god word much mercifull god faith without impossible please thee anie thing doo commeth hearing hearing word god much turneth awaie eare fro hearing lawe euen praier shall abhominable turned sinne yea bicause also farre blessed thing heare keepe thy word haue honour haue borne nursed thine owne sonne grant v grace therefore humblie beseech thee zeale loue doo one thing acceptable seruice thee needfull v done euen attentiue desirous mind heare thy holie word preached farre exceed queene saba haue sought wisdome vttermost part earth wisdome thou offerest v exceedeth much redilie practise heard thy prophet thy sonne aboue prophet wise martha making choise thy grace better part may made wise vnto saluation neuer taken v remaine v till put v possession happie life blessed hope looke grant v carefull ouer dutie thou hast commanded wee especiallie regarding chiefest thee needfull selues may therby declare selues deed god bicause heare god word true sheepe thy fold bicause harken diligentlie thy voice followe thee susanna ioanna marie magdalen godlie men woman meanes finallie faile thy promise obteine endlesse comfort glorie thy name blessing gift eternall life among faithfull beleeuers kingdome heauen iesus christ lord amen another verie christian praier preacher auditorie present oh lord beautifull feete bring glad tidings gospell peace saluation good thing surelie without preaching perish blessed praised thou therefore father thou hast giuen v thy gospell life foode doctrine peace time blessed praised thou therefore christ bicause thou giuest renewest often light thy gospell maitainest minister thy word preseruest cherishest defendest thy catholike church diuell thine enimies yea blessed saie praised also thou therefore holie spirit bicause thou powred vpon apostle dooest also kindle thy light hart rulest instructest admonishest helpest v gouernest guidest labour prosperous end sanctifiest v eternall life much chiefe authoritie speaking indeed thee lord alone mortall man hath dead hart humblie beseech thee blesse thy preacher heere present thy diuine grace may doo worke euangelist make thy gospell knowne vnto v giue vnto spirit feare godlinesse fortitude counsell zeale knowledge discretion wisedome vnderstanding constancie let hath receiued thy gift like good faithfull disposer thy manifold grace trulie minister vnto v lord let come vnto v abundant knowledge abilitie diuine mystery blessing gospell christ communicate impart vnto v speake grant may speake thee thy helpe grace allowed thee vtter word god hath receiued thee thou althings maist glorified put vpon hart breastplate perfect iudgement urim knowledge thumim holines righteousnes life puritie doctrine let thy word hart burning fire shut vp bone yea let bellie wine hath vent like new bottle burst full good matter thy spirit within may compell speake mind effectuallie yea doo thou lord saie secretlie speake worke let thy secret power vertue put vnto action labour exercise faith may accomplish thou requirest done conuersion saluation thy people present giue earnestpenie thy spirit hart open doore vtterance vnto may make manifest sauour thy life knowledg vnto v lord thou hast said open thy mouth wide fill open thou therefore lip mouth may shew forth thy praise shew v waie wherein may walke straight thee let mouth saie filled thy praise may preach thine vndefiled lawe conuerting soules giue wisdome simple light blind let vtterance giuen vnto may open mouth boldlie publish secret gospell whereof ambassadour therein may speake boldlie ought speake sparing anie man hauing regard please anie maner person touch thou god mouth thy preacher hot glowing cole thy spirit whereby first clensed may feruentlie purelie preach thy gospell vnto brother discharge dutie first mooued zeale thy glorie touched carefull affection towards thy people esaie giue vnto thy preacher audacitie eliah iohn baptist like true minister god may stoutlie boldlie without anie respect person desire please men feareth god face men reproue people sinnes let thou hast giuen commendement crie alowd spare let lift vp voice like trumpet diligence discretion shew thy people transgression reprooue vice vnfeinedlie bicause lord vaine shall cast net thy word except thou blesse draught labour yeeld profit vnlesse thou prosper doo thou therefore luckilie set loose thou tongue speake put thou hart saie blesse thy word may may able thoroughlie instruct v thy may catch soules thy secret diuine power drawe vnto hart mind eares hearer shall conuert win manie vnto thy christ thou thereby highlie glorified let thy spirit speake thy word tongue vtter nothing rashlie vndiscreetlie motion thy good spirit speaking sincerelie holilie thee thy sight giue beare thy word minister spirituall life care zeale diligence may indeuour faithfullie painfullie fulfill office vttermost finallie let defile euangelicall function anie meanes least suspicion glorie lucre neither let mouth speake wickednesse tongue set foorth deceit dooth preach thy lawes take thy couenant mouth grant himselfe also may hate reformed anie time cast thy holie word behind backe bicause thou lord mercifullie offerest vnto v thy saluation desire thee furthermore behalfe congregation present also part may owne accord willinglie receiue saluation gospell gratiouslie offered v thy preacher part doo publish thy glorious name greene grasse may receiue heauenlie dew thy doctrine barren earth hart may thereby moistened liuelie water thy grace holie spirit fructifie grant may receiue holie thing high mystery pretious pearles dog swine tread contemptuouslie vnder feete wicked atheist vngodlie contemners thy gospell damnation thy child god sheepe fold meeknesse obedience christian feare reuerence grant may heare receiue fulfill thy glorie saluation furthermore thou mercie openest mouth speake vnto v giue v grace open hart eares receiue wholesome instruction fatherlie admonition proceed thereout giue v grace saie applie hart instruction eares word knowledge let v still desirous thy heauenlie kingdome let holie bread thy gospell foode heauenlie dainty onlie sweet vnto v sauorie mouth may depart well refreshed full fraught largesse plentie thy word euangelike feast make thou v true conuerts increase growe faith faith vertue vertue let v neuer loath heauenlie philosophie let v learned taught thee made meet thy preacher receiue thy doctrine health preacher heere present vndoubtedlie thy mouth messenger thou hast sent therfore let v dare either barbarously misvse selues towards word deed thought scornefullie disdaine taught feare thy maiestie reuerence towards let v attentiue ghostlie greedinesse marke word well followe whatsoeuer shall godlie vttered finallie touch thou hart beseech thee god beleeue thy word repent speed preaching thy gospell may take place v practise work faith shew foorth fruit worthie thy preacher togither v leading right vertuous godlie life according rule prescribed thy word may brought end vnto thee chiefe shepheard soules wee may iointlie partaker eternall good thing excellent felicitie thorough iesus christ lord amen another great darknesse soules lord thou shinest vnto v lightsome lampe thy grace nothing effectuallie preaching thy word great haruest thou thy selfe hast said workemen part men ignorant wrapped miserable blindnesse teach thy word trulie ought beseech thee therefore thou wilt send foorth workemen thy haruest send teacher lord taught thee instructed thy spirit godlie wisdome vnderstanding preaching seeke themselues thee godlie doo wise vnderstand giue preacher thy word heere present treasure thy wisedome may powre vpon v saluation v open windowes hart may receiue holie wholsome light good seede falleth vpon v choaked thornes withered awaie drought deuoured fowles aire may growe vp good ground fruitefullie great increase thy glorie saluation amen another praier vsed anie hearer god word giue thee hartie thanks eternall god father lord iesu christ hath pleased thee thine vnspeakable mercie goodnesse age continuallie send world men woonderfull gift knowledge thy renuers spreader foorth thy truth like thanks ascribe vnto thy sacred maiestie allowing v shepheards preacher day gathering together thy church mankinde building bodie christ humblie beseech thee gratious god continue alwaie among v thy pure word thy minister gather vnto thy selfe euerlasting congregation instruct mine hart thy spirit truth vnfeinedlie may assent thy wholesome word proue liuelie member thy bodie incorporated societie world doth sincerelie confesse thee euermore extoll thy holie name keepe preacher thou dooest wilt giue certaine knowledge thy blessed may time time open vnto v thine intent concerning repairing mankind saluation redemption soules thy free mercy also teach v liue new obedience abstaine carnall desire fight soule inspire minister preacher thy word thine holie spirit may vtter thy purelie haue receiued thy hand reteining forme whoalsome word sounding onlie doctrine vttered thy sonne thy bosome otherwise departing order faith rule thy word greatlie obscure light thy doctrine obtrude vpon v vanitie owne inuentions wherefore let speake thy word deceiptfullie sincerelie euen thee thy sight grant also transforming thy ministerie policie lord ouer thine elect neither contend superioritie primacie church mystery christ manifest ought doo shall dooings bee profitable vnto godlie assist also thine especiall grace disgrace doctrine impuritie life let conuersation answer vnto doctrine teach preach life thy good pleasure manie good daie yeare may continue preaching gladsome voice thy gratious gospell among v without contention strife sonne god art lord flocke worke thou effectuallie thy preacher speake thou within v hart blessed thine eternall father confirme thy doctrine mind thine holie spirit grant may trulie knowe discerne howling woolues inchanted song seducing hireling grant may knowe thee euen thou knowest thine heauenlie father walke religiouslie righteouslie thy sight shewing selues holie seede praiseth thy name euermore come holie spirit open mine hart eares may conceiue profit thy whoalesome doctrine sweet comfort reuealed thy holie word preaching gospell lord acknowledge teares sluggishnesse carelesnes seeking thy truth bewaile wretched coldnesse hardnesse hart beseeching thee endue vnfeigned longing ardent desire holie sermon grant life may worship foot preacher peace reuerence true dispenser thy mystery thy faithfull minister double honor none otherwise obeie godlie sermon would voice sound heauens let blemish imperfection particular men vnreuerentlie conceiue thy whole ministerie worke also within despising thy word deliuered vnto v neuer seeke strange reuelations violent rauishings besides contrarie thy word bearing alwaies mind order thou hast appointed may constantlie embrace thy word manifested thy church finallie impart grace vpon v may imitate followe good work holie men casting old man putting new created god righteousnesse true holinesse amen praier god would feede defend church vsed communion heauenlie heardman nursse thing liuing thy meere goodnesse satisfiest creature haue life suffer thy church pine awaie famished lacke food thy blessed word feed v continuallie thy goodnesse suffer thou lord giuest sustenance flesh thy faithfull seruants depriued perfect doctrine pure sound sacrament indeede food eternall life feed v continuallie angel food thy holie word christ iesus whereby hart may bee made righteous strong himward let v like child israel loath heauenlie manna thou mercifullie aboundantlie powrest downe vpon v neither let v lust againe fleshpots aegypt least thy wrath kindled v also thou cause onelie cease fall heauen vpon v also thou smite v greeuous plague thou diddest israelite rather newborne babe remembring written man shall liue bread onlie euerie word proceedeth mouth god let v hartilie desire sincere milke thy word let soules delight fatnesse let v come earelie late water buie eate satisfie hunger thirst let v harken diligentlie vnto thee eate good labour continuallie without wearinesse meate perisheth lord let v neuer see daie wherein thou shalt prouoked send famine land againe famine saie bread thirst water hearing thy word god far bee famine v good lord neither let v anie deserue cast owne city townes house wander strange land sea sea north south east west running fro like hungerstarued wretch seeke food thy word sometimes haue done lord yet find least meanes doo onelie perish bodie also soule lacke thy word verie food thereof let thy word god still neere v euen mouthes hart word truth saie preached taught receiued feed thou v whensoeuer famine either bodie spirit vexeth v father giue v daie daily bread may walke strength thereof daie night vntill come holie hill horeb behold lord according thy commandement doo open mouth wide fill thou full thy heauenlie dainty thou hast promised lord euermore giue v bread life heauen may stedfastlie beleeue thee behold lord come vnto thee though famished let v therfore go awaie vnfed hungred let v sent awaie fasting mind ala hunger thirst greatlie toy gaud world haue nothing set afore wee poore beggerlie wretch thou lord art rich good thing plentifull giuer dainty heauenlie satietie therefore beseech thee giue v somewhat eate giue meate saie vnto wearie wandering soul yet lust conuenient refreshed thee art liuing heauenlie bread wherewith well fed strength come v againe may ascend vnto high thing neuer heereafter hunger thirst anie vanity amen another praier vsed sermon communion thou vsest mightie god preserue thy child thou hast louinglie adopted lesse care diligence sheepe alwaies fed led thee louing shepherd toward owne health perfect commoditie long haue thee maister gouernour shall destitute neither meate drinke thy wholesome doctrine sacrament whereby manifest pine awaie long liue miserable wretched life hunger thirst true perfect goodnesse happeneth cause wee haue forsaken thee followed strange guide wherof none come great peril miserable trouble mind fall vpon v wherefore humblie beseech thee faithfull perfect ioie sight thee louing god father iesus christ thee holie ghost praise glorie euermore amen another almightie god mercifull father hast annointed thy sonne thy holie spirit sent preach gospell prison bondage sinne death might set libertie haue wounded hart healed faith sweete doctrine grant v loue bondage rather libertie death rather life may receiue word may attaine euerlasting freedome life much lord thou declarest contempt thy word thou dooest oftentimes withdrawe preacher euen seemed especiallie haue beene sent grant v receiue teacher thy truth may continued amongst v euerlasting comfort thee sonne holie ghost honour glorie euer amen another praier hardnesse hart contempt word god much thy sacred doctrine mightie god especiallie taught sacred church wherby thou thy selfe art manifestlie knowne singularlie preached highlie magnified also thereby still called heauen heauenlie thing behooueth v manie professe thy schoole greatlie reioice thy faithfull disciple hart desire giue diligent eare vnto thee alone thy wholsome instruction thou hast oftener thou diddest vnto israelite thy sacred scripture also minister thy blessed word protested vnto v wise giue eare vnto people acknowledge trulie thy god word saie onelie mind verelie perfect pure worshipping ala haue turned hart thy holie word wretchedlie despised doctrine thy sacred lawe gospell haue alwaies hitherto beene slander vnto verie hartilie sorie trusting death bloudshedding thy sonne iesus christ sauiour doo great feruencie earnest praiers lamentablie call vpo thee pardon sinfull crime seeing acknowledge thee onlie god earnestlie desire thy gratious goodnesse grant v request may hencefoorth euer giue eare onelie vnto thy diuine maiestie honour thee alone neither make anie thine equall prefer anie thing thee suffer sinfull hart nature disposed vnto euill hardened thy fatherlie friendlie admonition make soft hartilie praie thee inspiration thy good grace holie spirit neither suffer v thou thine infinite goodnesse merit sake hast chosen thy blessed people sheepe thy pasture striue struggle thy blessed commandements like vnto stiffenecked iewes wouldest oftentimes put therto traill thy mightie power grant thou deere excellent father speakest alwaie peaceable matter thing singular commoditie haue heretofore beene maruellous rebellious stubborne burdenous troublesome vnto thee may become thy tractable conformed obedient child euer hereafter haue great regard thy blessed word verie attentiue mind may giue good eare thing thou speakest willest v doo dooing shall onlie saued adorned glorie also euerie thing shall replenished goodnesse truth righteousnesse peace faith shall abound shall plentiouslie iustified iesus christ lord amen sedition priuie conspiracie false doctrine heresie hardnesse hart contempt thy word commandement good lord deliuer v may please thee giue thy people increase grace heare meekelie thy word receiue pure affection bring foorth fruit spirit beseech thee heare v good lord may please thee bring waie truth haue erred deceiued strengthen doo stand comfort helpe weakeharted raise vp fall finallie beate downe satan vnder feete beseech thee heare v good lord amen verie necessarie praier hypocrite false teacher deriders gospell whosoeuer almighty god make true account sincere goodlinesse pure religion exceeding sorowfull see sacred church scattered wholesome doctrine derided praise thy diuine name contempt thing appertaine deuout woorshipping thee turned vnto heathenish gewgawes voluptuous pleasure intent therfore thing may wise happen vnto v see far powre foorth dailie thee great submission dolfull complaint thou wouldest first thine exceeding great goodnesse louing mercie blot heinous sinnes offence maner infinite exceeding greeuous committed onelie weakenesse ignorance also done oftentimes maliciouslie set purpose fauourable saie god vnto greeuous sinnes turne awaie v sort fierce wile subtil laiengs await antichrist thy sacred church depriued blessed ioie spirituall gladnesse lord beseech thee shew experiment proofe thy selfe declare thy name thy power amongst thy spitefull enimies bring downe antichrist kingdome vngodlie sect schismaticall faction certes ouerlong hath oppressed v yea verie daie still letteth hindereth holdeth vnder foote verie manie else speedilie would haue run kingdome libertie beleeued gospell pull therfore downe lord stumbling block euill example peruerse doctrine neuer suffer recouer againe lord thou seest right well perceiuest cruell malicious vngodlie antichristians would inuade church puft vp pride inflamed furie scorning well diuine lawes humane like statelinesse equall contempt dooing nothing courtesie faithfulnesse practising mischiefe naughtinesse endeuouring much lieth thy blessed word may flourish true religion might vtterlie extinguished perfect inuocating calling vpon thy glorious name might quite rooted bring thing naught forged tale men tradition politike deuises diuelish deceipts verie much outrage thy beloued israel sith hath thy great mercie enioied long peace blessed tranquillitie let hir ioined vnto thee hir welbeloued may continuallie laie sure hold vpon thy worthie praise suffer mouth hir good wholesome instructor closed vp put silence permit thy due honour obliuion yet let hymnes song wherwith thou art highlie praised celebrated vsurped haue derision scorne finallie humblie beseech thee excellent father wrath indignation euer due vnto v reason heinous sinnes haue wickedlie committed thou wouldest yet glorie thy famous name turne fro thy sanctified church thy deere spouse powre rather vpon enimielike rage malicious affection imagine nothing else quite marre vtterlie laie waste thy blessed heritage deede lesse aduersaries thy blessed name peace quietnesse iesus christ lord amen praier vnbeleeuers men may embrace gospell vnto thee doo crie lord father maker men art rich vnto call vpon thee commandest light shine darkenes thou wilt men saued come knowledge truth therfore thy great loue thou diddest call v participation lot saint light nature child wrath death alien stranger testament promise hauing none hope without god world fellowe citizen saint houshold god built vpon foundation apostle prophet iesus christ beeing head corner stone susteineth whole building word power heare v thy seruants making supplication yet haue hard sound thy gospell neither knowe thy name sitting darkenesse shadowe death haue mind darkened alienated life god ignorance caried awaie vnto dumbe idol fained god euen led run worship god giue grace thy word may knowne among preached euerie land sound go end world thou also maist found sought thee famous among neuer asked thee send foorth thy word may healed walke vanity mind god father lord iesu christ king glorie giue spirit wisedome reuelation confessing thee inlighten mind may knowe hope wherevnto thou hast called v pretious glorie thine inheritance saint excellent greatnesse power toward v beleeue according working mightie power thou hast wrought raised thee dead placed thy right hand heauenlie place aboue principality power open hart vnbeleeuers hearing thy word may acknowledge thee onlie true god iesus christ whome thou hast sent may worship thee father sonne sonne thee father holie ghost euen thou hast reuealed thy selfe take vaile hart iewes least blinded reading old testament stumble stone rocke offence incredulitie hardnesse hart thy sonne christ crucified preached vnto stumbling blocke thy gospell sauour death vnto death conuerted true faith knowledge thee father sonne face vncouered may behold thy glorie knowing writing prophet messias thou hast appointed sauiour world likewise gather thou gentile whome gospell word crosse meere foolishnesse thy congregation may embrace thy ministerie casting fleshlie wisedome leade cogitation captiue obedience gospell moreouer praier supplication onlie aboue mentioned also either although resist thy truth pure religion openlie obstinatelie professe religion yet mingled manie superstition abuse worshipping calling vpon saint departed life addicted outward ceremony rudiment world burdening conscience man obseruations tradition father trusting owne righteousnesse rather work deedes flesh refuse make little accompt thy righteousnesse true iustification go establish owne righteousnesse christ end lawe righteousnesse manie beleeue another foundation man laie laid thy sonne messias waie truth life end lawe perfect obedience fulfilling lawe innocent bitter death hee hath restored vnto v saluation perfect righteousnesse euerie one beleeueth might perish haue euerlasting life god sight blind bring home againe ignorance either intangled doubtfull labyrinth grosse errours countenance polluted religion lightened thy spirit may returne right waie impudent face stiffe neckes doo obstinatelie affected ignorance withstand thine holie spirit whose sens god world hath blinded light thy glorious gospell shine ouer represse bridle malice slaughter persecution neither trouble destroie thy church amen sermon reade sentence scripture exhorting diligent obseruing following god word beard deuteronomie verse thou shalt obeie diligentlie voice lord thy god walke ordinance obserue keepe doo commandements command thee daie blessing shall come thee ouertake thee blessed shalt thou citie blessed field c thou wilt obeie voice lord thy god keepe doo commandements ordinance command thee daie curse shall come vpon thee ouertake thee curssed shalt thou citie curssed field c whole chapter ecclesiasticus keepeth lawe bringeth offrings inough holdeth fast commandements offereth offering saluation matthew soeuer heareth saieth christ word doth liken wise man hath builded house rocke c whosoeuer heareth word doth shall likened vnto foolish man hath builded house vpon sand c luke blessed heare word god keepe luke seruant knoweth maisters doth shall beaten manie stripe roman hearer lawe righteous god dooers lawe shall iustified iames wherefore yee dooers word hearer onelie deceiuing owne selues anie heare word doo like vnto man beholdeth naturall face glasse hath considered himselfe goeth awaie forgetteth immediatlie manner one looketh perfect lawe libertie continueth therein beeing forgetfull hearer dooer worke shall bee blessed deed iohn yee cleane word haue spoken vnto abide c vine yee branch abideth bringeth foorth much fruit without ye doo nothing yee abide word abide aske yee shall done vnto reuelation ouercommeth keepeth word vnto end giue power ouer nation reuelation remember therefore thou hast heard receiued hold fast repent hold saie thou hast man take thy crowne watch giue thanks praie vnto god sermon saie immortall praise thanks giuen vnto thee almightie god mercifull father hast giuen v pretious gift thy holie word vouchsafed v heare glad tidings thy sacred gospell hand thy minister presentlie thy mercy hath vttered vnto v seeing thou hast delt gratiouslie v free publishing thy gospell amongst v foure twentie yeeres seemeth thou hast euen lifted v vp heauen city wherein sauiour taught vpon earth hast manner throwne downe hell left terrible fearfull example thy iudgements walke woorthie grace offered vnto grant v profit chastisement correction thy grace thou hast reuealed thy vnto v otherwise could neuer haue knowne strengthen v lord neuer refuse thy gospell vnbeleefe seeke person preacher anie cause pretence infidelitie hauing thy word alwaies hart thy praise tongue may walke woorthie thy great grace bestowed vpon v haue conuersation heauen wee may taken vp thither vnto thee alwaies glorifie thee thy sonne holie ghost amen thankesgiuing knowledge god word giue thee thankes father lord heauen earth thou hast hid mysterie thy word gospell saluation thy sonne wise men vnderstanding world hast reuealed babe base degree certeinlie thy good pleasure thou hast giuen v thing thy sonne none knoweth thou father neither dooth anie knowe thee except thy sonne thy sonne shall reueale thee worship thee praise thee glorifie thee giue thee thanks hid wisedome thou didst determine world glorie neuer knowne prince world anie time sonnes men reuealed spirit communion mysterie hid age opened thy saint thou wouldst haue made knowne rich glorious mysterie thine owne working thy free mercie made heires partaker thy promise christ iesu gospell bringeth v tidings full assurance euerlasting rich thine infinite goodnesse mercie blessed god euen father lord iesus christ hath blessed v spirituall blessing heauenlie thing christ hath chosen v foundation world holie without blame loue hath predestinated v adopted iesus christ vnto himselfe according good pleasure whereby loueth v beloued haue redemption bloud euen forgiuenesse sinnes according rich grace wherein hath abounded towards v wisdome vnderstanding hath opened vnto v mysterie according good pleasure hath purposed himselfe euen vntill dispensation fulnesse time might gather one thing heauen earth euen christ also chosen wee predestinated according purpose maketh althings counsell owne might praise glorie hoping haue beleeued christ heard word truth euen gospell saluation grace thou didst extend toward v work righteousnesse done according thy mercie thou sauedst v didst call v holie calling according work according thine owne purpose grace giuen v christ time made manifest appearing sauiour iesus christ hath abolished death brought life immortalitie vnto light gospell thee therefore art power establish hart according reuelation mysterie kept secret since world began opened published among nation scripture prophet commandement euerlasting god obedience faith thee saie god onelie wise praise iesus christ euer amen beseech thee according operation working thy mightie power may continue constant true faith wholesome doctrine time forsaking wisedome opened gospell may followe iudgement worldlie reason fleshlie vnderstanding thou hast beesotted altogither confounded searching thy hidden mystery thy spirituall wisedome dooth farre exceed wisedome vnderstanding creature wherevnto flesh attaine neither bloud reueale yet naturall man although indued great sharpenesse wit worldlie vnderstanding perceiue grant beseech thee may thy simple sheepe littleones receiuing thee word truth without contradiction disputation article faith bring fleshly wisedome made void proper vnderstanding may bring mind godlie captiuitie let thy sonne descending aboue brought eternall wisedome gospell thy bosome made sacrifice behalfe exalted thy right hand bestoweth gift let beseech thee shine hart likewise cause thine holie spirit instill v diuine light breath vpon v new flame thine heauenlie knowledge till departing eternall life may behold thee onlie true god face face liuest reignest perpetuall glorie amen another thankesgiuing sermon render vnto thee heauenlie father hartie thanks spirituall heauenlie nourishment thy blessed word wherewith soules onelie well refreshed present also faith strengthened loue kindled conscience quieted wee humblie beseech thee giue v grace onelie hearer thy word dooers also onelie loue also liue thy gospell onlie fauour also followe thy godlie doctrine onelie professe also practise thy blessed commandements whatsoeuer outwardlie heare inwardlie beleeue may shew foorth conuersation liuing vnto honour thy holie name comfort christian brother health soules amen another god wee haue heard eares father preacher haue declared vnto v noble work thou hast done old time v grant therefore beseech thee thou heauenlie husbandman seed thy word sowne amongst v may take deepe root hart neither burning heate persecution cause wither neither thornie care life doo choke seed sowne good ground may bring foorth thirtie sixtie hundred fold thy heauenlie wisedome hath appointed glorie thy holie name amen another praier thankesgiuing sermon giue thee humble thankes lord iesu christ thou hast vouchsafed euen abundantlie refresh feed v food thy word beseech thee vnderstanding knowledge thy word may wholsome comfortable effectuall v heauenlie seed sowne doo die perish v without fruit keepe hart lord inuiron compasse inclosure hedge thy grace thy holie angel preserue watch ouer infernall fowle bird satan pull thy sacred word hart prepare breast make apt hart vnto thee good lord may firmelie keepe thy word may alwaie sticke new fresh memory giue v also strength possibilitie power life may answere thy doctrine heard giue increase also thy word heauenlie husbandman v may augment growe thy holie speech heauenlie eloquence may onlie bring v knowledge thy also may execute accomplish fullfill thou commandest willest perseuering end may last aspire thy celestiall kingdome amen another gratious god mercifull father hast vouchsafed v rich pretious iewell thy holie word assist v thy spirit may written hart euerlasting comfort reforme v renew v according thine owne image build v vp edifie v perfect building thy christ sanctifieng increasing v heauenlie vertues grant heauenlie father iesus christ sake amen another praier accomplishing god reuealed lawe truelie accounted right happie amongst mortall men good mercifull god haue thy sacred lawe alwaie set eies mind make patterne begin life rule proceed haue begun shall happen go astraie fault may amended thereby also leade vertuous life according vnto iustice shall liue blamelesse dooings shall examined vpright iudgement shall ashamed greatlie auaile diligentlie practised tender age hartilie acknowledge earnestlie confesse deere father man policie altogether vnprofitable none accompt made thereof vnlesse thou present thy blessed spirit dooest direct mind otherwise gaine may haue hearing meditating thy holie lawe cold verie hurtfull knowledge wherefore earnest request thou wouldest onlie minister strength vnto v thy grace accomplishing thing thou commandest thy diuine lawe also bring vnto good effect may haue felicitie owne deuises take greater delight continuall practise due execution thereof anie fleshlie worldlie pleasure iesus christ lord amen another praier strength speedilie accomplish god diuine lawe one side doo consider weaknes strength mightie god contrariwise absolutenesse perfectnesse thy blessed lawe euidentlie perceiue obteining thereof thy puissant helpe stand v verie great steed first therefore teach v true way thy holie commandements moreouer illuminate sort mind vnderstanding may able incline great feruencie vnto thing thou hast taught commanded furthermore needefull thee graunt v power abilitie performe whatsoeuer haue learned thee otherwise shall profit v little nothing haue knowledge vnlesse part obedience either performed leastwise begun v lewd inclination sinfull hart doth greatlie hinder finallie sens corrupt affection woonderfull huge aduersaries heerevnto succour thou v therfore humblie beseech thee thy good grace aboundant fauour forgiuing whatsoeuer haue committed doo dailie sinfull manner thy sacred lawe neither let imputed vnto v eternall destruction meane season good god quicken lift v vp thy vnspeakable louing mercie see offred vnto v benigne promise thy holie scripture thou wouldest permit v swarue thy sacred lawe thou hast vouchsafed set v doo much feruencie desire vnseparablie annexed vnto thee grant may execute exceeding feruent desire charge left vnto v may maruellous speedilie bestir step foot towards fulfilling thy blessed lawe cause thou v excellent father humblie beseech thee cut cast aside delay contrarie expectation vngodlie alwaies cast let entrap v may obedient thy sacred precept honour loue thee purelie may accompanie v like earth eueriewhere replenished thy inestimable goodnes number thy true faithfull suppliant may dailie greatlie augmented iesus christ lord amen praier vsed anie excommunicate person notorious sinner dooing open penance church true conuersion repentance c eternall euerliuing god father lord iesus christ thou mouth thy holie prophet apostle hast plainelie pronounced thou desirest death sinner rather may conuert liue also hast sent thine onelie sonne suffer cruell death crosse iust find themselues oppressed burthen sinne aduocation may haue accesse throne thy grace assured crie shall find fauour mercie unto thee mercifull god doo miserable wretch crie whome filthie life lewd conuersation proud contempt thee thy holy lawe thou griefe dolour manie good christian hart dooest iustlie scourge punish censure thy church hast woorthilie cut secluded reiected excommunication thy mysticall body making spectacle god angel men unto thee saie lord maister power callest offender vnto thee waie iudgement affliction knowest hardnesse hart haue power selues returne rise vp doo come name thy sonne lord sauiour iesus christ acknowledge thee congregation heinous sinnes wherewith haue shamefullie polluted selfe offended thee thy church heere prostrate feete thy maiestie craue mercie pardon thee aske forgiuenesse world especiallie congregation whome confesse haue offended humblie beseeching thee father mercy looke vpon thine eies pitie euen thou lookedst sometime vpon sinfull woman taken adulterie vpon marie magdalen banket prostrating hir selfe thy foot bitterlie bewaile hir wickednesse likewise fauour thou didst publicane standing far temple without lifting vp eies vnto heauen shame striking brest onelie said lord mercifull vnto sinner first god thou wilt pierce hardened hart moue power thy holie spirit sort may come true knowledge sinnes feele soule conscience terrour thy iudgement vpon offender especiallie lord haue offended thy maiestie great number thy christian congregation detestable fact greeuous sinne beeing armed thy grace endure mortification flesh like sauiour iesus suffered flesh may subiect selfe iust ordinance thy church refuse openlie heere acknowledge confesse fault christian patience true humiliation giuing thee glorie thy name face thee congregation present may eiewitnesses lord externall confession outward acknowledgement sinnes without inward contrition dolour hart soule auaileth nothing thy presence art searcher hart sifter reines humblie beseech thee thou wilt touch hart conscience effectuallie worke perfect remorse detestation former offence without anie hypocrisie true compunction soule sincere confession mouth vtterlie loathing condemning mine owne impietie damning lawe pronounceth vniust damnable may attaine sense feeling thy mercie thou hast aboundantlie shewed vnto mankind christ iesu lord conuert lord shall conuerted thou art god conuerted doo penance heale lord shall healed saue thou shall saued thou art praise confesse shame confusion face due iustlie suffer daie thee honor glorie redemption thus iudging punishing dooest little little giue place amend space repent hast suddenlie vnwares taken awaie face earth ouerwhelmed thy iustice wicked deedes dooing deserued thou iustlie mightest thy lenitie patience longsuffering mercie thou louer soule humblie thanke thee beseeching thee mollifie hart may repent esteeme greatlie great rich inestimable treasure thy goodnesse moreouer good lord iesus christ grant beseech thee among feares terrours conscience may take hold thee liuelie faith hast redeemed cursse lawe art made wisedome righteousnesse sanctification redemption may fight conscience yeeld selfe slaue still sathan despaire thy mercie vpholden voice thy gospell may flee vnto thee mediator iustified faith may haue peace god comming vnto thee hearing thy word repentance angel heauen may continuallie haue occasion reioice auoiding fearefull vengeance assuredlie shall fall vpon inobedient may restored right thy lawe receiued againe bosome thy church member thy mysticall body hart walke holie obedience thee thy holie word praise thy name comfort thy church confusion sathan amen thankesgiuing praier vnto god reconciled offender excommunicate person restored church vsed open penance done sermon otherwise heauenlie father fountaine mercie consolation confesse selfe chiefest sinner wretch vnworthie bee counted amongst thy child member thy church thou haue respect corruption nature horror manifold misdeed seeing hath pleased thy fatherlie goodnesse onlie freelie elect choose thy deere sonne lord iesus christ death redeeme gospell call holie spirit thine illuminate also thou hast commanded thy holie word sacred gospell preached onlie world end penitent may haue assurance remission sinnes great small old new onlie time euen oft sorowfull hart broken spirit bitter teares shall bewaile call thy grace mercie consideration thy fatherlie adoption ineffable clemencie shewed vpon mee vnwoorthie wretch highlie praise magnifie thy fatherlie mercie testimonie whereof onelie feele selfe others also see euidentlie conuersion confession forepassed fault penance dooing assured haue much shamed selfe godlie congregation haue thereby confounded ouercome mine enimie satan time bondage whose venem deceiuable entisements heretofore haue beene verie rebellious wholesome admonition church vile sinnes rebellion contempt confesse haue beene woorthilie excommunicate punished censure lord seeing spirit lord iesus christ hath farre preuailed power therof set freedome thy mercie returned againe societie thy saint mysticall bodie thy church beseech thee obedience lord iesus christ accept sorowfull conuert allow mine vnfeined repentance confession former inobedience fault neuer laid charge haue mercie vpon god haue mercie vpon absolue thy poore creature onelie sentence excommunication also sinnes committed censure church laid lord giuen according hartie vnfeined repentance thee congregation hartilie forgiue world anie thing hath offended lord pronounce thou sinnes cleansed shall cleansed absolue thou chaine mine iniquity wherewith fast tied bound shall absolued loose thou sin earth shall loosed heauen thy great goodnesse mercie acquited sent awaie vncondemned thee sinfull woman taken adulterie hir accuser receiued againe societie iesus christ bosome church participation blessed sacrament finallie fruition thy benefit may perpetuall assistance thy holie spirit onelie displeased sinnes bridle hencefoorth corrupt affection till satan cleane troden vnder foot power redeemer christ also conducted course life hereafter neuer fall like sinnes impietie contempt god godlinesse anie continuallie may subiect voice church minister proceed dailie maner good work christian obedience praise thy holie name edifieng thy church iesus christ lord onelie sauiour thee holie ghost giuen honour glorie praise thankesgiuing onelie miserable sinner vnwoorthie wretch also men angel creature heauen earth time foorth euermore amen luke verse reioice saith christ haue found sheepe lost yea saie vnto ioie heauen presence angel god ouer one sinner repenteth ouer ninetie nine iust person neede repentance praier vsed conuersion anie notorious sinner doth open penance church pitifull god omnipotent lord mercifull father good thou bearest vnto v iesus christ thy deere sonne wilt death destruction sinner rather inspiration moouing thy holie spirit conuert liue also doost witnesse vertue strength thy word causeth mountaines shake rock tremble flouds drie vp behold thy child people prostrate thee humblie beseech thee iesus christ sake pitifullie looke vpon sinner especiallie vpon sister present baptised thy name hath professed hir selfe subiect religion vnto discipline thy church though satan ala hath blinded hir wilfullie shee hath contemned one lord thou alone knowest maist thou alone change mollifie hart impenitent sinner thou saie voice prophet nathan awakedst dauid deadlie securitie without anie prophet didst beate downe pride manasses prison filled ierusalem kind impietie thou turnedst hart peter onelie looke thy deere sonne lord iesus christ fearfullie horrible imprecation hee thrise denied openlie forsworne thee thou openedst eies blind excommunicate man causedst beleeue thy saiengs forgauest woman taken adulterie sentst hir awaie vncondemned thee hir accuser thou saie lord whose mercy without measure endure euer thee doo praie sister heere presentlie punished dooing open penance hir offence earnestlie desiring thee father mercy first pierce moue hir heart feare thy seuere iudgements sufferest child thine go vncorrected world end may escape vnpunished world come open hir eies may begin see vnderstand fearefull terrible thing fall thy hand prouoke thy wrath indignation hir let please thy maiestie vertue thy holie spirit mollifie hir hard hart saie may length feele greeuouslie hath offended thee church giue hir thy grace acknowledge accuse damne well v whome hath offended thy presence hir contempt sinne notorious damnable least hir obstinacie wilfull rebellion thy church congregation prouoked compelled greefe hart cut hir quite thy mysticall bodie whome lord vnfeinedlie desire receiue within church liuelie member thy deere sonne lord iesus christ heare v mercifull father call backe againe deere sister eternall destruction whereinto sathan would leade hir thy presence euen hir rebellion transgression doo mourne may receiue hir againe gladnes ioie render praise honour vnto thee thy holie congregation grant selues lord vnworthie whome thou shouldest sister brought vnfeined repentance conuersion may escape fearfull indignation appeareth haue fallen grant saie lord vnto sister repentance hart sincere confession mouth praise thy name comfort thy
