euer euer amen praier almightie mercifull god heauenlie father thy poore child vnwoorthie bidden ghest thy prepared sacrifice celestiall feast due examination former life humble contrite hart sorowfull repentant spirit forgiuing charitable mind heere prostrate knee thy throne mercie lowelie hart humblie beseech thy maiestie euen thy deere onelie sonne iesus christ sake thou hast euer alreadie giuen oblation offering sinnes haue mercie pitie compassion vpon vile wretched miserable sinner forgiue mine innumerable horrible offence old new committed heauen earth thee new praie thee sanctifie throughlie god make hartilie desire feare trembling please thee thing doo woorthie communicant godlie ghest fit partaker heere daie thy heauenlie food great sumptuous supper lord god giuing vnto thine accustomed goodnesse right knowledge vnderstanding thy word thing selfe holie mystery meane manifold fruit benefites thereof also causing working thy mercie grace bring true constant faith roote welspring newnesse life well praising thee louing neighbour purging mine owne conscience earnest repentance continuall contrition dead work filthinesse sinne neither ignorance thing gratious god may cause contemne vnfaithfulnesse make void fruit sinne iniquitie procure thy heauie plague grant may faith knowledge amendment life faith heere vnited thy sonne christ head deerelie beloued spouse holie heauenlie mystery comfort bodie soule afterward may haue full fruition deede mine euerlasting ioie saluation eternall life iesus christ lord blessed euer amen another godlie praier iesu christ holy eternall god miserable woman wretched sinner acknowledge confesse woorthie least thy mercy vnwoorthie receiue thee vnder roofe soule participating thy blessed bodie bloud horrible infinite sinnes wherewith defiled wo lord woman polluted lip dwell among people haue vncleane lip therefore verie entrailes hart troubled bone doo shake finde soule vnworthie ghest heauenlie supper yet againe mine hart woonderfullie lightned call mind thou deere sonne almightie god camest world call righteous sinner vnto repentance whole need physician sick besides knowe right well constantlie doo beleeue notwithstanding filthinesse thou canst make mee woorthie alone canst make cleane conceiued vncleane seed righteous men sinner thou forgiuest sinnes thy woonted grace thine holie spirit powred vpon v thy power mercie beseech thee graunt grace vnto sinner may woorthilie approch heauenlie sacrament least otherwise mine vnwoorthinesse made giltie thy bodie bloud stead life receiue iudgement condemnation giue grace therefore afore presume come vnto participation thereof may examine selfe calling sinnes mind searching way vnfeigned hartie repentance returning vnto thee lord least otherwise concealing sinnes iudas traitor eate bread lord lord abusing thy gentlenesse heape vengeance vnto selfe daie vengeance make therefore saie confesse sinnes hartie sob thou faithfull iust god wilt abandon mine offence cleanse sinnes wilt disdaine accept fauour doo refraine acknowledge wickednesse moreouer powre true liuelie faith neuer mistrust thy word annexed sacrament promiseth vnto mankind remission sinnes eate drinke mouth onelie purpose faith must come therevnto apprehend word promise annexed ground principle sacrament whosoeuer giueth credit word giuen shead remission sinnes man hath promised namelie eternall life saluation remission sinnes likewise righteousnes life saluation doubteth word without doubt vnworthie receiuer commeth vnprepared doubting man neither eateth flesh spirituallie yet drinketh bloud though carnallie eies seemeth consume sacrament bodie bloud teeth mouth damnation rather bicause thy supper poison euill man taketh good thing naughtilie finallie grant also receiuing thy sacrament new testament may put according former conuersation old man corrupt according lust error renewed spirit mind putting new man god shapen righteousnesse holinesse truth albeit nature liue without spot wickednesse yet blesse may neuer offend willinglie altogether depending vpon thy goodnesse whose manner pardon true penitent sinner may boldlie approch thine holie supper especiallie seeing haue libertie enter holie place thy bloud new liuing waie thou hast prepared v vaile thy flesh seeing haue high priest ouer house god make v drawe nigh true hart assurance faith sprinkled mind euill conscience washed bodie pure water cause v hold fast profession hope without wauering faithfull promised let v consider one another prouoke vnto loue good work forsaking assemblie faithfull maner exhorting one another much see daie approching amen another christian deuout praier said receiuing holie communion christ lord sauior thy greeuous agonie heapes trouble thorough wrath thine almightie father lighting vpon thee commandedst thy disciple peter iohn prepare passouer together might eate thou longedst saluation didst eate lambe figure thy selfe expressedst image banket thy people israelits vnder conduction thy seruant moses depart aegypt celebrate hauing finished supper old couenant thou begannest new couenant testifieng thy presence benefit church mooue thou hart thankfulnesse like desire may desire come vnto thy table seeke nourishment eternall life suffer v loath thine heauenlie banket prophane curious men doo contend thee contemne order thou hast appointed amend abuse prophanings thine holie table horriblie deformed filthinesse punished place manifold plague disease thy wisedome thou healest disease infirmity visible signes sacrament thou confirmest faith thou art effectuall beleeuers according thy promise blesse bread wine thou hast willed beleeue receiue thee true faith puritie mind thou declarest thy supper trulie thou tookedst flesh vpon thee sake euen ingraffe v thine owne flesh bring v eternall life eternall life begunne world whereby soule renewed vnto eternall happinesse moreouer blessed meate doth witnesse testifie body replenished sense thy liuing flesh shall rise againe perpetuall glorie increase nourish profitable taking thee light within v worke thy sacrament taken digested thou maist come v thee assist v thy ghests sweet housholder woorthilie may feed vpon thy meate trie soule earnest vnfeined conuersion let v plaie hypocrite prophanelie dallie thee thy holie sacrament cause v rightlie discerne thy bodie bloud common meate let v neuer eate bodie lord lord grant true vnfeined faith may enter thy sacred couenant may alwaies abide thee thou v likewise thine holie spirit bond loue publike common banket ioine v thine member thy church giue grace feed bread may one bodie knit vnto thee art head working thing let diuell time disturbe pleasant concord betweene thee v betweene head member bodie let v gather also summe doctrine preached church let raise v vp vnto thankfulnesse thy benefit increase desire continuall praier whereby craue thing stand need continue custome euen till thou returnest gloriouslie cloud iudgement maintaine place preaching godlie ceremony bring time barbarous ignorance furthermore dooing herof ministerie profession sathan instrument confirme mind thy spirit sound pure vnderstanding let v oppressed idolatrous darknesse approouing horrible abuse carrieng laieng vp offring halowed bread without vse much one sillable thing seene thy first institution wherefore represse diuell blasphemouslie dealing thine ordinance first consume world vtterlie fire wrapped againe horrible darknesse idolatrie superstition mitigate punishment sicknesse infection warre misery prophaning supper whole world doth endure let thine angel spare griefe hart bewaile abuse feed v fill v thy ghests thy liuelie presence dwell thou v worke v sharpen remembrance thy benefit within v finallie resurrection graue giue v place thy seat shall find new taste kingdome thy father another praier said receiuing blessed communion kneele god boord lord although woorthie receiue thee house soule mine innumerable offence sin done thy great goodnesse yet trusting good lord thy great pitie infinite mercie come receiue thy blessed bodie sicke creature thee art health life vncleane thee art well mercie blind ignorance thee art light euerlasting needie thy grace poore vertue thee art king heauen earth naked good work thee art author grace come wretch thee lord maker desolate comfortlesse thee helpe succour besides thee consolation come sinner thee art mediatour meane betwixt god man come caitife thee mercifull sauiour come sinfull thee granter remission pardon dead sinne thee art restorer life euill thee art goodnesse hardharted releeued infusion thy superabundant grace desiring thee meekelie heale mine infirmity sicknesse wash awaie sinne filthinesse lighten blindnesse reduce right waie thereof comfort desolate goodnesse haue mercie wretchednesse pardon sinfulnes giue light grace thus burdened sinne may receiue thee food angel king glorie lord lord chastitie bodie purenesse mind cleannesse soule contrition hart abundance weeping teares spirituall ioie gladnesse dread reuerence faith hope charitie obedience humilitie loue deuotion faithfulnesse thankfulnesse beseeming lord receiued soule expedient displeased good lord sinner vncleane hart polluted mind come hither daie receiue thy pretious bodie sacramentall bread wine remember mercifull lord thou refusedst sinfull marie magdalen penitent kissing thy blessed foot likewise despise put awaie vnwoorthie receiuing thy bodie blessed sacrament sinnes wickednesse grant thou copunction hart plentie weeping tear wash awaie sinnes wickednesse pure hart cleane conscience may daie receiue sacrament soules helth may obtaine possesse thereby euerlasting life holie saint heauens glorie present life holie spirit replenished neuer admit louer besides thee grant blessed iesu receiue sacrament bread wine may woorthie bee accounted member thy mysticall bodie heere earth though yet worthie numbered among simplest lowest thy seruants rather reiect outcast sinfulnesse yet good lord thine infinite power thou maist make able equall like meanest thine elect seruants come thou father fatherlesse come thou comforter comfortlesse come cleanse soule contagiousnesse sinne conuenient according anie vncleannes thou spouse virginall chastitie shouldest come dwell come therefore sanctifie soule make cleane thy gratious presence heapes soile remnant sinne found anie least cranie corner thy spirituall house temple bodie soule meane offend celestiall eies thy diuine maiestie shall thy holie hall cleansed soule ring resound thy perpetuall praise thy glorie come saie god apparell naked soule rich ornament thy vertue grace white raines thy righteousnesse innocencie may delight thee therein abide thou disdainedst touch sore leaper thy holie hand good lord vouchsafe annoint simple soule ointment remission pardon life stedfast hope firme faith perfect charitie may increase vertue daie daie may atteine glorious fruition thy godhead kingdome heauen may see thee face face praise thee thine elect chosen saint world without end amen another verie deuout praier receiuing holie communion sweet louing lord iesu christ deuoutlie hartilie desire receiue daie thou knowest mine infirmity necessity suffer manie euils vice lie wherewith often greeued tempted troubled vnquieted defiled unto thee doo come remedie vnto thee doo earnestlie praie comfort helpe speake vnto thee knowest thing vnto euen verie secret thought manifest onlie canst perfectlie comfort helpe thou knowest good thing lacke thing poore beggerlie vertues behold stand thee requiring grace mercie feed cherish thy hungrie begger kindle coldnesse fire thy loue lighten blindnesse bright cleerenesse thy presence turne earthlie thing bitternesse vnto heauie greeuous hard painfull contrarie thing patience lift vp hart vnto thee heauen suffer wander go astraie thee vpon earth thou onlie time foorth euermore dooest waxe sweet vnto thou onelie art meate drinke loue ioie sweetnesse oh would god thou wouldest vouchsafe altogether enflame burne euen consume thy presence change thy selfe may made one spirit grace inward vnitie softning thy feruent loue suffer depart hungred thirstie worke mercifullie thou hast often heeretofore maruellouslie wrought thy saincts maruell altogether set fire inflamed thee faile selfe changed sith thou art fire euer burning neuer failing loue purifieng hart lightening vnderstanding behold therefore wretched sinner presuming mine owne merit trusting onlie thy mercie goodnesse bold come trembling feare vnto thy table sweete deinties holie lord iesu christ haue hart bodie defiled marred polluted manie fault offence mind tongue chastlie warilie kept therefore holie deitie dredfull maiestie wretched caitife great perplexitie mind taken vnwares betwene many troublsome straight doo run againe thee fountaine mercie unto thee doo hasten healed cured vnder thy protection doo flie whome endure iudge earnestlie desire haue sauiour thee lord doo open shew woundes vnto thee doo vncouer detect shamefastnesse knowe sinnes great sore afraid hope repose trust thy great mercy infinite surpassing number turne thine eies thy mercie towards lord iesu christ heauenlie king euerlasting god man crucified man heare trusting thee haue mercie vpon full miserie sinne thou art flowing fountaine vndrainable welspring mercie pitie beseech thee bottome hart thou wilt forgiue sinnes life purge awaie rust filth thereof life come may imputed vnto god vnspeakable pitie whose power infinite without whome possiblie resist sinne comfort helpe greatlie neuer heereafter anie commit anie mortall deadlie sinne hencefoorth may ouercome temptation diuell may direct whole life thought word work altogether vnto thee thou maist end life preserue keepe sathan vrge terrours feares bring desperation flowing fountaine charitie make mind free creature might drawe thy loue fauour thy loue may profit go forward preuaile verelie end life may worthilie receiue thee soule powred sacke bodie doo thou mercie bring vnto euerlasting palace thy heauenlie father see behold cleere renowmed glasse holie trinitie remember thy creature lord whome thou hast redeemed thy pretious bloud wo euer haue offended thee purpose thy grace amend life take therefore mercifull father sinnes iniquity cast soule filthie fowle matter venemous contagion infection sinne thine ancient accustomed mercy powre thy heauenlie medicine preseruatiue thy loue wound may refresh restore former puritie cleannesse purified bodie mind may deserue made fit thorough christ merit woorthilie tast holie mystery come daie lord minister vnto sicke languishing soule heauenlie cordiall comfort iust sinner whole sicke haue neede physician verie true charitie euerlasting felicitie onlie hope soule haue mercie vpon blot misdeed thee doth hart expect desire fulfill lust longing thou hast put euen thou wouldest thine christ forsake vnmeete stranger let thy right hand alwaie preuent defend euill come lord whome wretch haue sore offended forgiue forget mine offence thou hast shead thine owne pretious hart bloud come sweet lord giue meate eternall health come vnspotted sacrifice deliuer euerlasting death come thou physician weake diseased come thou food hungrie come lord visit house dedicated remaine thee enioie happinesse thou hast prepared v thy sonne full fruition whereof thou hast deferred rising vp againe dead strengthen v lord blessed hope resurrection according thy promise thou maist make v like thine angel heauen glorious estate iesus christ lord thee holie ghost honour praise euer amen another sonne god lord sauiour christ delightest bankets whereby men approch companie thy celestiall welfare beseech thee conuert v lord shall conuerted graunt marie magdalen casting selues thy feete may earnestlie teares bewaile offence againe lifting vp hand vnto thee may laie hold thee embrace thee kisse thou v thine holie kisse thy spirit powred v stirre vp v new life may annoint thee true confessing thy goodnesse delight thee sweet sauour true inuocation new obedience grant also life may worship thy foot bring tidings peace forasmuch last age world messenger peace vitterlie weepe assist v may touched misery thy church studie power mitigate made member companie vnto whome thou hast forgiuen much againe entirelie doth loue thee againe called vale teares may come thy heauenlie banket shall without teares without grudging without greefe sinne offence house thy father manie ample dwelling place amen another praier said little receiue bread god art rich mercie good thing plentifull giuer bountifull bestower deinties celestiall satietie heauenlie repast giue meate soule wearie faint lusteth conuenient lo poore wretch come vnto thee art rich sinner vnto thee art mercifull let returne home contemned despised nothing begin hungred let leaue fasting come vnto thee though famished let go awaie vnfed although eate sigh sorowe yet good lord beseech thee giue mee somewhat eate behold godlie heroicall matrone canaan matth verse come vnto thee saie lord helpe according thy promise feele burthen thy displeasure euen misery vncleannesse suffer sight mine owne vnwoorthinesse withdrawe thee make sweetlie reuerentlie reason thee thy holie spirit enforced good woman doo like word vnwoorthie giltie vncleane dog outcast thy house court haue barked glorious maiestie thee thine eternall father defiled filth idolatrie fowlenesse life spot disobedience thee haue mercie vpon sonne god appearedst flesh becamest worme wash v sinnes vncleane beast haue mercie vpon lord haue mercie vpon behold vnto thee euen little whelpe nigh famished lacke meate drinke wearied seeking releefe almost dead fall downe thy glorious table sweet ypocrasse pretious nectar immortalitie tasted father prophet confessor virgin excellent light thy church sit alreadie thine heauenlie table feede vpon meate eternall glorie suffer eate crums thou art bread life repell hunger satisfie desire thy presence fill thy comfort spirituall deinties make faith strong beleeue thy word promise made holie thou art holie may holilie taste see sweet thou art life inchoation life come perfectlie pleasantlie perpetuallie enioie thy heauenlie table father giue v daie dailie bread may walke strength thereof daie night vntill come thy holie hill horeb sweet lord let feed vpon thee life enter soule sweet loue louing sweetnesse let bellie eate thee soule refreshed thee heauenlie bridegrome thou art bread fountaine life yea thing indeede whereby righteous liue loue thee thee doo couet loue woorship whome shall dwell reigne blessed upon thee doo call soule thou preparest receiue thee desire thou breathest come therefore purger sinnes thou art curer wound strength feeble comforter sorowfull worship honour liue onelie health dead come saie blessed trinitie enter soule come beseech thee haue mercie vpon make meete thee thou maist possesse thou hast made redeemed sanctified preserued may haue thee seale vpon hart giue thy selfe god god restore thy selfe vnto nothing else suffice thy seruant mercifullie graunt vnto according multitude thy great mercy basenesse may please thy maiestie vilenesse thine almightie power sweet christ charitie god dulcet honie snowie milke foode angel make growe thee may eate thee sauorie taste make ouercome enimie saluation thou maist vouchsafe giue according thy promise eate tree life middest paradise god manna hid may one daie called vnto lambes supper eate bread thy table kingdome god among blessed one deere god praie thee let mind thus kindeled loue thee flie euen till come beautie thy celestiall house throne thy glorie let fed dining table heauenlie citizen place full feeding plentifull running streames pleasant pasture behold lord stand doore knocke beseech thee bowel thy mercie wherewith thou daiespring high hast visited v open hand thy pitie wretch knocketh vouchsafe mercifullie bid enter thee may rest thee dwell thee sup thee thou may refreshed full thee art liuing sweet whitebread heauenlie repast wherewith fed strength come perfectlie vnto againe may ascend vnto high thing neuer hencefoorth hunger thirst anie greatlie vanity ye receiue bread lift vp hart eies vnto god heauen saie father hartilie thanke thee hast giuen thine onlie begotten son take vpon naturall bodie bodie offered thee vpon altar crosse health welth saluation sinner whose sake father beseech thee haue mercie vpon remembrance whose bitter death painfull passion possible thanks thy benefit brieflie comprised therein trembling feare receiue holie bread feed therby soule christ blessed bodie giuen onelie faith mine euerlasting comfort saluation thine eternall glorie amen thus heauenlie father blessed god render vnto thee hartie thanks thy benefit thou hast shewed vnto wretched sinner especiallie sweet smelling sacrifice thine onlie begotten sonne offered vnto thee altar crosse giuing pure vndefiled bodie vnto death redemption mankind remebrance wherof according thy welbeloued sonnes ordinance receiue holie bread intirelie beseeching thee may partaker merit thy deere sonnes bodie breaking also lead life woorthie great benefit vnto glorie thy name amen see wine behold corporall eies christ saith wine lift vp soule vnto christ heauen whose bloud alwaie fresh liuelie father sprinkle quicken thee praie saieng lord iesu christ sonne liuing god vpon crosse thy hand spred abroad redemption mankind diddest drinke bitter cup thy passion beseech thee vouchsafe drawe mouth soule thirsteth thee vnto high flouds flowing streames thine eternall abundance satietie yea drawe wholie vnto thy selfe art liuing well intent may according capacitie drinke wherevpon doo liue god life thou didst saie thy holie blessed mouth anie man thirst let come vnto drinke well life grant vnto thirstie soule alwaie drinke thee according thy holie true promise water life may flowe bellie well life replenish fill mind full riuer thy pleasure make hart drunken thy loue maner drunken wine forget thing saue cup may forget vaine earthlie thing continuallie haue nothing else remembrance thee onelie thy bitter death thy painfull passion pretious bloudshedding come praie thee hart make drunken abundance thy plentifulnesse may forget temporall thing make saie throughlie drunken thy cup may forget euen selfe vtterlie renounce mine owne vngodlinesse sinne christ art euerlasting suffisance shalt giuen hungrie thirstie refresh v continuallie exquisite well furnished banket thy blessed sacrament make v drinke plentiouslie holie cup thy blessed spirit grace let inspiration thy sweet spirit succeed like spring water let perpetuall food wanting weakenesse wherewith feed replenish v let taste pleasant riuers holie ghost may refreshed soule may cooled sweet liquor thereof burne hencefoorth iniquitie lust sinne make quaffe hartilie cup thankesgiuing yea let bowel filled pleasant wine thy loue refresh continuallie sweet riuers thy heauenlie consolation thou art life whereby liue hope sticke vnto glorie desire giue vnderstanding cheere vp loue lift thou vp soule drawe mouth spirit thirsteth thee vp water streames aboue uouchsafe sweet iesu midst monings sore complaint deepe sigh hart take vp sad sorowfull mind top high mountain euen bed sweet spice putting place pasture riuers sweet water thou preparest table diuerselie furnished thy friend come refresh mine appalled spirit cheere vp heauie hart make merie deinties length well refreshed may forget manifold misery vanity life rest thee art true peace euerlasting passing vnderstanding lord god art sanctifier saint beseech thee consecrate make meete thy dwelling may thy rich spirit eternall deinties enioie princelie palace heauen quaffing verie abundantlie wellspring life thee may excellent benefit thy glorious passion death resurrection light behold praie thanke thee deere father thou didst spare thine onelie deerlie beloued sonne iesus christ shed euen pretious bloud vpon altar crosse wash awaie sinnes remembrance whereof trembling dread drinke vnspeakable giue vnto thee humble thanks namelie shedding pretious blood thy deere sonne iesu christ vertue whereof thy wrath stirred vp wretched sinner pacified ransome paid lawe fulfilled mine made strong true faith pretious blood thy deere sonne lord heauenlie father giue thy holie spirit may rule gouerne hart neuer vnthankfull forgetfull thine exceeding kindnesse traine life according thy blessed whatsoeuer doo speake thinke may vnto glorie thy blessed name health soule iesus christ lord amen haue receiued holie communion giue god thanks saie thanke thee good lord thine infinite goodnesse thou daie hast fed thy blessed bodie bloud sacrament desiring thee meeklie sacrament haue receiued may purgation clensing sin fortitude spiritual strength frailtie sure defence worldlie trouble aduersities purchasing grace pardon medicine life continuall remembrance thy blessed passion waie may conduct stumble may vphold fallen may raise good continuance thy euerlasting glorie may bring order tallage taste hart neuer seeke sweetnesse thee neuer seeke louer thee none comfort beside thee care none delight thee anie honour thine giue mee perfect loue towards thee wherewith may come great merit heauen though spent life day remembrance thy blessed passion gratiouslie deliuer tribulation bodie soule captiuitie anguish peril grant onlie vnto also vnto thine elect chosen christian people heere elsewhere thy holie name sake amen another thanksgiuing communion thanke thee christ lambe god offering thy selfe vpon altar crosse thy father offering sacrifice sweet sauour god sinnes reconcile v vnto certaintie whereof confirmation faith thou hast instituted behalfe holie sacrament supper oft receiue may celebrate thy memorie thankesgiuing remember merit fruit thy passion beseech thee thy bitter death stirre vp mind often receiuing thine ordinance institution may consider bitter death thou didst suffer behalfe great loue draue thee take cruell shamefull death saue v withall continuallie yeeld bound hartie thanks vnto thee like sort answer power vnspeakable good good life carefull obseruation thy commandements may either frailtie flesh anie fault preuented sinne runne vnto thee repentance consideration new eternall couenant touching remission sinnes made v erected vpholden vnto liuelie puissant hope sweet iesu grant fast linked vnto thee holy mysterie may receiue power strength thee beleeuing thy promise wholie addicted therevnto without anie doubting conscience feare trouble may haue perfect consolation suffer separated member thy bodie church whereof thou art head fulfilling graunt abiding thy word kingdome may without fault foundation without sinne conscience walke worthie sacrament forsaking vtterlie renouncing diuell idolatrie vice carnall desire fight soule cannot partaker lord table diuels make also remember sacrament bound doo good vnto others manie graines corne doo make one loafe manie grape make one wine manie yet one loafe one bodie asmuch participate one bread drinke one cup ioine v therefore togither sauiour world common banket band loue may fastened vnto thee head thou didst die v againe may feare suffer giue liues glorie thy name neuer separated thee neither life death make v also hartilie loue one another like true liuelie member thy bodie neede require may giue liues brother suffer concord mind broken receiueth mysterie vnitie keepeth bond peace doth receiue mysterie himselfe testimonie himselfe giue grace therefore leauing aside wrath fiercenesse maliciousnesse enuie may forgiue one another euen thou forgiuest v beare one another better auoiding strife dissention sectes pernicious heresy keepe thine ordinance right vse thy sacrament amongst v euermore good worke diuine ceremonie may alwaies note badge publike profession whereby knowne pagan token loue confession thankefulnesse remoue awaie abuse prophanations holie sacred supper together horrible idolatrous adoration inuented sathan member shamefull deforming thy godlie goodlie institution maintaine humblie beseech thee true vnpolluted vse thereof till thy pleasure returne cloud iudgement great power glorie neuer remembrance last resurrection death appoint v place thine heauenly table may taste new wine kingdome thy father abiding thine elect angel blessed saincts euermore amen meditation trust christian soule ought haue passion lord iesu thanksgiuing vnto god manifold benefit thereof might despaire verelie manifold sinnes negligence without number thy word god made flesh dwelt amongst v neither dare despaire seeing enimies reconciled death thy sonne obedient vnto thee death yea euen shamefull death crosse hath taken awaie handwriting sinnes nailing crosse hath crucified sinne death much reconciled saued hope certitude surenesse trust pretious bloud shead v saluation doo take hartening meanes sitteth right hand god sueth v looke backe carelesse eie trusting whome alreadie risen againe receiued alreadie mounted vp heauen doo sit among angel haue desire come vnto thee hauing mine owne righteousnesse haue thy sonne lord iesu christ mercifull god gentle louer mankind giue thee thanks iesus christ thy sonne lord didst mightilie make v lost sinnes maruellouslie didst deliuer recouer v againe thy goodnesse saie doo giue thanks manifold praise doo shew foorth thee hart mind vnspeakable loue wherewith thou hast vouchsafed thy maruellous goodnesse loue v wretch vnworthie beloued didst send thine onelie begotten sonne thy bosome vnto commonweale saue v sinner time child perdition damnation render vnto thee possible thanks holie incarnation natiuitie blessed virgin marie mother vpon vouchsafe take flesh v saluation intent like verie god god might verie man man giue thee condigne thanks passion crosse death resurrection ascension heauen seate maiestie thy right hand giue thee thanks saie sacred shedding foorth pretious bloud wherewith redeemed also holie quickening sacrifice blessed bodie bloud daie dailie thy church feed drinke wherewith also washed cleansed sanctified made partaker onelie high diuinitie finallie giue thee thanks maruellous vnspeakable charitie loue wherewith thou didst loue v vnwoorthie person didst saue v thine onelie beloued sonne thou didst loue world thou gauest thine onlie begotten sonne intent none trulie beleeue shuld perish haue euerlasting life thing verilie euerlasting life knowe thee also iesus christ thou hast sent verie god vpright faith work woorthie faith wherefore hart mouth doo confesse praise blesse thee god father vnbegotten thee god sonne onlie begotten also thee holie ghost comforter thee blessed trinitie glorie praise thanks togither power dominion might world world euer amen meditation vsed receiuing holie communion stirre v vp consideration knowledge great benefit giue god thanks therefore gratefull goodnesse blesse lord soule mine entrailes laud holie name forget soule infinite mercy continuall benefit receiued liberall hand amongst well maist thou reckon hath daie giuen thee infinite maiestie vouchsafe visite thee enter thy homelie habitation surpassing clemencie wholie giue himselfe thee maruellous sacrament thou incomprehensible god lesse pitifull puissant shall saie seeing depth thy bottomlesse mercy hath vouchsafed impart selfe depth mine vnspekable misery thanks yeeld thee great kindnesse loue wot right well member muscle bodie turned tongue yet could condignelie thanke thee least thy benefit much lesse able shall one tongue laud thanke thee present gift great inestimable value elizabeth mother forerunner saint iohn baptist visited sacred virgin marie thy mother perceiued thy presence illuminated holie ghost astonished thereat cried alowd said whence haue mother lord dooth come much iustlie astonished crie whence haue onlie sonne blessed virgin euen lord himselfe lord angel heauen earth creature world hath visited entred honoured fostered filled woorthie sacrament whence haue lord high puissant woorthie worship hath vouchsafed come vnto mee wretched worme heinous sinner sinner haue manie time offended lewdnesse abhominations haue oft banished expelled woorthilie holie prophet iob dauid woonder thy diuine clemencie time said man thou magnifiest sonne man thus thou visitest much greater reason haue wretched caitifs saie day man thou hast thus extolled man make thy selfe man giue thy selfe foode man wherewith may euerie daie visited refreshed albeit men may maruell thy diuine clemencie vsed towards man much yet may maruell men basest vnwoorthiest dauid king saule would haue chosen sonne lawe reputed himselfe vnwoorthie said life father linage sonne lawe king much cause haue saie seeing king king hath admitted mee high dignitie father offspring vessell corruption sacke doong filth ingendred vile stinking matter touching flesh ere long shall yeeld food woormes concerning soule soiled sinne fraught ignorance forgetfulnesse manie mo defect wicked inclination life vanitie puffe wind smoke shadowe quicklie vanisheth confusion disorder continuall exercise sinne transgression thy commandements hath life mine exercise mine inclination beene also father adam offspring ancient familie sith descend generallie borne thus blemished thus bent like child traitour adiudged suffer death wherefore puissant prince dreadfull king aboue king thou knowing life haue much woorse either knowe imagine hast vouchsafed receiue sonne lawe thine owne child yoonger one right tenderlie beloued father accustomed cherish thou hast cherished fed angel bread wherein found sauour diuine delight luke reporteth one ghests table thee prince pharisies house saie blessed shall eate bread life kingdome heauen much happie knowe gather fruit life rate bread wherein selfesame god spirituallie faith conteined therewith receiue pledge eate euerlasting kingdome happie eke shall dispose themselues repaire gratious banket wherein found sweet tasts sauours rich renowme thing happilie desired yea man may long offered desire delight pleasure sincerest choisest sweetest wish wealth behold treasure inricheth heauen earth state souereigntie sought behold highest dignity possiblie atchieued sith meanes venerable sacrament soule vnited god resteth associated reuerenced quire angel assist wherefore ye blind beguiled child adam pleasure profit doo prowle doo esaie saith spend monie vpon bread imploie trauell may satiate content loose satietie sweetnesse treasure conteined gift doo thou soule doo thou thou henceforth anie blind see thou seeke anie carnall contentations hauing meanes partaker meere spirituall celestiall delight take taste pleasure food death whereof thou earst didst feed hauing bread life giuen granted vnto thee regard pomp vaine vanity world seeing thou maiest enioie sacrament true happinesse good thing world cannot possiblie atteined imbrace keepe treasure sufficeth make thee trulie happie possesse good exceedeth good content quiet thy selfe repose may abundantlie satiate thy desire ingratefull thy benefactor yeeld hartie thanks well benefit heretofore beginning bestowed vpon thee howbeit gratious mercifull lord yeeld thee woorthie thanks debt owe thee great mine abilitie discharge small hart might power thanke thine infinite liberalitie hauing created thine owne likenesse similitude hauing conseruation created likewise great varietie creature much doo laud blesse thee thy pretious death bloudshed thou hast redeemed ye lord doo bowel power body soule thanke thee blesse thee adore thee hauing left v auenlie woorthie sacrament giuing miserable wretch grace eftsoons receiue eftsoones may thereby made partaker fruit thy redemption bicause thanks praise slender weake vnwoorthie gift haue receiued beseech thy sweet sonne iesus christ supplie want vouchsafe sound perpetuall peales praise euerlastinglie adore thee mee reuerence thee offer continuall sacrifice thanksgiuing yet doo finite correspondent value benefit haue daie receiued infinite holie gratefull thanks thou lord iesu gauest thy father minding grant v inestunable gift euen infinite doo offer thee together verelie beleeue cause didst thou yeeld incomparable gift destitute condigne grace thanks doo humblie beseech thee thy bonntifull clemencie seeing hath pleased thee satiate honour thy worthie presence venerable redoubted sacrament thou wilt also vouchsafe grant thy grace alwaies gratefull answere woorthilie happie visitation hath alwaies beene thy woont sauiour redeemer thy goodnes thou hast vouchsafed enter hast thou departed thy blessing abundantlie heaping grace vpon grace mercie vpon mercie thou enteredst matthew publican house publican thou madest thy disciple apostle thou enteredst zacheus house changed old custome health giuen houshold thou enteredst sunon peter house drauest awaie ague wiues mother leauing hir whole comforted eft soones didst thou enter martha good marie magdalen house tongue tell spirituall rich thou gauest house ineffable grace thou endowedst two sister finallie figure sacrament wit arke old testament entred obed edoms house cause thy blessing powred vpon paieng plentifullie harborough house offered thee wherefore sweet welcome ghest seeing thy goodnesse thou hast vouchsafed daie enter poore cottage send downe withall thy holie blessing thereon meanes whereof may woorthilie answer vnto thine incomparable mercie cleanse fine house lord filth thou seest repaire doo cost least decaie fall ruine driue darkenesse glistering beames thy light adorne decke vp vertues grace holie ghost thus cleansed repaired adorned illuminated may please thee dwell therein neuer depart tarrie still lord comforter night draweth nigh without thee shall remaine darkenesse sore endangered therefore saie tarrie thou still depart lodging thou hast affirmed eternall truth thy whole delight dwell child men thou standest knocking doore ready euter sup shall open let thee behold haue giuen thee free entrance thou thy goodnesse hast admitted sweet supper thy sacred bodie abandon therfore souereigne lord ne depart thou drawe thee knit tie fast thee yea drawe quite selfe sith much better thee thee liue die thee remaine firme constant decaie come naught renew therefore sanctifier loue transforme thee grant liue thee onlie liue thee onlie loue thee onlie delight thee thou mine onlie ioie mine onlie comfort mine onlie foode wherewith soule may sort refreshed meat seeme loathsome vnsauorie onlie haue chosen onlie shall suffice alone liue contented satisfied happie vntill desired daie come shall feed thee another forme enioie thee continuallie companie elect blessed saincts celestiall court father holie ghost thou liuest reignest euerlastinglie amen another fruitfull meditation christian soule exhorting thankefulnesse newnesse life holie conuersation deepe consideration great benefit christ receiued sacrament read receiuing holie communion church time serue home especiallie easter daie thou maist doubt soule great wealth felicitie wrought thee holie mystery christ whereof thou hast beene partaker glorious death resurrection let v little refresh selues contemplation thereof chaw cud calling often remembrance taking great delite sweet taste thereof may lesse feele perceiue bitternesse miserable life go therefore soule call mind saie wee therefore thou hast receiued thine owne possession euerlasting veritie euen lord sauiour iesus christ confirme thy conscience truth matter thou hast receiued true faith repentance hart thou hast receiued purpose amendment life thou hast receiued euerlasting gage pledge thy saluation thou hast receiued bodie broken blood shed remission thy sinnes thou hast receiued bodie haue within thee father sonne holie ghost dwell thee indue thee grace strengthen thee thine enimies helpe thy weaknesse possesse thee peace gladnesse make thee thankfull thy redeemer carefull lead godlie conuersation comfort thee presence weale wo thou hast receiued bodie saie indue thee euerlasting righteousnesse assure thee perpetuall blisse life eternall christ true faith art thou soule quickened againe death sin life grace hope translated corporall euerlasting death euerlasting life glorie heauen hencefoorth thy conuersation indeed thy hart desire alwaie fixed set doubt therfore soule truth matter great high euer mystery thing becommeth thy god doo little deed impossible euer seeme thee praie god hartilie thou maist haue faith perceiue great mystery faith thou maist certeinlie knowe beleeue nothing impossible god onelie bring thou faith saie christ holie word sacrament thou shalt well feele perceiue benefit christ conteined therein thy comfort let thy repentance shew thy faith also let thy purpose amendement obedience thy hart god lawe hereafter declare thy true beleefe endeuour thy selfe soule saie paule hencefoorth conuersation heauen whence looke sauiour euen lord iesus christ shall change vile body may made fashioned like glorious bodie shall doo power whereby rose againe death wherby shall able subdue thing vnto himselfe else shall auaile thee soule bee escaped deliuered filthinesse world knowledge thy lord sauiour iesus christ thou intangled againe therewith thereby ouercome againe certeinlie beene better neuer haue knowne waie righteousnesse knowne receiued turne backward againe holie righteous commandements god giuen vnto thee shall prouerbe verified thee said dog returned vomit againe sow washed hir wallowing mire againe oh shame thee soule thus cleerelie freelie washed thy sinnes returne filthinesse thereof againe great follie thus indued righteousnesse loose againe yea wilfull madnesse loose inheritance thou art set vile transitorie pleasure sinne finallie vnnaturall vnkindnesse thy sauiour christ meere mercie come thee dwell within thee thy ghest driue thee banish violentlie thee stead whome grace vertue receiue vngratious spirit diuell founder vnrighteousnesse naughtinesse mischiefe oh soule canst thou find thy hart saie shew extreame vnkindnes christ iesus hath gentlie called thee mercie offered giuen himselfe vnto thee entred thee yea darest thou bold renounce presence father sonne holie ghost one god whole maiestie together power wisedome goodnesse fearest thou danger perill traiterous defiance departure soule aduise thy selfe well thou dooest consider dignitie thou art set thou art therfore cleansed washed sanctified renewed thou shouldest hencefoorth sinne serue god true holinesse righteousnesse day thy life end thou maist reigne euerlasting life thou refuse great grace whereto thou art called thing dooest thou heape vp thy damnation prouoke god cast heauie displeasure vpon thee iust plague reuenge thy mockage holie sacrament great abusing verie warie well aduised therefore saie soule hencefoorth thou dooest behaue thy selfe let follie loose thing grace hath pretiouslie offered purchased let wilfulnesse blindnesse put great light shewed vnto thee applie thy selfe liue christ christ may still liue thee whose fauour assistance thou haue hast thou euerlasting life alreadie within thee nothing hurt thee whatsoeuer hitherto done amisse committed christ thou seest hath offered thee pardon cleerelie receiued thee fauour againe full suretie whereof thou hast presentlie inhabiting dwelling within thee onlie take good hart vnto thee shew thy selfe thankefull thy life determine thy selfe refuse auoid detest abhorre thing thy conuersation offend eies mercie endeuour thy selfe saie soule waie rise vp againe waie thou hast fallen pit sinke sin thy tong thou hast offended thereby rise againe glorifie god therewithall accustome laud praise name god thou hast therewith dishonoured thou hast hurt good name thy neighbour otherwise hindered intend restore againe without restitution god accepteth thy confession yet thy repentance ynough forsake euill except thou set thy courage doo good occasion soeuer therfore thou hast offended saie turne occasion vnto honouring god profiting thy neighbour true soule sin strong affection vnrulie yea hard subdue resist thy nature corrupt leauened sowre bitternesse poison thou receiuedst inheritance thine old father adam yet neuerthelesse good cheere christ thy sauiour hath ouercome world enimies thee sin shall haue power ouer thee thou art vnder grace though thy power weake yet christ risen againe strengthen thee battell holie spirit shall helpe thine infirmity full trust therefore confidence soule take good hart vnto thee saie good courage lord put vpon thee holie armour god thou maist stand fast enimies would againe assault subdue thee bring thee againe thraldome slauerie bondage remember soule thou art brought thy vaine conuersation thy freedome purchased neither gold siluer deere price pretious hart bloud innocent immaculate lambe iesus christ euen least soule begin take hand name feare god purge old leauen sinne wickednesse corrupteth sowreth sweetnesse thy life maiestie god thou maist new fresh dough void sowre leauen wickednesse shalt thou shew thy selfe sweet bread god may haue delight thee shalt thou declare thy selfe worthie host ghest christes gift grace haue effect thee thou hast right beleefe knowledge holie mystery receiued thee finallie shalt thou applieng thy faith vertue holie sacrament thy life conuersation conforming fashioning thy selfe example signification meant thereby certaine sure liue life happilie world come dwell christ whome thou hast receiued euerlasting glorie god mercy sake praie thus almightie god mercifull father hast ordeined marriage kept without blame breach end suffering anie put asunder whome thou hast ioined together sanctifie called estate life keepe according hart vpon delighting meete may loue husband child house land owne liues whatsoeuer thou giuest v comfort heere time may keepe still highest degree loue thee spirituall husband question shall betweene thee anie thing else may make losse thing abide perfectlie loue towards thee end whome father holie ghost laud praise euer euer amen solemnization matrimonie fift lampe buriall anie meditate praie followeth lord iesu christ sonne god art giuer eternall life hartilie thanke thee thou art inwardlie touched mercie towards v oppressed temporall euerlasting misery thou hast tasted death thy flesh thou hast touched graue earth wherby sanctified made light godlie keepe etternall death according thy commandement stand bringers minister death euen sinne satan thou pluckest faithfull iawes death bringest new life comfort thy gospell teachest speake sound foorth thy glorie comendest life mother church length death euils subdued thou wilt bring thy kingdome wee humblie beseech thee take mercie vpon thy church miserable day widowe destitute worldlie helpe dependeth onlie vpon thy mercifull aid protection speake vnto hir cheerfull voice saie weepe powre vpon thine true light faith comfort lift v vp mids death confidence thy presence hope eternall life driue awaie gard death teach v set foorth thy truth length let v placed sweet mother saint true countrie happie citie ierusalem shall euermore enioie blessed sight thee thy heauenlie congregation amen another deuout praier burial lord thou art god euer short life alwaies v die come world thee thousand yeeres bee one daie yea least minute houre life passeth awaie dooth dreame euen grasse field greene daie drie morowe thou displeased lost thou chasten shrinke feare thorough sinnes dead vnto thee certes lord thou haue respect sinnes shall continue shew v manie day life may dispend wiselie praise thy name least falselie trusting vpon long life might come vnto death oh good god fraile corrupt worke indeed euen verie dust ash length day flower field man deliuer himselfe death man saue owne soule graue thou onelie lord must doo namelie beleeue thee god haue mercie vpon take mee awaie vnprouided middest day let go graue full age let remember mine end shall depart life depriued euerlasting life let beare alwaies mine eies shortnesse life vanitie thing naught well men themselues thing affaire staie feete lord time slip cruell zeale enuie might haue vngodlie part passe liues quietlie die quietlie beseech thee let thy chosen person discouraged offended thy godlie prouidence ordering worldlie thing shrinke thee reason thereof rather let v remember danger verie deed vngodlie vnhappie conclusion terme close finish happie course againe contrarie part pleasantnesse conscience comfort quietnesse shall followe visit v peace come lead v prisoner prison may reioice thee perfect hart come sauiour thou art longed nation people come shew thy countenance vnto v shall safe come light redeemer god spouse take soule prison may giue praise vnto thy name long shall tossed waues mortalitie crieng vnto thee lord thou hearest lord heare crie vnto thee huge sea bring hauen endlesse blisse happie god conueied sea haue obteined arriue thee safest harborough hauens happie indeed escaped alreadie sea shore banishment home owne countrie prison palace enioieng wished rest blessed alreadie haue gained garland endlesse glorie sought manie tribulation ioie happie mirth euer blessed indeed treble fouretimes blessed alreadie quite rid misery haue atteined kingdome beautifulnesse euerlasting blissefulnesse assured vnappearable glorie ioie endlesse mirth sorowlesse health griefelesse waie without labour light without darknesse life without death happie therefore saie alreadie haue escaped shipwracke present miserable life obteined grace come great ioies heauen ala yet still waues sea longing thee lord hauen sea ierusalem heauenlie countrie quiet countrie looke towards thee ken thee farre wee hale thee sea sigh vnto thee vale miserie labour teares may anie meanes attaine vnto thee christ god onlie hope mankind refuge strength whose brightnesse inlighteneth eies farre beames seastarre dooth mistie darknesse stormie sea guide v vnto thee hauen lord gouerne ship thy right hand helme thy crosse wee perish waues tempest water drowne v deepe swalowe v vp hooke thy crosse plucke v backe vast sea vnto thee onlie comfort see waiting v farre morningstarre daiesunne righteousnesse maner weeping eies vpon shore heauenlie countrie behold thou hast ransomed doo crie vnto thee yea euen yet thy banished exile thou hast redeemed thy pretious bloud doo crie vnto thee heare v god sauiour hope end earth sea farre conuersant troublesome sea thou standing vpon shore lookest peril oh saue v thy name sake perish lord grant v keepe course betweene scylla charybdis hold thee may escape danger come safe land without losse ship fraight amen another meditation happinesse good soule hence departing burial happie soule departing earthly bodie goeth directlie heauen secure quiet feareth neither enimie death enioieth continuallie thy presence god vncessantlie beholdeth glorious lord whome hath serued loued length full ioifullie gloriouslie hath attained vnto glorie great blessednesse neither time shall diminish anie wicked person take awaie daughter zion haue seene hir counted hir blessed euen queenes concubine haue praised hir saieng commeth vp desert abounding pleasure leaning vpon hir welbeloued looketh foorth morning faire moone pure sunne terrible armie banner cheerefullie goeth hastneth runneth amazed shee heareth hir beloued saieng vnto hir wise arise loue faire one come awaie behold winter past raine changed gone awaie flouds appeere earth time singing bird come voice turtle heard land figtree hath brought foorth hir yong fig vine small grape haue cast sauour arise loue faire one come awaie doue art hole rocke secret place staires shew thy sight let heare thy voice thy voice sweet thy sight comelie come awaie chosen faire one doue mine vnspotted one spouse come awaie put thee bedchamber haue longed thy beautie come awaie thou maist triumph presence mine angel whose companie haue promised thee manie peril labour come awaie enter thy maisters ioie man shall take thee amen another may vsed saincts daie oh happie thy saincts christ haue passed ouer sea mortalitie attained vnto hauen perpetuall quietnesse securitie peace rest alwaie ioifull merrie wherfore thy tender loue beseech thee christ art without care thy selfe carefull v needest care incorruptible glorie haue thou consideration manifold misery god hast chosen people thy selfe endued glorie making immortall thine immortalitie ioifull thy blessed sight beseech thee thou alwaies mindfull v helpe v yet salt sea life tossed surge v thou goodlie gate art raised maruellous highnesse helpe v vile pauement lieng much beneath thee giue v thine hand raise vp lie vpon ground waxing strong weakenesse may made couragious battell make thou intercession v continuallie vncessantlie praie v wretch negligent sinner thy praiers may conioined holie companie saincts otherwise shall neuer saued ala verie fraile weakelings courage creature giuen seruice bellie flesh hauing v almost sparkle vertue yet placed vnder thy confession christ borne wood crosse great wide sea thing creeping innumerable small beast great wherein cruell dragon alwaie prepared deuour v wherein dangerous rock scylla charybdis like innumerable thing whereby heedlesse wauering faith make shipwracke wherefore christ praie v good christ praie thou saie v thy good praiers merit may deserue ship merchandise saued attaine vnto port perpetuall saluation quietnesse peace securitie neuer shall haue end amen seruice common praier ended praie thus iesu christ verie true aaron onlie high bishop soule thine name art gone vp holie place bearest name lord vpon thy shoulder continuall remembrance forsomuch offering sacrifice cannot perfect frailtie fault imperfection shall found therein thy sight vouchsafe beseech thee holiest holy perfect high priest mercie beare iniquity publike praiers common sacrifice thy people one accord thy grace haue heere time made offered vnto god father thy name pardon pardon dulnesse coldnesse deuotion let oblation alwaies vpon thy forehead cause burnt offering presented accepted sweet sauour rest lord god thy onelie mediation pacified sinnes pardoned gratiouslie reconciled sanctified may woorthie often haue accesse thy mercieseate woorship thee thy holie temple thy seruants go peace glorifie thee holie obedience thy word doo vnto poore much else thus almightie god hast giuen v grace time one accord make common supplication vnto thee dooest promise two three gathered togither thy name thou wilt grant request fulfill lord desire petition thy seruants may expedient granting v world knowledge thy truth world come life euerlasting amen people arise depart church saie thus thy selfe rise vp lord arise let thine enimies scattered yea let hate thee prophane thine honour flee thee gather saincts togither continuallie let neuer depart thy church soone church dore saie blessed bee glorie lord place going homeward church meditate praie followeth christ whose home heauen whose house place ioies eternall thanke thee thy great mercy shewed towards especiallie vouchsafing mee yet time repent liue godlie grant also beseech thee trulie humbled thee daie may good life declare haue come church vaine penitent publicane may returne home house vnder thy protection imbettered iustified god man holie obedience glorifie thee home abroade life death amen another behold lord praie thee poore seelie woorme creeping walking bodilie earth time life pilgrimage passage home make mindfull mine euerlasting home desirous returne house liuing hauing mine affection inflamed thy holie spirit may vtterlie contemne earthlie thing couet euermore present thee conuersatoin may heauen whither grant mee length come long home thy child partaker thy glorie reioice thy child bicause euerlasting home great glorie thereof knowe lord mine earthlie house tabernacle bodie destroied haue building thee euen habitation made hand eternall heauen sigh desiring clothed house heauen mortalitie might swalowed vp life bicause knowe long home bodie absent thee therefore rather absent bodie present thee lord neuerthelesse whether home home good comfort alwaies good cheere thee beseeching thee mercie grant grace endeuour selfe walke faith thy feare inward appearance shall appeare iudgementseate christ euerie one receiue work bodie according hath done whether good bad may found accepted vnto thee amen enter house praie thy fauour grace god guide enter materiall house home beseeching thy mercie blesse preserue comming going euer thy peace god passeth vnderstanding may euermore therin neuer turne back deformedlie scattered abroad thee vntill thou bring home painfull pilgrimage whereas first fruit spirit come home praie lord blesse v make house church thy saint linked one confession religion thee made one mind house may deuout galilean praise thee thy benefit euer lord fashion conforme thy holie spirit house peregrination herein enioieng benefit perfect peace seemelie quietnesse comlie order may make thy mystery song vntill shall please thee lead vpward vnto peace thy child euen thy holie house mansion place thou hast placed v shall desire nothing else tarrie remaine euer whilest clad bodie doo go astraie stranger vnto thee neither haue anie abiding place euer must seeke one come thou bring v camest thence redeeme v iesus christ righteous father holie ghost possible praise endlesse glorie euer amen praiers meate sundaie almightie god mercifull father hast taught v outward thing defile man proceede hart grant v esteeme cleane thou pronouncest cleane praier thankesgiuing vse thy creature made benefit may sanctified vnto v part abhorre pollusion sinne onelie thou declarest common vncleane wee may auoid thy grace murder adultries theft falsewitnessebearing vnlawfull desire concupiscence whatsoeuer thou hast forbidden touching dutie towards men seruice obedience vnto thee thus sanctified thy grace may alwaies haue free accesse vnto thy sanctuarie life receiued heauenlie ierusalem canaanite vncleane person shall enter life come iesus christ lord thee holie ghost honour glorie praise euer amen another sonne god thy miraculous multiplieng fish loaues bread didst feed fiue thousand thy people wildernesse inwardlie spirituall comfort outwardlie corporall food thereby shewing thy selfe deed creator susteiner thing beseech thee onelie giuest v breath life knowest need alone canst giue reason maner thou wilt feed v corporall thing thou dooest startes without anie nourishment giue vnto thy church thy wisedome thing necessarie sustentation life wherein ioies life eternall come doo begin albeit somtime lacke diuers thing although thine aduersarie throweth stone v bread yet thy power strengthen v faint liue bread alone owne industrie armed thy word promise spirituall food sword soule may receiue comfort thereby protected thee woonderfull sort liue glorifie thee world come amen another praier meat vsed daie haue receiued holie communion thanke thee eternall housholder banket paradise troubled diuell man thou hast againe thine infinite goodnesse thy sonne prepared sumptuous supper great feast much thy people among tower thy daily iunkets placed togither part world despise thy holie table suffer themselues caried vnto bankets satan vaine pleasure world thou hast vouchsafed call v vnwoorthie wretch lame blind beggerlie last age world number thine elect may filled yea thou compellest lieng high way hedge reason trouble decaie kingdom preaching thy word come participation thy banket humblie beseech thee bring v thine heauenlie table appoint v place therein euermore grant thy sonne bread liuelie wine may drawe nourishment iuice drinesse nature may watered length taste thy supper table euerlasting life drinke new wine thy sonne enioieng visible sight blessed societie thine elect amen begin eate immediatelie blesse saie lord god art sanctifier thy saint euerlasting suffisance shalt giuen hungrie blesse thou heauen thy good creature great benefit thou hast created releeue want thy hungrie child receiued thanksgiuing thy celestiall benediction may healthfull medicine remedie humane nature grant inuocation thy holie name soberlie taking temperatelie thankfullie tasting hereof may therewithall receiue helth bodie safegard soule iesus christ lord amen else praie thus sober vsing meate drinke grant mercifull god long wander wretched world may take meate drinke infirmitie flesh neuer corrupted fine fare wherein flesh delighteth neither yet anie foolish superstition drawne awaie anie time temperance sobrietie let v alwaies remember vse abundance abound thing plentifullie may giue selues moderate abstinence continuallie also may patientlie beare pouertie hunger commeth wee may vse libertie meates drink alwaies glorie thy name lord may eies frugalitie may appeare life may continuallie seeke satietie fulnesse whereby shall satiate euer abundantlie glorie thy countenance shall appeere vnto v heauens iesus christ lord amen take salt meditate little selfe saie euerie man shall salted fire euerie sacrifice shall seasoned salt salt good salt vnsauourie wherewith shall seasoned god giue v grace haue salt selues haue peace one another let communication well sauoured powdered salt saie seasoned godlie wisedome knowing speake talke may tend glorie thy name edifieng owne soules iesus christ lord amen meale time let one child seruants best reade caution following chapter portion scripture distinctlie reuerentlie boord may giue diligent eare therevnto caution remembrance said child meate time remember meates drinkes heere set giuen god vse abuse surfeting dronkennesse remember giuen profit body hurt soules remember giuen alone vnto others also need liberalitie almes releefe eating drinking remember doo feed woormes pamper carcasse ouercharge soule yee surfet taking much midst mirth abundance remember poore prisoner sicke affliction ioseph persecuted member though yee case finallie remember food soules christ bodie broken bloud shead desire meate saie lasteth euer labour harken diligentlie word shall read vnto first let v praie praier said child seruant meale time reading chapter bible lord hast prouided earthlie creature feeding mortall body direct v carefullie seeke delight tast thy holie word may immortall seed begotten thy child thereby nourished fed vntill become perfect men thy sonne christ iesus else thus blessed lord hast onlie created thing man sustenance also hast caused holie scripture written learning grant v conuersant among thy gift purelie holilie thou art may sort also reade thy word heare marke learne inwardlie digest heauenlie food soules well refreshed vertuouslie transformed bodie soule may holilie walke strength thereof glorifie thee iesus christ lord amen chapter read saie thus blessed heare word god keepe grant therefore beseech thee lord may onlie reader hearer thy word dooers follower also beeing fed nourished thy hand soule bodie may heere bee apt readie doo good work thou hast prepared v walke life come receiued thine eternall kingdome glorie iesus christ lord amen another thanksgiuing receiuing bodilie sustenance reading part god holie word spirituall food lord god onlie giuer good gift thy great mercy hast made v partaker heauenlie gift thy holie word feed mind thine earthlie creature necessarie sustenance weake body grant beseech thee thy grace thy gift may made perfect vnto v giue strength vnto meate may healthfull nourishment breed v anie carnall desire vaine life enable body good work time present pilgrimage thy good creature may good releefe long thou wilt much thou knowest expedient v thy seruants finish day thou hast numbred edifieng thy saincts glorifieng thy holie name lord knowe nothing selues ignorant hart full darkenesse therefore beseech thee thy word thine eternall wisdome haue read wherein haue conference may mind burning lampe shining light thine onlie truth hart soules fruitefull seed new birth thine owne image may happilie againe restaured v may bee made thee holie righteous people inward working thy gratious spirit dailie strengthening hart earnest loue thy truth carefull obedience thy commandements iesus christ onlie mediator sacrifice owne bodie hath purchased vnto v thy fauour hath giuen v boldnesse call vpon thee vnto whome father thee holie ghost bee honour glorie world without end amen another praier meate lord daie sanctified thy name eternall father thy sonne iesus christ lord dooest euermore protect prouide thy church spirituall corporall blessing bestowing liberallie vpon v good thing asked according thy lift vp thine eies christ behold thy miserable people depend altogither vpon thy prouision acknowledge selues fed defended miraculouslie thee assist v also may withdrawe eies consultation flesh bloud looke vpon thee lord whose blessing eate store selues albeit worldlie help faile yet bee thou firie wall still v feed defend thy saincts feelds comfort vntill thou begin ioifull passouer euerlasting sabboth bring v wildernesse sea penurie court ioie wealth satietie euerlasting welfare meane make v thankfull benefit enioie let v gather vp remnant fragment cast thy sumptuous rich banket vnto v preserue basket blesse store euen art schooles learning thy doctrine may spread abroade world make v onlie honour thee thy corporall benefit much giuing thy selfe vnto v art bread life thou king defending v life power sathan feed v thy heauenlie bread may nourish v eternall life happinesse amen another praier meate daie haue receiued holie communion seeing thy free grace mercie almightie god thou hast made v partaker daie thy rich spirituall corporall thing christ iesu selues vnwoorthie haue gathered crumb vnder thy table make v mindfull great mercy continuallie thankefull thee manifold benefit walke woorthie honour dignitie thou hast done vnto v may receiue full accomplishment thy loue towards v life come lord sauiour iesus christ thee holie ghost honour glorie world without end amen another thanksgiuing vnto god food read meditated vpon meate thanke thee king glorie lord heauen earth thou hast youth present houre maruellouslie nourished v giuing v meate drinke cloathing thing perteining sustentation present life naked bare came mother womb wee brought nothing world whatsoeuer haue thou gauest yea afore borne mother wombe didst thou ordeine thing necessarie life sufferedst v enioie thing aboundantlie alwaie thou hast care v father vseth child neither art thou ignorant stand need continuallie thy blessing dailie destitute new releefe thou giuest thy woonted vnspeakable goodnesse acknowledge whatsoeuer haue possesse thy gift confesse thee fountaine good thing perceiue thy fatherlie goodnesse spread onlie ouer mankind also ouer liuing creature thou giuest meate flesh thou giuest fodder cattell feedest yoong rauens call vpon thee corporall good distributed among men chance without thy prouidence neither atteined onlie industrie power man thou giuest gather thou openest thy hand liuing creature filled thy blessing without thee endeuours vaine thou blesse labour doo eate wind receiue profit great thy mercie lord disdainest prouide sinfull flesh lord god great thy woonderous work thou hast done v much thought comprehend muchlesse word expresse would report vtter found could recite notwithstanding thine infinite benefit comprehended mortall man yet surcease set foorth thy praise hide thy goodnesse sonnes men declare speake thy truth one generation another blessed art thou god euer euer either aboue heauens earth beneath thine thing come thee thine hand receiue whatsoeuer possesse thing thy meere mercie without merit woorthinesse therefore magnifie lord doth mightie thing corner earth dooth nourish v mother womb giueth v good thing grant v likewise quietnesse mind peace time thy grace may abound toward v continue defend v liue almightie mercifull father thy breath take life thy blessing doth abide v thee liue moue haue man liueth bread onlie owne wisedome forecast neither art thou bound fatall chaine second cause thy decree enioie life thing created thy becke doo continue thou thinkest good giue v onlie store thing necessitie life grant also meate drinke vertue power releeue strengthen body thou alone vpholdest thing thy word power unlesse thou dailie didst feed v hidden grace thou dooest inspire bread feed v heapes yeerelie increase small purpose aboundance wheate wine thing yet vnlesse watered thy blessing quicklie would come naught perish lacke food aboundance substance possesse without thou prosper fructifie thy blessing albeit feed bread yet ascribe life vertue bread neither thy power tied bread man life included within altogither dependeth vpon thy good pleasure beseech thee thy large bountifull liberalitie cast v time old age strength faileth v forsake v likewise confirme faith distrust thy promise neither driuen thee anie meanes seeme neuer contrarie naturall cause giue grace may withdrawe eies worldlie consultation touching food necessary life may wholie depend vpon thee time go beyond limit thou hast prepared lord iesus christ liueth reigneth thee euermore amen noonetide middaie saie thus lord light inlightning welfare whence true brightnesse light doth come grant beseech thee thy goodnesse thou hast giuen thus plentifullie corporall light compasse bodie euerie side thy mercie giue aboundantlie spirituall light thy grace knowledge may inlighten mind cause mine age appeare cleere noone daie lord nothing world perfect glorious full decrease weare awaie euen see course thy glorious creature sunne highest begin drawe downeward graunt also beseech thee age fortie yeeres bodie little little shall begin fade beautie thereof wither drawe towards end togither soule daie iudgement may shine bright sunne highest doth may begin glorified full region celestiall world sunne righteousnesse brightnesse perpetuall charitie felicitie doth euerlastinglie shine inlighten holie companie heauen amen else thus lord let thy fauour preuent v doth sunne highest region spreadeth beames ouer part earth brightnesse therof shineth without cloud sort giue v thy cleerenesse shewe thy bright countenance ouer v lightened thy word wee may walke daie thorough circumspectlie warilie way thy commandements blinded mid daie run headlong darkenesse neither grope noone daie night wandering path thy iudgements open thine eies god ouer v thou vnto v mightie protector daie firmament strength couering heate parching shadow noone tide defender offence assister falling comforter soules lightener mind giuer health happines christ lord amen p meate better keepe vaine exercise idle cogitation spend sabboth daie wholie holilie lord behooueth take occasion god name spirit heauenlie fire drie vp dropsie flesh may loue v bone bone make v one spirit finallie bring v glorious companie eternall sabboth excellencie conceiued hart man meane let v ceasse hurlie burlie toiling drudging vaine trumperie world last may religiouslie halowe keepe godlie rest new sabboth thing allowable pleasant vnto thee sanctifieng thee true rest peace drawe v vaine fantasy present thing may attend await vpon thee thy ioifull comming grant saie may humbled vnder thy mightie hand may knowe infirmity obeie thee cross correction looke vnto thee liuelie faith hope ioifull deliuerance shall perfect thy sonne trumpet shall summon new sabboth drawe vnto high sitteth thy right hand exalted thine elect thine enimies beastlie arrogancie blushed contend fight thee subdued amen another almightie god mercifull heauenlie father sixe day thou haddest created thing didst rest seauenth daie sanctifiedst teach v keepe holie sabboth daie shew cercmonie onlie much euerie good woorke thou hast commanded part fashion sake wholie end thine owne glorie sake wee beseech thee lord heale onlie head limmes also hart soules may lawfull keeping thy sabboth thy commandements obedient greatnesse omnipotencie power able word onlie nothing make althings wonderfull work able comprehended within compasse man reason call also mind vnsearchablenesse diuine wisedome goodlie order continuallie doth conserue thing lastlie let v forget incomparable loue towards v onlie meere goodnesse without anie part ablenesse desert hath prouided thing vse onlie hath moreouer made v capacitie vnderstanding discusse knowe vse seruing necessity diuersitie time occasion requireth let v therefore shew selues vnto vnthankfull nextlie let v call mind sundrie peril well ghostle bodilie hath dooth time time preserue v namelie peril land peril water peril fire peril sicknes imprisonment open shame slander extreme beggerie famine pestilence horrible disease sudden shamefull death sundrie mischiefes may vnderstand haue happened dailie doo perceiue happen vnto others like sort haue happened vnto v mercifull goodnesse beene therefrom preserued herewith let v also call vnto mind health wealth god good gift hath lent vnto v render vnto humble thanks therefore also let v thinke hath made v vile sort condition euen vnto owne likenesse indued pretious gift reason vnderstanding memorie noble gift hath giuen v intent honour accordinglie doo doo abuse worldlie vaine fantasticall delight may assure selues onelie make straight account thereof also greeuouslie punished therefore moreouer let v call mind mercifull like louing maister sauior christ sonne god second person trinitie lord king ouer rule power descended downe bosome father heauenlie throne miserable world tooke vpon fraile flesh suffering space three thirtie yeeres hunger thirst cold watch pouertie euil report hatred disdaine slander rebuke check taunt scornes buffet binding beating whipping wrongfull accusation false condemnation yea last vile spitefull cruell shamefull death innocentlie giltlesse thereby deliuer v gilt eternall death transgression first parent adam iustlie deserued herewith let v also thinke reproch shame v repine grudge suffer like sake sith lord maister singular loue beare vnto v hath suffered sake seruants rather vile slaues respect disdaine repine onelie maister king ouer king hath disdained suffer also let v consider merit bitter passion grace giuen vnto v sacrament baptisme hath forgiuen v cleerelie clensed v vtterlie discharged v former sinnes herevpon let v call mind oft since time haue offended falling againe deadlie sinne therewith let v call remembrance particularitie offence greeuousnesse long haue continued without repentance taken let v weigh abundance great mercie first gratiouslie hath abidden time repentance readie hath beene forgiue v vpon due repentance taken perfect confession without dissimulation made thereof vnto remember also lewdlie wickedlie sinfullie haue bestowed short time god hath world lent vnto v fight warre continuallie mortall aduersaries world flesh diuell trauell without ceassing worke euerlasting destruction bring v euerlasting death beereue v life eternall ioies endlesse thinke also god great mercie gratiouslie spared v life vntill repented wickednes wretched condition extreme torment hell paine beene haue continued euer world without end deere short pleasure vaine delight flesh haue beene vnto v let v also call mind houre death vncerteintie time thereof knowe maner shall like certeine escape wee sure happen depart life deadlie sinne shall onelie die bodilie death also spirituall death eternall death bodie soule let v therefore endeuour selues liue though euerie houre vnto v last houre meanes shall vnreadie suddenlie soeuer death shall steale vpon v yet shall feare coming furthermore let v thinke shall become wretched body vile carcase haue sought meanes pamper whose ease wee haue much procured haue delicatelie nourished haue finelie araied whose vaine pleasure haue much followed doubtlesse shall become abhominable stinking carion deerest friend shall forced turne awaie head stopping nose verie noisomnesse corrupt sauour euill stinch thereof let v also consider shall auaile v possession rich haue sought busilie greedilie heape togither must leaue behind v shall carie awaie nothing v sauing heauie burden conscience part doo vnlawfullie possesse wrongfullie withhold else haue euill gotten let v weigh shall become soule shall leaue bodie rot earth selfe shall called iudgement high iudge shall forced make streight account work word thought shall able conceale nothing verie secret dooings shall made open ashamed confesse shall manifest booke shall opened deed thought shall rehearsed whole companie heauen shall said euerie one v behold man work shall conscience accuse v euill deed witness shall come v diuell shall readie drawe v eternall perdition terriblenesse countenance shall put v horrible feare shall tremble quake desire haue respite amendement former wicked life repent v sinfull liuing wise may bee granted v asmuch mercie must giue place iustice let v therefore god doth lend v time repent time doo vnfeinedlie may assure selues receiue mercie forgiuenesse god asmuch willeth death sinner rather conuert liue let v also weigh selues noble thing soule greeuous hir wound curing sauiour christ necessitie wounded yea beene vnto death death eternall sonne god neuer haue suffered shall lightlie esteeme losse soule vnto may perceiue much compassion shewed great maiestie sith hath shed teares v let v likewise nightlie wash bed copunction hart continuall teares verie heauinesse wee haue greeuouslie offended louing maister sith hath shed pretious bloud v shed also sort saie dailie affliction mortifieng body let v haue regard flesh desireth conuenient soules health shall soules glorious shall returne lord god true repentance penitence let v call remembrance louers world among v long agone become nothing remaineth dust woormes haue beene men solicited vsed kind mirth banketed gorgiouslie apparelled verie pleasant led day worldlie delight suddenlie midst iolitie death arested caried downe hell flesh appointed feede woormes soules euermore tormented vnquenchable flame hell fire find profit fleshlie pleasure worldlie reioicings euill concupiscence short vaine pleasure continuall torment miserie doo endure neuer see light neuer receiue ease paine comfort heauinesse fire continuallie burneth yet neuer consumeth long burning leeseth anie part heate woorms doo gnawe conscience diuels tormentor waxe neuer wearie tormenting take anie pitie intreated mitigate anie part torment nothing shall heard weeping lamentation groning wofull criengs shall sauour smell nothing horrible stinch corrupt aire shall see nothing monstrous shape horible tormentor diuels wherefore let v aduise selues whether folowing vaine worldlie pleasure giue soules like sort eternallie tormented else refusing little time paine shall suffer reioice christ blessed saint heauen euer whilest world god dooth set v fire water saie saluation damnation vnto may stretch hand let v lastlie consider comfort shall saued soules see god brightnesse face liue god possesse god high perfect goodnesse perfect goodnesse highest perfect felicitie chiefe perfect charitie eternall suretie sure eternitie true gladnesse full knowledge beautie blisse sort shall man blessed god whose conscience shall found sinne shall see god owne desire shall possesse pleasure enioie gladnesse shall flourish eternitie shall shine veritie shall ioie righteousnesse shall haue eternitie continuance shall haue facilitie knowledge felicitie rest shall delighted god whose countenance amiable whose face beautifull whose speech pleasant delectable behold sweet possesse pleasant enioie vnderstanding made cleere affection purified may loue knowe wee shall need seeke anie thing besides whole found much
