manifest daie woonderfull worke highest great lord made commanded take course top heauen vnto end thereof ornament heauen glorious starres lord high doth lighten world commandement keepe order faile wearie watch lord god woonderfull thy name world hast set thy glorie aboue heauens mouth babe suckling wilt thou praised thine enimies thou maist confound thine aduersaries enuieth thy renowme see workemanship thy hand moone starres thou hast ordeined signifie thy glorie vnto nation among people declare thy woonderfull thing thou art mightie lord worthie praised great thy vertue thy power woonderfull thanke thee holie father god heauen thou hast created thy word power vniuersall world creature whatsoeuer liueth moueth thy wisdome thou dooest gouerne sending thy spirit yet doest vphold cherish wood fruitfull tree stone graine flower herbes grasse feeld hast thou ordeined vse man wee magnifie thee god wise creating sea spring water power thy word giuing vertue bring foorth fish kind eaten man blesse thee eternall god making superiour lower region aire bird feathered fowles sundrie kind food man glorifie thee giuing whole frame earth creature vnto mankinde setting man ouer work thine hand hast subiected thing vnder foot sheepe ox yea beast feeld fowles aire fish sea walke path sea especiallie praise thee lord maker making v thy creature reasonable men woman according thine owne similitude giuing v reason sens preseruing v hitherto thou didst nourish v woonderfullie within mother wombe thereof hast thou brought v sound part without imperfection yet continuest thy fauour dooest keepe v danger deliuerest v euill thing dooest thou thy fatherlie diuine goodnesse without anie merit desert bound thanke thee praise thee serue honor obeie thee extoll thy sacred name god high separating rest sabboth daie men ceassing handie labour might better serue celebrate thine honour recite power lord declare work number praise man vtter benefit notwithstanding although miserable men wretched sinner therefore vnmeete extoll thee according thy desert yet still praise thee euermore vttermost power declare thy iustice mercie liue remember thy goodnesse time forget thy benefit soules thing hath breath praise lord praise ye lord amen another meditation thanksgiuing creation world mightie wise maruellous lord god nothing hast created heauen earth therein hast prepared due new property euerie worke thou hast brought foorth thy diuine word holie commandement hast ordeined established holie work thy hand yet stand serue vse seruice men course heauens neuer stand still ingendered vnto v euer haue need course also dieth withereth rotteth old bicause old decaied arise vp new fresh course hast thou mightie god made maruellouslie agreeably man thorough agreeable work thine hand without anie externall learning teaching instruction might come knowledge inuisible thee thy holie exalted euerlasting blessed godhead inuisible might insomuch none make himselfe vngiltie inexcusable misbeleefe ignorance farre soeuer departed thy holie word verie heauens giue knowledge inough thy diuine glorie though haue tongue speake neither doo heare anie thing mouth yet neuerthelesse voice gone corner world place men heare voice sounding eares man farre distant feeleth alwaies benefit come heauens also seeth continuallie thy maruellous handie work firmament dooth shew declare vnto v thanke thee praise thee laud magnifie thy glorious name meeke lord thy benefit especiallie thou hast thought inough thee haue giuen v heauens earth therin serue v instruct v also hast vouchsafed send thine onlie deere beloued sonne sauior iesus christ downe amongst v vale teares ascended heauen hast left v thy holie word sent thy holie ghost v intent learne truth thy word might deed behold effectuallie better cleerer thy godhead also praie humbly beseech thee mercifull god thou wilt gouerne v driue awaie v fleshlie conuersation intent may hencefoorth liue godlie ghostlie life flesh may hindered passe pilgrimage perfection thou requirest christian men may knowe discerne vse thy glorie vnmeasurable great good thing thy large bountifull hand hath giuen reached vnto v iesus christ lord amen meditation man creation almightie lord god hast created heauen earth therein naught especiallie hast made man vnto thine owne godlie image infunding creating reasonable soule mortall transitorie soules vnreasonable beast soule liueth like spirit ghost god euer soule man knoweth thee god doth beleeue thee shall behold thee soule bodie together thou hast made man aboue creature much superiour hast highlie exalted thou hast made prince chiefe gouernour lord captaine ouer thy creature earth hast cast vnder foot subiection mercifull lord powre v thy heauenlie light may euer haue due regard vile lothsome stuffe matter thy godlie hand hath made v thou hast neuerthelesse exalted v mightilie miserie let v knowe saie lord man crept dust mire woman rib hir husband end may anie meanes puffed vp pride vaineglorie presumption great glorie wherewith thou hast vouchsafed endue cloath v true humilitie may impute exhibit thing vnto thine onlie goodnesse clemencie grace mercie may bee drawne thereby vnto loue thee kindle lampe soules cold thy loue light thy grace may diligentlie fulfill accomplish thou hast commanded v leaue thou hast forbidden v like becommeth thine obedient child vale miserie also afterward heauenlie paradise vndefiled like vnto thee may found like thou hast created v like vnto thine owne similitude image likenesse iesus christ lord amen another meditation man creation thine almightie hand god keeping alwaies one staie created angel heauen feelie woormes vpon earth yet neither higher one page duplicate page duplicate lower like none hand could haue created angel could none hand haue created woorme like none could haue created heauen could none haue created leafe tree like none could haue made bodie could none make haire white blacke onlie thine almightie hand wherevnto thing possible alike possible thee create woorme angel impossible spread heauen leafe easier fashion haire fashion bodie vneasier stablish earth vpon water water vpon earth thou listest doo hast thou done according thou listedst thou hast made thing heauen earth sea deepe place among thing thou hast made according thou listedst couldest knewest doo certes lord thy hand could haue made stone bird serpent beast knew haue done would bicause thy goodnesse stone tree beast trulie bicause thy goodnesse hath ordeined bicause thou louedst first hast thou done maker heauen earth bottomlesse deepe hast neede wherevpon commeth thou hast thus loued lo bicause thou hast created cause thou didst create account number thy creature thy foreordinance euerlasting thou madest anie thing euen beginning thou didst spread heauens yet deepes neither haddest thou yet made earth founded mountaines neither anie watersprings yet broken thou madest thing saie thou madest thy word thou foresawest assured prouidence thy truth thy creature also thou willedst thy creature whence commeth gentle lord high god mercifull father alwaies meeke deserued kindnesse shewed like thy roiall maiestie create thou diddest create nothing nothing thou madest somewhat maner somewhat drop water fire bird fish serpent brute beast stone block sort thing haue onelie thing haue onelie growing yet kind thing haue onlie growing feeling aboue thing thy haue sort haue onlie haue growing growe also kind thing haue growing feeling also doo growe feele yea thou hast made small od betweene angel haue receiued reason knowe thee thy hand well well saie od betweene v haue happie knowledge thee alreadie possession haue hope see thee face face see thee riddle glasse see thee fullie partlie howbeit thing commeth perfect shall vnperfect done awaie time shall behold thee vncouered face face let v counted little inferiour angel seeing thou lord hast crowned v garland hope decked glorie honour seeing thou hast inhonoured v exceedinglie thy friend rather fellowes coequals thing thine angel uerelie euen saith thy truth equall angel sonnes god else sonnes god made fellowes angel shall sonnes god verie deede sonne man become sonne god trulie bethinke bold saie man onlie little inferiour angel yea hailefelowe angel also superiour bicause man god god man angel respect may saie man woorthiest creature word beginning god god word whereby god said let light made light made word whereby god created althings beginning euen selfesame word became flesh dwelt among v haue seene glorie lo heere glorie glorie discreetlie lo heere ioie ioie discreetlie lord god whole life glorie soule therefore acknowledge vnto thee lord god thou createdst indued reason thou didst create sort equall angel thy word may perfect attaine equalitie angel may haue adoption thy child thine onlie begotten word lord thy deer beloued son thou art well pleased onelie coheire substance euerlastingnes thou thy selfe art yea euen iesus christ onlie lord redeemer inlightner comforter spokesman thee light eies life sauiour onlie hope hath loued v himselfe whome haue assured trust laid vp store stedfast faith theeward entrance come vnto thee hath giuen power become child god manie beleeue name giue praise vnto thy name lord creating thine owne image hast made capable great glorie become sonne god trulie tree doo stone doo speake generallie anie thing doo moue growe aire sea earth asmuch hath giuen power thy word become sonnes god haue reason power whereby knowe consisteth reason hath giuen power vnto men whome created reasonable owne image likenesse certesse lord thy grace woman grace may thy child thing whence haue lord souereigne truth true souereigne beginning creature whence haue lord may become child god thing cannot thou art endurest euer thou hast made thing thou hast made man beast stone greene thing earth went desert afore went good turne afore thou hast created thing onlie thine owne goodnesse creature hath deserued none deserued ought thy goodnesse shewe selfe creature thou hast made reasonable without reason alone deserued thou shouldest make able become child god denie abilitie rest god forbid thinke thine onlie grace thine onlie goodnesse brought passe might partaker sweetnesse grace therefore whereby thou hast created nothing beseech thee lord giue grace thankefull vnto thee thy creature put trust vnder shadowe thy wing goodnesse wherethrough thou hast created helpe thy creature whome thy gratious goodnesse hath created let perish naughtinesse thy goodnesse hath wrought let perish wretchednesse thy singular mercie hath made auaileth thou hast created shall sinke downe mine owne corruption god hast thou made sonnes men vaine thou hast created lord rule thou thing thou hast created despise worke thine owne hand god thou hast made naught lord thou gouerne shall returne naught againe like thou madest nothing thou gouerne shall yet againe brought nothing selfe helpe lord life least perish mine owne naughtinesse lord thou hadst created haue beene thou hast created thou gouerne vndone mine owne merit mine owne desert haue said made thee create thine owne gratious goodnesse mercifulnes louingnesse thine lord god made thee create beseech thee let make thee gouerne booteth thy louingnesse caused thee create must perish mine owne wretchednesse thy right hand gouerne lord god let mercifulnesse caused thee create created cause thee also saue created let louingnesse wan thee create win thee also saue sith lesse thou art verie loue mercie selfe thou continuest alwaie one vnchangeable immortall inuisible god blessed praised euer euer amen god hath put thing vnder seruice man consideration temporall benefit coniecture heauenlie wisedome goodnesse god thou gratious god hast put thing vnder man foot end man alone wholie subiect vnto thee end man wholie thine thou hast made man lord thy work thou hast created outward thing bodie bodie soule soule thee might serue thee onlie loue thee onlie possessing thee comfort inferiour thing seruants whatsoeuer conteined vnder cope heauen inferiour vnto man soule made inherit yet corruptible base might see thou hast giuen v light skie hand thine vnweariable seruants sunne moone according thy commandement doo continuall seruice daie night thy child intent might breath thou hast granted v pure aire intent might heare thou hast giuen v diuersitie sound intent might smell thou hast giuen v sweetnesse sent intent might taste thou hast giuen v quality sauours end might feele chap plucked lion mouth manie sundrie way brought backe againe hell though wist haue gone downe verie gate hell thou hast held going drew neere death dore thou hast suffered take also thou hast oftentimes preserued mee bodilie death sauiour haue beene attached sore sickness haue beene manie danger sea land thou hast alwaies stood deliuering fire sword perill mercifullie preseruing trulie lord thou knowest death dispatched time hell receiued soule beene damned euer thy mercie thy grace preuented rescuing bodilie death also death soule lord god manie good turnes hast thou done saie blind wist vntill thou inlightenedst therefore light soule lord god life whereby liue sight mine eies wherewith see behold thou hast inlightened perceiue liue thee yeeld thee thanks though little woorth slender farre thy benefit howbeit yet frailtie hath giue thou onelie art god gratious maker louest soules hatest none thing thou hast made behold chiefe among sinner thou hast saued may example vnto others thy merciful louing kindnes acknowledge thy great benefit vnto thee thou hast plucked bottome hell twise thrise hundred time thousand time yea alwaies made toward hell thou didst alwaies bring backe againe thou mightest iustlie haue damned thou haddest would thou wouldest lord god bicause thou louest men soules bearest men sinnes might repent thy way full mercie therefore lord god see thing discerne thy light hart astonished thy great mercie towards thou hast deliuered soule bottome hell brought backe againe life starke dead thou hast made thoroughlie aliue againe therfore altogither beholden thee life whole yeeld selfe wholie vnto thee let whole spirit whole hart whole bodie whole life liue vnto thee sweet life thou hast deliuered whole thou mightest possesse whole thou hast made whole new againe thou mightest haue whole againe therefore let loue thee lord strength let loue thee mine vnspeakable ioie let mee liue hencefoorth selfe vnto thee whole life perished mine owne wretchednesse reuiued againe thy mercie thou art pitifull mercifull god manie thy compassion towards thousand loue thy name therfore lord god thou sanctifier hast commanded thy lawe loue mine old age euen till last gaspe beseech thee thy selfe forsake thou madest thou redeemedst forlorne thou inlightenedst darknesse thou raisedst dead yea forlorne dead thou camest downe bosome thy againe abasing thy selfe lowe vndoone gone farre awaie sinnes sold sinne camest thou bring againe thou didst loue well thou gauest thine owne blood ransome lord thou hast loued thy selfe thou diddest neuer depart hart sake shunned crosse thou hast annointed oile wherewith thou thy selfe wert annointed might called christian thy name christ behold thou hast registred vpon thine hand end remembrance mee might alwaies present thee yet notwithstanding remembrance thee alwaies present thus haue thy loue thy grace mercie alwaies preuented thou hast oftentimes deliuered manie great peril deliuerer went astraie thou broughtest mee backe againe ignorant thou taughtest mee sinned thou diddest chastise haue beene heauines thou hast cheered haue beene despaire thou hast recomforted haue beene fallen people peril dow thy gift daugh blesse thou thine inheritance thy bountious benefit moth time lord giue v thy peace passeth vnderstanding daugh bicause none god dooth fight v onelie thou king moth soften thou hardened hart clense filthie soules sinne daugh thy spirit gift grace make v holie life beginne praier mother lord god mercifull father vpon daie placing thy seruant deer souereigne gratious queene elizabeth empire kingdome diddest deliuer thy people england danger war oppression body tyrannie conscience superstition restoring peace true religion libertie body mind hast continued thy blessing without desert part space foure twentie yeeres memorie thy great benefit assembled togither humblie beseech thy fatherlie goodnesse grant v grace may word deed hart shew selues thankfull obedient vnto thee elizabeth vertuous queene thy grace may honour goodnesse godlinesse long manie yeeres liue reigne ouer v obeie enioie hir maiestie continuance thy great blessing thou hitherto hast hir thy blessed minister powred vpon v hir people beseech thee grant vnto v thy deere son iesus christ sake lord sauiour daughter amen else saie thus yeeld vnto thee mightie mercifull father immortall thanks hath pleased thee thy meere mercie fatherlie bountie stormes manie troublesome time conduct v vpon daie banishment exile comfortable port tranquillitie hand thy gratious seruant deere souereigne ladie queene elizabeth sheepe wandering astraie wildernesse thou ordeinedst hir maiestie bee shepheard gather v againe thy sheepefold beene long tossed hither thither outrage cruell furie tyrannicall persecution like poore weatherbeaten barke hath beene continuallie tormoiled tossed perilous surge outragious swelling sea finding sure rode harborough wherein rest continuallie danger either sinke sand ouerwhelmed waues violentlie dashed peeces maine rock euen saie despaired vtterlie safegard standing stil feare hazard euerlasting confusion thou comittedst helme guided hir grace wisedome last conducted v hauen long desired peace tranquillitie therefore whereas thou hast placed hir regal throne dauid iosias samuel yea shepheard ringleader waie true holinesse sincere religion inspire hir mind manifold blessing thy grace may walke day hir life path thy commandements happilie discharge hir dutie stewardship dispensation thou hast committed hir maiesties hand inflame hir mind loue thy holie gospell hir deed thought practises may tend propagation planting thy word christian religion hir maiesties dominion incline motion hir vertuous disposition aboue thing seeke thine honour glorie sowe seed catholike faith abundantlie place cut brood superstition idolatrie constitute true preacher thy word stablish euerie thine holie gospell true religion preserue hir mercifull father hitherto thou hast miraculouslie done diuelish deuises practises hir enimies may haue long happie reigne among v aduancement thy glorie ioie comfort v hir subiects let hir naturall disposition continue hir foe terrible hir subiects amiable hir offender mercifull vertuous bountifull indifferent men respect parciall point neither cause ecclesiasticall yet matter concerning politike striue spring vp abhominable superstition idolatrie grant hir grace mercifull father run remnant hir race right path thy commandements declining neither right hand left vsing time thy heauenlie word rule compasse direct hir course preserue hir grace mercifull father continuall health bodie quietnesse mind may alwaies able rule bridle hir high charge execute right iustice sort degree aduancement god preseruation queenes maiestie realme almightie god mercifull father thy great mercy hast giuen vnto v peaceable prince gratious queene also haft hitherto verie often miraculouslie saued hir sundrie great peril imminent danger hir mercifull vnbloudie gratious gouernement hast preserued v whole realme manifold mischief dreadfull plague wherewith nation round v haue beene yet greeuouslie afflicted haue mercie vpon lord grant v grace beseech thee thy great benefit wee may hartilie thankfull obedient vnto thee flie thing may offend thee prouoke thy wrath indignation v order liues thing thought sinnes people redoubted thou lord hast appointed sacred thou lord hast annointed feared thou changest hart like streames water honoured thine owne image likenesse guiding angel creature largesse liberalitie thy select seruant elizabeth queene supreame gouernour v legue nation people hir obeisance regiment starre light influence ouer thing beneath thee first cause fountaine brightnesse attained vnto cleere riuer plentifull brooke course water thee euerlasting headspring euen shining beames flowing streames thy mercy good gift haue beene sithence day hir happie gratious day yeares degenerate true knowledge thee thy sonne iesus christ vnto consuming nakednesse idolatrie plaieng inordinate golden calfe owne making priest foure twentith sunne happilie inuironeth firmament sithence meanes poore vessell weaker sexe sillie maiden thou performing glorious deliuerance thy people thraldome slauerie pharao egypt didst annoint king daughter holie oile setting crowne pure gold vpon hir head inuesting hir purple scepter regall diademe realme sithence time father owe thee hir god moses breath nostrels sight light vse aire ease hart peace conscience whole worke welfare hir inspired thee spreading hir beames hir appearing bloudie launce claunching murreans redoubling sheelds haue beene shattered asunder shiuers bated foiled mattockes spade flame fury quenched serpent looke vpon saued admirable lenitie babylon hath put zion egypt become owne rahab harlot denizoned ierusalem become wild oliues true garden plant ismael israel miscreant christian painime protesting professing antichristian romanists heathen idolater faithfull euangelicall sincerelie beleeuing woorshippers thee spirit veritie according thy holie word neither hath cost beene spared populous nation hir time haue seene golden yeeres reigne hir father dauid peacefull kingdom salomon haue aduanced earth haue denied hir fruitfulnesse sea hir increase cloud drop heauens fairenesse yoong men see vision old men prophesie ierusalem hir light shining vnto hir glorie lord risen vnto hir queene bringing hir honor vnto citie dauid nation walking light thereof great honour thou iehouah hast heaped vpon v honourable foraigne region worke thou hast wrought thy chosen yea much hath brightnesse beautie beene powred abroade whilest egypt round hath darkened euen whole world manner besides v whome thou hast gathered pasture gosen thicke mist errour haue blinded eies earth cloudie piller hath departed v daie firie flame night whilest land round haue warred destruction one another moses hath guided v peace whilest nation like egypt round hath plagued destroier first borne sitting vpon prince throne vnto vassall slaue grinding handmill moses hath diminished hir flocke whilest firme land haue beene ouerwhelmed rage sea water iland hauing dwelt peace hath sent hir ship ophir gold prepared hir nauie danger enimie whilest athalia hath murthered hir owne bloud ioas hath learned lawe lord iehoiada whilest achas consecrateth owne sonne fire samaria eateth hir owne child walles eliza directeth child prophet office whilest iezabel setteth vp baal embrueth achab bloud prophet naboth elia gathereth people god mount carmel behold wonder fire god lighting heauen vpon sacrifice replenishing hart ioie tongue gift language woorthie instrument thy goodnesse expresse image thy maiestie ample matter day celebritie doth thy people desire thy hand first lord thou giue v thankefull hart make v day liues mindfull thy fatherlie gratious bountifulnesse presentlie queenes highnesse hath gloriouslie atchiued trauell full three twentie yeares annuall celebritie voluntarie sacrifice praise thanksgiuing therefore returneth may thy benefit full often returne twice yeare yeare yeare kingdom men thou christ thine onelie sonne gratious father thy chosen church doost comfortable nourishing dispose roiall state among men thy grace come passe english nation portion thy church doo enioie gouernement elizabeth queene thou hast practises thine hir aduersaris deliuered peril thy mightie hand brought reigne ouer v mercifullie guiding hir thou hast made hir v mother thine afflicted flocke nurse benefit haue libertie true religion common peace maruelouslie protecting hir thou hast kept hir defend v vse hold benefit quietlie euen thy mightie maruelous mercie thou hast discouered practises craftie cruell enimies purposed spoile hir v v hir hir v thy religion peace determining deliuer v ouer tyrannie shamelesse man rome bloudie sword purpose mischiefe thou haddest permitted preuaile suffered sinnes thy hand lord iustlie hand vnnaturallie vniustlie doo offend thy maiestie manie way offend anie way yet wickednesse hate v onelie bicause truth doo professe serue thee cause conspire thee god like hypocrite queene like traitours commonwelth countrie like spoiler v euen cain abel thy great goodnesse hath deuised better v doo thou hast spared v would haue spoiled thy wisedome hath vnfolded wickednesse thy prouidence hath preuented purpose honour praise thanksgiuing congregation euerie member thereof giuen thee god grace lord pitie father mercie euer euer beseech thee mercifull father prouoked sinnes giue v ouer lust enimies doo make v reproch heathen let iewes turke papist ouerthrowe triumph thee saieng god thy rich mercie christ forgiue sinnes thy renewing spirit amend v worke good worke thou hast begun among v confound bring naught attempt like enimies thou didst babel infold follie owne counsel thou diddest achitophel thine angel sinite force thou didst senacherib desperate attempt let drowned pharao treason ouertake thou didst absolon anie conuerted turne thou diddest manasses otherwise let feele due punishment dathan conspirator also may left example thy iustice posteritie doo likewise humblie beseech thee continue thy goodnesse towards v euer thine old woonted mercie deliuer queene elizabeth euill direct hir true knowledge thee acknowledge thy benefit towards hir hir dutie towards thee kindle hir hart zeale serue thee hir selfe haue thee serued v entirelie guide hir still gouerne v iustlie godlie peace giue vnto v also subiects thankefull hart thee faithfull hir thee charitable towards men liue vnder hir gouernment counsellers minister euerie place calling may throughlie sanctified holinesse liue thee thus prolonging hir reigne ouer v doo thou hir plant thy religion among v may power reforme rule v remaine posteritie v praise thy name may continue hart mouth english nation england may saie euer lord praised thanksgiuing vnto god benefit bestowed vpon realme england suppressing late rebellion praier preseruation prosperous estate gratious queene elizabeth almightie euerlasting god maker heauen earth lord creature whose mightie hand humble lowlie aduanced proud stubborne thrust vnder foote thy seruants giue thee hartie thanks thy great bountifull goodnesse thou hast late without deseruing bestowed vpon v deliuering v cruell tyrannie bondage persecution wherewith late oppressed also restoring v againe former peace quietnesse free exercise faith direction thy sacred gospell still maugre head enimies mainteined thee amongst v comfort thy singular benefit gratious liberalitie excellent father wise able render vnto thee woorthie thanks therfore make humble sute request vnto thee lord may please thee thy holie name sake accept good willes behalfe giue v grace day life remember maruellous worke thine partlie christian deuout feruent praiers thy humble handmaiden gratious queene thy people partlie sure confidence trust hir grace euermore put thee thou hast without force strength men put onlie hir enimies also thine fight thee thy truth trauelled meanes disanull quite ouerthrowe state church religion established woonderfull myraculous act thou hast gratiouslie begun beseech thee thy tender mercy sake go forward establish thy glorie may aduanced thereby craftie deuises malicious assault diuell minister cleane ouerthrowne subdued christ thou king king prince peace ruler israel haue mercie vpon deere souereigne ladie elizabeth grant thou hitherto hast singularlie blessed hir adorned hir maiestie manie thy speciall good grace blessing benefit thy glorie comfort thankefuluesse therefore vnto thy maiestie continuallie hartilie faithfullie praie thee ioie thy heauenlie countenance may still gratiouslie shine vpon hir humble hir soule thee hir guide director sheeld preserue defend hir power hir enimies thine hir aduersaries may time time made thine hir footstoole euer kept vnder hir foot mire street thinne scoom filthie fome light chaffe withered haie burnt stubble wind beseech thee also lord thou scepter israel hir scepter may yet growe greene burgen fructifie flourish fruit true happinesse glorie victorie princelie honor dutifulnesse healthfull sweetnesse tendernesse beautie comlinesse hir roiall state calling euen palmetree safelie well set soile happinesse hir throne regall may steddilie stand euer without winding shaking swaruing tottering nodding euen seate salomon day hir grace regiment may vnto v thy glorie day heauen life ended make hir partaker brightnesse thine thy father euerlasting glory among thine annointed elect celestiall kingdome euerlasting renowme grant christ thou mercifull king gouernor sittest vpon seate dauid hast obteined euerlasting kingdome chosen israelite euen thy mercy sake amen another praier queene estate realme gratious lord mercifull father acknowledge thee lord lord king king creating beginning ruling thing euermore heauen earth according thy woonderfull wisedome power selues thy poore seruants worke thy hand sheepe thy pasture subiected thy high maiestie depending vpon thy fatherlie prouidence thing neuerthelesse seeing thou thy wisedome annointest king queenes appointing rule ouer people sit lieutenant thy seate minister iustice father nursses mainteine cherish thy church commanding v onlie obeie honor moreouer praie watching ouer v good therefore beseech thee thy great name sake iesus christes sake shew thy mercie king prince mainteine thy glorious gospell especiallie praie thee blesse gratious queene elizabeth spirituall blessing christ iesus temporall blessing according thy good pleasure great measure thine effectuall lawe may find great increase vertue wisedome strength christ iesu faithfull happie discharge hir dutie hir holinesse ioie zeale thy house may multiplied euerlasting seeing hath pleased thee thy singular mercie giue hir especiall honor first suffer thy glorious truth afterward miraculouslie deliuering hir hand hir enimies set crowne vpon hir head make hir instrument aduance thy glorie gospell suffered bring hir darkenesse light persecution great long peace giue thee hartie thanks singular benefit beseech thee make hir v euermore thankefull thy good pleasure still preserue hir continuance blessing towards v increase time time thy glorie benefit thy church hir infinite peace christ iesus prince peace furthermore praise thee hir estate enimies gospell hir enimies also defence therof may despise peace offered vnto repentance may accompt thy long suffering hir peaceable vnbloudie gouernement occasion saluation soules vnfeigned loue truth mercifull souereigne otherwise stil remaine disobedient thy truth disloiall hir highnesse dangerous state god saluation thou hast discouered discouer still thou hast preuented preuent still let eies ware wearie looking hart faint waiting comming yet commeth neither let come lord beseech thee blessed long reigne hir grace peace zion euermore also deere father blesse loue thy spirit sanctifie keepe hir maie spirit counsell fortitude rule sister also namely hir commonwealth may flourish together growe vp together palmetrees beautie strength giuing aid help one another church glorie god may appeare sunne brightnesse land may flowe milke honie true peace abound therein ye triumphant reigne debora grace lord great miserable sinner vnwoorthie least therefore looke v thy selfe iniquity thy great mercy accepting death passion thy sonne full ransome offence throwing bottome sea making crosse resurrection effectuall v obedience godlinesse becommeth thy saincts thy good blessing towards gratious souereigne may added gouerneth blessedlie ouer blessed people people blessed lord beloued lord thy grace may abound church commonwealth daie daie till daie translation thy kingdome iustice inhabiteth also shall inhabit reigne thee according thy promise euer grant v thing mercifull father thy deere sonne lord iesus christes sake whose name craue thy mercifull hand praieng furthermore hath taught v praie father c psalme another praier prosperous estate flourishing reigne right vertuous souereigne queene elizabeth god without whose wisedome kingdome stand speciall consideration hast ordeined kingdome familie dauid teach queene elizabeth whome thou hast appointed rule right gouernement teach saie daughter thy dauid whome thou hast chosen thy selfe rule righteousnesse may iustlie gouerne hir people thine especiallie may defend poore iniuries mightie thus people scattered heere mountaines hilles safe vnder iust gouernment shall abound commodity peace grant vnto hir far tyrannie may sure refuge poore may comfort family oppressed pouertie iniuries may keepe vnder ye false accuser sharpe punishment come passe lord state kingdome ordered thine authoritie men meete shall acknowledge feare thee anie short continuance time sunne moone shall sooner ceasse course thou shalt faile woorshipped thou againe wilt powre downe vpon thy people heauen good thing like showre comming downe vpon new mowne medowes none otherwise thou vsest water earth shower due season whilest elizabeth reigneth thus gouerned thy grace holie spirit iust shall flourish great peace shall continued firme course starres queene hir selfe shall haue dominion one sea euen fro euphrates farthest coast earth inhabitant country desert shall come vnder hir yoke falling downe vnder hir foot hir enimies falling downe hir shall licke dust earth king silicia ilands shall offer present vnto hir ethiopian also arabian shall bring hir gift finallie king shall haue hir admiration hir renowme vertue nation shall reuerence hir name maiestie hir righteousnesse shall bee praised whole world heareth crie poore doth defend needie forsaken hath mercie needie refresheth danger life defendeth poore iniurie mightie neither doth suffer violence done vnto vnreuenged therefore thou god wilt keepe hir safe gold shall brought vnto hir midst arabia men shall make praiers hir life safetie shall dailie wish prosperitie vnto hir seeing safetie family nation consisteth preseruation hir maiestie let v hartilie haue good cause praie incessantlie hir grace safetie welfare church loue fauour hir therein defend god thine owne hand woorthie woman sacred queene whose endeuour thou hast vsed restore peace thy church religion thy people saue woorthie princesse elizabeth saie whome purpose thou hast indued rare singular wisedome power constancie roiall gift grace grant men may dutifullie honour obeie hir prince peace mother israel nurse thy church woorthilie hir vertues set ouer v thee god reigne finallie grant gouernement pastor chiefe shepheard may want neither integritie vprightnesse taking counsell neither wisedome performing hir enterprise according thy shall wheate reaped eueriewhere full handful verie top mountaines corne growing high tree libanus shall multitude inhabitant city may almost seeme like plant springing earth yea shall hir noble memorie roiall fame euer euen durable sunne queene elizabeth example pietie felicitie vnto kingdom nation world shall accept hir blessed among woman vnto thee lord prince celestiall company author thing woonderfull rare gift hir maiestie shall possible praise especiallie giuen yea fame thy glorie praised magnified euer euer let fill heauen earth euen let god amen another dailie praier perpetuall happinesse sacred gratious souereigne queene elizabeth almightie god king king lord lord thine hand power heauen earth thou confirmest kingdom againe doost alter according thine heauenlie pleasure praise thee magnifie thee extoll thine holie name hath pleased thee appoint ouer v good gratious queene dooth gouerne counsell rule wisdome grant hir beseech thee continuall peace long life much happines deliuer hir maiestie hand hir enimies rule thou hir mind may serue thee alwaies feare reioice trembling let hir maintaine imbrace pure religion defend hir people profession christ gospell error superstition whatsoeuer giue hir wisedome vnderstanding doo thing gratefull thy sight profitable v hir subiects hurtfull none god eternall father heare petition elizabeth queene hir trouble name christ sauiour glorifie hir comfortable aid holie spirit vphold hir euermore mindfull hir grace hir good lord remember hir offering make hir praiers acceptable thy sight giue hir according hir hart desire fulfill hir petition prosper hir purpose may reioice thy saluation triumph name thee god blesse hir lord euermore wee may knowe hir protector cloud harken vnto hir thy holie heauens oh send hir helpe thy sanctuarie aid hir aboue thy mightie right hand bringeth saluation let hir enimies plainlie knowe god thou wilt saue thine annointed though trust horse chariot yet remember name god shall fall ouercome wee couragiouslie persist lord protect hir maiestie heare v call vpon thee thy strength may reioice mightilie triumph thy saluation grant hir desire hir hart denie petition hir lip thou hast preuented hir notable blessing put crowne pure gold vpon hir head hath asked life thee thou wilt giue hir long life great hir glorie thy saluation honour fame hast thou put vpon hir thou hast ordeined hir exceeding blessednesse doost comfort hir hart thy cheerfull countenance bicause delighteth christ doubteth thine euerlasting mercie god giuest victorie vnto king didst deliuer dauid perill sword saue redeeme deere queene elizabeth deliuer hir hand child another deuotion whose mouth vttereth vanitie right hand right hand falshood yea let hir hand lord light vpon hir enimies thy right hand find hate thee enuie hir prosperitie put burning fornace time thy displeasure lord anger shall consume fire shall deuour fruit shalt thou destroy earth seed sonnes men bicause intended euill thee imagined mischiefe innocent could bring passe therefore wilt thou turne flight bend thy bowe face triumph lord thy vertue sing thy glorie commend thy power saue queene mercifull god despite hir enimies either secretlie openlie go bring hir life graue hir glorie dust lord shield souereigne exalt thine annointed let thine hand assist thine arme strengthen hir neuer let hir foe preuaile hir child wickednesse bring hir destruction banish hir court hir priuie enimies preserue hir euermore dissembling friend mercie iudgement queene elizabeth song vnto thee lord let hir sing thy magnificall mercy worke hir roiall hart endeuour fullie instructed perfect waie thy roiall lawes much thou hast made hir queene ouer relme thy grace open hir hart instruct hir lead hir vp downe midst hir people perfectnesse hart let hir neuer set hir eies anie diuelish thing cause hir detest worke backsliding god let take hold hir driue far awaie hir men froward hart let hir acquainted euill person priuilie slandereth neighbor let hir destroie hath also proud looke hautie stomach cause hir loath settle hir eies vpon land faithfull may dwell hir leadeth godlie life men good conscience let hir seruants let deceitfull person haue anie place hir house telleth lie reuenger bloud cause hir speedilie cast hir sight finallie grant hir power lord host dailie suppresse vngodlie land may root citie god wicked dooers queene elizabeth hath done lawfull right wherefore lord leaue hir doo offer hir wrong thine owne goodnesse sake take hir thine handmaid vnto thy protection let proud oppresse hir wrong deale thine handmaid according thy louing kindnesse teach hir thy statute thy seruant grant hir vnderstanding may knowe thy testimony thy testimony conteine woonderous thing therefore cause hir hart zealous keeping first entrance thy word illuminate giuing vnderstanding euen vnto simple worke hir hart feruent desire thy word affection thereto may like one panteth openeth mouth breath looke thou vpon hir lord mercifull vnto hir thou vsest doo vnto loue thy name direct hir step thy word let wickednesse haue dominion ouer hir redeeme hir fraudulent dealing men cause hir keepe thy commandements make light thy countenance shine vpon queene elizabeth thine handmaiden teach hir thy statute heare praiers god giue good eare vnto mine intercession behold end earth call vnto thee deere souereigne ladie queene elizabeth whensoeuer hir hart heauines oh set hir vp vpon rocke higher hitherto thou hast beene hir defence strong tower hir face enimie let hir dwell beseech thee thy tabernacle euer let hir trust vnder couering thy wing thou lord heardst hir desire hast giuen hir heritage ouer feare thy name grant vnto queene long life hir yeeres may endure manie generation let hir dwell lord euer appoint thy louing mercie truth may preserue hir cause hir alwaies sing praise vnto thy name may daie daie performe hir vowes keepe thy heasts finallie giue thy iudgment lord vnto hir grace thy righteousnesse vnto hir counsell may iudge people iustice poore equitie let mountaines bring peace little hils righteousnes vnto people let iudge afflicted among people saue sonnes poore make destroie backeslider persist afflict miserable trust thy mercie protection shall quietnesse peace abound among v like hillock earth cause hir enimies feare hir long sunne moone shineth one generation another water hir thy grace heauen thou didst gedeons fleece wool dew thou refreshest drop raine new cut grasse vpon earth hir day let righteous flourish great abundance peace long moone firmament defend dominion thou hast giuen hir within sea floud vnto end earth cause hir foe kneele downe hir hir enimies licke dust hir feete giue hir long prosperous reigne indue hir abundance rich wealth heape glorie honour vpon hir head let hir partaker alwaies praiers iust dailie blessed lord euen god israel onelie worketh woonderous thing blesse gratious queene elizabeth blessed name maiestie euer yea let earth filled glorious praise amen shall magnifie thee lord hir king shall praise thy name euer euerie daie let hir giue thanks vnto thee lord praise thy name euer euer grant mercifull father thy deere sonne sauiour iesus christ sake amen amen another praier queenes excellent maiestie wonderfull excellent almightie god depth thy iudgements thou king king lord lord thou thy pleasure doost take awaie transpose roote plant confound establish kingdom thou thy singular goodnesse hast deliuered gratious souereigne queene elizabeth thy chosen handmaid almost death dore yea thou hast deliuered hir prison setled hir hir father throne thee therefore doo render thanks thee doo sing laud praise thy name doo honour daie night thou hast restored againe libertie countrie sinceritie doctrine peace tranquillitie thy church thine thine lord benefit meanes labour seruice hirs burthen heauie ala woman shoulder yet easie tollerable thy helping hand assist hir therefore mercifull father neither respect hir offence desert hir parent manifold sinnes v hir people thinke vpon thy woonted compassion alwaies hand thy poore afflicted preserue hir kingdome mainteine religion defend thy cause queene elizabeth v thy sheepe hir people scatter thine enimies thirst war let ashamed confounded woorship idol let v praie vnto forraigne nation people knowe thee neither call vpon thy name strengthen confirme lord good worke thou hast begun inspire gratious queene thy seruant v thy poore flocke thy holie spirit vncorrupt life may ioine puritie religion may yeeld bring foorth wild bastard fruit mild sweet grape fruit beseeming liuelie faith true repentance meet conuenient thy gospell intent may enioie immortall treasure liuing dieng thee may finallie possesse inheritance thy heauenlie kingdome iesus christ lord thine kingdome power glorie euer amen forme blessing praier gratious queene elizabeth christ deere spouse scripture come downe lord come thousand thy saincts appeare gratiouslie vnto thy church saincts come visit people congregation iacob whersoeuer assembled whome thou tenderlie louest humbled thy foot yeeld thee thanks thy blessing benefit receiued come downe saie god iacob blesse israel yea come blesse thy chosen deere beloued seruant elizabeth queene whome thou hast set vp mightie prince mother ouer thy people citie zion made chiefe gouernour among nation let elizabeth liue die neither let hir honour anie thing diminished sinnes offence heare lord voice hir humble dailie praiers let hir continue prince peace roiall ruler ouer thy people hir hand shall good ynough hir thou helpe hir still thou hast done hir enimies right light thine holie handmaid whome thou didst prooue great temptation triall thou didst ioseph thou didst annoint hir queene whome hitherto thou hast preserued pure vndefiled virgin promote thy glorie thou didst dauid hir manifold affliction hath esteemed seruing thee hir god sauing hir selfe loued hir life deere loued thy lawe yea preferred thine obedience sacrifice thing world beside let hir gratious queene elizabeth saie hath thus hir dutie plentifullie rewarded therefore thee hir god heauen perpetuall crowne glorie palme victorie euen hath taught iacob thy iudgements israel thy lawe hath put incense thy face burnt offering vpon thine altar euen god hath hezechias restored thy sincere religion woorshippeth thee aright euerie one godlie thee blesse therefore lord hir substance first fruit accept work hir hand smite loines rise vp hir hate hir rise againe let beloued lord dwell euer safetie thee yea doo thou lord vouchsafe stil hir vale defence hir life long dwell hir heere church hir beloued spouse head gouernour laie thy left hand vnder hir head let thy right hand embrace hir may find continuall comfort thy presence fountaine garden well liuing water arise north come south blowe thy spouse goodlie pleasant garden inclosed fountaine sealed vp thy selfe water spring lebanon may growe great sweet spice smell therof may flowe thy nostrels thou eate pleasant fruit hir kisse hir kiss peace righteousnes let hir two breast satisfie thee like two yoong roe twin feeding vpon lillie set hir seale thine hart signet vpon thine arme let lampe hir loue verie vehement flame vnquenchable let hir sure wall foundation wherevpon thou maist build golden palace let hir breast tower vnassaultable may meet thee hir spouse dwell thine eies findeth perpetuall peace quietnesse god whose sight hir father walke thou god hast fed hir hir life long vnto daie deliuered hir hither manie euils death blesse hir still euen blessing abraham isaac iacob patriarch blessing thy mercy promised vnto hir father dauid hir let israel also blessed hir let thy grace plentifullie manifestlie appeare people may thence take patterne blessing thee teach posteritie blesse praise thee thy goodnesse mercie towards hir v thy might thy strength noblenesse dignitie excellencie power lionesse laid downe couched safelie spoile shall stir hir vp hir enimies doo feare hir doo thou still charge daughter ierusalem stir vp thy loue awake hir troubling hir quietnes peace vntill please hir fellowe virgin praise hir hir hand shall necke hir enimies hir father people doo bow downe vnto hir saieng good lucke haue thou thine honour ride word truth thou embracest meekenesse let brother euill reuengers bloud instrument violence crueltie bee hir court habitation let crueltie falsehood come hir soule secret let hir soule come neither let hir glorie ioined stained assemblie damned crue wicked curse curse hir blesse blesse hir diuide iacob scatter israel shameleslie rage dare cruellie attempt anie treachery treason hir innocent roiall person yea let condignelie punished whosoeuer go trouble state ouerthrowe hir kingdome let scepter depart hir hand hir kingdome diminished let thy wise lawegiuer meeke moses continue amongst v honour iudge thy people gather vnto thee long rest peace euen vntill silo sauiour iesus giuer prosperitie come crowne hir euerlasting kingdome saluation let hir see rest peace good thou hast made hir ouercome hir enimies last blesse hir lord great increase maner good profitable pleasant thing hir bread let fat may giue pleasant gift woorthie queene let hir hind sent vnto v thee pretious present giuing goodlie word hir people let elizabeth daughter increase like flourishing fruitfull palme tree water side whose small branch virgin may run spread themselues fruitfullie also shew verie greene vpon wals thy house archer hir enimies haue greeuouslie prouoked hir shot hir venemous dart haue hated hir hir hinderance griefe great manie haue beene hir affliction persecution hir bowe abode fast strong hand hir armes strengthened hand mightie god iacob hir deliuerance euen stone israel appointed mother israel euen god hir father hath helped hir almightie hath blessed hir heauenlie blessing aboue blessing deepe lieth beneath blessing brest wombe time come blessing god shewed vnto hir father shall take effect stronger hir blessing hir elder unto vttermost end hils world shall blessing vpon head elizabeth top head hir separate hir birth consecrated wombe dignitie honour far aboue hir felowe virgin made annointed lord beare rule haue dominion ouer men euen morning light sunne riseth gloriouslie without cloud faire morning iust ruling feare god let hir house growe thee god may continue perfect point sure euerlasting according thy couenant promise made hir father dauid grasse earth bright raine groweth quicklie fadeth sooner hir beautie glorie let like first borne bullocke hir strength unicorne horne hir power let hir smite people togither euen ten thousand ephraim ten thousand manasses blesse hir hir going comming prosper hir home abroad hir affaire land sea make hir glad ioifull willing call thy people vnto holie hill zion thy church offer togither offering righteousnesse may sucke abundance sea treasure hid earth blesse hir lord may dwell lion catcheth praie arme head victorious ouer hir enimies hate hir despise thee blesse hir thy grace may looke well hir selfe beginning portion thee lawegiuer hid reserued v thy people may come head people execute righteousnesse lord iudgements israel lion whelpe let hir leape basan make hir strong inough defend hir selfe balaks curse treason zimri achitophel satisfie hir thy fauour fill hir thy blessing let hir possesse east west south north part earth blesse hir people make hir acceptable vnto hir brother sister dip hir foot oile hir shoe let iron brasse hir glorie health wealth strength continue long sunne like thee god israel though thou sit vpon heauens ridest vpon vpon horse yet art thou hir helper sauiour whose glorie cloud celestiall place eternall god still hir refuge vnder armes euerlasting god let hir liue euer hee shall cast enimie hir face shall command hir destroie israel euen present may still dwell alone safetie fountaine iacob plentifull issue land wheate wine heauens drop dew thy blessing plentifullie vpon hir hir countrie happie blessed art thou israel hast queene like vnto thee people saued lord shield thy helpe sword thy glorie therefore thine enimies haue lost strength thee ward subiected thee thou shalt tread vpon high place blesse hir still lord giue power vnto thy queene may strong keepe foot thy saint within wals thy church cause wicked euer keepe silence darknes amen amen praier said mentallie alowd true harted english men woman queenes maiestie rideth anie time god saue roiall maiestie god god preserue noble grace good lucke haue honor fairest among woman ride queene according great worship high renowme wherewith king king hath innobled bicause word truth meekenesse righteousnesse professe shall right hand teach terrible thing lord himselfe keeper preserue euill lord heauen earth defence right hand left lord preserue going comming time foorth euermore sunne shall burne daie neither moone night king king haue pleasure beautie make daughter spouse virgin glorious within mightie iehoua establish seate iudgement euen throne father dauid may become old mother israel peace prosperitie vnto loue honour horror conscience confusion face vnto hate indurable gift god grace people doo highlie praise zeale zion world doth honour therefore zion sake also wish maner prosperitie yea bicause house lord haue reformed religion grace hath restored continuallie triumph mercie praie still renowme roiall name maiestie fame may vniuersallie spred ouer earth remembred one generation another gospel sake say maiestie doth maintaine vncessantly praise god lowd voice crie say god saue gratious queene elizabeth iesu blesse highnesse holie ghost heauen comfort conduct maiestie wais blesse souereigne ladie blessed trinitie heape glorie honour vpon elizabeth queene glorious deitie blesse hir sacred maiestie saie god fro time foorth euermore king heauen receiue queene receiue imbrace thy glorious virgin deere daughter accompanied hir felowe virgin prince daughter honourable woman thy tuition protection ioie gladnesse saie let hir liuelie image thy princelie maiestie brought safe vnhurt home againe vnto hir iuorie palace last enter king court hir father house may enioie perpetuall crowne euerlasting kingdome reioice thee hir god hir spouse hir sauiour euer euer shall hir people giue thanks vnto thee lord world without end amen compendious forme praier whole estate christes church necessarie vsed estate time conuenient especiallie euerie sabboth holidaie euening mother daughter familie psalme preparing hart praier mother come let v search trie way turne againe vnto lord daughter let v seeke lord found let v call vpon neere moth let v lift vp hart hand vnto god heauens haue sinned haue rebelled therefore spare v daugh euen crowne head cast downe wo therefore vnto v haue sinned moth iniquity sealed vp bagge hath set misdeed secret sinnes light countenance daugh weighed balance found lacke weight altogether lighter vanitie moth though hath chosen v heritage yet vnto lion forrest dailie crie therefore hath hated v daugh lord absent himselfe euer shew fauour moth mercie cleane gon euer doth promise faile euermore daugh hath god forgotten mercifull hath shut vp tender mercie displeasure moth uerelie fruit infirmity yet right hand lord amend daugh therefore leaue complaint vpon selues speake bitternesse soules moth wil saie vnto god condemne v neither cast thou worke thy hand daugh rather turne thou v vnto thee shall turned renew day old thou hast banished v long inough hast beene sore displeased v moth poore needie god make haste vnto v thou art helper redeemer god make tarieng daugh let oppressed returne ashamed let poore needie praise thy name moth nowe doo sow teares may heereafter reape gladnesse daugh blessed man whome thou chastisest lord teachest thy lawe moth thou maist giue rest day euill whilest pit digged wicked daugh blessed man whome thou correctest therefore refuse thy chastisement moth though thou make wound yet thou giuest plaister though thou smite yet thy hand make whole againe daugh therefore lord open thou lip mouth shall shew foorth thy praise moth bow downe thine eare lord consider complaint hearken vnto v thy truth righteousnesse sake daugh amen praier heard obtaine fauour mother seeing hath pleased thee mercifull father fauourablie consider weakenesse vnwoorthinesse mankinde whereas wee could selues neither lift vp eies vnto thee weakenesse neither yet hope anie good thing thy hand vnwoorthinesse euen extreme miserie hast giuen vnto v thy welbeloued sonne iesus christ whome onelie made able lift vp hart vnto thee also may assure selues merit passion thy fauour mercie euer shall aske agreeable thy good pleasure doo first bottome hart yeeld vnto thee thanks honour glorie thine inestimable goodnesse bestowed v thine vnwoorthie seruants doo likewise beeing assured thy mercie promised christ dailie present selues thee intent faithfull praiers may dailie receiue fruit thy mercifull goodnesse releeue continuall necessity withall heere lord strange countrie enimies euerie side waie euer turne v see nothing either continuall conflict else vtter destruction thou therefore holie father hast giuen v thine onlie sonne iesus christ intent name might call vpon thee vouchsafe likewise heare v time soeuer call vnto thee name sith hath pleased thee exercise v continuall tribulation triall may obtaine patience strength may continuallie stand stronglie maintenance thy cause thy honor glorie let desert much prouoke thy displeasure v therefore thou cease glorifie thy holie name v rather thy goodnesse forgiue thou sinnes hinderance thy honor glorie haue committed giue v grace hartilie repent v misdeed sort may hencefoorth seeke thy face walke thee newnesse life seeking thy honor glorie aboue thing hath hitherto hindered v shame may al meanes furthered euen v likewise vnspeakable comfort v iesus christ lord daughter amen church vniuersallie mother fallen dangerous day wherein goodnesse decaieth sin aboundeth humblie beseech thee mercifullie behold perillous estate age generall confusion whole world multiplie thy grace blessing thy church much thy mercy world neuer defiled anie corruption either world flesh diuell neither yet perish eternallie world daughter amen ciuil magistrate mother mercifull therfore father vnto state member thereof vnto king prince ciuil magistrate namelie thy seruant elizabeth queene gouernour may euerie one seuerall charge mainteine scepter truth righteousnesse may beate downe sinne aduance vertue may humblie submit themselues power vnto thy good pleasure thing seeke continuallie furtherance thy gospell doo shall thy honor glorie daugh amen bishop spirituall pastor mother vnto bishop preacher spirituall pastor thou hast appointed watchman vnto thy flocke may endeuour themselues businesse set apart faithfullie execute charge gathering together thy wandering flocke feeding bread life confirming doctrine godlie conuersation defending rauening woulfes theeues diligent fruitfull watching ouer daie night finallie carefull auoiding thing may giue occasion forget neglect charge cannot verie ill flocke whensoeuer shepheard sleepeth daugh amen inferior subiects mother vnto v inferior subiects may willinglie gladlie loue honor serue obeie superior power thee thee may ioifullie receiue thy gospell plentiouslie bring foorth fruit thereof thing chieflie applie selues maintenance thy true worship setting foorth thine honor glorie daughter amen ignorant mother vnto ignorant also eies may opened would please thee shew thy countenance vnto may knowe thee thy church condemne errours eies closed vp darknes zeale simplicitie without knowledge may haue stead godlie zeale grounded perfect knowledge thy gospell may fructifie also glorie thy holie name daugh amen malicious persecutor mother euen vnto malicious persecutor also may either length receiue thy grace often mercifullie profered vnto acknowledge malice returne vnto thee thy great honor glorie thou shalt praised euen mouth thine enimies else haue vtterlie giuen ouer themselues vnto continuall hatred thee thy word vtterly reiected kind discipline thou take awaie among v thy great honor glorie also thy little flocke deliuered tyrannie oppression shall ioifullie sing vnto thee thy continuall goodnesse woonderfull deliuerance daughter amen afflicted christ sake mother vnto v troubled persecuted cruellie handeled thy name sake although please thee make sharpe triall faith enimies may either ashamed confounded thereat yet thou leaue v much destitute thy grace able stand vttermost proofe thereof consider lord greatnesse infirmity although sin haue deserued thy wrath yet let equitie cause thine troubled purchase vnto v thy fauour mercie giue v therefore grace continue end willinglie ioifullie beare whatsoeuer crosse shall please thee laie vpon v alwaies readie defend set foorth thine honour glorie whatsoeuer triall must need drinke cup triall yet giue leaue vnto thy chosen drinke flowre reserue bottome dreg thereof proud obstinate enimies thy gospell according thy mercy promised iesus christ lord daughter amen estate generall mother finallie thou mercifull vnto v houshold faith estate calling soeuer remembring end thou hast created v dangerous thing walke farre vnworthie vocation comonlie doo may hartilie repent v licentious dissolute wicked life euer crie vnto thee pardon grant heauenlie father denieng vnfruitfull receiuing thy word laid charge vtter confusion length may onlie receiue speedilie learne bring foorth fruit applieng liues exact rule thereof walking thee holinesse righteousnesse continuall thanks praise thy mercy shewed vnto v euer seeking thine honor glorie dooings may end short wearie peregrination taken vp vnto thee euerlasting rest quietnesse prepared beleeuers merit iesus christ lord daughter amen increase true preacher complaining lacke herein mother heauenlie father according wee taught thy sonne humblie beseech thee mercifullie bow downe thine eies behold great plentifull thy haruest euen readie cut downe thrust thou foorth good faithfull laborer reape gather thy barn though thy haruest great yet labourer verie behold lord miserable estate day thy seelie sheepe wander vp without shepheard euerie one almost goeth priuaite imagination accounting part dutie charge mooued therat take pitie great miserie better sort see lament lord busilie seeke redresse thereof owne priuate comodities set apart surelie thy sheepe euen thy sheepe heauenlie shepheard perilous case gone astray euerie one owne way euen owne destruction barren mountaines almost vtterlie famished lacke food themselues able returne fold thing euen thou hast giuen charge part either sleepe sweetlie awake content way occupie themselues lord wilt thou also alwaies sleepe neuer arise vp reuenged manifest iniuries wilt thou neuer displace carelesse hireling raise vp place shall vigilant pastor ouer charge although sinnes deserue redresse neither yet giue v anie hope find mercie matter yet thy name sake thine honour glorie father cease dailie present selues thee euen present humblie beseeching thee name thy sonne iesus christ raise vp among v like thou hast begun manie good shepheards let anie paine discomfiture seeke thy wandering sheepe defend v bloudthirstie iawes rauening woolues good guide shew v waie themselues lead vnto v yea carie home poore faint vpon back good faithfull distributer thy word mystery giue v food due season breaking vnto v liuing bread giuing v drinke water life whereas manie v almost perished famine therefore becom lothsome ill liking thy sight may therby thy helpe recouered lothsomnesse ill liking restored againe former plight beautie may strong growe grace godlinesse altogither safetie thy fold one hart voice declare thy mercie goodnesse woonderous work sanctifie thy holie name euer grant thou heauenlie father lord haruest sake thy name sake merit iesus christ onlie guide chiefe shepheard liueth reigneth thee holie ghost euer daughter amen vniuersities schooles mother blesse thou therefore lord dew thy spirit uniuersities schooles sith hath pleased thee thine appointed meanes haue preacher teacher may instructed godly knowledge learning made fit walke woorthilie vocation time soeuer shall please thee call forth grant besech thee ought light nursses vnto country euen may giue vnto godlie perfect life nourish vp good sound doctrine thy glorie comfort discharge duty bicause day charitie waxeth cold number couetous worldling much increased seeke rather keepe backe liuings plucke awaie rather bestowe anie thing maintenance studie blesse thou therfore thing sufficient seruice thee increase good learning lacke thereof hinderance building thy house setting foorth thine honour glorie remooue among v mercifull father whatsoeuer occasion let hinderance vnto couet knowledge sanctifieng thy holie name iesus christ lord daughter amen good estate realme mother also thou hast commanded v call vpon thee daie troble promising thou wilt heare praiers therefore humblie beseech thee fauourable vnto realme visit offence sharpelie neither giue v drinke bitter cup vnto iudgement seemeth thou hast prepared v lord wee may abide force thy iudgments denie haue woorthilie deserued whatsoeuer punishment thou hast euer hertofore powred forth vpon anie nation sith thy name called among v sith make account anie helpe onlie thee sith acknowledge offence humblie desire pardon iesus christ let thy iust iudgements laie hold vpon v expedient v thy honour glorie taste thy mercie thou hast hitherto dealt exceeding mercifullie v thou hast planted among v goodlie vineyard best plant thou hast walled round watered plentifullie dew thy blessing much thou couldest haue done v thou hast done neither hast thou dealt nation ala wretched sinner contrarie desert thy louing kindnesse haue brought foorth wild grape thou hatest steed good sweet grape thou lookest wee haue taken thy word mouthes haue hated reformed thereby yea haue vtterlie despised thy holie word preacher thereof derision haue made open readie waie vnto damnable work blasphemie idolatrie murther adulterie pride couetousnesse disobedience sensualitie vnmercifulnesse oppression slander vnthankfulnesse whatsoeuer else corrupt nature casting aside grace discipline woont bring foorth whilest thing thou heldest thy peace winkedst thereat therefore foolishlie imagine thou art like vnto v delighted sinne thus haue work prouoked thy diuine maiestie greeuous displeasure v holie god seeing thy long sufferance thou hast mercifullie striken hard hart secret consideration miserable estate beseech thee iesus christ sake giue v likewise repentant hart sorowfull former misdeed thereby may also attaine promise thou hast annexed therevnto namelie thou breake downe wall thy vineyard thou suffer eaten vp troden downe thou laie waste brier thorn growe vp therein thou command cloud raine vpon neither thou turne roote rottennesse neither yet thou make bud rise vp like dust bicause haue cast thy lawe lord god host contemned thy word holie one israel make v byword vnto neighbour scorne vnto dwell v rather grant beseech thee hencefoorth may hartilie repent walke thee newnesse life thy honor glorie example neighbour conuersion confusion enimies euerlasting comfort iesus christ lord daughter amen praier repentance mother although infirmity doo euidentlie appeare diuers way shew foorth themselues vnto v almightie mercifull god yet nothing cannot perceiue behold owne wickednesse sort indeed tongs confesse thou thy selfe hast said altogither vnrighteous one v doth good imagine mischiefe although driuen thine eternall truth outwardlie confesse yet haue inward feeling thereof ought haue altogither closed vp owne stubbernesse selfeloue wherfore commeth passe neither repent v amend neither yet hartilie acknowledge certainlie knowe within v holie god long shall cleane without vnderstanding long shall flesh haue dominion ouer thy good spirit v long shall cloud vnsensiblenesse darken blemish inward sight uerelie sinnes haue deserued onlie thou hide thy face awaie v time thou shouldest vtterlie cast v thy fauour grace eternall damnation sith thou art wont deale mercifullie euen sonnes men vnto v also hast giuen good likelihood thereof thou hast striken hart feeling owne wretchednesse putteth v good comfort hope thou hast done end intent thou maist bestowe larger grace v also therefore somewhat emboldened although dust ash humblie desire thee name thy sonne iesus christ euen length thou wilt vouchsafe giue vnto v grace hartie repentance wee knowe likewise may acknowledge vnto thee vnrighteousnesse hencefoorth labour busilie without anie delaie amend thing wherein haue hitherto offended thee knowe lord onelie time mercie much obtaine mortall life remaineth nothing v looked fearefull rigorous sentence iudgement grant therefore beseech thee mercifull god sith damnable estate reason continuall disobedience meanes recouer selues thy mercifull gift repentance may euen obtaine thy hand onlie thy grace annexed therevnto needfull v accomplishing thy setting foorth thy honour glorie iesus christ lord sauiour sitteth thy right hand euen euer make intercession v daughter amen authoritie discipline established church mother crookednesse disobedience haue taken deepe roote estate adaies manie dare boldlie refuse ecclesiasticall censure great hinderance course gospell grant therefore beseech thee like thou hast dealt nation euen may please thee length extend thy like mercie vnto realme also others necessitie authoritie ecclesiasticall censure discipline sinnes thou hast hitherto kept backe v may placed church due punishment sinfull life contempt thy word sort may extend indifferentlie vnto estate high lowe well terror ill comfort good also speedie perfect reformation thing yet disordered thy church iesus supplie infirmity wherewith dailie offend thee blesse thou therefore mercifull vnto thy church vniuersallie member thereof namelie vnto prince ciuil magistrate gouernment thy name may alwaies sanctified thy glorious kingdome faithfullie prepared unto bishop spirituall pastor may diligentlie execute charge committed vnto unto subiects inferior may thee thee obeie serue loue honor superior sweet promise thine eternall father hath vttered thee blessed put trust furthermore petition thou wilt blesse v countrie commonweales increase among v dailie ye number faithfull prosper course gospell tender loue god thus preuenting wretched man great hartie vnspeakable good vouchsafed become man man sake yea anie find hart hate man woman whose nature likenesse plainelie seeth manhood god doubtles
