confounded order step thy word shall wickednesse haue dominion ouer keepe thy ceremony forsake vtterlie halleluiah praier lord iesus christ sonne liuing god thanke thee forasmuch thy decree concerning redemption mankind beginning thou hast beene present thy church outwardlie speaking vnto hir thy minister inwardlie kindling thy light righteousnesse hart faithfull thou hast ratified thy promise outward signes ceremony whereby euerie man may applie benefit vnto himselfe thy burnt offering sacrifice testifie thee afterwards slaine flame fire heauen set fire offering witnesse thy presence manie behold thy benefit true faith thou wouldest quicken sacrifice thine holie spirit inflameth true knowledge good motion within godlie life giuen thy meere mercie first parent knowe full well said woman shall bring foorth mediator called seed woman withall promised subduer sathan knew god man promise repeated vnto abraham father faithfull forasmuch restraint made vnto certaine nation thou didst adde new rite circumcision whereby onelie posteritie abraham discerned nation also testimonie admonishing seed come christ take weake flesh vpon beare nature bring iewes gentils vnto eternall felicitie wherefore yeeld thee humble thanks forasmuch hitherto thou hast continued sound thy person office notwithstanding great raging thine enimies appearing length flesh giuing thy selfe vnto v newyeares gift inestimable price made vnder lawe cursse saue v wretch cursse lawe restore v vnto innocencie lost sinne cause thy blessed vpon daie circumcised flesh first shead thy pretious bloud v vncircumcised hart lip shew thou camest deede verie seed abraham wast subiect lawe cursse condemnation v corrupt nature thy holinesse might sanctified haue thee obedience answere withall beseech thee therefore grant v true circumcision spirit hart member mortified worldlie carnall lust may thing obeie thy blessed heere staie selues put trust thee thus hast humbled thy selfe lowe v may exalted thee hart praie thee ioine v holie companie wait thy redemption came doo reioice come performed sacred host angel giue glorie renowme vnto thee bringing thy peace passeth vnderstanding vpon earth declaring great kindnesse good towards v giue thy selfe thereby euerlasting ioie blisse newyeares gift worthie memoriall inestimable value owne euer euer speake hencefoorth hart thy louelie voice lighten lampe mind thy heauenlie knowledge confirme v thy blessed sacrament certaine token thine vndoubted regeneration quickning v oh take awaie cursse wrath god damnation work flesh diuell grant beseech thee thy grace may dailie mortifie concupiscence pleasure thing world wealth rich glorie libertie fauour men meates drink apparell ease yea life selfe horror impatiencie greeuous thing may weakened accustome selfe denie easie pleasant thing life euer become obedient readie christian patience doo thy good thing hartilie willinglie serue thee doo whatsoeuer may please thee make saie effectuall power thy grace holie spirit working miserable wretch hate abhor flie subdue adulterie whoredome vncleannesse vnnaturall lust euill concupiscence inordinate desire wantonnes tendernes delicatenes idlenes dronkennes gluttonie slothfulnes distrust despaire ignorance weakenes wilfulnes idolatrie superstition hypocrisie heresie error sect variance strife wrath enuie slander lieng swearing curssing vaineglorie pride couetousnes theft deceit flatterie whatsoeuer else lord fighteth rebelleth thy holie spirit strengthen thy might may onlie drawe mine earthlie member horrible vice rehearsed vnder foot also fight continuallie subdue may turne best meet matter whereon may exercise faith powre foorth hartie praier giue thee hartie thanks victorie finallie worke thy blessing fruit spirit righteousnes peace loue ioie holie ghost longsuffering gentlenes goodnes faithfulnes meekenes temperance strength patience like grant v remission sinnes righteousnes life restore mind thy lawe begin new conformitie new yeare life conuersation may perfect life come thou sauiour thy power merit mind may perceiue thy father peace v thy death find thee dwelling within v eternall life happinesse amen halleluiah epiphanie twelfe daie apparition christ three king offering christ preface get thee vp beetimes bright daughter ierusalem thy light commeth glorie lord risen vpon thee lift vp thine eies looke round thee behold gentile shall come thy light king brightnesse springeth foorth vpon thee multitude camel dromedary bring rich gentile shall couer thee saba mada epha shall come bringing gold incense shewing foorth praise lord gather themselues come thee thy sonnes shall come vnto thee farre thy daughter shall gather themselues thee euerie side fro east west isle also shall wait speciallie ship tharsis may bring thy sonnes daughter farre siluer gold vnto name lord thy god vnto holie one israel hath glorified thee stranger shall build vp thy wals king shall doo thee seruice yea king prince host gentils shall see arise worship thee haue made thee light gentile thou maist health vnto end world thou shalt suck milke gentils king brest shall feed thee king saie shall thy nursing father queenes shall thy nursing mother shall come kneeling vnto thee haue vexed thee despise thee shall fall thy foot thee face flat vpon earth licke vp dust thy foot yea euerie people kingdome serueth thee shall perish destroied vtter destruction thou shalt knowe lord sauiour redeemer euen mightie one iacob whosoeuer putteth trust shall confounded dwell wildernes saie shall kneele king sonne enimies shall licke dust king tharsis isle shall giue present king arabia saba shall bring gift king shall fall downe nation shall doo seruice shall liue vnto shall giuen gold arabia praier shall made euer vnto dailie shall praised lord declared saluation righteousnesse hath openlie shewed sight heathen world shall worship thee god sing thee praise thy name high lord king earth may glad thereof yea multitude isle may reioice bee glad thereof bring therefore vnto lord ye mightie bring present gift vnto lord ye kindred nation world come saie court praise speake good name ascribe vnto lord onelie strength power kingdome glorie worship god saie ye god king iudges ruler earth worship holie worship giue honor due vnto name make praise glorious liues conuersation hath exalted himselfe exalted farre aboue god praise glorie aboue heauen earth halleluiah praier oeternall god father lord iesus christ woonderfull maner reuealedst thy selfe baptisme christ standing water iordan time thou diddest testifie thy sonne holie ghost appeared likenesse dooue gouerne v thine holie spirit true faith may obeie thee kindle mind true knowledge thy benefit bring passe approching vnto thee praiers may discerne thee true god aboue feined god mind turne selues banke water companie godlie auditor beholder noble appearing made speake vnto v thy sonne holie ghost turne v vnto true obedience thou broughtest godlie auditor vnto sight christ taking flesh vpon became mediatour thou eternall father spakest cloud holie ghost appeared likenes dooue bring passe life may depend vpon benefit thy soone coupled nature vnto make eternall couenant v cause heauens like maner opened vnto v may heare thy voice thy spirit rest vpon v worke v beginning eternall life vntill thy visible presence shall hold thy diuinivntill heauens darklie cloud face face beeing made like thy sonne christian magician philosopher persia remnant schoole daniel conduct leading starre came farre see thee gaue notable testimonie birth christ iesus sauiour mainteine euermore thine owne glorie sake congregation may set foorth celebrate thy benefit grant luckie starre light faith may rise vnto v seeketh thee bethlem manger thy word reuealed ministerie wander right waie neither seeke fained byway humane opinion seruice suffer lampe thy light extinguished either darkenes hypocrite idolater rage tyrant wage mortall battell thee grant endued new light thee true sunne righteousnesse may reioice whole hart acknowledge thee bee captaine wilt gouerne thy people truth equitie let light thy grace saie lighten darkenes conscience mercifull iesu true bright loadestar world thy ioifull apparition giue vnto v full knowledge thy selfe owne selues within may see thee inwardlie find thee may continuallie offer vnto thy holie maiestie mirrh sincere faith inward contrition frankincense deuout praier inuocation gold loue righteousnes patience trouble ascribing vnto thee honour king seruice due vnto god may shew true liberalitie godlie vnto thee thy poore church beare sufficient testimonie world thy kingdome diuinitie priesthood humanitie crosse death buriall take hold manifold benefit thereof outwardlie also may place office calling helpe mainteine thy ministerie vttermost power grant thou thou hadst reuealed manifested thy selfe vnto three wise men leading starre causedst returne another waie owne countrie wee waie darkenes offence haue retired gone backe supernall countrie blessednes thou bright daiestar world beeing guide may returne vnto waie truth grace knowing thee faith depart life wee may bee brought kingdome thy diuinitie shall shine without mist mystery haue fruition thy glorious godhead woorship thee praise thee euer euer amen halleluiah ashwednesdaie first daie lent christ fasting fortie day preface let bridegroome come forth chamber bride hir closet let sinner weepe lord saie turne thou v good lord shall turned fauorable lord fauorable thy people spare v rent hart garment turne thee fasting weeping praieng thou art mercifull god full compassion long suffering great pitie thou sparest deserue punishment thy wrath thinkest vpon mercie oh spare thy people good lord spare let thine heritage brought confusion heare v lord thy mercie great multitude thy mercy looke vpon v haue mercie vpon v god haue mercie vpon v miserable sinner p heere saie seuen penitentiall psalmes following praiers contrition repentance thinke good praier lord god iesus christ onlie redeemer tookest vpon thee sinfull flesh liuedst therein life holie righteousnes example didst power thy godhead diuine nature reuerentlie obeie thing thine heauenlie father subduing flesh great triumph glorie maiestie power diuell world flesh onlie thee spirit sanctification might myraculouslie appeere beare swaie fulnesse sight flesh course life euer remaine power glorie verie god verie god kingdome god father beseech thee humblie lord iesu hatest nothing thou hast made dooest forgiue sinnes penitent haue compassion vpon v weakenesse infirmitie thou hast safetie taken upon thee flesh sake didst fast fortie day fortie night hast diuerslie thine owne person felt man fraile state mortall nature inclinable without thy diuine power fall obedience thy heauenlie suggestion sathan old enimie allurement thing earthlie vaine transitorie beseech thee god grant vnto v thine holie spirit strength thereof v proceeding thee may weakenesse haue power enimie may resisted world defied flesh vanquished spirit quickened whereby may gladlie obeie thy godlie turne vnto thee heart vnfeigned repentance hartie contrition earnest confession also true fasting competent feeding faithfull praieng charitable dealing chast looking reuerent beholding godlie hearing fruitefull speaking holie thinking free flattering void detraction slander lieng false accusation blasphemie outfacing idle talke filthie communication tread steadilie thing step true holines thee thou hast gratiouslie lead v taught v waie simplicitie outwardlie inwardlie bodie soule part member fast lent euer may prophane earthlie hypocritish superstitious carnall view world holie heauenlie spirituall thee giue v grace saie much absteine meates ill manner flesh filthie cogitation thou god wilt worshipped spirit truth spirituall fast pleaseth thee suffer v gratious god abuse thy good creature immoderatelie hurt body soules temperatlie better serue thee soberlie take food carefullie absteine sinne otherwise absteine meate refraine pride couetousnes concupiscence lewdnes like vice shall hurt body hypocriticall abstinence cast awaie soules exceeding impietie assist v thy secret grace therefore beseech thee vse abstinence flesh subdued spirit may euer obeie thy godlie motion righteousnes true holines reioicing peace conscience obteining thee god mercie perfect remission forgiuenes aboundance thy grace may shew foorth fruitfullie thy glorie day liues life ended reigne thee euer thy glorious kingdome holy folke doo rest thy blessed natiuitie holie circumcision fasting temptation crosse death passion thou hast alone deerelie purchased v perpetuall praise thine eternall name amen haue sinned haue sinned haue mercie vpon first sundaie lent christ temptation wildernesse glorious conquest ouer sathan preface sonne thou wilt come seruice god stand fast righteousnesse feare prepare thy soule temptation tempted remember alwaie lord thy god lead thee fortie yeares wildernes humble thee prooue thee knowe thine hart whether thou wouldest keepe commandements humbled thee suffered thee hunger fed thee manna neither thou thy father knew make thee knowe man doth liue bread onlie euerie word proceedeth mouth lord doth man liue daie therefore heare voice harden hart prouocation daie temptation wildernesse father tempted prooued sawe work fortie yeares long greeued generation said people doo erre hart haue knowne way vnto whome sware wrath enter rest examine lord prooue trie reines hart thy louing kindnes euer mine eies walke thy truth haue sinned haue mercie vpon praier cause thine appeering flesh sonne god lord sauiour christ destroie work sathan first parent diuell hatred thee thine eternall father encountred visible forme soaked mind certaine suspicion doubtings thy pricked desire excellent nature themselues creature excellent tickled spurre pride ambition subtiltie caried headlong himselfe withdrawne thee bottomles pit eternall destruction thou incensed infinite vnspeakable good thou bearest mankind tookest v miserable wretch insatiable iawes mortall enimie thy flesh length dreaded assaile thee captaine thou puttest shamefull flight drauest thee thine anie time thy small assistance may repell preuaile fierce assalts temptation unto thee almightie god victorious captaine godlie groanes doo crie requiring thy mercifull hand made number thy celestiall souldiers parteners thy glorious victorie enioiers thy happines arme v thy heauenlie armour knowledge thy word spirituall consolation whereby may bee able repell firie dart foule feend thy church age hath enimie thine set himselfe brought engins ouerthrowe vsed thine owne person time thou wentest thy baptisme preaching knowing thy prosperitie would decaie yet god acknowledge thee messias troubled thee beeing wildernes without worldlie power aid wealth rich horrible cogitation vexe thy soule troubled thy hart greefe vnspeakable time thy church lieth wildernesse poorelie miserablie doth lie oppressed wrongfull iniuries mightie trouble laugheth thereat derideth saincts standing vnder crosse bid stone made bread contemneth miserie casteth teeth glorie wealth kingdome assist v temptation may laie hold armour proofe behold noble answere thine man liueth bread onlie knowledge thee euerliuing father holie ghost true almightie god giuing v bread life ordeining corporall thing fed susteined life eternall father knowest need alone canst giue reason manner thou wilt feed v thou dooest starres without corporall thing giue vnto church thy wisedome thing necessarie sustentation life wherein ioies life eternall come doth begin albeit sometimes lacke diuers thing although thine aduersarie throweth stone v bread yet thy power strengthen v faint thou art maker wee thy workemanship thy hand whole frame world liue bread alone owne industrie neither art thou tied fatall chaine second cause thy decree thy doo breath thee liue moue haue beeing thy commandement take life thou biddest leaue world wherefore please thee shall liue doo bird aire haue protection child mother wombe knoweth liueth albeit lieng great darkenes couered secret part receiueth nourishment maruellous manner mother length course nature commeth safe sound world notwithstanding liuing palpable darkenes life wrapped misery world among packe thine enimies yet armed thy word promise doo receiue comfort thereby protected thee woonderfull sort length trust deliuered bodie sinne come better life neuer shall haue end made liue alwaies world miserie thou hast prepared glorious life thy seruants sweetnes whereof beginneth world thy word life eternall father thy sonne word speaking v inwardlie outwardlie outwardlie minister vttereth thy bosome thy commandements inwardlie speaketh soules raising vp godlie cogitation manner pleasing thee double life reserued v wit corporall spirituall bread owne merit thy reuealed thy sonne furthermore forsomuch sathan vseth another kind weapon destruction godlie thy church enioieth quietnes peace stirring excellent good wit teacher armed publike authoritie vnto curiositie ambition whereby enuie hatred vaine contention mooued famous men cast themselues pinacle temple heresy doo arise humblie beseech thee respect also hurtfull former subtiltie sathan represse thine enimie corrupteth thy word vseth confirmation damnable opinion quench flame ambition pride curiositie leade v temptation neither suffer v tempt thee contend thee pride setting owne wisedome subtiltie thee ouerthrowe first parent suffer v forsake thy word neither permit fowle lieng spirit falsifie v make v constantlie rest vpon thy promise sacred sure anchor setting motion curiositie pride last remoue v horrible torment idolatrie world daie wrapped idle seruice yea vnwittinglie whole world full idol great dishonor thy name fained god erected superstitious inuocations confirmed idolater swimme wealth rule rost thy glorie defaced thy maiestie blasphemed diuell rageth reigneth giueth kingdomes disposeth good world word true lieth shamefullie thou thou alone alterest empire confirmest thy pleasure order obserued thou causest misorder raised diuell shall punished thee paine eternall wherefore haue mercie v god haue mercie v deliuer v thicke mud idolatrie make v lift vp eies vnto thee sonne glorie abhorring feined seruice ceremony contrarie thy word wee may acknowledge serue sanctifie thee true god father sonne holie ghost thy sonne dooest deliuer v power sathan make v heires thine euerlasting kingdome alone knowest hart grones creature onlie wilt called vpon name thy sonne heare v onelie sake wherefore vnto thee god iehoua doo speake thee onelie thine assistance serue neuer giue thy glorie another take vp impudent theefe satan would steale awaie thine honour banish far thy church gard body soules gard thine holie angel may pitch tent v encounter sathan besetteth v side deliuer v hand misery life last passing world carie soules vnto societie thy saint life eternall amen haue sinned haue sinned haue mercie vpon diuel manifold temptation wanted tempter thou wert armed stronglie intent ouercome thou didst restraine strengthen tempter came transformed angel light intent deceiue thou diddest rebuke intent knowe thou diddest inlighten great red dragon old serpent called diuell sathan hath seuen head ten horn thou hast created take pleasure huge broad sea wherein creepe liuing wight innumerable beast great small saie diuers sort fiend practise nothing else daie night go seeking may deuoure except thou rescue old dragon bred paradise pleasure draweth downe third part starres heauen taile cast ground venem poisoneth water earth manie men drinke may die triumpheth vpon gold mire opinion iordan shall runne mouth made mould feareth man shall saue v chap shall plucke v mouth sauing thou lord hast broken head great dragon helpe v lord spread thy wing ouer v lord may flie vnder face dragon pursueth v fence thou v horne thy sheeld continuall endeuour onelie desire deuoure soules thou hast created therefore crie vnto thee god deliuer v dailie aduersarie whether sleepe wake whether eate drinke whether wee dooing anie thing else presseth vpon v kind meanes assaulting v daie night traines policy shooting venemous arrowes v sometime openlie somtime priuilie slea soules yet lewdlie ouerseene lord whereas see dragon continuallie readines deuoure v open mouth neuerthelesse doo sleepe riot owne slothfulnesse though danger desireth nothing else destroie v enimie intent kill v watcheth continuallie neuer sleepeth yet wake sleepe saue selues behold hath pitched infinite snare foot filled way sundrie trap catch soules escape hath laid snare v rich hath laid snare pouerty hath laid snare meate drinke pleasure sleepe waking hath set snare v word work life lord deliuer v net fowler hard word may giue praise thee saieng blessed lord hath giuen v vp torne teeth soule deliuered sparowe net fowler net broken escaped temptation sathan praie thus lord iesu christ onlie staie fence mortall state onlie hope onlie saluation glorie triumph flesh thou hadst cause taken vpon thee didst suffer thy selfe tempted sathan onlie alone men diddest vtterlie ouercome vanquish sinne death world diuell kingdome hell whatsoeuer thou hast ouercommed behalfe thou hast ouercommed neither hath thy haue anie thy seruants keepe battell fight anie foresaid euils purpose reward v crowne glorie intent thou mightest likewise ouercome sathan thy member thou hast afore done thine owne person giue thou beseech thee vnto v thy souldiers lion victorious tribe iuda strength roring lion continuallie wandereth fro seeking whome may deuour thou serpent true giuer health life nailed high vpon tree giue vnto thy little seelie one wilinesse deceiptfull awaitings subtil serpent thou lambe white snowe vanquisher sathans tyrannie giue v thy little sheepe strength vertue thy spirit owne selues weake feeble thee strong valiant wee may withstand ouercome assault diuell ghostlie enimie may glorie ouer v conquerours thee may giue thanks thy mercie infinite almightie power thine incomprehensible loue towards v may alwaie worthilie receiue blessed sacrament according thy holie ordinance thereby may obtaine increase goodnes vnitie spirit thee head thee thy spirit companie trulie thine thy spirituall mysticall bodie spirituall christian brother sister suffer v also beseech thee fall anie slothfull carelesse negligence whereby vnkindlie forget inestimable benefit rather occasion mind woorthilie prepared holie action thankefullie renew memorie thy infinite loue towards v receiue grace thereby offered vnto v ioining v continuallie neerer vnto thee till ioined without anie separation vnto thee thee finallie thine owne blessed person thou hast giuen example perfect loue whereby humblenesse meekenesse serue one another thou lord maister v didst vouchsafe thy last supper wash foot thy disciple seruants grant v louing meeke spirit thine whereby may far disdaine despising brother readie good thing dutifull seruiceable vnto thee thee thou hast left v commandement may loue one another thou hast loued v thereby knowne thy disciple especiallie christ may faithfull loue toward thee sake wast content vnfaithfullie vnfriendlie betraied liued familiarlie thee thou mightest thereby assure v thine euerlasting loue mercie thee therfore father holie ghost praise honour glorie euer amen haue sinned haue sinned haue mercie good fridaie christ reuiled reuiled againe suffered threatened committing vengeance iudgeth righteouslie despised shame endured crosse suffered v wretch leauing v example likewise followe step whose stripe healed wo ala euer sinned oh soule come therefore let v laie awaie presseth downe sinne hangeth fast let v run patience vnto battell set v loking vp vnto iesus captaine finisher faith onelie reioice crosse christ seeing haue redemption bloud euen forgiuenesse sin past present come much knowe redeemed old vaine conuersation corruptible thing siluer gold euen pretious bloud christ owne selfe bare sinnes bodie crucifie dailie afresh blasphemie maner vngodlinesse whose bellie god whose glorie shame whose end eternall damnation bodie soule rather haue conscience purged dead work serue liuing god let v passe rest time abode trembling feare euer reioice crosse christ sufficient v wee haue spent time past life gentile walking wantonnesse lust excesse wine excesse eating drinking excesse riot abhominable idolatrie therefore crie wo ala euer sinned vpon wretch thus greeuouslie haue offended god god aske thee mercie haue mercie vpon lord haue mercie vpon wo mee euer transgressed oh soule let v esteeme knowe nothing saue iesus christ crucified yea god forbid reioice anie thing crosse lord iesus christ whereby world crucified v vnto world crucified christ may liue god hauing libertie enter holie place bloud iesus new liuing waie hath prepared v vaile flesh let v consider one another prouoke vnto loue good work drawe nigh true penitent hart assurance faith sprinkeled hart euill conscience meditate dailie mercy giue thanks continuallie benefit passion eternall redemption still reioice crosse christ iesu lord saie praier lord iesu christ sonne liuing god mouth hartie affection wee glorifie thee praise thy name immortall thanks thine infinite goodwill towards mankind thou vouchsafest become intercessor v vnto thine heauenlie father bearing horrible wrath conceiued v sinnes offering thy selfe death adorne v eternall glorie thou wast hanged crosse made cursse v ouerwhelmed sorowes heauie flesh bloud beare thou sufferedst displeasure consuming fire god thou shedst thy bloud thy whole bodie thy death thy member beeing pierced oh christ oh sweet iesu thou shedst thy pretious bloud saie sixe seuerall time sundrie part thy blessed bodie afore thine execution v miserable sinner namelie first thy circumcision beginning redemption secondlie thy praier garden earnest desire redemption thirdlie thy whipping fourthlie thy crowning thornes reward redemption thy stripe healed fiftlie thy crucifieng nailing crosse thy hand foot bored fasten thee thereon price redemption sixtlie lastlie wounding piercing thy blessed side yea thy verie hart thou hanging dead crosse true sacrament redemption whereby cleansed purified washed sinnes among thy diuers torment afore thy execution thy spirit resolued sense infinite anguish thou sufferedst enduredst oh christ thou vtteredst diuers word partlie reason intollerable greefe partlie thine vnspeakable goodnes oh teach v thy wisedome reuerentlie listen vnto put carefullie bottome mind thy death mankind seuered two part thou head pensiue church hangedst vpon crosse redie yeeld vp ghost crosse stand thy louing mother marie godlie woman iohn thy weake disciple moorning rage iewes hide themselues nichodemus ioseph aramathie great greefe mind faine hold tongs winke outragious crueltie nation thee gracelesse iewes vngodlie souldiers pilate herode laie hold thee mocke thee blindfold thee buffet thee pierce thee plaie thy garment epicure tyrant high priest parasits haue thee derision laugh sleeues see thy death conspired may walter superstition wickednesse multitude ethniks quarter world celebrate filthie vngodlie feast great dishonour thy name thou beholdest diuersitie men seest thing heauen earth beeing deed humble meeke hart thou powredst charitable praier wise father forgiue knowe doo word thy priesthood thou art chiefest priest bedewed thine owne bloud entring holiest holie place touchest brest father searchest enen secret counsell thou praiest onlie thy weake auditor strengthned also thy verie enimies put thee shamefullie death returne vnto repentance yea mankind thou praiedst namelie euerie one beleeue thy name mercifull intercessor include selues thy generall praiers recited thine agonie repeated crosse yea vttered beginning world standing right hand thy father making intercession v sounded continuallie eares god worke found number whome sathan hath entred blaspheame thee despise thy benefit destroie themselues vtterlie increase faith knowledge thee eternall father thy sacrifice pleased may forgiue sinnes receiue v companie glorious thine eies crosse standeth thy noble sorowfull mother hir sister good woman thy disciple iohn whome thou louedst blesse v thy goodnes ioine v companie thy mother shineth notable light strength faith beholdeth thee hir sonne sight none could greeuous world sawe rage thine enimies thine intollerable torment yet beleeued notwithstanding greeuousnes thy paine shedding thy pretious bloud flight thy disciple crueltie thine enimies odiousnes thy death beleeued saie force faith thou wast god nature shouldest rise againe reigne euerlastinglie ouercome death diuell subdue thine enimies sonne god kindle within v praie thee like spark faith giue v grace thine elect neuer ashamed stand vnder thy crosse thou euen entire good mercifullie among thy seruants didst speake vnto comfort thy pensiue moorning mother speake vnto v thy troubled church miserie comfort hir thy sweet voice presence thou commendedst thy mother thine apostle make v vnfeignedlie loue church thy sweet true mother grant euerie v may cherish louinglie mainteine vttermost power especiallie guide preacher may loue mother nourish vnitie pure doctrine auoid seed heresy remooue stumblingblockes occasion hindering faith praier yoong christian thy side hang two theeues punished sinnes according lawe desert whereof one desperatelie powring blasphemous speech godlie requiring thy fauour ended day mankind lord doo likewise hang misery sinnes whereof captiued mind point death scoffe blaspheme desperatelie vtter condemnation finish day giue v grace beseech thee may imitate example gratious theefe passage life moued infallible argument thine almightinesse mercie required pardon offence obteined according request giue grace may imitate hartie repentance sorowe sin notable faith zealous confession good work beseech thee mercifull lord mindfull v lord mindfull v thou sittest kingdom thy father misery world thou mindfull v begin thy kingdome v heere world euerie combate conscience especiallie point death pronounce heart comfortable absolution daie shalt thou paradise shew vnto v thy paradise departing life may find rest soules open soules gate paradise place seates immortalitie state blisse thy father togither blessed companie angel men sheweth himselfe euen meane thy combate yet finished thou criedst pittifull maner god god hast thou forsaken thy diuinitie separated thy humanitie neuer lost tooke neither surcessedst dooest thou surcesse anie time equall one thine eternall father houre thy humiliation wherein woonderfull vnspeakable maner thy diuinitie hid selfe would haue obedience showne thought best destroie iewes thine enimies murtherers yea hid selfe streames god displeasure sinnes men fall vpon thee christ wrestle extreame torment certeine space thou perceiuedst comfort notwithstanding thy diuinitie confirmed thine humane nature suffer passion thy diuinitie could suffer anie passion therefore confirmed might sufficient satisfaction sin men haue endured greeuous torment could neuer abide god comfort v may abide punishment men may said though body greefe feele yet soules great ioie vertuous hope strengthen paine naught annoie intollerable creature suffer punishment god saued thereby wherefore sonne god displeasure bee mindfull thy mercie thou protection wrath thine eternall father doo destroie v euen little taste god displesure bursteth peeces bone men like lion therfore thou vtteredst like complaint saieng thirst thy soule languished greatnesse thy paine thy spirit resolued thy woonderfull greefe hart thy bowel dried awaie moisture abode therefore trulie didst thou inwardlie thirst desire vertue comfort thy father outwardlie haue thy bodie refreshed iesu christ art fountaine eternall life giuing water quencheth thirst whose bellie springeth well life suffer v taste greeuous thirst merciles rich glutton hell neuer quenched godlie saie soule stucke vnto iawes quietnes bone lord thy iudgements correct thy furie least come vnto nothing thou obseruest iniquity lord lord shall able abide thus doo thy saincts crie saie trouble wherefore kindle thy wrath altogither v cease comfort weake nature striuing thy iudgements iuice thy word comfortable watering thy spirit unto thee thine eternall father manifest presence comfort sake better quieted thou saiedst finished thou gauest thanks thine eternall father helping thee whereby sacrifice welfare elect euermore fulfilled oh sacred priest imprint within v celestiall conclusion notable finishing thy sacrifice vndoubtedlie may thinke sacrifice remission sinnes life eternall purchased v afterward deliuered feares thou criedst great voice father thy hand commend spirit grant departure world may vtter word make v feele presence thy father comforting v pleased thee may know body soules doo perish let v iest epicure doo saieng fugitiue flattering pale curst naked soule whither goest thou thou hast prepared v sonne god large pleasant place thy father house manie resting place feare torment thou hast deliuered v paine hell purgatorie thy father embraceth soules mercifull armes laieth abraham bosome replenisheth quietnesse light ioie vnspeakable till body also raised againe appeare euerlasting kingdome faith giue v grace leaue world rest thee euer euer amen amen haue sinned haue sinned god god haue mercie vpon god forbid reioice crosse christ whereby world crucified vnto world thus fruitfull meditation vpon passion sauiour iesus christ read often lord iesus christ sonne euerliuing almightie god whome thing made ruled gouerned thou liuelie image substance father eternall wisedome god brightnesse glorie god god light light coequall coeternall consubstantiall father thou loue thou haddest mankind hee fallen fellowship god societie sathan euill didst vouchsafe redemption become mediatour betweene god man taking thy godhead nature concerning substance becamest man also heire mercifull messias power thy godhead merit thy manhood hast made purgation sin euen thine owne selfe whilest thou wast heere earth set right hand thy father v euen concerning nature maiestie glorie power infinite pray humblie beseech thy mercie grant present reherse thy passion suffering last night thou wast heere thy death thy good spirit might thereby effectuall worke faith well pardon sinnes mortification mine affection comfort cross patience affliction amen middest thy last supper thy deere apostle thing could thee namelie would leaue thee earnest would forsweare thee one twelue traiterouslie betraie thee small cross vnto thee iudas admonished thee beware tooke heed went finish worke contemning thine admonition counsell could vexe thy louing hart supper contention amongst thy disciple greatest thee yet dreaming carnallie thee thy kingdome hauing affection pride ambition busie amongst notwithstanding thy diligence reproouing teaching thine admonition crosse would come thereby make vigilant grosse thought could two sword put awaie peril little greefe vnto thee thy comming gethsamane heauinesse oppressed thee therefore thou wouldest thy disciple praie thou didst tell peter fellowes thy hart heauie death thou didst praie carefull also least fall temptation thou wentest stone cast didst praie thy selfe falling flat groueling vpon earth ala thou feltest comfort therefore thou camest thy disciple sweet deere vnto thee lo thy discomfort passe neither thy peril owne therefore sleepe apace thou hadst awaked thou goest againe praie thou foundest comfort therefore didst returne againe comfort thy deerest freends hand yet againe ala fast asleepe wherevpon thou art inforced go againe thy heauenlie father sparkle comfort thy wonderfull cross agony heere thou wast discouraged comfortlesse euen streames bloud came running thine eies eares part thy bodie able expresse infinitenes thy cross euen thy garden thou sufferedst sake well satisfie thy father wrath sinnes also sanctifie suffering gladlie susteined thy bloudie praier thou camest yet againe foundest thy disciple asleepe thou canst well awake lo iudas commeth great band weaponed men apprehend thee theefe doth leading thee awaie bound high bishop house anna caiphas heere augment thy miserie behold thy disciple flie thee false witness brought thee thou art accused condemned blasphemie peter euen thy sight forsweareth thee thou art vniustlie striken answering lawfullie thou art blindfeeld striken buffeted whole night bishop caiphas house cruell seruants morning betimes thou art condemned againe priest blasphemie therefore bring thee secular power pilate whome thou art openlie arraigned theeues malefactor sawe thou wast accused malice wife sent messenger vnto saieng haue thou nothing doo iust man haue suffered manie thing daie dreame reason yet dismisse thee send thee herod thou wast derided shamefullie comming going waie wonderfullie especiallie herod apparelled thee foole afore pilate againe therefore thou wast brought accused falslie man take thy part speake good word thee pilate caused thee whipped scourged handled pitifullie see anie pitie might appeare prelate man pitied thee barrabas notable theefe murtherer preferred thee people head taile thee cried crucifige hang thee vp uniustlie death wast thou iudged thou wast crowned sharpe thornes pierced thy braines thou wast made mocking stocke thou wast reuiled beaten scourged spit vpon miserablie handled thou wentest ierusalem place execution euen mount caluerie great crosse hang thee vp laid vpon thy backe beare drawe long thou wast able thy bodie racked nailed tree thy hand bored thy foot also nailes put fasten thee thereon thou wast hanged betweene heauen earth one spued heauen vomited earth vnworthie anie place high priest laughed thee scorne elder blasphemed thee said god care thee common people also laughed cried vpon thee thirst oppressed thee vineger onlie gall giuen thee drinke heauen shined thee sunne gaue thee light earth afraid beare thee sathan euen tempted thee thine owne humane sens caused thee crie god god hast thou forsaken oh wonderfull passion thou sweet iesus sufferedst mankind thou teachest thou comfortest god father sinnes forgiuen learne feare god loue god hope god hate sinne patient call vpon god neuer leaue anie temptation thee crie father thy hand commend spirit amen praier wherein confesse selues verie cause christ passion hast thou committed oh lord thou shouldest bee iudged hast thou offended thou shouldest cruellie handled ordered thy fault thine offence cause thy death occasion thy condemnation lord cause thy sorowe fault thou wast killed haue deserued thy death committed offence aduenged vpon thee oh maruellous kind iudgement vnspeakable disposition ordering mystery vniust man offendeth righteous punished guiltie doth euill innocent beaten euill doth trespasse good condemned euill man deserueth doth good iust suffer seruant doth amisse maister maketh amends man trespasseth god suffereth oh thou art sonne god lowe thine humilitie descend greatlie thy charitie euen waxe hot burne towards v far thy pitie exceed whither thy benignitie gentlenes growe extend far thy loue stretch far came thy compassion wrongfullie thou wast punished committed mischeeuous deed aduenged vpon thee fault thou submittedst thy selfe torment proud thou wast humble meeke swelled puffed vp thou wast extenuate appaired disobedient neuerthelesse thou obedient barest paine punishment disobedience obeied seruant excesse gluttonie thou wast punished scarsitie lacke food tree drawe grandmother eue vnto vnlawfull concupiscence desire perfect charitie led thee vnto punishment endure torment vpon crosse presumed forbidden thou didst smart therefore tooke pleasure delicatenesse thou wast vexed crosse abound haue plentie pleasure thou art torne nailes doo taste pleasant sweetnes apple thou bitternes gall behold king glorie mine iniquitie vngodlinesse thy pitie goodnes manifest behold mine vnrighteousnes thy iustice plainelie declared thing god king shall render vnto thee thing thou hast bestowed vpon nothing found hart man may worthilie recompense reward man wit excogitate imagine anie thing woorthie compared vnto thy diuine mercie neither office creature go recompense fullie iustlie aid helpe creator trulie sonne god thy maruellous dispensation appointment frailenesse may helpe little mind pricked stirred thy visitation doo punish flesh vice also euill concupiscence thereof thing thou wilt grant giue grace doo shall begin suffer susteine sorrowes greefes thou also didst vouchsafe die sinnes victorie inward man shall armed thou beeing captaine externall outward victorie forasmuch spirituall persecution ouercome shall afraid thy sake obedient vnto materiall sword crosse world slendernesse state condition please thy goodnes shall able according little power thereof answer vnto greatnes excellencie creator ye heauenlie medicine good iesu preseruatiue thy loue beseech thee thine accustomed ancient mercy powre wound fowle filthie matter venemous contagion infection cast awaie may refresh restore former puritie cleanenesse haue tasted pleasant sweetnes abide thee may make despise vtterlie set naught entisements world feare thy sake none aduersities thereof remembring thine euerlasting nobilitie excellencie may alwaies abhor disdaine trouble transitorie world thou lord wast crucified beseech thee crucifie thee may rise againe thee euerlasting life thy flesh crucified crucifie thee christ kingdome flesh hath dominion may put old adam newnesse life may transformed thee second adam sinne infidelitie whole tyrannie sathan vanquished ouercome bring passe lord thy crosse painefull suffering thy yoke may made light thy burthen easie willinglie gladlie following thee may come whether thou art gone thy father blessed immortall whome nothing shall afterwards able separate v amen haue sinned haue sinned god god haue mercie vpon god forbid reioice anie thing crosse lord iesus christ whereby world crucified vnto vnto world galath another praier christ crucified wherein deuoutlie call mind great thing hath done v benefit reape remembrance holie wound exceeding greatlie haue sinned thy maiestie lord mine owne conscience findeth mee guiltie manie offence yet doo despaire neither anie thing doubtfull whereas sinne hath abounded hath thy grace god ouerabounded despaireth forgiuenes sinnes denieth thee god mercifull yea great wrong doth thee god distrusteth thy mercie much lieth denieth thee louing true mightie thing wherein whole hope consisteth weet loue thy adoption truth thy promise power thy redeeming let vnwise imagination murmur much listeth saie art thou great thy glorie desert hopest thou obtaine answer boldlie knowe whome haue credited thou thine exceeding great loue hast adopted thy child thou art southfast promise thou art mightie perseuerance thou maist doo thee listeth bee feared multitude sinnes bethinke death thee lord sinnes able ouercome thee thy nailes thy speare crie vnto throughlie reconciled thee christ loue thee longius hath opened thy side deere iesu speare gone doo rest safetie afraid let loue loue driueth feare dores remedie mightie effectuall heate leacherie death thee redeemer thou stretchest thine armes vpon crosse thou holdest thy hand readines imbrace v sinner betweene armes thee sauiour mind liue die shall sing safelie glorifie exalt thee lord thou hast taken vp hast giuen mine enimies pleasure ouer thou sauiour hast bowed downe thy head thy death receiue kiss thy beloued often doo kisse thee lord throughlie touched loue thee loue mankind god camest man camest man becamest man loue inuisible god becainest like thy seruants verie loue wast wounded sinnes wound thine sauiour safe quiet rest v weakelings sinner doo dwell ease thy wound haue waie vnto bowel thy mercie whatsoeuer wanting selfe doo borowe bowel thee lord aboundance mercie want hole flowe hole thy blessed bodie opened vnto secret thy hart great pledge thy kindlie loue euen bowel mercie thee god whereby daie spring hath visited v aloft thy wound sweet iesu christ full mercie full pitie full sweetnesse full loue bored thy hand thy foot pierced thy side speare hole may taste sweet mild thou art deed mercifull thou art call vpon thee truth seeke thee cheeflie loue thee plentious redemption giuen vnto v thy wound sweet sauiour iesu christ great aboundance sweetnes great plentie grace great perfection vertues giuen v thy pretious wound sweet sauiour iesu christ bountifull iesu grant therefore humblie beseech thee whensoeuer anie fowle thought assaulteth may forthwith runne thy wound christ flesh presseth downe may rise vp remembring thy wound lord diuell laieth wait may flee bowel thy mercie iesu shall quicklie depart anie time heate lecherie prouoke member let quenched praie thee calling mind thy wound sonne god finallie mine aduersities let find remedie effectuall thy wound christ saie let sleepe without care rest without feare thou christ hast died v nothing bitter death swallowed vp thy death sweet iesu whole hope therfore shall thy death lord god thy death desart refuge welfare life resurrection thy mercifulnesse lord merit poore merit long thou lord compassion failest long thou art manifold mercie long also manifold desert mightier thou art saue without care wherefore excellent goodnes withdrawe thy mercie mightie maker despise thy worke prudent redeemer suffer perish price thy redemption gentle ghostlie heauenlie hoast ghest purifie saue dresse keepe thy house dwelling place thou dedicatedst sanctifiedst thee sacrament baptisme blessed charitable sweet iesu bounteous excellent glorious iesu innocent mercifull meeke louing deere iesu haue mercie vpon haue mercie vpon forgiue sinnes shall loue thee shall sorie sinnes shall loath forsake sinnes shall detest abhore sinfull life turne vnto thee grace shall remember thy benefit thy meekenes thy pouertie bitter passion thy patience thy obedience thy loue thy charitie shall sanctifie worship magnifie loue hartilie thee heauen thy saint earth celebrate thy feast accordinglie saie thy incarnation passion resurrection ascension due reuerence christian deuotion thou dredfull maister dread lord iesu thou loued father loue thou bee lord redeemer seruice thou mine hoast dwell soule thy grace mercie chastitie puritie cleannesse meet according hoast thou life saint fairenesse beautie angel thanking therfore good lord jesu christ wound hart thy holie wound moist mind thy pretious bloud whither soeuer turne may behold aboue thee crucified whatsoeuer see may appeare ruddie thy pretious bloud thus holding may fixe sight nothing onlie thee liuest reignest one god world without end haue sinned haue offended god god haue merceie praier wherein commemoration christes passion desire pardon sinnes continuance vertue godlinesse behold pitifull father thy pitifull sonne suffered wicked behold mercifull king suffered remember thou art louing kind suffered lord innocent although thy sonne thou didst deliuer redeeme ransome seruant author beginner life led sheepe killed made obedient thee euen vnto death afraid take vpon cruell sharp kind death call remembrance thou distributer health whome although thou didst beget thy power yet notwithstanding thou wouldest haue made partaker thine infirmitie weakenes trulie thy god head take vpon thy nature hanged vpon gibbet torment crosse flesh taken vpon suffer sorrowfull punishment turne eies thy maiestie lord god towards worke thine vnspeakable pitie looke thy deere sonne whose whole body stretched foorth marke harmelesse hand pure doo drop distill downe innocent bloud beseech thee pacified pardon wicked deed hand haue committed consider bare naked side thrust cruellie speare renew wash holie fountaine well beleeue flowe thence marke vnspotted foot haue stood waie sinner alwaies haue walked thy lawe pierced sharpe nail make perfect step thy path make thy louing kindnesse hate way iniquitie remoue way iniquitie make thy mercie choose waie truth beseech thee king holie men holie one holie one redeemer make runne waie thy commandements may vnited knit vnto spirit disdaine clad flesh doest thou looke vpon marke pittifull father head thy deerelie beloued sonne yong man leaned vpon shoulder past pretious death behold gentle creator humanitie gentlenes thy beloued sonne haue compassion vpon feeblenes thy weake feeble handieworke behold glorious parent torne rent member thy kind louing child remember gentlie substance behold paine god man release loose man thy creature miserie bondage sinne behold punishment redeeme pardon offence redeemed lord whome thou didst strike sinnes people although thy welbeloued whome found guile yet neuerthelesse reckoned amongst full iniquitie looke downe therefore lord thou louer labouring laden hart eies thy pittie see altar crosse thy sonne thine onlie beloued babe slaughtered behold father heauen thy bleeding babe sake thou hadst made vnder lawe curse therof giuing death euen acursed shamefull death crosse might thereby redeeme v wretch enimies lawe curse condemnation looke vpon saie sauiour world suffering life death hath fulfilled prophesies behold made castawaie iewes scorne gentile endured treasonable hate friend deadlie terror troubled soule might haue peace conscience reconciled vnto thee let shame ignominie praie thee honour triumph wound medicine curse blisse death life finallie lighten mind beseech thee thy holie spirit may able conceiue vnderstand height depth length breadth meanes infinite measure exceeding loue towards v sight knowledge great loue may inflame v loue thee againe thought deed may wholie set vpon thee shewing thankfulnesse vnto thee obedience vnto thy word glorieng nothing thy christ crucified end may inioie full fruit passion thine vnspeakable loue towards v euerlasting saluation iesus christ onelie lord redeemer thee father holie ghost giuen praise honour glorie euer euer amen another godlie meditation praier wherin declare vnto god father passion sonne rehearsed reconciliation attonement god behold almightie god father lord iesus christ beseech thee thy benignitie gentlenesse haue mercie vpon pretious thing could find haue offered deuoutlie vnto thee thing estimation could imagine haue presented humblie vnto thee haue left nothing haue declared vnto thy maiestie nothing remaining may adde haue committed betaken whole hope vnto thee haue sent vnto thee mine aduocate spokesman euen thy welbeloued sonne iesus haue sent thy glorious child mediator betwixt thee haue sent saie intercessor whome trust get pardon forgiuenes sinnes word haue sent word word haue said sent misdeed behold haue rehearsed vnto thee passion thy holie sonne iesus christ passion beleeue suffered beleeue godhead sent thee take vpon mine humanitie nature thought scorne suffer buffet bond spitting mock yea tooke vpon suffer crosse nailes dart beleeue also manhood nature infancie troubled creeping scrallings wrapt cloathes manner child vexed youth labour made leane waking fasting wearied iournieng afterward whipped torne rent diuers kind punishment reckoned among dead endued glorie resurrection carried ioies heauen placed vpon right hand thy maiestie saie manhood waie meanes pacifieng appeasing thee waie meanes hauing mercie vpon mee mercifullie looke vpon mee heare wretch redeeme bondseruant deliuered behold creator doo despise creature receiue shepheard welcommed gentle louing countenance mercifullie looke vpon sheepe hath brought home vpon owne shoulder faithfull shepheard manie diuers labour trauels ouer steepe hils headlong deepe vallies search owne sheepe straied awaie also found faint almost dead long wandring gat himselfe vnder great reioicing making fast vnto maruellous bond charitie lifted vp deapth confusion brought home ninetie nine behold king king god almightie behold good shepheard rendereth thee thou committedst charge tooke vpon thine ordinance saue man hath deliuered vnto thee cleane pure spot washing bloud lo thy dearelie beloued sonne hath reconciled vnto thee thy handie worke gone astraie far waie lo gentle shepheard bringeth home againe thy flocke hir violent pirate robber driuen awaie hath brought vnto thy sight seruant whome hir owne conscience made run awaie hir selfe deserued punishment thy sonne hir solicitor hath deserued forgiuenes vnto whome also hir offence euerlasting fire due neuerthelesse subiect vnder prince captaine doth hope brought home hir owne countrie able holie father selfe offend thee able selfe pacifie appease thee thy welbeloued sonne god made helper taking vpon mine humanitie intent might cure mine infirmitie wherof first occasion thy wrath spring might offer vp thee sacrifice praise might render make also wellpleasing thy goodnes thing sitting thy right hand alwaies shew declare himselfe equall substance fellowe lo hope behold whome trust thou despise meete mine iniquity yet looke vpon leastwise mercifulle charitie thy welbeloued sonne giue heed thy sonne whereby thou maiest haue mercie vpon thy bondseruant looke vpon sacrament flesh pardon offence flesh often soeuer thou doest remember wound thy blessed son oft beseech thee let mine iniquitie hid bicause flesh hath stirred thee wrath let flesh beseech thee mooue thee mercie like flesh hath seduced led sinne flesh may get obteine remission certainly much mine iniquitie hath deserued much goodnes redeemer may euen right require mine vnrighteousnes great righteousnes bigger looke much god superiour vnto man euen much malice euill inferiour vnto goodnes qualitie quantitie haue sinned man sonne god made man hath redeemed pride could exceeding high humilitie bring downe power death great punishment sonne god suffered vpon crosse might deface vtterlie destroie trulie god sinnes sinfull men woman weied iust equall balance loue fauour redeemer towards v east far distant west innermost part earth much separated vppermost part heauen vnlike much lesse mine iniquitie goodnesse noble creator light pardon mine offence vnmeasurable trauels paine thy beloued sonne susteine beseech thee let goodnesse set wickednes modestie temperance mine vngratious frowardnes meekenes fierce crueltie let humilitie recompense pride patience mine impatience gentlenesse mine vnkind churlishnes obedience disobedience quietnesse mine vnquietnes pleasant towardnes bitter frowardnes sweet facilitie gentlenes mine angrie fretting fume conclude let charitie make amends heinous detestable crueltie amen haue sinned haue sinned god god said daie roote iesse shall stand signe people vnto shall nation flie rest shall glorie thou art blessed branch dauid thou tookest man nature vpon thee camest line dauid time thy humiliation thou wast sprig drie ground notable heauenlie plant oppressed misery thy soule dried awaie beaten mightie tempest god displeasure sinnes notwithstanding goodlie roote power thy diuine nature vtterlie choaked thou art deliuered midst death thy diuine power thou standest victoriouslie ouer thine enimies art readie bring v thy souldiers euils make v partaker thy glorious conquest thy kingdome altogither otherwise triumph glorie world death endeth pride power pompe world thy death rest glorious thy kingdome glorie beginneth life ended christ sonne god woonderfull thy rest man first made noble holie temple wherein perpetuall sabboth celebrated diuine nature abide filling comforting plentie heauenlie rich rest turned vnquietnes ioie sorowe hatred sathan thine enimie prophaned temple sabboth brought horrible misorder wickednes wherefore pleased thine almightie father goodnes send thee onlie sonne owne bosome restore againe sabboth hence woonderfull manner daie great sabboth according lawe moses thine humane nature death separated soule bodie rested sepulchre word forsooke nature graue reuiued flesh third daie thou rosest againe time redemption expired victoriouslie vnto thy kingdome giuest eternall sabboth rest flie vnto thee sonne god call thou sinner euen v miserable vncleane person vnto sacred feast world thee cheefe priest begun shall made perfect elect euermore shall followe lambe whithersoeuer go put v festiuall garment garment thy righteousnes benediction putting awaie leauen malice wickednes may celebrate feast sweet bread sinceritie serue thee purenes liuing truth yeare thine incarnation passed yeares since first passouer israelite celebrate going egypt long hast thou preserued thy church beseech thee preserue euerlastinglie notwithstanding rage diuell minister thou defendedst thy people eate lambe moreouer going egypt slaiedst thy righteous iudgements first borne land assist v liuelie faith may feed thee true lamb keepe v among misery last age world carcase remaining cast awaie condemned thy oblation gratefull sight god appeaseth wrath eternall father eating thee art lamb god taking awaie sinnes world righteousnes life giuen beleeuers word raiseth againe quickneth flesh vnto v ingraffed therevnto faith like life may giuen bodie sinne mortified v thou liue reigne v euermore wherefore let thy glorious rest v made earth sinne body appointed earth yea vngodlie shall abide euer earth neuer appeare thy glorious heauen thou touchedst death thy liuelie flesh thou madest light thou tookest awaie heauinesse thereof blast first serpent manie time euen man flesh turned verie serpent graue wicked horrible filth spirituall dragon serpent deuour euerlastinglie keepe perpetuall death thou sonne god makest graues thy saincts euen pleasant chamber thou driuest far awaie thence filthinesse sathan thou settest watchman euen thy pure angel bring soules paradise commending hand bosome thy father keepe also ash shall thy returne house holie ghost beautifie v like manner thy glorie true knowledge calling vpon thee present v point death receiue soules departure thine hand shew thou thy comfort ioie till resurrection mankind thou crowne thine elect perfect endlesse glorie taste wherof might seene fortie day thy resurrection neuer goodlie world thou rosest death broughtest graues great companie thy saincts scripture plainelie breeflie vngodlie doth testifie familiarlie holie father matrones remaine thy sweet mother apostle pleasant speech much talke made doubt misery man vnspeakable benefit gotten thee glorie eternall life lord raise thou vp hart true desire may long come faire companie let v turne selues cogitation vnto holie assemblie let v hearken vnto learne thy wisedome reuealed thy word life thy church darkenesse misery men occupied obseruation outward ceremony godlie woman annoint thy bodie manie time thy church seemeth depriued thy sweet presence vttereth sorrowfull word haue taken awaie lord tell haue laid sonne god amend mortall darkenesse within v kindle soule thine inward seruice pleaseth thee manifest thy selfe vnto v affliction speake comfortable word calamitie vnto v weepe euen death may thinke selues thou art present death rise againe fruition eternall life thy blessed saincts amen another almightie god mercifull heauenlie father hast raised vp thy sonne iustification thou gauest death sinnes grant thy holie spirit may worke faith v whereby may made partaker righteousnes hee hath trust without blessed hope rising againe dead faith vaine yet sinnes therefore beseech thee confirme strengthen v thou hast alreadie raised vp christ head may assured thou wilt also raise v vp bodie may ioined head furthermore thou hast left holie storie thy sonne might beleeue faith obtaine euerlasting life beseech thee worke fruit v constant faith saluation soules thy euerlasting glorie whome sonne holie ghost honor praise glorie euer amen another almightie god mercifull heauenlie father according beene written ye lawe moses prophet behooued sauiour world suffer death rise againe dead third daie repentance forgiuenes sinnes bee preached amongst nation name point point hast fullie accomplished thing christ iesus thine onlie sonne whome thou didst raise graue daie onlie liue againe world euen sit thy right hand prouiding infirmitie hast giuen v great manie witness holie men woman vpon earth angel heauen confirme truth matter vnto v might haue strong assurance saluation faith open mind vnderstand holie scripture grant v stedfastlie beleeue thy gospell faith made one may receiue forgiuenes sinnes estimation righteous men thy sight furthermore also grant mightie conquest whereby hath triumphed ouer last enimie death raising himselfe againe vnto life may rise death sinnes life grace leading new conuersation sit thy right hand hope hauing life hid shall appeare come iudgment life also heere led obedience faith may made manifest receiue faith possesse blessed hope looke wait comming saluation soules glorie thy name whome sonne holie ghost praise honour euer amen thanksgiuing lift vp hart vnto thee lord verie meet right bounden dutie time place giue thanks vnto thee lord holie father almightie euerlasting god chieflie bound praise thee glorious resurrection thy sonne iesus christ lord verie paschall lambe offered v hath taken awaie sinnes world death hath destroied death rising life againe hath restored v euerlasting life therefore angel archangel companie heauen laud magnifie thy glorious name euermore praising thee saieng holie holie holie lord god hoasts heauen earth full thy glorie glorie thee lord high ascension daie christ glorious ascending heauens sight apostle preface god gone vp merrie noise lord sound trumpet glorie god high halleluiah humbled himselfe vnto death wherefore god also hath highlie exalted set right hand heauenlie place far aboue power dominion halleluiah god gone vp high hathled captiuitie captiue receiued gift men halleluiah descended first lowe part earth euen also ascended vp far aboue heauens fulfill thing halleluiah god gone vp merrie noise lord ascended great triumph halleluiah lift vp head ye gate ye lift vp ye euerlasting dores king glorie may enter halleluiah yea thou exalted lord thine owne strength praise thy power perpetuallie euermore sing glorie god high halleluiah praier thou christ sonne god fortie day thy resurrection continuedst world vnspeakable comfort thy church expired thou ascendedst gloriouslie sight thy saint heauens yeeld thee hartie thanks thy benefit beseeching thee humblie number v among saint souldiers wait vpon thee triumphieng handwriting dependeth testimonie giltie conscience condemnation thy death sentence condemnation abolished thy bloud washeth v sin enimies thine elect euen diuell death lead bound whole companie saint heauen earth filled ioie speake thy victorie benefit thy saint heauen visiblie doo behold thy glorious victorie thy saint earth saued faith ornament glorie king daughter glorious within sight manie godlie auditor thine thy holie mother blessed virgin marie thou wast carried visiblie earth cloud heauen thou gauest taste eternall life thine apostle wondering thy departure preachedst thy returne iudgement thou hast glorified thine humane nature vnspeakable glorie placed right hand thy father vpon throne triumph victorie hauing sake vanquished enimies thine humane nature onelie aboue thy saint exalted also light cannot attained anie creature thou reignest visible father replenishing whole celestiall congregation righteousnes diuine glorie gouerne thou also mortall life outwardlie thy ministerie inwardlie mind thou hast ascended high lead captiuitie captiue bestowe thy benefit vpon man thy departure thou renewedst institution thy ministerie thou gauest thy disciple commandement preach nation thy goodnesse giue thee hartie thanks therby thou hast called v societie thy saint assist v thy spirit may beleeue gospell keepe euermore couenant baptisme haue made thee thou adornedst thine apostle carrie new doctrine ouer face whole earth singular testimony miracle church might assuredlie knowe erred continue among v like sort thy ministerie togither puritie thy word send among v euangelists pastor teacher may ioine themselues doctrine apostle diligentlie spread abroad speake thou art head ministerie within hart raise vp godlie motion thy spirit thou art ascended high bee head thy church filling thing finish thy worke v ingraffe v thy glorified bodie powre vpon v thy diuine nature like spirit may intermingle selfe soule begin liue v eternall life may create v new man fashioned accordinglie thy similitude likenesse inspire v perfection righteousnesse thou shalt thinke meete conuenient weake fraile nature let holie motion agreeing thine heauenlie planted v driue awaie darkenesse mind extinguish wicked affection hart let new man dailie prosper increase perfection defend thy church thy mightie right hand power man diuels fill flitting soules tast new life receiue thine hand grant resurrection glorification thy church maie ioifullie behold thee returning triumphing gloriouslie placed kingdome thou wilt deliuer thy father euerlasting happinesse amen halleluiah glorie god high anotherverie deuout meditation praier wherein mind verie much mooued plentiouslie stirred contemplation heauenlie thing said quietnesse mightie king verie good gentle louing lord iesu christ thine inestimable charitie vnspeakable pitie taking vpon thee seed abraham angel didst vouchsafe onlie willinglie suffer sinnes bond crosse wound yea death sepulchre three day death ouercome didst rise againe iustification wast seene thy disciple reforming hart establishing almost declining thee also thou hadst glorified mortall nature stole holie resurrection immortalitie fortith daie thou sight thy disciple didst triumph thy glorie gloriouslie ascend heauen cariedst aboue heauens aboue melodious companie angel aboue cherubin seraphin placing vpon right hand god thy father angel doo praise humane nature power heauen doo euen tremble see man god ouer thou lord sittest liuest euerlastinglie reignest throughout world behold thy seelie creature weight frailenes drawne euer downeward able liue holilie vertuouslie ought liue without thy continuall helpe whervnto thinke necessarie sticke cleaue humblie beseech thee drawe vpward toward thee may runne thee sweet sauour thine ointment let runne faint thou drawest leadest running drawe mouth soule thirsteth thee vnto high flouds streames thine eternall aboundance satietie yea drawe wholie vnto thy selfe art liuing well intent may according capacitie drinke whervpon doo liue god life thou didst saie thy holie blessed mouth anie man thirst let come vnto drinke well life grant vnto thirstie soule alwaie drinke thee according thy holie true promise water life may flowe bellie well life replenish fill mind full riuer thy pleasure make hart droonken thy loue manner droonken wine forget thing saue cup may forget vaine earthlie thing continuallie haue nothing else remembrance thee onelie according written remembred god delighted giue holie ghost water signifie thou didst promise giue thirsted thee grant beseech thee may assaie go whole desire studie toward place vnto beleeue thou didst ascend fortith daie thy resurrection present miserie may onlie bodie thought desire alwaies thee hart may whereas thou art art treasure worthie coueted much loued wherewith treasure woorthie compared bring passe lord christ thy gift may stirred carried vpward feruentlie desire ascend yea make certaine ascension hart lifting vpward sing song starres lampe thy loue saie kindled moued go thee thither whereas thou portion reignest beleeue reigne thither whereas thou flesh art glorified beleeue glorified thither thou bloud rulest perceiue beare rule euen vnto peace ierusalem ierusalem saie countrie ierusalem mother would go vpward remember ierusalem extend stretch foorth towards sens hart towards thee christ art king ouer hir hir light hir father hir defender hir patrone hir gouernour hir keeper hir chast strong delight hir onlie whole pleasure whome hir goodnes felicitie commeth thou art cheefe good true good neuer turne backe vntill thou bring home pilgrimage deformedlie scattered abroad vnto place deerelie beloued mother whereas first fruit spirit vntill thou god art mercie fashion confirme euer whither go vpward peace ierusalem bicause glad reioiced thing spoken vnto therfore wil go house lord hath placed v wil giue v good thing therfore desire nothing else tarie remaine lord euer oh lord forasmuch whilest clad bodie doo go astraie stranger vnto thee haue abiding place euer seeke one come abiding place heauen whither thou art ascended therefore thy fauour grace guide enter chamber hart sing vnto thee song loue king god mourning maruellous sighings place peregrination whereas thy iustices song whereas tossed stormes euerie side great floud life stedfast standing place high inough aboue water foot doue rest vpon life saie safe quiet peace anie sure rest eueriewhere battell strife eueriewhere enimies fighting without doores fright feares within doores asmuch one part v heauenlie earthlie bodie corrupt doth loden burdenous vnto soule therefore mind felowe freend wearie wandering foorth waie sicke lieth torne rent thing hath passed hungreth thirsteth greatlie vanity haue nothing set afore bicause poore begger thou lord god art rich good thing plentious giuer deinties heauenlie satietie giue meate vnto wearie thirsteth conuenient gather togither dispersed renew refresh torne lo standeth doore knocketh beseech thee bowel thy mercie wherwith thou daiespring high hast visited v open hand thy pitie wretch knocketh vouchsafe mercifullie enter thee may rest thee refreshed thee art liuing heauenlie bread wherewith fed strength come mee againe may ascend vnto high thing lifted vp vale miserie teares wing godlie desire may flie vp vnto thee heauenlie kingdome let spirit lord beseech thee take wing egle flie without fainting let flie vp come beautifulnesse thine holie house place heauen thy glorie dwelleth whereas vpon meatetables thy supernall citizen may fed full thy secret place thy pasture plentifull riuers side let mine hart rest thee god hart saie though great sea swelling water thou diddest rebuke wind sea made streightwaies great calme come wake vpon fluds mine hart thing belong vnto may made calme cleere may imbrace thee art mine onelie god may behold thee art sweet light nf mine eies without anie blind darknesse troublesome cogitation thought let mind flie lord vnder shadowe thy wing meate couered temperatenesse thy pleasant coolnesse may sing ioifullie saie laie downe rest peace finallie let memorie sleepe god beseech thee euils make hate iniquitie loue righteousnesse better delectable middes darknesse life among manifold bitter misery desire feruentlie heauenlie sweetnesse couet euerlasting blessednesse mind held euer whereas may sure haue infallible true ioies oh lord thy louing kindnesse art woorthie desired coueted thing shall see thee shall appeere thy face shall satisfied thy glorie wilt thou bring foorth darke prison may confesse thy name afterward bee pricked shall passe go maruellous beautifull house thine whereas voice gladnesse reioicing doth sound tabernacle iust men blessed dwell thine house lord shall praise thee euer world without end blessed yea blessed indeed thou hast chosen taken heauenlie inheritance behold lord thy saint flourish thee like vnto lillie replenished plentiousnesse thine house thou dooest giue drinke flowing riuer thy pleasure bicause thou art well life thy light brightnes doo see light greatlie themselues light made bright thee lord doost giue light doo shine like vnto sunne thy sight maruellous faire beautifull acceptable mansion dwelling place thine house lord power sinfull soule dooth couet enter lord haue loued comlinesse thine house place thine honour dwelleth asked one petition lord require may dwell house lord day life like hart coueteth go vnto water brooke euen dooth soule desire come vnto thee lord shall come appeare face lord shall see god soule longeth verie sore shall see land liuing land dead cannot seene mortall eies shall doo wretch fettered heauie gieues life tent cedar soule hath dwelt long hate peace quietnesse giue wing dooue may flie awaie rest nothing desire delight much lord companie good cleaue vnto god oh grant lord whilest fraile member sticke vnto thee written cleaueth vnto lord one spirit giue therefore beseech thee wing contemplation wherewith apparelled may flie vpward asmuch euerie vnluckie infortunate thing lieth beneath doo thou lord hold vp mind least fall headlong lowest bottom darke vallie least shadowe earth come betweene separate thee art bright sunne righteousnes least hid cloud darknesse haue libertie letted looke heauenlie thing aboue therefore doo assaie go vpward vnto ioies quietnesse peace vnto delectable pleasant state light hold mine hart thine hand bicause cannot drawne vnto high thing without thee thither doo make haste whereas chiefe principall peace reigneth continuall quietnesse shineth foorth hold gouerne spirit take according thy thou guide vnto may ascend region countrie plentifulnesse wheras thou feedest israel euerlastinglie food truth intent leastwise swift cogitation thought may come nigh thy wisedome remaineth aboue thing ouerpasseth thing gouerneth thing ala manie thing soule would flie vnto thee doo crie vpon command lord hold peace speake vnto soule selfe let giue neuer word answer let passe thing let clime aboue althings created come vnto thee may fasten eies faith vpon thee art onlie creator thing let couet vnto thee bent towards thee let thinke vpon thee meditation contemplation let laie thee hir eies selfe let roll tosse thee hir hart thee saie art true chiefe goodnesse ioie remaine without ending surelie manie contemplation man soule maruellouslie fed thee none soule much delighted yet hath good rest thee thinketh vpon thee hath thee onelie contemplation oh much thy sweetnesse lord maruellouslie dooest thou inspire hart loue thee delectable thy loue fruition whereof haue loue nothing thee seeke nothing else couet nothing else happie whose onelie hope thou art haue trust thee onlie whole worke praier blessed sitteth solitarie alone holdeth peace standeth vpon ward set keepe continuallie daie night yet whilest fraile bodie may able taste somewhat thy pleasure require thee thy wound bring health vnto v wound thou sufferedst vpon crosse health thy pretious bloud wherewith thou redeemedst v distill drop downe wound sinful soule also thou didst vouchsafe die wound saie fire mightie dart thy great charitie word god liuelie effectuous pearcing sharpe anie two edged sword thou chosen dart sharpe sword art able thy power pearce hard shield without anie situation placed anie place euerie without place fulfilling thing without stretching foorth thy hand going euerie without anie contradiction gainesaieng passing ouer thing without mouing anie end world world world euerlasting thou dooest liue thou hast continuall praise perpetuall glorie high power singular honor euerlasting kingdome rule empire without end infinite vnwearie immortall world world another meditation right beleefe vnitie person pluralitie god much mo thing haue learned holie mother church whereof thy grace made member hir haue learned thou alone true god hast bodie also art vnsubiect passion nothing thy substance nature anie waie violable changeable compounded created therefore certaine thou canst neither perceiued anie bodilie eies could euer seene proper nature anie mortall man hence may euidentlie gathered angel doo behold thee also life shall see thee naie verie angel neither able see thee thou art thy selfe naie conclude almightie trinitie knowne none onlie thy selfe blessed trinitie thou vnitie godhead pluralitie person manifold art number infinite therefore measurablie vnmeasurable waightily vnwaiable knowledge beginning souereigne goodnesse thou art whome whome thing participation thereof saie good thing thy diuine essence hath alwaies yet without matter although lacke forme wit informed forme formes welformed forme thou imprintest seale euerie particular thing thou makest doubtlesse differ thy selfe without either augmenting diminishing whatsoeuer world thy creature simple trinitie triple vnitie god whose almightinesse possesseth ruleth replenisheth thing thou hast created neither saieng thou fillest thing meane conteine thee rather thou conteinest neither part fillest thou thing yet may thought euerie thing according greatnesse portion hath receiueth thee greatest thing smallest thing lesse thou rather thing trulie thing thee whose omnipotencie includeth thing neither man find waie escape thy power whosoeuer hath thy fauour meanes auoid thy displesure written neither east west south god iudge againe whither shall go fro thy spirit whither shall go thy presence immensitie thy diuine greatnesse knowe thee within thing included without thing yet excluded therefore thou art within thou maist containe therfore without thing may comprehended within immensitie thine vncircumscribed greatnesse thou art within thou daie vvhich washed garment bloud lambe euen infancie crueltie herod soules righteous hand god shall torment touch sonne god time thine humiliation euen thy natiuitie infancie trulie diddest thou taste streame man miserie poorlie thou wast borne naked despised strawe wast thou laid among beast diddest thou send foorth thy crie seed dauid almost withered awaie thy good mother blessed virgin marie nursed nourished thee vp spring drie land among much trouble thy tender age tyrannie sathan crueltie herod farre countrie thou wast exiled good old man ioseph thy fosterfather thy blessed mother marie commandement angel astonished feare danger hand night stole awaie thee tooke long iournie euen greefe hart hundred mile trauelled desolate wildernesse craggie solitarie place arabia euen nation alwaie theft robberie theeuerie crueltie hath infamous length brought thee prouince emperour rome god would bee thy protectour watch angel defend thee thy blessed mother thy leader companion thy banishment draue awaie cruell theeues alwaies thee hereby hast thou sonne god put v mind miserie thy benefit mankind banished paradise state happinesse ioie misery life yea thy church world banishment oppressed men might excellent member thy church commonlie pursued death taking compassion misery thine owne accord thou becamest exile sake intercessor mankind thou madest thy selfe reputation thou tookest vpon thee miserable masse skin nature thou wast pilgrime world thou haddest place hide thine head thou vsurpedst none authoritie without calling woonderfull maner word lurke thy flesh suffering dieng bring v againe natiue countrie indeed whence beginning citie wherefore bottome hart beseech thee sonne god instill v true loue celestiall countrie kindle within v true desire thy companie comfort v banishment send thine holie angel protect v driue awaie tyrannie sathan thine enimies finallie soules shall depart vale misery place beseech thee tower true countrie thou sauedst thy church notwithstanding raging tyrannie cruell herod thou thy carefull parent tookedst thy flight aegypt iohn baptist hid desert beyond iordan hence forward defend v furie diuels men oh lord brest imbracements tender mother cruell wicked seruants bloudie herod tyrant daie plucke awaie yoong infant outward state thy church manie time hir may said rachel would comforted bicause hir child left aliue vnslaine yet maintainest thou remnant castest thine enimies eternall damnation wherefore thy praise daie confessed shewed foorth speaking dieng yoong babe infant innocent washed wound tender skin bloud lambe bare witnesse thy comming flesh death exalted farre better life thou wipest teares eies glorifieng thy church wilt place thine elect sweet companie vnspeakeable glorie rebuke vtter confusion diuell instrument hired wickednesse mortifie kill vice v conuersation life may expresse thy faith tongue doo confesse keepe v profession thy truth mitigate trouble thy church perish
