neither hatred ingratitude world beleeuing certainlie despise despised thee thou neither wilt thine holinesse wilt thy iustice suffer blaspemous impietie go vnpunished amen simon iudes daie apostle thou hast made prince land therefore shall remember thy name lord one generation another almightie god hast builded thy congregation vpon foundation apostle prophet iesu christ himselfe head corner stone grant v ioined togither vnitie spirit doctrine may made holie temple acceptable thee lord iesu christ maner diddest comfort thine apostle world would hate abhorre saieng haue chosen world therefore world hateth separate v humblie beseech thee darknesse idolatrie wickednesse world ioine v companie among thy godhead dooeth dwell grant true loue may ioined vnto thine eternall father thy spirit bond peace make v nothing dread sinister iudgements world neither yet anie peril forsake thy truth patientlie suffer iniuries thy selfe wast free let v alwaies thinke seruant greater maister togither thee thine apostle suffer trouble cross god sinnes amendement shall laid vpon v amen saint daie let righteous glad reioice god let also merie ioifull thanke thee almightie god heauenlie father thine infinite mercie lord sauiour working thine holie spirit thou gatherest mankind euerlasting church hast knit togither thine elect one communion felowship mysticall bodie thy sonne christ lord defendest mightilie rage diuels tyrannie member yea hast promised one daie thy sonne raise death adorne vnspeakable glorie beseech thee haue mercie v sake thy sonne mediator sauiour grant v grace followe thy holie saint vertue godlie liuing may come vnspeakable ioies thou hast prepared vnfeinedlie loue thee gather among v euermore religious companie may serue thee faith good conscience assist life benefit eternall life may begin may contrite hart obeie thee patientlie suffer trouble accompanie thy gospell shew selues meeke mercifull hungring thirsting hart thy righteousnesse seeking food confession fault infirmity also earnest feruent petition fasting weeping lamentation mourning desirouslie craue god hand well mercie forgiuenesse sinnes also mitigation present misery deliuerance euils bodilie ghostlie inwardlie thirsting longing soule onelie restored god grace fauour againe also gouerned holie spirit better spend rest life true feare seruice god dauid holie man chosen vessell glorie god euerlasting comfort domine ne furore psal lord rebuke thine indignation neither chasten thy displeasure haue mercie vpon lord weake lord heale bone vexed soule also sore troubled lord long wilt thou punish turne thee lord deliuer soule oh saue thy mercy sake death man remembreth thee giue thee thanks pit wearie groning euerie night wash bed water couch teares beautie gone verie trouble worne awaie bicause mine enimies awaie ye worke vanitie lord hath heard voice weeping lord hath heard petition lord receiue praier mine enimies shall confounded sore vexed shall turned backe put shame suddenlie beati quorum psal blessed man whose vnrighteousnesse forgiuen whose sinne couered blessed man vnto lord imputeth sinne whose spirit guile held tongue bone consumed awaie dailie complaining thy hand heauie vpon daie night moisture like drought summer knowledge sinne vnto thee mine vnrighteousnesse haue hid said confesse sinnes vnto lord thou forgauest wickednesse sinne shall euerie one godlie make praier vnto thee time thou maiest found great waterfluds shall come nigh thou art place hide thou shalt preserue trouble thou shalt compasse son deliuerance informe thee teach thee waie wherein thou shalt go guide thee mine eie ye like horsse mule haue vnderstanding whose mouthes must holden bit bridle least fall vpon thee great plague remaine vngodlie putteth trust lord mercie embraceth euerie side glad ye righteous reioice lord ioifull yee true hart domine ne infurore psal put rebuke lord thine anger neither chasten thy heauie displeasure thine arrowes sticke fast thy hand presseth sore health flesh thy displeasure neither anie rest bone reason sinne wickedness gone ouer head like sore burthen heauie beare wound stinke corrupt foolishnesse brought great trouble miserie go moorning daie long loines filled sore disease whole part bodie feeble sore smitten haue roared verie disquietnesse hart lord thou knowest desire groaning hid thee hart panteth strength hath failed sight mine eies gone louers neighbour stand looking vpon trouble kinsman stood far also sought life laid snare went doo euill talked wickednesse imagined deceipt daie long like deafe man heard one dumbe dooth open mouth became euen man heareth whose mouth reproofes thee lord haue put trust thou shalt answere lord god haue required euen mine enimies triumph ouer foote slipt reioiced greatlie ouer trulie set plague heauinesse euer sight confesse wickednesse sorie sinne mine enimies liue mightie hate wrongfullie manie number also reward euill good followe thing good forsake lord god thou far haste thee helpe lord god saluation miserere mei deus psal haue mercie vpon god thy great goodnesse according vnto multitude thy mercy doo awaie mine offence wash throughlie wickednesse cleanse sinne knowledge fault sinne euer thee onlie haue sinned done euill thy sight thou mightest iustified thy saiengs cleare thou art iudged behold shapen wickednesse sinne hath mother conceiued lo thou requirest truth inward part shalt make vnderstand wisedome secretlie thou shalt purge hysope shall bee cleane thou shalt wash shall whiter snowe thou shalt make heare ioie gladnesse bone thou hast broken may reioice turne thy face sinnes put misdeed make cleane hart god renew right spirit within cast awaie thy presence take thy holie spirit giue comfort thy helpe againe stablish thy free spirit shall teach thy way vnto wicked sinner shall conuerted vnto thee deliuer bloudgiltinesse god thou art god health tongue shall sing thy righteousnesse thou shalt open lip lord mouth shall shew thy praise thou desirest sacrifice else would giue thee thou delightest burnt offering sacrifice god troubled spirit broken contrite hart god shalt thou despise fauourable gratious sion build thou walles hierusalem shalt thou pleased sacrifice righteousnesse burnt offering oblation shall offer yong bullock vpon thine altar domine exaudi psal heare praier lord let crieng come vnto thee hide thy face time trouble incline thine eares vnto call heare right soone day consumed awaie like smoke bone burnt vp firebrand hart smitten downe withered like grasse forget eate bread voice groaning bone scarse cleaue flesh become like pellicane wildernesse like owle desert haue watched euen sparowe sitteth alone vpon house top mine enimies reuile daie long mad vpo sworne togither haue eaten ash bread mingled drinke weeping thine indignation wrath thou hast taken vp cast downe day gone like shadowe withered like grasse thou lord shalt endure euer thy remembrance throughout generation thou shalt arise haue mercie vpon sion time thou haue mercie vpon hir yea time come thy seruants thinke vpon hir stone pitieth see hir dust heathen shall feare thy name lord king earth thy maiestie lord shall build vp sion glorie shall appeare turneth vnto praier poore destitute despiseth desire shall written come people shall borne shall praise lord hath looked downe sanctuarie heauen lord behold earth might heare mourning bee captiuitie deliuer child appointed vnto death may declare name lord sion woorship hierusalem people gathered togither kingdomes also serue lord brought downe strength iournie shortened day said god take awaie midst mine age thy yeares endure thoroughout generation thou lord beginning hast laid foundation earth heauens worke thy hand shall perish thou shalt endure shall waxe old doth garment vesture shalt thou change shall changed thou art thy yeares shall faile child thy seruants shall continue seed shall stand fast thy sight de profundis psal deepe haue called vnto thee lord lord heare voice oh let thine eares consider well voice complaint thou lord wilt extreame marke done amisse oh lord may abide mercie thee therefore shalt thou feared looked lord soule doth wait word trust soule flieth vnto thee lord morning watch saie morning watch israell trust lord lord mercie plentious redemption shall redeeme israell sinnes domine exaudi psal heare praier lord consider desire hearken vnto thy truth righteousnesse sake enter iudgement thy seruant thy sight shall man liuing iustified enimie hath persecuted soule hath smitten life downe ground hath laid darkenesse men haue beene long dead therefore spirit vexed within heart within desolate yet doo remember time past muse vpon thy work yea exercise selfe work thy hand stretch foorth hand vnto thee soule gaspeth vnto thee thirstie land heare lord soone spirit wareth faint hide thy face least like vnto go downe pit let heare thy louing kindnes betimes morning thee trust shew thou waie walke lift vp soule vnto thee deliuer lord mine enimies flee vnto thee hide teach doo thing pleaseth thee thou art god let thy louing spirit leade foorth land righteousnesse quicken lord thy name sake thy righteousnesse sake bring soule trouble thy goodnesse slaie mine enimies destroie vexe soule thy seruant glorie father sonne holie ghost beginning euer shall world without end amen heerevnto may adde occasion time serue select notable psalmes dauid large psalter saie psalmes praiers compiled holie scripture verie necessarie vsed afflicted soule obteining remission sinnes mitigation misery lord lord god almightie great dreadfull thy word hast made heauen earth sea thing conteined nothing able resist thy power thy mercie ouer thy work thing vnder thy dominion rule man beast liuing creature thou art mercifull whome thou wilt hast compassion whome pleaseth thee thy counsell shall stand euer whatsoeuer thou wilt shall done power dominion glorie thine art aboue thing thing v thou art father mercy god grace peace comfort wilt death sinner delightest damnation soules lord god art rich mercie thine especiall loue towards v euen thine enimies didst send world thine onelie begotten sonne iesus christ whosoeuer beleeueth dulie shall perish haue euerlasting life haue mercie vpon haue mercie vpon according thy great mercie according multitude thy mercy put awaie mine offence god holie wash wickednesse make cleane mine vncleannesse acknowledge lord heinous sinnes accuse selfe mine vnrighteous deed confesse selfe wickednesse mine hart hath beene euer vnfaithfull rebelling thy precept haue beene vntrue froward child thee haue prouoked thee vanity holie father haue offended thy diuine maiestie woorthie called thy child bicause prouoked thee anger multitude sinnes haue exercised selfe thy righteous lawes haue turned backe thy way done euill thee haue done wickedlie vniustlie behaued selfe leauing thy commandements murmuring thy correction haue turned selfe awaie kept promise made vnto thee haue walked euill waie mine owne thought fantasy choosing thing thou wouldest lord god almightie haue feared thee shewed due reuerence vnto thee haue beene disobedient stubborne vnto thee common harlot without shame euen without shame sinnes behold speake vnto thee yet sinne haue left good gone backe thee haue put trust hope thee maker haue sought helpe safegard otherwise haue ploughed wickednesse reaped iniquitie eaten fruit lie bicause haue trusted mine owne waie haue cast thy lawes behind backe regarding thy commandements leauing mine owne lewd custom haue giuen hart returne thy path would knowe thee haue fallen mine iniquitie neuer vnto daie turned trulie vnto thee hart woman breakech hir fidelitie promise vnto hir husband euen lord god haue broken promise vnto thee haue liued abhominablie haue remorse repentance euill deed haue run sinne sinne following lewd desire hart thou knowest thing lord haue prouoked thee displeasure lewd inuentions none sinnes hid thee hated thy discipline correction regarded thy word saiengs haue done penance malice haue increased much vanitie mine hart hath beene void truth hand haue wrought vnrighteousnesse tongue hath spoken sinfullie haue laboured imagination mine hart find lie deceit truth hath beene way haue accustomed tongue speake trifle vanity fulfilling fleshlie desire thought purpose inuentions haue beene contrarie thy whereby haue offended eies thy maiestie thou hast seene thing lord hast holden thy peace yet euill thy sight displeased thee thine anger thou hast cast awaie art diuided manie day thou hast giuen vp desire hart doo thing seeming wo haue gone thee great miserie haue led life sinne wo haue forsaken thee doo deuises thy mind accomplish thought haue proceeded thy spirit haue heaped vp sinne vpon sinne mine infamie reproch dailie mine eies shame dare shew face lord god forgettest thou mee keepest thou awaie long thy mercie heare cause gratiouslie although thou hast beene displeased great thou art mercifull angrie alwaies beseech thee cast awaie contrite penitent person wretch abiect humblie calleth vpon thy name turne againe little toward lord god forgiue mischieuous deed order according sinnes punish wickednesse deserueth shew foorth thy power poore wretch persecute hir sore without strength turne thy face awaie praiers according thy promise take againe vnto thy fauour thine righteous father thine onlie deere sonne hath redeemed pretious bloud soule abhorreth mine old conuersation thee art iudge men aske mercie doo submit selfe vnto thy mightie hand thine anger thou shewest mercie time tribulation thou dooest forgiue sinnes acknowledge sinner beseeching thee lord god almightie thy goodnesse doo mee according thy great mercie confounded ashamed lift vp mine eies vnto thee sinnes ascended vp vnto thy sight thee father thee haue sinned done euill thee thou seest mine iniquitie great trulie haue beene offender thee euen cradle since sucked mother brest haue ceased doo euill behold begotten iniquitie mother brought world defiled sinne corne euill seed sowne mine hart much wickednesse hath sproong thereof vnto daie thou knowest lord shake sinnes offence carie still infamie youth behold lord sold vnder sinne flesh find good good would doo euill hate doo thought imagination mine hart haue beene set doo euill euer since yoong doo die sinnes lord god seeing thy sinner die returne sin liue thou art good mercifull according thy great mercie sauest vnwoorthie albeit man able beare punishment thou doost threaten sinner yet mercie thou hast promised great vnsearchable thou hast shewed mercie thousand time heretofore make glorious euen yet still old father necessity cried vnto thee thou diddest deliuer put trust thee confounded wit end wist doo onelie refuge lift vp eies thee thou didst saue thy name sake shew thy might strength manie time prouoked thee iniquity stirred vp thy goodnesse displeasure yet thou sawest tribulation lowlie submission vnto thee thou diddest remember thy promise hadst pitie compassion vpon according multitude thy mercy haue mercie vpon lord god omnipotent haue mercie vpon miserable wretched creature make whole beseech thee thou hast striken sinne iniquitie soule troubled greatlie long lord wilt thou looke towards long wilt thou reiect praier thus crieng vnto thee wilt thou heare time long wilt thou turne awaie thy face thine old mercy lord thou hast stablished thy truth wilt thou lord god cease shew mercie wilt thou withdrawe thy goodnesse displeasure hast thou cast awaie euer thou wilt neuer hereafter pleased thine hand weakened may helpe thine eares stopped refuse heare long shall mind troubled painfull heauie thought long shall sorowe torment mine hart long shall mine enimie haue vpper hand looke towards lord god heare praier giue light mine eies haue slept long death sinnes haue preuailed turne againe lord turne againe deliuer soule saue thy great mercie sake lo accepted time day health grace death shall remember thee hell shall laud praise thee liueth liueth shall praise thee shall make thy mercie knowne lord rebuke thine anger punish thy great displeasure cast thy dart laie thy heauie hand vpon haue borne thine anger long cup thy high displeasure haue droonke verie deepe health flesh feare thy displeasure haue peace rest behold sinnes mine iniquity gone ouer mine head like heauie burden dailie presse downe wound soule doo fester stinke euen mine owne follie wretch cast awaie thy fauour presence go moorning daie long soule full filthinesse part mee whole sound wherfore mine enimies doo persecute greatnes paine maketh rore crie heart fainteth trembleth within strength gone awaie lord thou knowest desire thou seest necessitie forgiue sinnes lord god almightie thine owne sake put thy sight hainous offence according thy goodnesse thou hast promised forgiuenesse sinnes doo pennance haue mercie lord glorie honour thy name longer displeased thou shalt surelie knowne iust true thy word shalt ouercome thou art iudged thy great grace shall knowne thou takest mercie haue whereof may glorie thy sight dweller earth shall learne knowe thy goodnesse thou shalt confer giue thy benefit v thy great name sake euill way wicked deed uerelie lord god except thou shew vnto v thy manifold mercy world shall haue life dwell therein thou helpe v thy goodnesse may haue offended raised vp sinnes haue mercie good father haue mercie thy glorious name longer angrie take sinner vnto thy mercie name thy holie sonne iesu whome thou hast sent obteiner mercie sinnes faith bloud behold holie father behold thy child whome thou hast chosen behold thy welbeloued sonne whome thy soule delighteth vpon whome thou hast put thy holie spirit sent preach gospell poore heale sinnes sorowfull contrite comfort mourne preach pardon prisoner sight blind behold thy little one borne v behold thy sonne giuen v whome thou hast spared giuen death v sweet offering sacrifice thee uerelie tooke vpon bodie infirmity bare paine made weake sinnes wounded offence correction peace laid vpon ye stroke suffered wound healed went astraie like sheepe euerie one followeth owne waie thou lord puttest iniquitie striking offence thy people gaue bodie beaten cheekes stricken turned awaie face scorned loue mercie hath redeemed lost bloud shead crosse hath pacified thing heauen earth gaue himselfe death made praiers offender looke mercifull father consider thus suffer remember beseech thee whome hath suffered innocent whome thou gauest death v euen sinner shall iustified bloud much rather saued wrath yet enimies reconciled thee death thy sonne shall reconciled much rather saued life behold pure immaculate lambe taketh awaie sinnes world whose pretious bloud redeemed iniquity looke vpon meeke innocent like lambe led death cruellie intreated opened mouth behold thine onlie sonne whome although thou begattest thine almightie power substance nature yet thou wouldest partaker mine infirmitie god nature thought rauine equall god made himselfe lowe taking vpon shape seruant comming similitude sinfull flesh condemned sinne flesh submitting himselfe vnto thee father euen death crosse put handwriting v conteined lawe written taking waie fastned crosse spoiled potestates power made shew openlie triumphed ouer owne person turne eies thy maiestie lord god looke vpon worke thine ineffable goodnesse behold thine owne sweet sonne bodie drawne stretched foorth crosse looke vpon part bodie crowne head vnto sole foote paine shall found like vnto paine behold louing father blessed head thy deere sonne crowned sharpe thornes bloud running downe vpon godlie visage behold tender bodie scourged naked brest stricken beaten bloudie side thrust heart panteth sinewes bee stretched foorth godlie eies dazell leese sight princelie face wanne pale pleasant tongue inflamed paine inward part waxe drie starke armes blew wanne stiffe bone plucked one another beautifull leg feeble weake streames bloud issuing bodie ranne downe apace vpon foot looke father vpon humilitie gentlenesse thy deere sonne pitie infirmitie thy weake handieworke behold glorious father bodie thy deere sonne rent torne remember beseech thee small substance looke vpon paine god man release miserie man whome thou hast made behold greeuous suffering redeemer forgiue sinne hir redeemed keepe euill way teach thy holie spirit choose waie truth beseech thee thou king holinesse holie redeemer christ thou bring againe right waie may vnited made one spirit abhorred vnited flesh make go perfectlie thy path hate wicked way wash hart malice clense secret sinnes clense holie father bloud new testament thy welbeloued sonne hath loued v washed v bloud sinnes hath redeemed v iniquitie purifie heart sanctification thy spirit sprinkling bloud thy sonne filthinesse sinne euill conscience god almightie mercifull vnto sinner thy glorious name sake remember sinnes longer thou art god gratious mercifull patientlie dooest suffer v wouldest man perish yt men returne penance make lord god returne mine euill way wicked thought remember sinnes abhominations youth according thy mercie mindfull mee thy goodnesse sake lord looke vpon grienous countenance man dare speake enter iudgement thy seruant thou accuse shall neuer quit thou lord marke sinnes iniquitie shall fall thee certaine sure thy sight man liuing shall iustified seeing thou hast found iniquitie euen thine angel much rather man abhomination filthinesse dwelleth earthlie house bodie drinketh iniquitie water cleane filthinesse corrupted trulie one though haue liued one daie earth though moneths may easilie numbered truth mortall man hath done wickedlie anie righteous earth doth good sinneth yet mercie thy hand lord although thou dreadfull hope thee whome soule trusteth soule looketh thee mercie plentifull redemption thee knowe assuredlie thou wilt cast awaie euer although thou cast awaie sinnes awhile yet thou wilt haue mercie vpon againe according multitude thy mercy thou lord art full pitie mercie wilt turne thy face awaie v returne thee thou art god full sweetnesse veritie patience disposest thing mercie fountaines thy goodnesse euer full flowe ouer thy grace neuer decaieth thy way mercie truth seeke thy couenant testimony gentle louing father child gentle louing art thou lord feare thee aboundance thy mercie thou dooest pardon infirmity thou knowest thine owne handieworke thou remembrest thou seest flesh strength thou hast forgotten world full vnrighteousnesse wickednesse wholie set bent euill yea neuerthelesse thou art mercifull full grace like mercifull lord forbearest punish sinner repent themselues returne sinnes haue mercie vpon lord god sauiour glorie thy name deliuer forgiue sinnes thy name sake righteous father looke straitelie vpon multitude sinnes looke face iesus thy holie sonne without sinne bare sinnes bodie tree crosse turne awaie thy face sinnes put mine iniquity make cleane hart mee god renew mee right spirit cast awaie thy presence take thine holie spirit giue againe comfort thy helpe stablish thy mightie spirit mollifie mine hart lord god may returne thy path haue wandered ouer long waie errour turne thee shall turned thou art maker claie worke thine hand turne thy face awaie go thy seruant thine anger mine helper forsake despise lord art god health amen another psalme remission sinnes mightie god angel men whose iudgements vnsearchable whose wisedome profound deepe neare praiers thy seruants cast awaie humble suit thy poore creature handie worke long shall liue speake vnto thee hold peace long breth bodie doo turne soule vnto thee set mine eies directlie vpon thee let thine anger turned awaie beseech thee grant may find grace fauour thy sight according greatnesse thy mercie forgiue sinnes plucke awaie mine heinous offence heale soule hath offended thee make free guilt transgression acknowledge mine iniquitie sorie sinnes haue forsaken thy waie knowing thy commandements haue done thing contrarie haue broken couenant made thee haue despised keepe thy lawe uerelie haue sinned thee lord god blemish sinne abideth still euen vnto daie haue forsaken thee god maker gone awaie thee sauiour haue rebelled thee like oxe winceth striueth hee yoked haue hardened hart thee haue lifted vp necke proudlie sinne haue trusted lie deceit would knowledge thee haue followed lewdnesse mine hart pride arrogancie haue beguiled foolish boldnesse mine hart hath brought desolate way mine owne counsel aduises haue brought thing malice rebellion possesseth hart men soule put quietnesse rest thinke anie good thing yoke sinnes waxed verie heauie lifted vp fastened necke thou hast spoken would heare thou hast called would answere beleeued thy word would abide thy counsell regarded thine holie word gaue mind thy saiengs thou hast striken would knowe cause thereof thou hast corrected would take thy discipline consider mine hart thou wouldest forget sinne malice mouth lip glorified thee mine hart farre thee hid sinne adam intent haue mine iniquitie vnknowne asked counsell thy mouth would followe thy lawe haue sinned thine eies therefore soule made vnstable forsooke thee art fountaine continuall springing water intent dig selfe muddie pit haue water thing returned thee haue praied vnto thee might leaue wicked way see lord behold vile made beautie soule perished gone much dare anie wise behold looke vpon thee cause forsake thee vainlie followe vaine thing lord haue mercie vpon heare praiers thou art god sauiour besides thee turne awaie thy heauie displeasure destroie sinnes youth humblie beseech thee lord forgiue forgiue thine exceeding mercie lord god host thou determined saue let orresist thou stretch thine hand shall turne thee awaie thou maist doo potter doth pot behold thine hand claie amend lord mercie thine anger least thou vtterlie consume make vnderstand knowe hurtfull deadlie thing forsake thee lord god cast awaie feare thee man heale mee cure plague man deliuer mee thou lord woundest makest whole strikest healest againe destruction commeth selfe helpe saluation standeth onelie thee none like vnto thee thou art mightie great name thy strength turne thee lord shall turned take awaie mee sinfull hart thy lawe may bring foorth fruit remember lord thy goodnesse sake great loue thou bearest towards lord god behold thou hast made heauen earth thy great might nothing hard thee thou art puissant mightie whose name lord host great maruellous thy counsell soone thou hast spoken word thing done soone thou hast commanded thing thy word returneth thee void without effect thou lord god west mercie vnto thou canst doo thou makest though thou sawest sinnes men bicause doo penance amend liues thou louest althings hatest nothing thou hast made nothing thou madest hast ordeined anie hatred thou sparest tenderest men thing thine thou louest soules men thou doost minister mercie equitie iustice earth therefore vertues thou greatlie delightest trulie lord thou art righteous gratious notwithstanding haue offended thee transgressing thy couenant trespassing thee lord thou hast seene mine abhominations looke cause consider vile wretched see behold great confusion time reconciliation heare daie saluation haue mercie mercifull vnto haue mercie haue none helpe thee whose nothing resist whensoeuer thou doost purpose saue heare wretch making supplication vnto thee make trust thy name deliuer thy power haue regard heauen lord looke downe thine holie habitation throne thy glorie destroie bicause mine iniquitie remember sorowe paine suffer still angrie lord forget sinnes remember longer let praier ascend vp vnto thee saie vnto soule behold come thee thy helth thy saluation amen another psalme remission sinnes god eternall iust holie keepest couenant mercie loue thee keepe thy commandements looke haue mercie vpon haue trespassed thee done euil thy sight shew foorth vpon tender affection thy mercie thy seruant may haue hart praie vnto thee humblie make praier thy face trusting mine owne righteousnesse thy great mercy vncleane filthie righteousnesse like foule bloudie clowt unto thee lord iustice mercie pitie vnto confusion shame mine iniquity certainlie euen beginning haue vsed selfe proudlie thee dooing wickedlie ceasing lord thou hast redeemed yet haue ceased offend thee mine hart hath beene straight thy sight thou hast taught instructed stablished power haue beene euill affected towards thee like deceitfull bowe pride presumption accuse face ouerthrowne mine owne wickednesse doo seeke thee lord beseech thee may find thee thou art separated haue greedilie followed filthinesse yet accuse mine owne sinfull way thee lord vntill thou haue mercie vpon receiue againe thy fauour god forbid euer depart thee againe diligentlie seeke thy promise neuer hold peace keepe silence vntill thou haue established couenant thou hast made ordeined time past saie like iustice iust man shall deliuer saue time soeuer shall offend wickednesse wicked man shall hurt time soeuer shall returne wickednesse hope lord god tarie thy pleasure thou art good trust thee soule seeketh thee thou keepest thy truth euermore word issue foorth thy mouth shall void none effect destroie good lord sinnes reserue eternall punishment open thine eies behold greatnesse paine mine affliction mine iniquitie great thy sight sinnes haue brought trouble destroie vtterlie leaue sinnes thou art god mercie verie gratious execute punishment vpon thou haddest purposed doo according thy name although default sinnes manie lord thou art god thy name hath beene put vpon leaue deepenesse trouble thou hast chastised reformed manie hast strengthned wearie hand thy word haue set vp staggered thou hast made streight crooked knee wherefore seeke thee lord god hast wrought great thing vnsearchable innumerable thou hast taken vp poore dust hast exalted abiects thou dooest deliuer poore miserie straite bottomlesse pit tribulation wide mouth anguish affliction rest quietnesse thou art gratious mercifull thou shewest mercie yet come world thou art verie mercifull diligentlie obserue keepe thy lawes thou dooest patientlie suffer sinner giuing time place wherby may changed malice heare poore wretch making supplication vnto thee thee thy name haue put trust affiance take thy seruant vnto thee make good let disappointed looke come againe lord god saue soule destroie whome thou hast redeemed thy great might power looke vpon hardnesse hart vpon sinnes like thou hast manie time shewed mercie mercifull forgiue heare lord pacified regard praier doo according thy great name lord looke haue helpe saluation thee dailie meditation exercise thy mercy great thy goodnesse inestimable heare fauourablie withhold thy mercy longer waie thy iudgements looke thee soule desireth magnifie thy name haue thee memorie incline hart doo thy commandements direct way euermore thy sight let neuer heereafter go awaie thy way leaue deepenesse trouble turne thine eies awaie teach lord doo thing pleasant thy sight make perpetuall league couenant thou wilt put thy feare heart neuer swarue thee life withdrawe thy goodnesse euer keepe thy promise fidelitie good vnto beneuolence fauour thou art mercifull thy displeasure continueth euer remember fauour kindnesse visit thy saluation knowe lord god thou art gratious mercifull patient great mercifulnesse thou art good mercifull thou keepest couenant mercie thy seruants walke thee whole heart none god thou regardest carest thou hast beene euer verie mercifull deliuering soule deepe hell let thy goodnesse lord euer wealth resteth onlie thee time tribulation call vpon thee lord thou art nigh vnto call vpon thy holie name succour god looke merilie vpon shew light thy countenance thee soule trusteth hart reioiceth let praier come vnto thy throne bow downe thine eare vnto crie heare penitent lord thou hast hitherto patientlie suffered intent repent amend life god haue opened vnto thee life saue mee thy name sake trust thee care worldlie thing one thing onlie need desire may find grace fauour thy sight wherefore beseech thee lord take awaie paine sorrowe leastwise mitigate asswage either comfort counsell meanes soeuer shall bee seene good thee another psalme complaint penitent sinner sore troubled ouercome sinne lord god mercifull patient much mercifulnesse truth thine aboundant charitie according thy great mercie hast taken v power darkenesse hast saued v fountaine regeneration new birth renewing holie ghost whome thou hast shed vpon v aboundantlie iesu christ sauiour haue found grace fauour thy sight suffer speake word vnto thee displeased dooest thou euer forget leauest middest trouble euils become thy zeale thy strength multitude thy tender affection thy mercy lord may fallen rise vp againe may hath gone awaie thee returne thee againe shall sorrowe euer endure shall wound incurable neuer healed commeth passe turne still awaie thee sinne dailie increaseth selfe returne much giuen man direct owne way neither make perfect owne proceeding thy hand life euerie liuing thing spirit also euerie man thou shewest thy mercie whome thou wilt thou art gratious whome thou fauourest thou dooest kill thou dooest quicken thou leadest downe hell gate bringest vp againe thine eies behold way euerie man thou searchest hart men place secret darke wherein sinner may hide themselues thee anie man may lurke hide himselfe caues thou shalt see dooest fulfill heauen earth euerie part hast thou cast awaie thy presence takest thine enimie hast thou laid vpon head heauie weight sinnes seeing man able beare thy displeasure meaneth thou shewest thy power wretch destroiest thou sinnes youth haue sinned shall doo thee sinnes increased shall doo doo iustlie shall giue thee shalt thou receiue hand wickednesse shall hurt selfe righteousnesse shall profit life man temptation vpon earth haue sinned men haue may doo shall anie man found cleane without sinne thee shall anie man without default deed may mortall man pure sinne thy sight may borne woman righteous remember lord beseech thee thou hast made earth thou shalt bring againe dust death day passe vanish awaie like smoke waste dailie tarieng life flieth awaie winde considereth good latelie borne world shortlie shall taken awaie hence death neuer continue still one state day life short thou hast appointed end shall passe naked bare came mother wombe naked bare shall returne againe trulie men liuing vanitie haue pitie lord miserie despise work thy hand though sinne yet vnder thee wee knowe thy power strength sinne sure thou regardest v cease thine indignation lord turne cast sinnes behinde thy backe take awaie thy plague thy punishment hath made feeble faint thou chastisest man sinnes thou causest consume pine awaie whatsoeuer delectable perisheth like vnto cloth eaten mothes would god one defend vntill thine anger turned awaie thou wouldest set time thou wouldest remember cleane cast awaie thy presence shall neuer heereafter see thy face againe behold haue opened griefes soule day sorrowes haue taken flouds tribulation compasse round streames thy furie run ouer crie vnto thee lord god thou hearest aske mercie thou reiectest praiers thrustest thou downe poore wretch thy presence forsakest thou long time takest thou away mine iniquitie puttest thou awaie wickednesse mine hart arise tarie longer lord arise reiect euer haue remembrance beseech thee thoroughlie tremble shake feare yet hold tongue crie still vnto thee moorning heauie hart turne awaie stroke thy vengeance bring mind trouble rest long continuer pilgrime stranger mortall men man thou shouldst angrie mankind thou shouldest heauie lord vnto v wilt thou bring sorowe vpon sorowe pant paine find rest sorowe greeueth eate sudden sigh ouerwhelme mine hart bone broken heare mine enimies raile vpon saie daie daie thy god turnest thou thy face awaie thing lord hast thou regard trouble earnestlie make praiers dailie thy sight heauinesse mine hart doo shew vnto thee spirit carefull troubled within desperation hath entered mine hart thy pleasure lord god cast awaie thine owne handie worke deliuer soule corruption life euerlasting darknesse auaileth euer borne thou cast straight damnation seeing dead shall praise thee anie go downe hell haue sinned shall doo thee hast thou put contrarie thee wearie mine owne selfe searchest thou sinnes narrowlie man take thine hand would saie righteous without sinne thou mightest woorthilie condemne fire prepared diuell angel confesse sinner doo humble mine hart thy sight surelie anie man would stand thee iudgment shall able answere one word thousand thing wherewith thou mightest charge maketh feare deed knowing thou sparest offendeth looke vpon thy power mightie strong art thou shall call iudgement shall defend matter speake thee lord call crie thee god make mine humble suite turne awaie thine anger may knowe thou art mercifull vnto sinnes deserue strength may endure end trouble soule may patientlie abide strength stonie strength flesh made brasse helpe selfe strength flieth awaie although thou hide thing thine hart yet knowe thou wilt remember length thou art true iust lord god thou dooest condemne vniustlie rewardest man according desert come vpon bicause haue forgotten thee vsed selfe trulie thy testament mine hart hath turned backward haue followed desire flesh thou hast surelie knowne thing knowest secret hart laie lord sin youth haue remembrance mine old iniuries done thee dailie sorowe ouercommeth sadnesse possesseth mine hart looke peace haue looke time health greefe continueth still time thine anger past let mercie come yet vnhappie wo ala euer sinned mine hart therefore mourneth sad mirth ioie banished wasted miserablie confounded bicause haue forsaken cast awaie thy lawe death hath ascended vp windowes pearcing inward part mine hart dailie one muse secretlie selfe another lowd voice crie complaine meane time life draweth neere pit shall giue place rest griefes trouble forsake men get awaie shall giue water mine head fountaine teares mine eies may bewaile sinnes night daie looke may saue deliuer wrath come haue trust neither life death feare thy iudgement lord paine prepared wicked sinner feare sinne maketh carefull burden conscience oppresseth sore god tenderlie louest mankind art rightfull iudge spare beseech thee shew fauour time forgiue feare put awaie dread depart hence shall returne againe sinnes doo vexe trouble sore great none greater ala fall ala miserie ala griefe plague stroke certainlie sinne cause take suffer verie deuout effectuall praier vnto christ mercie grace hartilie said often vsed especiallie ye fast prepare selfe receiue communion lord iesu christ sonne liuing god vpon crosse thine hand spred abroad redemption mankind didst drinke bitter cup thy passion beseech thee thou wouldest vouchsafe giue helpe daie night euer lo poore wretch come vnto thee art rich sinner vnto thee art mercifull let mee returne home contemned despised nothing begin hungred let leaue fasting come vnto thee though famished let go awaie vnfed although eate sigh sorowe yet sorowe giue somewhat eate first good iesu acknowledge thy maiestie mine vnrighteousnesse towards thee behold lord conceiued sinne borne thou diddest wash sanctified afterward defiled selfe bigger greeuous sinnes borne sinne necessitie bicause could borne none otherwise afterward rolled selfe willinglie sinnes neuerthelesse thou lord mindfull thy pitie diddest take house carnall father tent vngodlie hast inspired put mind followe thee generation seeke thy face walke right path puritie abide continue among lillie virginitie chastitie sit downe togither thee supper scarsitie least excesse vnkind wretch forgetting manie great benefit entered thy seruice haue committed manie vnlawfull thing offend woonderfull vngratiouslie dooing manie foule sinne right haue amended mine euil life left sinnes heaped sinnes vpon sinnes euils wherewith thou didst create thine owne similitude likenesse haue dishonoured thee lord haue spotted defiled selfe namelie idolatrie superstition pride vaineglorie couetousnesse manie euils foule vice wherewith mine vnluckie soule vexed punished torne destroied behold lord mine vnrighteousnesse gone ouer mine head like sore burden ouer heauie beare except thou whose propertie euer haue mercie forgiue doo laie vnder mee right hand thy maiestie shall constrained miserablie sinke deepe drownd giue heed lord god behold bicause thou art holie looke mine enimie assaulteth saieng god hath forsaken persecute catch bicause man deliuer thou lord long turne againe deliuer soule oh saue thy mercy sake haue mercie vpon thy daughter thou hast brought foorth small sorowe paine bee intentiue vnto mine euilnesse thou forget thine owne goodnesse father hee deliuer child yea father correct child chasten rod pitie therefore father lord although sinner yet choose bee thy daughter bicause thou hast made yea made againe mard sinne repaire amend euermore lord first mended chastised thy child thy gentle scourge deliuer thy sonne mother forget child bare hir womb surelie although sometime forgetfull yet thou father hast promised forget v behold crie thou dooest heare vexed sorowe thou comfortest shall saie shall doo wretched caitife desolate great comfort cast tro sight thine eies wo vnto great goodnesse great mischiefe fallen whither purposed go whither come labour attaine vnto euils haue obteined sought good thing behold haue found trouble anguish care behold miserable case euen state death damnation iesus iesus departed surelie better haue nothing yea bee without iesu better liue liue without life thou lord iesu thine old mercy wilt thou absent thy selfe euer wilt thou bee angrie towards wretch euermore pacified beseech thee haue mercie vpon pacified saie turne thy face awaie intent thou mightest redeeme didst turne awaie thy face rebuked thee scorued thee spitted vpon thee confesse acknowledge haue sinned conscience deserueth damnation penance able doo sufficient make amends mine iniquitie sure certaine thy mercie exceedeth offence man doo oh doo seech thee pitifull lord write heinous sinnes thou shouldest enter iudgement thy seruant according multitude thy mercy haue mercie vpon crosse blot mine iniquity depart hence shall seene world else wo vnto wretch daie iudgement commeth bookes conscience shall laid wide open shall said lo looke vpon woman hir work wicked abhominable shall doo saie lord god heauens haue offended shall reueale shew foorth mine iniquitie earth haue polluted shall arise vp testifie manifold misdeed behold shall able ala giue neuer word answere stand thy presence trembling quaking vtterlie confounded holding downe head shame condemned also testimonie mine owne giltie conscience vnto eternall damnation ala wretch shall saie crie vnto thee lord god consumed fretted holding peace speake greefe would cease hold peace shall bitterlie vexed within go therefore soule moorne lament widowe hir husband hir virginitie howle wretch crie weeping thy spouse christ hath forsaken thee caitiffe crie alowd eares thy god saie god almightie let thine anger fall vpon deale sinnes neither reward mine iniquity thou laie much charge due sinnes much cannot receiue surelie lord power able suffer beare wherefore lord haue mercie vpon least despaire despairing take hart somewhat comforted although haue committed much thou maist condemne woorthilie yet thou hast lost wherewith thou wast woont saue sinner neither dooest thou reioice destruction losse die yea intent dead men might liue thou thy selfe didst die thy death kill death sinne reuiued againe liue thy death beseech thee let die thou liuest send downe thy hand power high deliuer hand mine enimies reioice ouer saie let v deuoure euer good iesu needed mistrust thy mercie thine enimies didst redeeme v thy bloud reconciled v vnto god behold therefore hid vnder shadowe thy mercie doo come vnto throne thy glorie requiring doo runne crieng knocking vntill thou take pitie vpon thou didst call v pardon forgiuenesse laboured pardon soone shall obtaine forgiuenesse wee aske doo remember bountifull iesu thy iustice towards sinner thinke vpon thy liberalitie gentlenesse toward thy creature doo remember thine anger toward giltie remember thy pitie mercie toward wretch forget proudlie prouoke mooue thee vnto wrath looke vpon wretch calleth vpon thee iesus sauiour therefore good iesu thine owne sake arise helpe saie vnto soule thy health thy safegard thus presume much verie bold thy goodnesse lord thou dooest teach v aske seeke knocke wherfore admonished thy word doo aske seeke knocke thou lord commandest v aske make mee able receiue thou giuest counsell seeke grant may finde thou teachest v knocke open knocke confirme vnstable wauering restore lost raise dead vouchsafe direct gouerne thy fauour sens thought dooings hencefoorth may serue thee may liue toward thee may commit selfe vnto thee knowe lord thou hast made owe debt vnto thee euen mine owne selfe thou hast redeemed mee wast made man sake owe vnto thee selfe lo haue neither giue haue vnto thee without thee doo thou take drawe vnto thee may thine following louing thee like thine condition creation liuest reignest one god blessed trinitie world without end amen psalter avgvstine composed euerie psalme dauid verse vse mother lord god almightie king eternall glorie dooest acknowledge blessed man abhorreth waie sinner doth meditate thy lawe daie night teach thou wretched sinner faithfullie serue thee feare trembling heart seeing humilitie hart doo call vnto thee voice heare haue mercie vpon mee harken vnto praier neither thou thy part rebuke thy wrath old enimie mankinde lieng wait part deuoure soule like lion teare peeces none helpe lord whose name excellent world turne thou mine enimie backe fall againe perish thy presence let intrap soule firie snare suffer brimstone stormie tempest torment oppression needie sighings poore thou dooest arise behold heare lord god thou art counsell trust poore make walke vprightlie worke righteousnesse thy fauourable kindnesse may portion mine inheritance keepe apple thine eie hide vnder shadowe thy wing thou art strength rocke refuge cleanse fro secret fault keepe thy seruant presumptuous sinnes send helpe thy sanctuarie giue mee mine hart desire saue lion mouth lead path righteousnesse may ascend thy mountaine stand thine holie place hauing innocent hand pure hart remember sinnes youth rebellion gather soule sinner neither giue vnto lust mine aduersaries fauourablie harken thou vnto voice petition calling vpon glorie thine holie name thou doo heare haue mercie vpon trusting thee let neuer confounded forgiue punishment sinne let thy mercie lord vpon trust thee deliuering feare saie vnto soule thy saluation trust vnder shadowe thy wing giue mine hart desire haste thee helpe mee lord saluation lord let knowe mine end measure day let knowe long haue liue incline vnto heare crie bring lake miserie mirie claie set foot vpon rocke order going deliuer time trouble may go thy glorious house thou art god strength let step go thy path may loue righteousnesse hate iniquitie thou mine hope strength thou art great king ouer earth thou art god euer deliuer soule power hell hath receiued thee thou shalt appeare iudge v haue mercie vpon according multitude thy mercy take thine holie spirit gratious god houre hide thy face sinnes put awaie mine iniquity create cleane hart god renew right spirit within may appeare like greene oliue tree house god iacob reioice euerlastinglie glad israel saue god thy name thy power iudge mee hide thy selfe fro supplication mercifull vnto send thou heauen saue reproofe would swalowe vp breake teeth god mouth breake iawes yoong lion lord thou art defence mercifull god helpe thy right hand vnder couering thy wing let protected thou art render euerie man according work soule thirsteth thee hide conspiracie wicked sith flesh shall come vnto thee put backe thy mercie neither take thine holie spirit cause thy face shine vpon send good passage god sauest v deepe swallowe vp pit shut hir mouth vpon thou mine helper deliuerer lord make tarieng sith thee lord doo trust let neuer bee confounded thou shalt iudge people lo withdrawe themselues thee shall perish oh let oppressed returne ashamed bicause thou art righteous iudge thou makest lowe thou exaltest shall stand thy sight thou art angrie thou art god dooest woonders thou nourishedst thy people bread ye wildernesse didst turne lust let thy grace refresh hungrie soule make haste let thy tender mercy preuent thou defender giue bread teares bitternesse troubled mind time tribulation grant withall honie rocke may taste sweetnesse inward consolation god iudgest betweene innocent sinner alone art high ouer ye earth haue mercie vpon giue grace glorie hast ordeined lawe forgiue iniquitie mine hart couer sinnes saue thou thy seruant trusteth thee god laiest foundation thy church vpon holie mountaines incline thine eare vnto crie let thine hand therefore establish turne vnto destruction deliuer snare hunter pestilence plague destroieth noone daie planted thine house may flourish like palmetree growe like cedar libanon bringing fruit euen mine old age bicause holines becommeth thine house lord euer thou refuge god rocke mine hope thou lord art great god great king aboue god thou wilt iudge world righteousnesse thy people truth shall enioie light righteous ioie vpright hart let thy right hand thine holie arme preserue mee thou sittest vpon cherubims make mee come thy presence ioifulnesse may walke vprightnesse mine hart midst mine house let froward hart depart cause mine eies turned vnto faithfull may sit walking perfect waie thy iudgement thou shalt cut worker wickednesse citie lord heare praier let crie come vnto thee hide thy face time trouble incline thine eares vnto pardon sinnes redeeme soule destruction satisfie longing good thing thou lookest vpon earth trembleth broughtest foorth thy people ioie thy chosen gladnesse make keepe iudgment worke righteousnesse time bring darknesse shadowe death prepared hart may sing giue praise saue lord according thy mercie glorie saint assemblie congregation iust righteousnesse may endure euer mine horne exalted glorie thou raisest needie dust liftest vp poore doong making iudah thy sanctification israel thy dominion may blesse thee lord hencefoorth euer shall walke lord land liuing breake thou bond confirme thy mercie towards call vpon thee trouble lord heare set large teach lord waie thy statute may liue keepe vnto end giue vnderstanding search thy lawe obserue also mine whole hart haue gone astraie like lost sheepe seeke thy seruant deliuer soule preserue going comming foot may stand court ierusalem lift vp mine eies vnto thee dwellest heauens deliuer soule snare foulers least put foorth mine hand vnto wickednesse fill mouth laughter tongue ioie replenish longing good thing thy beloued may find rest blesse sion may see welth ierusalem hauing escaped cord wickednesse let thine eares attend vnto voice praiers lord let mine hart hautie mine eies loftie giue grace thinke humblie vntill find place lord habitation mightie god iacob lord hath appointed blessing life euer lift vp mine hand thy sanctuarie praise thee iudgest thy people art pacified towards thy seruants god god lord lord weeping worshipping towards thine holie temple trie knowe marke consider path leade thy waie euer deliuer lord euill man preserue cruell man let praier directed thy sight incense bring soule prison may praise thy name heare praier lord thy righteousnesse enter iudgement thy seruant heare speedilie lord least spirit faile thou god art refuge deliuerer forasmuch thou art great woorthie praised thy greatnesse incomprehensible raise vp crooked loose shackeled giue sight blind thou dooest build vp ierusalem thou hast made barres thy gate strong let coupled thy child within angel power kingdome heauen doo praise thee let triumphing gloriouslie congregation saint sounding cimbals lip praise magnifie thy name holie glorious reigneth euerlastinglie amen shushanna hir psalter conteining verie deuout praiers remission sinnes auoiding kind sinne leading godlie life almightie euerliuing god thou god al power whose eies thing naked bare lord thou great terrible god saie keepest couenant mercie loue thee doo thy commandements let thine eares bee open thou maist heare praiers thy seruant make thee time let ascend vp thy presence accepted thy sight iesus christ sake haue mercie vpon thy poore creature worke thine hand haue sinned done wickedlie haue offended thy maiestie greeuouslie haue gone backe departed thy precept iudgements haue followed thy seruants prophet spake vnto thy name haue daie daie prouoked thy iust wrath indignation lord acknowledge confesse vnto thee manifold sinnes wickednesse haue vnrighteouslie greeuouslie committed thee thought word deed youth vp vntill daie taught thy word grace hartilie sorie doo vnfeinedlie repent purposing euermore assistance thy grace walke new life desiring thee pretious bloudshedding iesus christ thy deere sonne lord haue mercie vpon forgiue mine offence according thy great mercie promise hast said time euer sinner dooth repent sinne bottome hart put wickednesse remembrance lord remember therefore multitude misdeed beseech thee according thy great mercy thinke vpon call remembrance christ sake thy louing kindnesse thy tender mercie hath euer beene old hide thy face cast thy seruant thy displeasure thy mercy sake deliuer sinnes make scorne vnto foolish turne awaie thy mercie let thy louing kindnesse truth alwaie preserue helpe thy name sake deliuer thy strength heare praier lord consider word mouth misdeed preuaile bee thou mercifull vnto sinnes let sorowfull sighing prisoner come thee lord comfort soule thy seruant vnto thee doo flie succour satisfie thy mercie soone shall reioice glad thee day life looke extreamlie done amisse haue sinned heauen thee woorthie called thy child yet lord thy great goodnesse powre downe crums fall thy childrens table make one least reward according deseruings must need perish vnto perteineth nothing open shame confusion damnation thee mercie forgiuenesse plentious redemption therefore come vnto thee lord thou louer soules hoping mine owne righteousnesse trusting onlie multitude thy great mercy thou hast made laid foorth eies people offering saluation whole world hast promised whosoeuer whole generation man receiue grace repent turne vnfeignedlie sinnes shall haue free remission forgiuenesse iesus christ lord onelie aduocate mediator whome saluation lieth whome thou hast said deere sonne whome well pleased well pacified thy sonnes sake whome bold come vnto thee appeareth thy sight making continuall intercession v haue mercie vpon thou mightie god cleanse sinnes doo awaie mine iniquity oh let feele thy mercy towards doo confesse sinnes vnto thee lord hide mine vnrighteousnesse doo acknowledge mine offence accuse selfe thee misdeed helpe god sauiour glorie thy name deliuer forgiue sinnes thy rich mercy sake remember offence youth lord thinke vpon thy great mercy couenant made vnto christ iesus thy tender mercie sake laie sinnes charge forgiue past giue grace amend life decline sinne incline vertue may walke vpright hart cleane conscience single eie thee daie night euermore put thy presence oh thou god comfort incline thine eare vnto calling strengthen thy seruant power thy right hand helpe thine handmaiden comfort soule thy sweet promise let thy mercy couer mine infirmity mercifull father consider mine infirmity saie manie great beare mine imperfection thy sonne sauiour iesus christes sake good experience infirmitie might mercifull vnto afflicted consider enimie hath gotten open waie flesh wherein confesse dwelleth nothing sinne wretchednesse miserie yea lord acknowledge borne sinne conceiued wickednesse nature child wrath flesh dwelleth good thing selfe able thinke good thought much lesse doo thou thy lawe requirest bee done hast said cursed continueth thing written lawe doo againe lawe spirituall carnall sold vnder sinne therefore lord god call vnto thee grace hast said aske yee shall haue seeke yee shall finde knocke shall bee opened vnto preuent drawe goodnesse none come vnto thee except drawne except borne aboue cannot see kingdome god assist therefore guide thy holie spirit time time drawe shall runne thee giue strength ablenesse christ lord accomplish fulfill thy righteous stand assault diuell stonie vnbeleeuing blind doubtfull vnfaithfull vnthankefull hart giue hart flesh loue incline thy carnall secure impenitent hart take awaie giue hart feare loue obeie thee write thy lawe hart graue mind may beleeue trust liue thee euer take wicked spirit suspicion enuie hatred variance strife sedition sect euill gealousie vaine surmise murmuring grudging backbiting slandering anie especiallie calling office idlenesse sloth beastlie securitie giue ouer vnto vnshamefast obstinate minde hold alwaies vnto thy nourture correction bow hart alwaies vnto thee may serue thee day life holinesse righteousnes acceptable thee giue thy grace oh lord may haue thee alwaies mine eies may also haue respect vnto thy iudgements whatsoeuer saie thinke doo may agreeable thy holie word minded vngodlie wicked men woman let haue pleasure thing please grant whensoeuer ouertaken anie kind sinne wickednesse either thought word deede feele mine owne infirmitie weakenesse may immediatelie hartie repentance returne thee againe lie still securitie sinne make able contented patience heare occasion offence offered giuen recompense euill euill suffer good lord giue occasion euill anie man doo make willing confesse fault amend giue grace neuer enuie anie good man loue woman doo either loue god people else beloued make reioice men gift enuie better mine rather giue thanks hart desiring may increased increase faith lord sauiour thee thy christ make strong beleeue thy promise increase loue redeemer thee thy righteous people make perfect true vnfeined vertue godlinesse increase sure hope saluation iustifier without doubt wauering aduersitie without pride presumption prosperitie may serue thee reuerence godlie feare day life increase strength resist sinne get victorie masterie stand euill temptation assault flesh world diuell may haue place according thy promise neuer prooued tempted thou wilt giue strength ouercome increase lord vertues agreeable godlie life come vnto thee god vnto well euerlasting fountaine health saluation good lord giue grace therefore day pilgrimage walke good conscience pure mind thee towards men dooing reader thy holie word talker onlie may appeare world vaine pompe pleasure beautie thereof may vnto vile dust filth slime may vse though vsed may serue may take part thereof vnto necessitie thanksgiuing doo vse thy creature voluptuouslie may liue soberlie godlie present life thy glorie preserue defend thy seruant false opinion deceiued caried awaie errour wicked may growe grace knowledge lord sauiour iesus christ lord giue wisedome knowledge vnderstanding perceiue false lieng flattering spirit doo deceiue hart innocent begile vnstable soules giue also lord right reuerent pure iudgement vnderstanding thy holie word auoide rash iudgements peruerse interpretation may neuer swarue true sense meaning therof grant cheefest felicitie may thy holie word hearing reading talking watching praier fasting mortifieng mine owne member lord plant true obedience thy lawe let care world choke thy word make lift vp hart oftentimes thee chance fall slip make thinke thee sorie stedfast purpose amendment oh lord offer vp selfe whollie crooked corrupt nature much work vnto thy mercie corrected reformed thine owne pleasure let hand vngodlie cast downe saue soule lord god whither bee prosperitie aduersitie losse gaine sickenesse health life death aid strengthen succour defend thy seruant aduersities tribulation temptation suffer tempted aboue strength increase ioie comfort thee thy holie spirit may reioice trouble affliction imbrace consolation comfort thinke selfe happie counted woorthie suffer anie trouble thy name sake take mine hart thought earthlie comfort onlie set mine eies ioie crosse christ may take comfort therein despise shame great reward laid vp heauen patience suffer aduersitie continue welldooing vnto end oh lord take saie carefull hart worldlie thing let vile vnto thy sake grant neither pouertie oppresse driue despaire falshood neither wealth prosperitie lift vp forget thee selfe prosperitie may thankfull aduersitie patient humble lord let merie without lightnesse sad without mistrust sober without dulnesse fearing thee without desperation trusting thee without presumption let merie ioie without thee let desire nothing besides thee good lord giue ioifulnesse hart peace conscience continuall gladnesse consolation thy word promise may euermore thankfull vnto thee praise thy name euer let thy kingdome come vnto righteousnesse peace ioie holie ghost long suffering gentlenesse goodnesse faithfulnesse meekenesse temperance strength patience like vertues prescribed vnto thy holie word grant god tender louing mercifull hart towards brother long amitie perfect patience beare thing well thy prouidence shall see meet laie vpon thy fatherlie mercie god leaue selfe stand thou alwaies weake mine owne power doo anie thing good righteousnesse strength lieth onelie thee therefore lord come vnto thee requiring mercie thy sight assistance thy grace may bee strengthened power inward man armed assay thine holie complet armour breastplate righteousnesse sheeld faith hope saluation helmet swoord spirit thy holie word may stand perfect thy bee found woorthie christ receiue crowne life thou hast promised loue thee purenesse mind therefore lord giue ouer selfe thine holie hand desiring thee christ sake thus armed may remaine vnder protection strong defence thy power thine holie angel may pitch tent round compasse alwaies beseech thee lord giue vnto thy seruant strength thine holie spirit subdue bodie sinne whole lust thereof may bee made obedient mind member doo thine holie thou shalt appeare reward euerie one according deed may reioice ashamed thee thy comming moreouer lord beseech thee thinke vpon thy people straied farthest part earth entered couenant thee minded walke thy grant lord may growe togither loue knowledge thy word keepe vnitie spirit bond peace vtter confounding errour false opinion keepe v cleane hypocrisie superstition make v strong trouble affliction heauenlie father grant vnto saie wheresoeuer dispersed throughout vniuersall world professe thy holie word liue may die sinne lead godlie conuersation walking innocentlie thee rule confirme hart thy spirit lord lighten mind guide v alwaies lightsome lampe thine holie gospell gouerne preserue thy church defend realmes city giue succour harbour thy people make v diligent happie work vocation take thy custodie euer soules body liues euer haue gratious fauourable oh lord men euen verie enimies according thy good purpose forgiue sinnes conuert vnto thy truth thou hast appointed iesus christ saluation mercifull god brother sister suffer anie kind persecution affliction whether mind bodie especiallie suffer thy name gospell giue patience constancie stedfast hope till thou send full good deliuerance trouble gratious thou hast coupled linked v loue friendship whose hart thou hast mooued praie v wish v good succour helpe v necessity grant v thy blessing holie spirit sanctifie v vnitie faith dwell v euer finallie oh lord haue mercie vpon mine husband child familie thou hast giuen v make content thy gift increase thy feare hart may trulie loue thee one another v thee may pure soule bodie may godlie liue togither according thine holie ordinance giue hart wisedome vnderstanding set thy feare alwaie mine eies ioseph cast surmise misbehauiour marie spouse obeied word thine holie angel may beare mine imperfection bee obedient word deed thought thy oh lord giue v power thy spirit gouerne selues holilie rule bring vp child familie godlie feare nurture information lord knowledge thy holie word may alwaies vnto example godlinesse vertue praise thine holie name plant mine hart vertues necessarie requisite christian woman giue mee grace vse good gift haue receiued thy mercifull hand may thy glorie praise consolation saluation profit thy church behold lord although dust earth ash yet haue taken vpon bold come make petition request vnto thee trusting mine owne woorthinesse righteousnesse doo acknowledge prophet stained defiled onlie thy great mercie promise merit christ death bloudshedding laie mine humble praiers thee requiring mercie pardon forgiuenesse sinnes also assistance thy grace doo thy day life obteine petition therefore heare speedilie good lord forgiue fauourablie lord tarie ouerlong thine owne sake doo thy deere sonne iesus christ sake thy promise yea amen onelie redeemer mediator sauiour iustifier thee father holie ghost honour glorie praise euer amen another good godlie praier said time euerie christian man woman almightie euerlasting god father sonne holie ghost thou hast made heauen earth thing conteined haue mercie vpon poore wretched sinner dailie assaulted kind miserie wretchednesse beseech thee father loue thy sonne iesus christ consider weakenesse frailtie imperfection haue mercie vpon increase thy grace souereigne sauiour deere redeemer mine onelie iustifier come vnto thee lord according word sauiour christ hath said come vnto ye labour laden ease refresh oh mercifull father ease great burden sinne haue vnrighteouslie committed thee either thought word deed refresh soule dailie thy mercy sprinkle sweet hysop thy mercie shall cleane wash shall whiter snowe powre vpon ioie gladnesse make bone reioice thou hast smitten turne thy face sinnes put misdeed make cleane heart god renew right spirit within cast awaie thy presence take thy holie spirit oh giue comfort thy helpe againe stablish thy free spirit shall teach thy way vnto wicked sinner may conuerted vnto thee deliuer bloud guiltinesse god thou art god health tongue may praise thy righteousnesse open lip lord shall mouth shew foorth thy praise consider mine imperfection helpe thy mercy remember thine old woonted mercy faithfull promise made vnto forefather abraham isaac iacob patriarch prophet apostle martyr thy saint sauiour christ iesus compassed infirmitie weakenesse flesh came vnto thee lord vnto well euerlasting fountaine health saluation thou mercifullie susteinedst keepedst deliueredst temptation tribulation foot anie time slipt went waie committed sinne thee yet thy mercie alwaies readie thou thine holie spirit diddest procure repentance turned againe vnto thee conuersion turning againe thou mercifullie acceptedst hand bicause desirous liue perfectlie thy sight thou preseruedst found faithfull thee lord thou art thy yeeres endure euer beseech thee father beare mine imperfection helpe likewise thy mercie anie time happen fall commit sinne thee thou saiedst thine holie apostle paule let thy grace time sufficient wise may immediatelie turne againe true repentance vnto thee conuersion turning againe accept alwaies mine hand iesus christ sake shall found perfect thee although spirit bee willing yet flesh vntoward weake therefore doo leaue mine owne righteousnesse thee knowe confesse saie flesh nothing plaine miserie wretchednesse sinne therefore doo come vnto thee beseech thee christes sake extend thy mercifull hand towards doo awaie mine offence knowe lord grace goodnesse commeth thee therefore art thou praised loued feared congregation among saincts thou art onlie giuest victorie lord host thou saiest thy prophet neither host men strength thy spirit therefore beseech thee giue onlie strength knowledge thee also readie earnest purpose subdue mine imperfection grace time liue thou thy holie word hast prescribed vnto moreouer beseech thee make perfect thy sight may render continuall thanks iesus christ thee haue hitherto indeuored selfe according power thou hast giuen liue thy praie thee forgiue iesus sake protest thee helpe spirit order life hence foorth according thy word walke perfectlie thee neuerthelesse beseech thee christes sake time beare imperfection shall may anie time found deliuer thy power mercie increase faith sauiour increase faith iustifier increase faith redeemer increase faith hope charitie vertues consonant agreeable godlie life come vnto thee well euerlasting fountaine health saluation heauenlie father let men woman liue thy sight seeke thy word intent forsake sinne vngodlie liuing walke godlie conuersation innocentlie thee thanke thee lord hart mind hath pleased thee thy great mercie goodnesse create forme mould earth giuen member requisite needfull bodie hath pleased thee preserue thou hast created sith time creation vntill hath pleased thee defend daie night day time life hitherto hurt peril deliuered hour temptation tribulation well asleepe forgetfull remembred called vpon thee hath pleased thee minister necessitie meate drinke cloathing inward reioicing quietnesse mind health bodie like hath pleased thee giue man brother profession b husband vaile remedie consolation comfort necessity grant grace lord trulie honor loue serue obeie thee knowe whatsoeuer doo good euill shall rewarded thee lighten v dailie thy grace may gouerne selues houshold child thou hast giuen v true faith feare knowledge thee may acceptable sacrifice vnto thee iesus christ lord seeing hath pleased thee father lighten inward eies mind thy grace call great blindnesse ignorance sinne wherein men borne knowledge thee let paule saith please thee preserue whome thou hast called dailie oppressed sinne desire turne come vnto thee tongue nation soeuer whole world seeing hath pleased thee call grace knowledge thy word giuen seeke loue beleeue let thy direct way erre oh staie foot thy holie hand preserue thine arme else farre weake without thee doo nothing oh let liue thy sight lord put thee giue new hart new spirit yea pure mind cleane conscience make thou shall perfect thee shall call vpon thee time trouble offer acceptable sacrifice thou wouldest receiue v thy protection keepe v night diuell haue power ouer v thou watchfull ouer v eternall sauiour least subtill tempter apprehend v thou art made v euerlasting protector behold whether sleepe wake whether liue die thine thou art creator redeemer stand therefore behalfe watch armie thy celestiall warriers thine angel filled perfect goodnesse perpetuall integritie behold thy face alwaies heauens expell v house wicked spirit bee mortall enimies damage v case deliuer v persecutor laie snare destruction turne away thy mercie truth v god assist v peaceablie may rest sleepe quiet laie v downe peace sleepe thou lord alone makest v dwell safetie without danger hide v thy tabernacle lord sitting thy secret place abiding vnder shadowe thy wing may saie vnto thee lord thou art keeper refuge god trust thee feare danger although extreame darknesse yet wee feare though walke midst shadowe death yet dread none euill thou art v thy rod thy staffe doo comfort v let thy mercie god followe v day life may dwell thy house longnesse day praising thee euermore sonne holie ghost one true god reigning world without end amen another large euening praier confession lord god father euerlasting full pitie acknowledge confesse woorthie lift vp eies heauen much lesse present selues thy maiestie confidence thou wilt heare praiers grant request consider owne deseruings conscience doo accuse v sinnes beare witnesse v knowe thou art vpright iudge dooest iustifie sinner wicked men punishest fault transgresse thy commandements yet mercifull father since hath pleased thee command v call thee trouble aduersities promising euen helpe v feele selues swallowed vp death desperation vtterlie renounce worldlie confidence flie thy souereigne bountie onlie staie refuge beseeching thee call remembrance manifold sinnes wickednesse whereby continuallie prouoke thy wrath indignation v neither negligence vnkindnesse haue neither woorthilie esteemed liues sufficientlie expressed sweet comfort thy gospell reuealed vnto v rather accept obedience death thy sonne offering vp bodie sacrifice hath made sufficient recompense sinnes haue mercie therefore vpon v lord forgiue v offence teach v thy holie spirit may rightlie way earnestlie repent much rather lord reprobate thou hast forsaken praise thee call vpon thy name repenting hart sorowfull mind conscience oppressed hungering thirsting thy grace shall euer set forth thy praise glorie albeit woorms dust yet thou art creator worke thy hand yea thou art father thy child thou art shepheard thy flocke thou art redeemer people thou hast bought thou art god thine inheritance correct v therefore thine anger lord neither according desert punish v mercifullie chastise v fatherlie affection world may knowe time soeuer sinner doth repent sin bottome hart thou wilt put awaie wickednesse thy remembrance thou hast promised thy holie prophet finallie humblie thanke thee mercifull father thy deerelie beloued sonne iesus christ sauiour thy benefit bestowed vpon v beginning world time election creation redemption sanctification continuall preseruation namelie thy mercie goodnesse thou hast preserued v daie time life hitherto misfortune hurt danger bodilie ghostlie forsomuch hath pleased thee make night man rest thou hast ordeined daie trauell whither sleepe wake liue die alwaies thine grant deere father may take bodilie
